atk-s0502a0:807_5: suṇavācaṃ maccheravinayaṃ akkodhananti imāni satta vatapadāni pūretvā –
atk-s0502a0:812_0: Evaṃ pasaṃsiyabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā jīvitapariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:812_5: Sakko attano parisāya kassaci apivanatthāya saññamadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:812_7: Sakko “kiṃ me imehi sādhāraṇena rajjenā”ti attano parisāya saññaṃ datvā te pādesu gāhāpetvā mahāsamudde khipāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:812_9: Atha nesaṃ puññānubhāvena sineruno heṭṭhimatale asuravimānaṃ nāma nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:813_0: Devāsurasaṅgāme pana asuresu parājitesu dasayojanasahassaṃ tāvatiṃsadevanagaraṃ nāma nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:813_1: Tassa pana nagarassa pācīnapacchimadvārānaṃ antarā dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:813_3: Taṃ kho pana nagaraṃ dvārasahassayuttaṃ ahosi ārāmapokkharaṇipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:813_4: Tassa majjhe sālāya nissandena tiyojanasatubbedhehi dhajehi paṭimaṇḍito sattaratanamayo sattayojanasatubbedho vejayanto nāma pāsādo uggañchi.
atk-s0502a0:813_11: Iti sālāya nissandena yojanasahassubbedho pāsādo sattaratanamayova hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:813_12: koviḷārarukkhassa nissandena samantā tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalo pāricchattako nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:813_13: pāsāṇaphalakassa nissandena pāricchattakamūle dīghato saṭṭhiyojanā puthulato paṇṇāsayojanā bahalato pañcadasayojanā
atk-s0502a0:814_0: Hatthī pana erāvaṇo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:814_2: Tasmā so uyyānakīḷāya nikkhamanakāle attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko erāvaṇo nāma hatthī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:814_3: So tettiṃsajanānaṃ atthāya tettiṃsa kumbhe māpesi āvaṭṭena tigāvutaaḍḍhayojanappamāṇe,
atk-s0502a0:814_4: sabbesaṃ majjhe sakkassa atthāya sudassanaṃ nāma tiṃsayojanikaṃ kumbhaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0502a0:814_6: Tattha antarantarā sattaratanamayā yojanubbedhā dhajā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0502a0:814_8: Yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasaṃmisso dibbagītasaddo viya ravo niccharati.
atk-s0502a0:814_9: Maṇḍapamajjhe sakkassatthāya yojaniko maṇipallaṅko paññatto hoti,
atk-s0502a0:814_11: Tettiṃsa devaputtā attano kumbhe ratanapallaṅke nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:814_12: Tettiṃsāya kumbhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ kumbhe satta satta dante māpesi.
atk-s0502a0:814_14: ekekasmiñcettha dante satta satta pokkharaṇiyo honti,
atk-s0502a0:814_16: ekekasmiṃ gacche satta satta pupphāni honti,
atk-s0502a0:814_18: ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta devadhītaro naccanti.
atk-s0502a0:814_19: Evaṃ samantā paṇṇāsayojanaṭhānesu hatthidantesuyeva naṭasamajjā honti.
atk-s0502a0:814_20: Evaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavanto sakko devarājā vicarati.
atk-s0502a0:815_0: Sudhammāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā tattheva nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:815_1: Tassā sudhammā nāma nava yojanasatikā devasabhā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:815_2: Tato ramaṇīyataraṃ kira aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:815_3: māsassa aṭṭha divase dhammassavanaṃ tattheva hoti.
atk-s0502a0:815_6: Nandāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā tattheva nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:815_7: tassā pañcayojanasatikā nandā nāma pokkharaṇī nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:815_8: Cittāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā tattheva nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:815_10: tattha uppannapubbanimitte devaputte netvā mohayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:815_11: Sujā pana kālaṃ katvā ekissā girikandarāya ekā bakasakuṇikā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:815_12: Sakko attano paricārikā olokento “sudhammā idheva nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:815_14: sujā nu kho kuhiṃ nibbattā”ti cintento taṃ tattha nibbattaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:815_15: “bālā kiñci puññaṃ akatvā idāni tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:815_16: idāni pana taṃ puññaṃ kāretvā idhānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā aññātakavesena tassā santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a0:815_27: Sakko “ahaṃ taṃ tattha nessāmī”ti vatvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ netvā nandāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre vissajjetvā itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0502a0:815_36: sobhati vatassā attabhāvo”ti keḷiṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:816_1: “diṭṭhā te sahāyikā”ti vatvā “diṭṭhā maṃ uppaṇḍetvā gatā,
atk-s0502a0:816_2: tattheva maṃ nehī”ti vutte taṃ tattheva netvā udake vissajjetvā,
atk-s0502a0:816_10: Sā tato paṭṭhāya sayaṃmatamacchakeyeva pariyesitvā khādati.
atk-s0502a0:816_12: vālukāpiṭṭhe matamacchako viya hutvā uttāno nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:816_16: So thokaṃ vītināmetvā puna tassā purato uttāno hutvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:816_17: Puna sā “matamacchako”ti saññāya gahetvā gilanakāle agganaṅguṭṭhaṃ cālesi.
atk-s0502a0:816_19: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vīmaṃsitvā “sādhukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhatī”ti attānaṃ jānāpetvā “ahaṃ tava vīmaṃsanatthāya āgato,
atk-s0502a0:816_21: evaṃ rakkhamānā na cirasseva mama santike nibbattissasi,
atk-s0502a0:817_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya pana sayaṃmatamacchaṃ labhati vā, na vā.
atk-s0502a0:817_1: Alabhamānā katipāhaccayeneva sussitvā kālaṃ katvā tassa sīlassa phalena bārāṇasiyaṃ kumbhakārassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:817_2: Athassā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikakāle sakko “kuhiṃ nu kho sā nibbattā”ti āvajjento disvā,
atk-s0502a0:817_3: “idāni mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti eḷālukavaṇṇena paññāyamānehi sattahi ratanehi yānakaṃ pūretvā taṃ pājento bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0502a0:817_5: eḷālukāni gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti ugghosento vīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a0:817_6: Muggamāsādīni gahetvā āgate pana “mūlena na demī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0502a0:817_21: “Tuyhamevetāni mayā ānītānī”ti yānakaṃ pājento tassā gharaṃ gantvā aññehi anāhariyaṃ katvā eḷālukavaṇṇena
atk-s0502a0:817_24: pañcasīlāni akhaṇḍādīni katvā rakkhāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:818_0: Sāpi tato cavitvā asurabhavane asurajeṭṭhakassa dhītā hutvā sakkassa verighare nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:818_1: Dvīsu pana attabhāvesu sīlassa surakkhitattā abhirūpā ahosi suvaṇṇavaṇṇā asādhāraṇāya rūpasiriyā samannāgatā.
atk-s0502a0:818_2: Vepacittiasurindo āgatāgatānaṃ asurānaṃ “tumhe mama dhītu anucchavikā na hothā”ti taṃ kassaci adatvā,
atk-s0502a0:818_3: “mama dhītā attanāva attano anucchavikaṃ sāmikaṃ gahessatī”ti asurabalaṃ sannipātāpetvā,
atk-s0502a0:818_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko tassā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ olokento taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a0:818_7: “idāni mayā gantvā taṃ ānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahallakaasuravaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā gantvā parisapariyante aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:818_8: Sāpi ito cito ca olokentī taṃ diṭṭhamattāva pubbasannivāsavasena uppannena pemena mahogheneva ajjhotthaṭahadayā hutvā,
atk-s0502a0:818_9: “eso me sāmiko”ti tassa upari pupphadāmaṃ khipi.
atk-s0502a0:818_10: Asurā “amhākaṃ rājā ettakaṃ kālaṃ dhītu anucchavikaṃ alabhitvā idāni labhi,
atk-s0502a0:818_11: ayamevassa dhītu pitāmahato mahallako anucchaviko”ti lajjamānā apakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:818_12: Sakkopi taṃ hatthe gahetvā “sakkohamasmī”ti naditvā ākāse pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:818_15: Sakko taṃ tattha āropetvā devanagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:818_16: Athassa sippalivanaṃ sampattakāle rathasaddaṃ sutvā bhītā garuḷapotakā viraviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:818_17: Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā sakko mātaliṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:818_22: “Maṃ ekaṃ nissāya ettako dijo rathavegena vicuṇṇito mā nassi,
atk-s0502a0:818_24: Sopi sindhavasahassassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ datvā rathaṃ nivattesi.
atk-s0502a0:818_25: Taṃ disvā asurā “jarasakko asurapurato paṭṭhāya palāyanto idāni rathaṃ nivattesi,
atk-s0502a0:818_26: addhā tena upatthambho laddho bhavissatī”ti nivattetvā āgamanamaggeneva asurapuraṃ pavisitvā puna sīsaṃ na ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:819_0: Sakkopi sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ devanagaraṃ netvā aḍḍhateyyānaṃ accharākoṭīnaṃ jeṭṭhikaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:819_3: mama imasmiṃ devaloke mātāpitaro vā bhātikabhaginiyo vā natthi,
atk-s0502a0:819_7: Tato paṭṭhāya cittapāṭaliyā pupphitāya asurā “amhākaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne dibbapāricchattakassa pupphanakālo”ti yuddhatthāya saggaṃ abhiruhanti.
atk-s0502a0:819_13: Sabbūpari pana upaddavanivattanatthāya devanagaradvāresu vajirahatthā indapaṭimā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:819_14: Asurā nāgādayo jinitvā āgatāpi indapaṭimā dūrato disvā “sakko nikkhanto”ti palāyanti. Evaṃ, mahāli,
atk-s0502a0:819_16: Evaṃ appamatto panesa evarūpaṃ issariyaṃ patvā dvīsu devalokesu rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:819_18: Appamādañhi nissāya sabbesampi lokiyalokuttarānaṃ visesānaṃ adhigamo hotīti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:823_0: Tattha appamādenāti macalagāme bhūmippadesasodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā katena appamādena.
atk-s0502a0:823_1: Maghavāti idāni “maghavā”tipaññāto magho māṇavo dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ rājabhāvena devānaṃ seṭṭhataṃ gato.
atk-s0502a0:823_2: Pasaṃsantīti buddhādayo paṇḍitā appamādameva thomenti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0502a0:823_5: Pamādo garahito sadāti pamādo pana tehi ariyehi niccaṃ garahito nindito.
atk-s0502a0:823_8: Manussadobhaggaṃ vā hi apāyuppatti vā sabbā pamādamūlikāyevāti.
atk-s0502a0:827_0: Appamādarato bhikkhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:828_0: So kira satthu santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:828_1: So “visesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti tato nikkhamitvā satthu santikaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a0:828_2: dāvaggiṃ uṭṭhitaṃ disvā vegena ekaṃ muṇḍapabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruyha nisinno araññaṃ ḍayhamānaṃ aggiṃ
atk-s0502a0:828_4: “yathā ayaṃ aggi mahantāni ca khuddakāni ca upādānāni ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:828_5: evaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaggināpi mahantāni ca khuddakāni ca saṃyojanāni ḍahantena gantabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:828_6: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā, “evameva, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:828_7: mahantānipi khuddakānipi upādānāni viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantare uppajjamānāni aṇuṃthūlāni saṃyojanāni,
atk-s0502a0:828_8: tāni ñāṇagginā jhāpetvā abhabbuppattikāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a0:828_9: abhimukhe nisinno viya paññāyamāno imaṃ obhāsagāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:831_0: Saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ, ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:832_2: Pamāde bhayadassi vāti nirayuppattiādikaṃ pamāde bhayaṃ bhayato passanto,
atk-s0502a0:832_3: tāsaṃ vā uppattīnaṃ mūlattā pamādaṃ bhayato passanto.
atk-s0502a0:832_4: Saṃyojananti vaṭṭadukkhena saddhiṃ yojanaṃ bandhanaṃ pajānaṃ vaṭṭe osīdāpanasamatthaṃ dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:832_6: Ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchatīti yathā ayaṃ aggī etaṃ mahantañca khuddakañca upādānaṃ ḍahantova gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:832_7: Evameso appamādarato bhikkhu appamādādhigatena ñāṇagginā etaṃ saṃyojanaṃ ḍahanto abhabbuppattikaṃ karonto gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:833_0: Gāthāpariyosāne so bhikkhu yathānisinnova sabbasaṃyojanāni jhāpetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a0:833_1: ākāsenāgantvā tathāgatassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ thometvā vaṇṇetvā vandamānova pakkāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:836_0: Appamādaratoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nigamavāsitissattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:837_0: Ekasmiñhi sāvatthito avidūre nigamagāme jātasaṃvaḍḍho eko kulaputto satthu sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a0:837_1: “nigamavāsitissatthero nāma appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto āraddhavīriyo”ti paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:837_5: Bhikkhū “ayaṃ nigamavāsitissatthero uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya ñātisaṃsaṭṭho viharati,
atk-s0502a0:837_7: pasenadikosale asadisadānaṃ karontepi neva āgacchatī”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā satthu ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:837_12: ahaṃ ete manusse nissāya ajjhoharaṇīyamattaṃ āhāraṃ labhāmi lūkhe vā paṇīte vā.
atk-s0502a0:837_13: Yāpanamatte laddhe puna kiṃ āhārapariyesanenāti na gacchāmi,
atk-s0502a0:837_14: ñātīhi pana me saṃsaggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:837_15: bhante”ti vutte satthā pakatiyāpi tassa ajjhāsayaṃ vijānanto –
atk-s0502a0:837_19: yaṃ tvaṃ mādisaṃ ācariyaṃ labhitvā appiccho ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:837_21: mama paveṇī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a0:838_0: Atīte himavante gaṅgātīre ekasmiṃ udumbaravane anekasahassā suvā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:838_1: Tatreko suvarājā attano nivāsarukkhassa phalesu khīṇesu yaṃ yadeva avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti aṅkuro vā pattaṃ vā taco vā,
atk-s0502a0:838_2: taṃ taṃ khāditvā gaṅgāyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivitvā paramappiccho santuṭṭho hutvā aññattha na gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:838_4: Sakko āvajjamāno taṃ disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthaṃ attano ānubhāvena taṃ rukkhaṃ sukkhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:838_5: Rukkho obhaggo khāṇumatto chiddāvachiddova hutvā vāte paharante ākoṭito viya saddaṃ nicchārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:838_7: Suvarājā tāni khāditvā gaṅgāyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivitvā aññattha agantvā vātātapaṃ agaṇetvā udumbarakhāṇumatthake nisīdati.
atk-s0502a0:838_9: “mittadhammaguṇaṃ kathāpetvā varamassa datvā udumbaraṃ amataphalaṃ katvā āgamissāmī”ti eko haṃsarājā
atk-s0502a0:838_10: hutvā sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ purato katvā udumbaravanaṃ gantvā avidūre ekassa rukkhassa sākhāya nisīditvā
atk-s0502a0:840_0: Kasmā nu sukkhe koḷāpe, suvassa nirato mano”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:841_1: Aṭṭhuppattiyeva hi tattha ca idha ca nānā,
atk-s0502a0:841_9: anacchariyā mama puttassa nigamavāsitissassa mādisaṃ ācariyaṃ labhitvā appicchatā,
atk-s0502a0:841_10: bhikkhunā nāma nigamavāsitissena viya appiccheneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:841_11: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu abhabbo samathavipassanādhammehi vā maggaphalehi vā parihānāya,
atk-s0502a0:841_12: aññadatthu nibbānasseva santike hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:845_0: Tattha abhabbo parihānāyāti so evarūpo bhikkhu samathavipassanādhammehi vā maggaphalehi vā parihānāya abhabbo,
atk-s0502a0:846_0: Gāthāpariyosāne nigamavāsitissatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:851_0: Phandanaṃ capalaṃ cittanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā cālikāya pabbate viharanto āyasmantaṃ meghiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:852_0: Tassa vatthuṃ vibhāvanatthaṃ sabbaṃ meghiyasuttantaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:852_1: Satthā pana tīhi vitakkehi anvāsattatāya tasmiṃ ambavane padhānaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkuṇitvā āgataṃ meghiyattheraṃ āmantetvā,
atk-s0502a0:852_4: ekakomhi yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī’ti maṃ yācantaṃ ekakaṃ pahāya gacchantena bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ cittavasikena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:852_6: taṃ attano vase vattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:859_1: Capalanti ekairiyāpathena asaṇṭhahanto gāmadārako viya ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato capalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:859_4: Dūrakkhanti kiṭṭhasambādhe ṭhāne kiṭṭhakhādakagoṇaṃ viya ekekasmiṃ sappāyārammaṇeyeva duṭṭhapanato dūrakkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:859_5: Dunnivārayanti visabhāgārammaṇaṃ gacchantaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ dukkhattā dunnivārayaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:859_6: Usukārova tejananti yathā nāma usukāro araññato ekaṃ vaṅkadaṇḍakaṃ āharitvā nittacaṃ katvā kañjiyatelena
atk-s0502a0:859_7: makkhetvā aṅgārakapalle tāpetvā rukkhālake uppīḷetvā nivaṅkaṃ ujuṃ vālavijjhanayoggaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:859_8: katvā ca pana rājarājamahāmattānaṃ sippaṃ dassetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a0:859_9: evameva medhāvī paṇḍito viññū puriso phandanādisabhāvametaṃ cittaṃ dhutaṅgāraññāvāsavasena,
atk-s0502a0:859_10: nittacaṃ apagataoḷārikakilesaṃ katvā saddhāsinehena temetvā kāyikacetasikavīriyena tāpetvā samathavipassanālake
atk-s0502a0:859_12: katvā ca pana saṅkhāre sammasitvā mahantaṃ avijjakkhandhaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0502a0:859_15: nava lokuttaradhamme”ti imaṃ visesaṃ hatthagatameva katvā aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a0:860_1: thale khittoti hatthena vā pādena vā jālādīnaṃ vā aññatarena thale chaḍḍito.
atk-s0502a0:860_5: “Okamokataubbhato”ti hi ettha okamokatoti udakasaṅkhātā ālayāti ayamattho.
atk-s0502a0:860_7: Paripphandatidaṃ cittanti yathā so udakālayato ubbhato thale khitto maccho udakaṃ alabhanto paripphandati,
atk-s0502a0:860_8: evamidaṃ pañcakāmaguṇālayābhirataṃ cittaṃ tato uddharitvā māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ pahātuṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:860_11: Evaṃ santepi dhuraṃ anikkhipitvā medhāvī puggalo taṃ vuttanayeneva ujuṃ kammaniyaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:860_13: idaṃ māradheyyaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ so vārijo viya paripphandati,
atk-s0502a0:861_0: Gāthāpariyosāne meghiyatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, aññepi bahū sotāpannādayo jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:864_0: Dunniggahassa lahunoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:865_0: Kosalarañño kira vijite pabbatapāde mātikagāmo nāma eko ghanavāso gāmo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:865_1: Athekadivasaṃ saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū satthu santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā taṃ gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:865_2: Atha ne yo tassa gāmassa sāmiko mātiko nāma,
atk-s0502a0:865_3: tassa mātā disvā gehe nisīdāpetvā nānaggarasena yāgubhattena parivisitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:865_7: pariyesanti maññe”ti ñatvā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “sace, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:865_10: pañca sīlāni gahetvā uposathakammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:865_11: Bhikkhū “mayaṃ imaṃ nissāya bhikkhāya akilamantā bhavanissaraṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti adhivāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:865_12: Sā tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:866_0: Te tattheva vasantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā aññamaññaṃ ovadiṃsu, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:866_2: Amhākañhi sakagehaṃ viya aṭṭha mahānirayā vivaṭadvārāyeva,
atk-s0502a0:866_3: dharamānakabuddhassa kho pana santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā mayaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a0:866_4: buddhā ca nāma padānupadikaṃ vicarantenāpi saṭhena ārādhetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:866_9: sāyaṃ kho pana therūpaṭṭhānakāle pātova bhikkhācārakāle ekato bhavissāma,
atk-s0502a0:866_11: apica kho pana aphāsukena bhikkhunā āgantvā vihāramajjhe ghaṇḍiyā pahatāya ghaṇḍisaññāya āgantvā tassa bhesajjaṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:867_0: Tesu evaṃ katikaṃ katvā viharantesu ekadivasaṃ sā upāsikā sappitelaphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā dāsadāsikammakarādīhi
atk-s0502a0:867_1: parivutā sāyanhasamaye taṃ vihāraṃ gantvā vihāramajjhe bhikkhū adisvā,
atk-s0502a0:867_6: “kiṃ nu kho katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:867_7: Atha naṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa katikavattaṃ jānanamanussā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:867_11: “kassaci aphāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti sakasakaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā vihāramajjhe sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:867_14: “mama puttehi aññamaññaṃ kalaho kato bhavissatī”ti cintetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:867_20: atha kasmā yathā amhākaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantā sabbe ekatova āgacchatha,
atk-s0502a0:867_23: ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ karimhā”ti. “Ko esa, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:867_30: attabhāve ca khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ tumhākameva vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:868_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ katvā attani khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tehi bhikkhūhi puretarameva tayo magge,
atk-s0502a0:868_2: Maggeneva cassā catasso paṭisambhidā lokiyaabhiññā ca āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:868_4: “kadā nu kho mama puttehi ayaṃ dhammo adhigato”ti upadhārentī sabbepime sarāgā sadosā samohā jhānavipassanāmattampi tesaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:868_5: “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ puttānaṃ arahattassa upanissayo atthi,
atk-s0502a0:868_14: na labhantī”ti upadhārentī “āhārasappāyaṃ nesaṃ natthī”ti disvā tato paṭṭhāya nānāvidhaṃ yāguṃ,
atk-s0502a0:868_16: nānaggarasañca bhojanaṃ sampādetvā gehe bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:868_20: Tesaṃ sappāyāhāraṃ labhantānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:869_0: Te ekaggena cittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:869_4: idāni vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:869_8: amhe olokeyyāthā”ti bahūni piyavacanāni vatvā paṭinivatti.
atk-s0502a0:869_9: Tepi kho bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā “kacci,
atk-s0502a0:869_13: na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti vutte “khamanīyaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:869_16: Amhākañhi mātikamātā nāmekā upāsikā cittācāraṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a0:869_17: ‘aho vata no evarūpaṃ nāma āhāraṃ paṭiyādeyyā’ti cintite yathācintitaṃ āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā adāsī”ti tassā guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:870_0: Aññataro bhikkhu tassā guṇakathaṃ sutvā tattha gantukāmo hutvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:870_1: taṃ gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti satthāraṃ āpucchitvā jetavanato nikkhamitvā anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ patvā vihāraṃ pavisanadivaseyeva cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:870_3: ahañca maggakilanto vihāraṃ paṭijaggituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:870_4: aho vata me vihārapaṭijaggakaṃ manussaṃ peseyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:870_5: Upāsikā gehe nisinnāva āvajjentī tamatthaṃ ñatvā, “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:870_7: Itaropi pānīyaṃ pivitukāmo “aho vata me sakkharapānakaṃ katvā peseyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:870_9: So punadivase “pātova siniddhayāguṃ me sauttaribhaṅgaṃ pesetū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:870_12: “aho vata me evarūpaṃ khajjakaṃ peseyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:870_17: aho vata me nānaggarasabhojanaṃ gāhāpetvā sayameva āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:870_19: āgamanaṃ me paccāsīsatī”ti bhojanaṃ gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā tassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:870_30: Evaṃ santepi upāsikā “paracittaṃ jānāmī”ti avatvā “paracittaṃ jānantā nāma evaṃ karonti puttā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:870_34: saha bhaṇḍakena coraṃ cūḷāya gaṇhantī viya maṃ vippakāraṃ pāpeyya,
atk-s0502a0:870_42: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ bhikkhu na tvaṃ tattha vasasī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:870_46: puthujjanā ca nāma sobhanampi asobhanampi cintenti,
atk-s0502a0:870_48: saha bhaṇḍakena coraṃ cūḷāya gaṇhantī viya maṃ vippakāraṃ pāpessatī”ti cintetvā āgatomhīti. “Bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:870_59: cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dunniggaha”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:873_0: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:874_0: Tattha cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkhena niggayhatīti dunniggahaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:874_1: Lahuṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati cāti lahu.
atk-s0502a0:874_4: Etañhi labhitabbaṭṭhānaṃ vā alabhitabbaṭṭhānaṃ vā yuttaṭṭhānaṃ vā ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:874_9: Tassa evarūpassa cittassa damatho sādhu catūhi ariyamaggehi dantabhāvo yathā nibbisevanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:874_12: Idañhi cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kataṃ maggaphalasukhaṃ paramatthanibbānasukhañca āvahatīti.
atk-s0502a0:876_0: Satthā tassa bhikkhuno imaṃ ovādaṃ datvā, “gaccha, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:876_1: aññaṃ kiñci acintayitvā tattheva vasāhī”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:876_2: So bhikkhu satthu santikā ovādaṃ labhitvā tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:876_3: Kiñci bahiddhā cintanaṃ nāma na cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:876_4: Mahāupāsikāpi dibbena cakkhunā olokentī theraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:876_5: “idāni ovādadāyakaṃ ācariyaṃ labhitvā punāgato mama putto”ti attano ñāṇeneva paricchinditvā tassa sappāyāhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:876_6: So sappāyabhojanaṃ sevitvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā maggaphalasukhena vītināmento “aho mahāupāsikā mayhaṃ patiṭṭhā jātā,
atk-s0502a0:876_7: ahaṃ imaṃ nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ pattomhī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a0:876_9: saṃsāre pana me saṃsarantassa aññesupi attabhāvesu ayaṃ patiṭṭhā bhūtapubbā,
atk-s0502a0:876_11: Sāpi ekūnaattabhāvasate tassa pādaparicārikā aññesu paṭibaddhacittā hutvā taṃ jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0502a0:876_13: “aho mayaṃ mahāupāsikā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ akāsī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:877_0: Mahāupāsikāpi gehe nisinnāva “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ mattakaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:877_1: no”ti upadhārayamānā tassa arahattapattiṃ ñatvā uttari upadhāriyamānā,
atk-s0502a0:877_2: “mama putto arahattaṃ patvā aho vata me ayaṃ upāsikā mahatī patiṭṭhā jātā”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a0:877_3: “atītepi nu kho me ayaṃ patiṭṭhā bhūtapubbā,
atk-s0502a0:877_5: “ahaṃ kho pana ekūnaattabhāvasate aññehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā etaṃ jīvitā voropesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:877_6: ayaṃ me ettakaṃ aguṇaṃ disvā ‘aho bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ upāsikāyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:877_7: “Atthi nu kho evaṃ saṃsāre saṃsarantiyā mama puttassa upakāro katapubbo”ti upadhārayamānā tato uttariṃ
atk-s0502a0:877_8: satamaṃ attabhāvaṃ anussaritvā satame attabhāve mayā etassa pādaparicārikāya hutvā etasmiṃ jīvitā voropanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:877_10: aho mayā mama puttassa mahāupakāro katapubbo”ti gehe nisinnāva uttariṃ visesetvā “upadhārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:877_11: So dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sutvā visesetvā satamaṃ attabhāvaṃ anussaritvā tattha tāya attano jīvitassa dinnabhāvaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:877_12: “aho mama imāya mahāupāsikāya upakāro katapubbo”ti attamano hutvā tassā tattheva catūsu maggaphalesu
atk-s0502a0:880_0: Sududdasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññataraṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:881_0: Satthari kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante eko seṭṭhiputto attano kulūpagattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:881_2: ekaṃ me dukkhato muccanakāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:881_9: attano sāpateyyaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekena kammantaṃ payojehi,
atk-s0502a0:881_13: bhante”ti vuttapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaṃ katvā puna theraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:881_21: So evaṃ anupubbena puññakammassa katattā anupubbaseṭṭhiputto nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a0:881_27: Tassa laddhūpasampadassa ācariyo attano santikaṃ āgatakāle abhidhamme pañhaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a0:881_30: Upajjhāyopissa attano santikaṃ āgatakāle vinaye pañhaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a0:881_38: idha ca mama hatthapasāraṇaṭṭhānampi na paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:881_41: So tato paṭṭhāya ukkaṇṭhito anabhirato dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a0:881_43: kiso lūkho dhamanisanthatagatto ālassiyābhibhūto kacchuparikiṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:882_1: kiṃ tvaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhitova nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnova ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:882_2: paṇḍurogābhibhūto kiso lūkho dhamanisanthatagatto ālassiyābhibhūto kacchuparikiṇṇo,
atk-s0502a0:882_8: Ācariyupajjhāyā taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:882_31: sakkā dukkhā muccitu”nti imaṃ ovādaṃ datvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:885_0: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:886_2: Yatthakāmanipātinanti jātiādīni anoloketvā labhitabbālabhitabbayuttāyuttaṭṭhānesu yattha katthaci nipatanasīlaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:886_3: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvīti andhabālo dummedho attano cittaṃ rakkhituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:886_5: Medhāvī pana paṇḍitova cittaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:886_7: Idañhi cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ maggaphalanibbānasukhāni āvahatīti.
atk-s0502a0:890_0: Dūraṅgamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto saṅgharakkhitaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:891_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nikkhamitvā pabbajito laddhūpasampado saṅgharakkhitatthero
atk-s0502a0:891_2: Tassa kaniṭṭhabhaginī puttaṃ labhitvā therassa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:891_3: So bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhito nāma hutvā vayappatto therasseva santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado aññatarasmiṃ gāmakārāme vassaṃ upagantvā,
atk-s0502a0:891_5: ekaṃ aṭṭhahattha”nti dve vassāvāsikasāṭake labhitvā aṭṭhahatthaṃ “upajjhāyassa me bhavissatī”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a0:891_6: “sattahatthaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā vuṭṭhavasso “upajjhāyaṃ passissāmī”ti āgacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0502a0:891_7: piṇḍāya caranto āgantvā there vihāraṃ anāgateyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā therassa divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-s0502a0:891_8: pādodakaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:891_9: Athassāgamanabhāvaṃ disvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā,
atk-s0502a0:891_11: bhante”ti theraṃ nisīdāpetvā tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya bījitvā pānīyaṃ datvā pāde dhovitvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ ānetvā pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:892_4: mayā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya ayaṃ tumhākameva sallakkhito,
atk-s0502a0:892_11: Atha naṃ tassa punappunaṃ kathentassapi thero na icchiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:893_3: evampi mayā saddhiṃ upajjhāyo paribhogaṃ na kattukāmo.
atk-s0502a0:893_4: Imasmiṃ mayā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akaronte kiṃ me samaṇabhāvena,
atk-s0502a0:893_8: kiṃ nu kho katvā gihibhūto jīvissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:893_12: svāhaṃ vijātaṃ vijātaṃ vikkiṇitvā mūlaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:893_13: mūle bahū katvā ekaṃ pajāpatiṃ ānessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:893_15: Athassa mama mātulassa nāmaṃ katvā cūḷayānake nisīdāpetvā mama puttañca bhariyañca ādāya mātulaṃ vandituṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:893_16: āgacchante antarāmagge mama bhariyaṃ evaṃ vakkhāmi –
atk-s0502a0:893_19: imaṃ yānakaṃ pājehī’ti vatvā puttaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0502a0:893_20: ‘ahaṃ nessāmi na’nti netvā sandhāretuṃ asakkontī cakkapathe chaḍḍessati.
atk-s0502a0:893_22: atha naṃ ‘tvaṃ mama puttaṃ neva mayhaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:893_23: naṃ sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi nāsitosmi tayā’ti vatvā patodayaṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiyaṃ paharissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:894_0: So evaṃ cintentova ṭhatvā bījayamāno therassa sīse tālavaṇṭena pahari.
atk-s0502a0:894_1: Thero “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ saṅgharakkhitena sīse pahato”ti upadhārento tena cintitacintitaṃ sabbaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a0:894_7: kiṃ me samaṇabhāvenā”ti tālavaṇṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0502a0:895_0: Atha naṃ daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca anubandhitvā ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:895_4: eko vo bhikkhu laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:895_5: imaṃ daharaṃ ukkaṇṭhitvā palāyantaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:895_8: “Kimatthaṃ te bhikkhu evaṃ bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:895_9: nanu tvaṃ āraddhavīriyassa ekassa buddhassa putto,
atk-s0502a0:895_10: mādisassa nāma buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ dametvā sotāpannoti vā sakadāgāmīti vā anāgāmīti vā arahāti vā vadāpetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:895_15: So evaṃ vassāvāsikasāṭakānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva therassa tālavaṇṭena pahārā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0502a0:895_19: mā cintayi cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dūre hontampi ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanakajātikaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:895_20: rāgadosamohabandhanā muccanatthāya vāyamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:899_0: Tattha dūraṅgamanti cittassa hi makkaṭasuttamattakampi puratthimādidisābhāgena gamanāgamanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:899_1: dūre santampi pana ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti dūraṅgamaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:899_2: Sattaṭṭhacittāni pana ekato kaṇṇikabaddhāni ekakkhaṇe uppajjituṃ samatthāni nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:899_4: tasmiṃ niruddhe puna ekekameva uppajjatīti ekacaraṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:899_5: Cittassa sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ vā nīlādippakāro vaṇṇabhedo vā natthīti asarīraṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:899_7: idañca hadayarūpaṃ nissāya pavattatīti guhāsayaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:899_8: Ye cittanti ye keci purisā vā itthiyo vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā anuppajjanakakilesassa uppajjituṃ adentā
atk-s0502a0:899_9: satisammosena uppannakilesaṃ pajahantā cittaṃ saṃyamessanti saṃyataṃ avikkhittaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0502a0:899_10: Mokkhanti mārabandhanāti sabbete kilesabandhanābhāvena mārabandhanasaṅkhātā tebhūmakavaṭṭā muccissantīti.
atk-s0502a0:903_0: Anavaṭṭhitacittassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto cittahatthattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:904_0: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto naṭṭhagoṇaṃ pariyesanto araññaṃ pavisitvā majjhanhike kāle goṇaṃ disvā goyūthe vissajjetvā,
atk-s0502a0:904_1: “avassaṃ ayyānaṃ santike āhāramattaṃ labhissāmī”ti khuppipāsāpīḷito vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:904_2: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye bhikkhūnaṃ avakkārapātiyaṃ bhuttāvasesakaṃ bhattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:904_5: Buddhakāle ca pana anekasūpabyañjanaṃ bhattaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:904_6: so tato yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā bhuñjitvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthe dhovitvā bhikkhū vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante, ajja, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:904_9: So “mayaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ nibaddhaṃ kammaṃ karontāpi evaṃ madhurabyañjanaṃ bhattaṃ na labhāma,
atk-s0502a0:904_12: bhikkhu bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:905_1: So buddhānaṃ uppannena lābhasakkārena katipāhaccayena thūlasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:905_6: Tassa gehe kammaṃ karontassa katipāheneva sarīraṃ milāyi.
atk-s0502a0:905_8: samaṇo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā puna gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:905_9: So katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā puna ukkaṇṭhitvā vibbhami,
atk-s0502a0:905_13: pabbajissāmī”ti gantvā bhikkhū vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:905_14: Atha naṃ bhikkhū upakāravasena puna pabbājayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:905_15: Evaṃ so iminā niyāmeneva chakkhattuṃ pabbajitvā uppabbajito.
atk-s0502a0:905_16: Tassa bhikkhū “esa cittavasiko hutvā vicaratī”ti cittahatthattheroti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:906_0: Tassevaṃ aparāparaṃ vicarantasseva bhariyā gabbhinī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:906_1: So sattame vāre araññato kasibhaṇḍamādāya gehaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā “attano kāsāvaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gabbhaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:906_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa bhariyā nipajjitvā niddāyati.
atk-s0502a0:906_10: “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ pabbajitvā imaṃ nissāya bhikkhubhāve saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti kāsāyakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā udare bandhitvā gehā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:907_0: Athassa anantaragehe ṭhitā sassu taṃ tathā gacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:907_2: idāneva araññato āgantvā kāsāvaṃ udare bandhitvāva gehā nikkhanto vihārābhimukho gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:907_3: kiṃ nu kho”ti gehaṃ pavisitvā niddāyamānaṃ dhītaraṃ passitvā “imaṃ disvā so vippaṭisārī hutvā gato”ti ñatvā dhītaraṃ paharitvā “uṭṭhehi kāḷakaṇṇi,
atk-s0502a0:907_4: sāmiko te taṃ niddāyamānaṃ disvā vippaṭisārī hutvā gato,
atk-s0502a0:907_5: natthi so ito paṭṭhāya tuyha”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:907_9: Sopi “aniccaṃ dukkha”nti vatvā gacchanto gacchantova sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:907_10: So gantvā bhikkhū vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:907_16: So katipāheneva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:908_8: ayaṃ bhikkhu amhehi evaṃ vutto evaṃ nāma kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:908_13: mama putto attano anavaṭṭhitacittakāle saddhammaṃ ajānanakāle gamanāgamanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a0:908_14: idānissa puññañca pāpañca pahīna”nti vatvā imā dve gāthā āha –
atk-s0502a0:915_0: Tattha anavaṭṭhitacittassāti cittaṃ nāmetaṃ kassaci nibaddhaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0502a0:915_1: Yo pana puggalo assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca thusarāsimhi koṭṭitakhāṇuko viya ca khallāṭasīse
atk-s0502a0:915_2: ṭhapitakadambapupphaṃ viya ca na katthaci saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0502a0:915_9: Saddhammaṃ avijānatoti sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammabhedaṃ imaṃ saddhammaṃ avijānantassa parittasaddhatāya
atk-s0502a0:915_10: vā uplavasaddhatāya vā pariplavapasādassa kāmāvacararūpāvacarādibhedā paññā na paripūrati.
atk-s0502a0:915_11: Kāmāvacarāyapi aparipūrayamānāya kutova rūpāvacarārūpāvacaralokuttarapaññā paripūrissatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0502a0:915_13: Ananvāhatacetasoti “āhatacitto khilajāto”ti āgataṭṭhāne dosena cittassa pahatabhāvo vutto,
atk-s0502a0:915_15: Puññapāpapahīnassāti catutthamaggena pahīnapuññassa ceva pahīnapāpassa ca khīṇāsavassa.
atk-s0502a0:915_16: Natthi jāgarato bhayanti khīṇāsavassa jāgarantasseva abhayabhāvo kathito viya.
atk-s0502a0:915_17: So pana saddhādīhi pañcahi jāgaradhammehi samannāgatattā jāgaro nāma.
atk-s0502a0:915_18: Tasmā tassa jāgarantassāpi ajāgarantassāpi kilesabhayaṃ natthi kilesānaṃ apacchāvattanato.
atk-s0502a0:915_19: Na hi taṃ kilesā anubandhanti tena tena maggena pahīnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anupagamanato.
atk-s0502a0:915_22: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati,
atk-s0502a0:915_24: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:917_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “bhāriyā vatime, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:917_2: evarūpassa arahattassa upanissāyasampanno kulaputto kilesehi āloḷito sattavāre gihī hutvā sattavāre pabbajito”ti.
atk-s0502a0:917_3: Satthā tesaṃ taṃ kathāpavattiṃ sutvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena gamanena dhammasabhaṃ gantvā buddhāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a0:917_9: sace ete rūpino hutvā katthaci pakkhipituṃ sakkā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:917_11: brahmaloko atinīcakoti okāso nesaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:917_14: “Ahañhi aḍḍhanāḷimattaṃ varakacorakaṃ kuṇṭhakudālañca nissāya cha vāre pabbajitvā uppabbajitapubbo”ti. “Kadā, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:918_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kudālapaṇḍito nāma bāhirakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha māse
atk-s0502a0:918_1: himavante vasitvā vassārattasamaye bhūmiyā tintāya “gehe me aḍḍhanāḷimatto varakacorako ca kuṇṭhakudālako ca atthi,
atk-s0502a0:918_2: varakacorakabījaṃ mā nassī”ti uppabbajitvā ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ kudālena kasitvā taṃ bījaṃ vapitvā vatiṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:918_3: pakkakāle uddharitvā nāḷimattabījaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a0:918_5: puna aṭṭha māse pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:918_6: Imināva nīhārena nāḷimattaṃ varakacorakañca kuṇṭhakudālañca nissāya sattavāre gihī hutvā sattavāre pabbajitvā sattame pana vāre cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:918_7: “ahaṃ cha vāre imaṃ kuṇṭhakudālaṃ nissāya gihī hutvā pabbajito,
atk-s0502a0:918_12: tathā naṃ chaḍḍessāmī”ti cintetvā nāḷimattaṃ bījaṃ pilotikāya bandhitvā pilotikaṃ kudālaphalake bandhitvā
atk-s0502a0:918_13: kudālaṃ aggadaṇḍake gahetvā gaṅgāya tīre ṭhito akkhīni nimīletvā uparisīse tikkhattuṃ āvijjhitvā gaṅgāyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:918_14: khipitvā nivattitvā olokento patitaṭṭhānaṃ adisvā “jitaṃ me,
atk-s0502a0:919_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bārāṇasirājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgantvā nadītīre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā nhānatthāya nadiṃ otiṇṇo taṃ saddaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a0:919_1: Rājūnañca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti,
atk-s0502a0:919_11: tasseva jayo sādhū”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:920_0: “Na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati;
atk-s0502a0:921_0: Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:922_0: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva ca gaṅgaṃ olokento āpokasiṇaṃ nibbattetvā adhigataviseso ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:922_1: Rājā mahāpurisassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā saddhiṃ balakāyena pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:922_4: “tassa rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgantvā tathā samiddhaṃ nagaraṃ suññaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:922_5: “evarūpaṃ nagaraṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito rājā orake ṭhāne na pabbajissati,
atk-s0502a0:922_6: mayāpi pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tattha gantvā mahāpurisaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā saparivāro pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:922_9: Satta rājāno bhoge chaḍḍetvā ettakaṃ janaṃ gahetvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:926_0: Kumbhūpamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto āraddhavipassake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:927_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā bhikkhū satthu santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0502a0:927_1: “samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmā”ti yojanasatamaggaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahāvāsagāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:927_2: Atha te manussā disvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā paṇītehi yāgubhattādīhi parivisitvā, “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:927_6: mayampi tumhākaṃ santike saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pañca sīlāni rakkhissāmā”ti yācitvā tesaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0502a0:927_13: ayuttaṃ kho pana asmākaṃ ayyesu idha vasantesu puttadāre gahetvā rukkhe abhiruyha vasitu”nti rukkhato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā cintayiṃsu, “ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:927_14: imasmiṃ ṭhāne ajjekarattiṃ vasitvā addhā sve gamissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:927_15: Bhikkhūpi punadivase antogāme piṇḍāya caritvā puna tameva vanasaṇḍaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:927_19: sve gamissati maññe”ti iminā upāyena aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ bhūmiyameva acchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:928_2: idheva kho pana imesu vasantesu amhākaṃ rukkhe abhiruhitvā nisīditumpi na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:928_3: temāsaṃ puttadāre gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānānipi dukkhāni,
atk-s0502a0:928_4: kiñci katvā ime bhikkhū palāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:928_5: Tā tesu tesu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu ceva caṅkamanakoṭīsu ca chinnasīsāni kabandhāni dassetuṃ amanussasaddañca bhāvetuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:928_16: satthu santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti nikkhamitvā anupubbena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:929_2: tasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkhissathā”ti? “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:929_3: amhākaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ evarūpāni bheravārammaṇāni upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0502a0:929_5: tena mayaṃ ‘vajjetabbayuttakamidaṃ ṭhāna’nti taṃ chaḍḍetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:929_16: mayā dinnaṃ āvudhaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a0:931_0: Sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:932_2: imaṃ tumhe bahi vihārassa vanasaṇḍato paṭṭhāya sajjhāyantā antovihāraṃ paviseyyāthā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:932_3: Te satthāraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā anupubbena taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā bahivihāre gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā sajjhāyamānā vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:932_4: Sakalavanasaṇḍe devatā mettacittaṃ paṭilabhitvā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpucchiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:932_10: Te rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinnā vipassanāya cittaṃ otāretvā attani khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā,
atk-s0502a0:932_11: “ayaṃ attabhāvo nāma bhijjanakaṭṭhena athāvaraṭṭhena kulālabhājanasadiso”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:932_12: Sammāsambuddho gandhakuṭiyā nisinnova tesaṃ vipassanāya āraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā, “evameva,
atk-s0502a0:932_14: ayaṃ attabhāvo nāma bhijjanakaṭṭhena athāvaraṭṭhena kulālabhājanasadiso evā”ti vatvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0502a0:932_15: yojanasate ṭhitopi abhimukhe nisinno viya chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjetvā dissamānena rūpena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:935_0: Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:936_0: Tattha kumbhūpamanti abaladubbalaṭṭhena anaddhaniyatāvakālikaṭṭhena imaṃ kesādisamūhasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ kumbhūpamaṃ kulālabhājanasadisaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0502a0:936_1: Nagarūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ ṭhapetvāti nagaraṃ nāma bahiddhā thiraṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:936_4: taṃ “vilumpissāmā”ti bahiddhā corā āgantvā pavisituṃ asakkontā pabbataṃ āsajja paṭihatā viya gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:936_5: evameva paṇḍito kulaputto attano vipassanācittaṃ thiraṃ nagarasadisaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā nagare ṭhito ekatodhārādinānappakārāvudhena
atk-s0502a0:936_6: coragaṇaṃ viya vipassanāmayena ca ariyamaggamayena ca paññāvudhena taṃtaṃmaggavajjhaṃ kilesamāraṃ paṭibāhanto
atk-s0502a0:936_10: āsevanto antarantarā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya suddhacittena saṅkhāre sammasanto rakkheyya.
atk-s0502a0:937_1: Yathā nāma yodho saṅgāmasīse balakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā amittehi saddhiṃ yujjhanto chāto vā pipāsito vā hutvā
atk-s0502a0:937_2: sannāhe vā sithile āvudhe vā patite balakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā vissamitvā bhuñjitvā pivitvā sannahitvā āvudhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:937_3: gahetvā puna nikkhamitvā yujjhanto parasenaṃ maddati,
atk-s0502a0:937_6: So hi sace balakoṭṭhake ṭhito evaṃ vissamanto taṃ assādento accheyya,
atk-s0502a0:937_8: paṭiladdhaṃ taruṇavipassanaṃ punappunaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya suddhacittena saṅkhāre sammasanto rakkhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:937_14: samāpattiṃ nivesanaṃ katvā tattha na niveseyya,
atk-s0502a0:937_16: “Addhā tumhepi evaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:938_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnāyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a0:938_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ vaṇṇayantā thomentā vandantāva āgacchiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:941_0: Aciraṃ vatayaṃ kāyoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto pūtigattatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:942_0: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito,
atk-s0502a0:942_2: Gacchante gacchante kāle tassa sarīre rogo udapādi.
atk-s0502a0:942_4: Tā anupubbena muggamattā kalāyamattā kolaṭṭhimattā āmalakamattā beḷuvasalāṭumattā beḷuvamattā hutvā pabhijjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:943_0: Buddhānañca nāma dve vāre lokavolokanaṃ avijahitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:943_1: Paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokentā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ katvā olokenti,
atk-s0502a0:943_2: sāyaṃ olokentā gandhakuṭito paṭṭhāya bāhirābhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ katvā olokenti.
atk-s0502a0:943_3: Tasmiṃ pana samaye bhagavato ñāṇajālassa anto pūtigattatissatthero paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:943_4: Satthā tassa bhikkhuno arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:943_6: idānissa maṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthī”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā vihāracārikaṃ caramāno viya
atk-s0502a0:943_7: aggisālaṃ gantvā ukkhaliṃ dhovitvā udakaṃ datvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ āgamayamāno aggisālāyameva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:943_8: Tattabhāvaṃ jānitvā gantvā tassa bhikkhuno nipannamañcakoṭiyaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:943_10: mayaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti mañcakaṃ gahetvā aggisālaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:943_11: Satthā ambaṇaṃ āharāpetvā uṇhodakaṃ āsiñcitvā tehi bhikkhūhi tassa pārupanaṃ gāhāpetvā uṇhodake maddāpetvā mandātape vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:943_12: Athassa santike ṭhatvā sarīraṃ uṇhodakena temetvā ghaṃsitvā nhāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:943_14: Atha naṃ taṃ nivāsāpetvā nivatthakāsāvaṃ udake maddāpetvā ātape vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:943_15: Athassa gatte udake chinnamatte tampi sukkhi.
atk-s0502a0:943_16: So ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā sallahukasarīro ekaggacitto mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:943_18: “bhikkhu ayaṃ tava kāyo apetaviññāṇo nirupakāro hutvā kaliṅgaraṃ viya pathaviyaṃ sessatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:947_0: Tattha aciraṃ vatāti bhikkhu na cirasseva ayaṃ kāyo pathaviṃ adhisessati,
atk-s0502a0:947_1: imissā pakatisayanena sayitāya pathaviyā upari sayissati.
atk-s0502a0:947_5: Niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ nirupakāraṃ niratthakaṃ kaṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ viya.
atk-s0502a0:947_6: Dabbasambhāratthikā hi manussā araññaṃ pavisitvā ujukaṃ ujukasaṇṭhānena vaṅkaṃ vaṅkasaṇṭhānena chinditvā dabbasambhāraṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a0:947_7: avasesaṃ pana susirañca pūtikañca asārakañca gaṇṭhijātañca chinditvā tattheva chaḍḍenti.
atk-s0502a0:947_8: Aññe dabbasambhāratthikā āgantvā taṃ gahetāro nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:947_11: Taṃ pana tena tena upāyena mañcapaṭipādakaṃ vā pādakathalikaṃ vā phalakapīṭhaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkāpi bhaveyya.
atk-s0502a0:947_12: Imasmiṃ pana attabhāve dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu ekakoṭṭhāsopi mañcapaṭipādakādivasena aññena vā upakāramukhena gayhūpago nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:947_13: kevalaṃ niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ ayaṃ kāyo apagataviññāṇo katipāheneva pathaviyaṃ sessatīti.
atk-s0502a0:948_0: Desanāvasāne pūtigattatissatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:948_3: Satthā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kārāpetvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:948_8: evarūpassa pana arahattūpanissayasampannassa bhikkhuno kiṃ kāraṇā gattaṃ putikaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:949_0: Ayaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhakāle sākuṇiko hutvā bahū sakuṇe vadhitvā issarajanaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:949_2: “vikkitāvasesā māretvā ṭhapitā pūtikā bhavissantī”ti yathā uppatituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:949_3: tathā tesaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhīni ca pakkhaṭṭhīni ca bhinditvā rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapeti,
atk-s0502a0:949_5: Atibahūnaṃ pana laddhakāle attanopi atthāya pacāpeti.
atk-s0502a0:949_6: Tassekadivasaṃ rasabhojane pakke eko khīṇāsavo piṇḍāya caranto gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:949_11: piṇḍapātamassa dassāmī”ti tassa pattaṃ ādāya pūretvā rasapiṇḍapātaṃ datvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:949_16: sakuṇānaṃ aṭṭhibhedananissandena tissassa gattañca pūtikaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:952_0: Diso disanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kosalajanapade nandagopālakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:953_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino nando nāma gopālako goyūthaṃ rakkhati aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo.
atk-s0502a0:953_1: So kira yathā keṇiyo jaṭilo pabbajjāvesena,
atk-s0502a0:953_2: evaṃ gopālakattena rājabaliṃ pariharanto attano kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0502a0:953_3: So kālena kālaṃ pañca gorase ādāya anāthapiṇḍikassa santikaṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ passati,
atk-s0502a0:953_6: Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno āgantvā paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0502a0:953_7: cārikaṃ caranto maggā okkamma tassa vasanaṭṭhānāsanne aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:953_8: Nando satthu santikaṃ agantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā satthāraṃ nimantetvā satthāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a0:953_10: Sattame divase satthā anumodanaṃ katvā dānakathādibhedaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:953_11: Kathāpariyosāne nandagopālako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthu pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ anugacchanto dūraṃ gantvā, “tiṭṭha,
atk-s0502a0:953_13: Atha naṃ eko luddako vijjhitvā māresi.
atk-s0502a0:953_14: Pacchato āgacchantā bhikkhū naṃ disvā gantvā satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “nando, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:953_15: gopālako tumhākaṃ idhāgatattā mahādānaṃ datvā anugantvā nivattento mārito,
atk-s0502a0:953_19: mayi āgatepi anāgatepi tassa catasso disā catasso anudisā ca gacchantassāpi maraṇato muccanūpāyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:953_22: taṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ antopaduṭṭhaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittameva karotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:955_0: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:956_0: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti.
atk-s0502a0:957_2: Yaṃ taṃ kayirāti yaṃ taṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0502a0:957_5: eko ekassa mittadubbhī coro puttadārakhettavatthu gomahiṃsādīsu aparajjhanto yassa aparajjhati,
atk-s0502a0:957_6: tampi tatheva attani aparajjhantaṃ coraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:957_7: veri vā pana kenacideva kāraṇena baddhaveraṃ veriṃ disvā attano kakkhaḷatāya dāruṇatāya yaṃ taṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0502a0:957_11: dasasu akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitattā micchāpahiṇitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare taṃ purisaṃ tato pāpataraṃ kareyya.
atk-s0502a0:957_13: diso disassa vā verī verino vā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhaṃ vā uppādeyya,
atk-s0502a0:957_15: Idaṃ pana akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:957_16: attabhāvasatasahassesupi catūsu apāyesu khipitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na detīti.
atk-s0502a0:958_2: Upāsakena pana bhavantare katakammaṃ bhikkhūhi na pucchitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:961_0: Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto soreyyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:962_2: Sammāsambuddhe sāvatthiyaṃ viharante soreyyanagare soreyyaseṭṭhiputto ekena sahāyakena saddhiṃ sukhayānake
atk-s0502a0:962_3: nisīditvā mahantena parivārena nhānatthāya nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:962_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahākaccāyanatthero soreyyanagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisitukāmo hutvā bahinagare saṅghāṭiṃ pārupati.
atk-s0502a0:962_7: “aho vata ayaṃ vā thero mama bhariyā bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:962_8: mama vā bhariyāya sarīravaṇṇo etassa sarīravaṇṇo viya bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:962_14: Sahāyakopissā ito cito ca vicaritvāpi nāddasa.
atk-s0502a0:962_18: Athassa mātāpitaro tattha tattha pariyesitvā apassantā roditvā paridevitvā,
atk-s0502a0:962_20: Sā ekaṃ takkasilagāmiṃ satthavāhaṃ disvā yānakassa pacchato pacchato anubandhi.
atk-s0502a0:963_2: mayaṃ ‘kassesā dārikā’ti taṃ na jānāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:963_4: ahaṃ padasā gamissāmī”ti gacchantī aṅgulimuddikaṃ datvā ekasmiṃ yānake okāsaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:963_10: amhehi tumhākaṃ ekaṃ itthiratanaṃ ānīta”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:963_11: So taṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā attano vayānurūpaṃ abhirūpaṃ pāsādikaṃ disvā uppannasineho gehe akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:963_13: itthiyo vā purisā abhūtapubbā nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:963_14: Purisā hi parassa dāresu aticaritvā kālaṃ katvā bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā manussajātiṃ āgacchantā attabhāvasate itthibhāvaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0502a0:964_0: Ānandattheropi kappasatasahassaṃ pūritapāramī ariyasāvako saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekasmiṃ attabhāve kammārakule nibbatto.
atk-s0502a0:964_1: Paradārakammaṃ katvā niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena cuddasasu attabhāvesu purisassa pādaparicārikā itthī ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:964_3: Itthiyo pana dānādīni puññāni katvā itthibhāve chandaṃ virājetvā,
atk-s0502a0:964_4: “idaṃ no puññaṃ purisattabhāvapaṭilābhāya saṃvattatū”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā kālaṃ katvā purisattabhāvaṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0502a0:964_5: patidevatā hutvā sāmike sammāpaṭipattivasenāpi purisattabhāvaṃ paṭilabhanteva.
atk-s0502a0:965_0: Ayaṃ pana seṭṭhiputto there ayoniso cittaṃ uppādetvā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve itthibhāvaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:965_1: Takkasilāyaṃ seṭṭhiputtena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya pana tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:965_2: Sā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ labhitvā tassa padasā gamanakāle aparampi puttaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:965_4: soreyyanagare taṃ paṭicca nibbattā dveti cattāro puttā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:965_5: Tasmiṃ kāle soreyyanagarato tassā sahāyako seṭṭhiputto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi takkasilaṃ gantvā sukhayānake nisinno nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:965_6: Atha naṃ sā uparipāsādatale vātapānaṃ vivaritvā antaravīthiṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā disvā sañjānitvā dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a0:965_7: pesetvā pakkosāpetvā mahātale nisīdāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:965_9: tvaṃ ito pubbe amhehi na diṭṭhapubbā,
atk-s0502a0:965_10: atha ca pana no mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karosi,
atk-s0502a0:965_14: Sā mātāpitūnañca bhariyāya ca puttānañca arogabhāvaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:965_18: Tesaṃ eko putto atthi, so kahaṃ, sāmī”ti? “Bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:965_20: mayaṃ tena saddhiṃ ekadivasaṃ sukhayānake nisīditvā nhāyituṃ nikkhantā nevassa gatiṃ jānāma,
atk-s0502a0:965_21: ito cito ca vicaritvā taṃ adisvā mātāpitūnaṃ ārocayimhā,
atk-s0502a0:965_22: tepissa roditvā kanditvā petakiccaṃ kiriṃsū”ti. “Ahaṃ so, sāmī”ti. “Apehi, bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:965_23: kiṃ kathesi mayhaṃ sahāyo devakumāro viya eko puriso”ti? “Hotu, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:965_29: “aho vata ayaṃ vā thero mama bhariyā bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:965_30: etassa vā sarīravaṇṇo viya mama bhariyāya sarīravaṇṇo bhaveyyā”ti cintesiṃ.
atk-s0502a0:965_33: Athāhaṃ lajjamānā kassaci kiñci vattuṃ asakkuṇitvā tato palāyitvā idhāgatā, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:966_7: ahaṃ mama ayyassa bhikkhāhāraṃ dadeyyaṃ, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:966_9: amhākaṃ ayyaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti so therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:966_19: Atha naṃ nisīdāpetvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā seṭṭhiputto taṃ itthiṃ gahetvā therassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:966_22: pubbe mayhaṃ piyasahāyako hutvā tumhe oloketvā evaṃ nāma cintesi,
atk-s0502a0:967_0: Purisaliṅge pātubhūtamatteyeva taṃ takkasilāya seṭṭhiputto āha –
atk-s0502a0:967_2: ime dve dārakā tava kucchiyaṃ vutthattā maṃ paṭicca nibbattattā ubhinnampino puttā eva,
atk-s0502a0:967_5: ahaṃ ekenattabhāvena paṭhamaṃ puriso hutvā itthibhāvaṃ patvā puna puriso jātoti vippakārappatto,
atk-s0502a0:967_6: paṭhamaṃ maṃ paṭicca dve puttā nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:967_7: idāni me kucchito dve puttā nikkhantā,
atk-s0502a0:967_12: imesu mā pamajjī”ti vatvā putte sīse paricumbitvā parimajjitvā ure nipajjāpetvā pitu niyyādetvā nikkhamitvā therassa santike pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:967_13: Theropi naṃ pabbājetvā upasampādetvā gaṇhitvāva cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:967_15: Janapadavāsino taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā saṅkhubhitvā kotūhalajātā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:968_0: Thero “kucchiyaṃ vuttakesu eva sineho balavā”ti punappunaṃ kathento harāyamāno ekova nisīdati,
atk-s0502a0:968_2: So evaṃ ekattūpagato attabhāve khayavayaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:968_9: purimadivasesu ‘kucchiyaṃ vutthaputtesu sineho balavā’ti vatvā idāni ‘mayhaṃ katthaci sineho natthī’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a0:968_15: mama puttassa sammāpaṇihitena cittena maggassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya na katthaci sineho jāto,
atk-s0502a0:968_18: taṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantare pavattaṃ sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittameva detī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:970_0: “Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā, aññe vāpi ca ñātakā;
atk-s0502a0:971_0: Sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti.
atk-s0502a0:972_0: Tatthana tanti taṃ kāraṇaṃ neva mātā kareyya, na pitā,
atk-s0502a0:972_3: Seyyaso naṃ tato kareti tato kāraṇato seyyaso naṃ varataraṃ uttaritaraṃ kareyya,
atk-s0502a0:972_5: Mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ dhanaṃ dadamānā ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve kammaṃ akatvā sukhena jīvikakappanaṃ dhanaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0502a0:972_7: tassā ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhena jīvikakappanaṃ dhanaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:972_8: Catūsu pana dīpesu cakkavattisiriṃ dātuṃ samatthā mātāpitaropi nāma puttānaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:972_11: sammāpaṇihitaṃ pana cittaṃ sabbampetaṃ sampattiṃ dātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:973_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:979_0: Ko imaṃ pathaviṃ vicessatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto pathavikathāpasute pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:980_0: Te kira bhagavatā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ caritvā jetavanaṃ āgantvā sāyanhasamaye upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnā
atk-s0502a0:980_1: attanā gatagataṭṭhānesu “asukagāmato asukagāmagamanaṭṭhāne samaṃ visamaṃ kaddamabahulaṃ sakkharabahulaṃ
atk-s0502a0:980_10: tumhehi ajjhuttikapathaviyaṃ parikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:991_0: Tattha ko imanti ko imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pathaviṃ.
atk-s0502a0:991_5: Imaṃ sadevakanti imaṃ manussalokañca devalokena saddhiṃ ko vicessati vicinissati vijānissati paṭivijjhissati sacchikarissatīti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:991_6: Ko dhammapadaṃ sudesitanti yathāsabhāvato kathitattā sudesitaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a0:991_7: dhammapadaṃ kusalo mālākāro pupphaṃ vicinanto viya ko pacessati vicinissati vijānissati upaparikkhissati
atk-s0502a0:991_12: adhipaññāsikkhāti imā tisso sikkhā sikkhanato sotāpattimaggaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā sattavidho
atk-s0502a0:991_13: sekho imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pathaviṃ arahattamaggena tato chandarāgaṃ apakaḍḍhanto vicessati vicinissati
atk-s0502a0:991_15: Yamalokañcāti taṃ yathāvuttapakāraṃ yamalokañca imaṃ manussalokañca saha devehi sadevakaṃ sveva vicessati
atk-s0502a0:991_18: yathā nāma kusalo mālākāro pupphārāmaṃ pavisitvā taruṇamakuḷāni ca pāṇakaviddhāni ca milātāni ca gaṇṭhikajātāni
atk-s0502a0:991_19: ca pupphāni vajjetvā sobhanāni sujātasujātāneva pupphāni vicināti,
atk-s0502a0:991_20: evameva imaṃ sukathitaṃ suniddiṭṭhaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammapadampi paññāya pacessati vicinissati upaparikkhissati
atk-s0502a0:991_21: paṭivijjhissati sacchikarissatīti satthā sayameva pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:992_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:995_0: Pheṇūpamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññataraṃ marīcikammaṭṭhānikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:996_0: So kira bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0502a0:996_1: “samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭetvā vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto “visesetvā
atk-s0502a0:996_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge marīciṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:996_3: “yathā ayaṃ gimhasamaye uṭṭhitā marīci dūre ṭhitānaṃ rūpagatā viya paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:996_5: ayaṃ attabhāvopi uppādavayaṭṭhena evarūpo”ti marīcikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento āgantvā maggakilanto aciravatiyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:996_6: nhāyitvā ekasmiṃ caṇḍasotatīre rukkhachāyāya nisinno udakavegābhighātena uṭṭhahitvā mahante mahante pheṇapiṇḍe
atk-s0502a0:996_8: “ayaṃ attabhāvopi uppajjitvā bhijjanaṭṭhena evarūpoyevā”ti ārammaṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0502a0:996_9: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhitova taṃ theraṃ disvā, “evameva, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:996_10: evarūpovāyaṃ attabhāvo pheṇapiṇḍo viya marīci viya uppajjanabhijjanasabhāvoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1002_0: Tattha pheṇūpamanti imaṃ kesādisamūhasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ abaladubbalaṭṭhena anaddhaniyatāvakālikaṭṭhena pheṇapiṇḍasarikkhakoti viditvā.
atk-s0502a0:1002_1: Marīcidhammanti yathā marīci dūre ṭhitānaṃ rūpagatā viya gayhūpagā viya hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1002_2: santike upagacchantānaṃ rittā tucchā agayhūpagā sampajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1002_3: evameva khaṇikaittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ayaṃ kāyopi marīcidhammoti abhisambudhāno bujjhanto,
atk-s0502a0:1002_5: Mārassa papupphakānīti mārassa papupphakasaṅkhātāni tebhūmakāni vaṭṭāni ariyamaggena chinditvā khīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a0:1002_6: bhikkhu maccurājassa adassanaṃ avisayaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ gaccheyyāti.
atk-s0502a0:1003_0: Gāthāpariyosāne thero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ thomento vaṇṇento vandantova āgatoti.
atk-s0502a0:1006_0: Pupphāniheva pacinantanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto saparisaṃ mahoghena ajjhottharitvā māritaṃ viṭaṭūbhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1007_2: Vesāliyaṃ licchavirañño putto licchavikumāro mahāli nāma,
atk-s0502a0:1007_3: kusinārāyaṃ mallarājaputto bandhulo nāmāti ime tayo disāpāmokkhassācariyassa santike sippuggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1007_4: takkasilaṃ gantvā bahinagare sālāya samāgatā aññamaññassa āgatakāraṇañca kulañca nāmañca pucchitvā sahāyakā
atk-s0502a0:1007_5: hutvā ekatova ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sippaṃ sikkhantā na cirasseva uggahitasippā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a0:1007_7: Tesu pasenadikumāro pitu sippaṃ dassetvā pasannena pitarā rajje abhisitto.
atk-s0502a0:1007_8: Mahālikumāro licchavīnaṃ sippaṃ dassento mahantena ussāhena dassesi,
atk-s0502a0:1007_10: Licchavirājāno “aho vata amhākaṃ ācariyo akkhivināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:1007_12: upaṭṭhahissāma na”nti tassa satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ ekaṃ dvāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1007_13: So taṃ nissāya pañcasate licchavirājaputte sippaṃ sikkhāpento vasi.
atk-s0502a0:1007_14: Bandhulakumāro saṭṭhiṃ saṭṭhiṃ veḷū gahetvā majjhe ayasalākaṃ pakkhipitvā saṭṭhikalāpe ussāpetvā ṭhapite
atk-s0502a0:1007_15: mallarājakulehi “ime kappetū”ti vutto asītihatthaṃ ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā asinā kappento agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1007_17: “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitvā sabbakalāpesu ayasalākānaṃ ṭhapitabhāvaṃ ñatvā asiṃ chaḍḍetvā rodamāno “mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1007_18: ettakesu ñātisuhajjesu ekopi sasineho hutvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ nācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1007_23: idaṃ na labbhā evaṃ kātu”nti nānappakārena vārito “tena hi mama sahāyakassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1008_0: Pasenadi kosalo rājā tassāgamanaṃ sutvā paccuggantvā mahantena sakkārena taṃ nagaraṃ pavesetvā senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1008_1: So mātāpitaro pakkosāpetvā tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a0:1008_2: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uparipāsāde ṭhito antaravīthiṃ olokayamāno “anāthapiṇḍikassa cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0502a0:1008_3: visākhāya suppavāsāyā”ti etesaṃ gehe niccaṃ bhattakiccatthāya gacchante anekasahasse bhikkhū disvā, “kahaṃ, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:1008_5: anāthapiṇḍikassa gehe niccabhattasalākabhattagilānabhattādīnaṃ atthāya devasikaṃ dve bhikkhusahassāni gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:1008_7: tathā visākhāya tathā suppavāsāyā”ti vutte sayampi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upaṭṭhahitukāmo vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusahassena
atk-s0502a0:1008_8: saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ sahatthā dānaṃ datvā sattame divase satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1008_9: pañcahi me bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1008_10: “Mahārāja buddhā nāma ekaṭṭhāne nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a0:1008_12: “Tena hi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nibaddhaṃ pesethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1008_15: “ime nāma parivisantū”ti avicāretvāva sattāhaṃ sayameva parivisitvā aṭṭhame divase vikkhittacitto pamajjamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1008_16: Rājakule nāma anāṇattā āsanāni paññāpetvā bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā parivisituṃ na labhanti “na mayaṃ idha ṭhātuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti bahū bhikkhū pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1008_20: tadā ānandattheraṃ ekakameva ṭhapetvā avasesā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1008_23: Tathāgatassa ca sāriputtatthero mahāmoggallānattheroti dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0502a0:1008_29: iti ime aṭṭha jane ādiṃ katvā ṭhānantarapattā sabbepi sāvakā ekadesena dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pūritattā mahāpuññā abhinīhārasampannā.
atk-s0502a0:1008_30: Ānandattheropi kappasatasahassaṃ pūritapāramī abhinīhārasampanno mahāpuñño attano kāraṇavasikatāya kulassa pasādaṃ rakkhanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1009_0: Rājā bhikkhūnaṃ gatakāle āgantvā khādanīyabhojanīyāni tatheva ṭhitāni disvā, “kiṃ, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:1009_3: “addhā ettakaṃ me bhattacchedanamakaṃsū”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kuddho satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1009_7: pañcasatā bhikkhū mama gehe saññaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1009_11: mama sāvakānaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ vissāso natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1009_12: tena na gatā bhavissantī”ti vatvā kulānaṃ anupagamanakāraṇañca upagamanakāraṇañca pakāsento bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṃ suttamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1010_2: aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kulaṃ anupagantvā vā nālaṃ upagantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1010_16: navahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ kulaṃ anupagantvā vā nālaṃ upagantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1011_2: aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kulaṃ anupagantvā vā alaṃ upagantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1011_16: navahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ kulaṃ anupagantvā vā alaṃ upagantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1012_1: mama sāvakā tumhākaṃ santikā vissāsaṃ alabhantā na gatā bhavissantīti.
atk-s0502a0:1012_2: Porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi hi avissāsikaṭṭhāne sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhiyamānāpi māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ patvā vissāsikaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsūti. “Kadā,
atk-s0502a0:1013_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kesavo nāma rājā rajjaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:1013_3: Pasādhanakappako panassa anupabbajitvā kappako nāma antevāsiko ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1013_4: Kesavatāpaso parisāya saddhiṃ aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā vassārattasamaye loṇambilasevanatthāya bārāṇasiṃ patvā bhikkhāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1013_5: Atha naṃ rājā disvā pasīditvā catumāsaṃ attano santike vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā uyyāneva vasāpento sayaṃ sāyaṃpātaṃ assa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1013_6: Avasesā tāpasā katipāhaṃ vasitvā hatthisaddādīhi ubbāḷhā hutvā ukkaṇṭhitvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0502a0:1013_11: Rājā amhākaṃ āgatadivaseyeva catumāsaṃ idha vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1013_15: ito avidūre tumhākaṃ pavattissavanaṭṭhāne vasissāmā”ti vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1014_4: Kappakopi na cirasseva ukkaṇṭhitvā ācariyena punappunaṃ vāriyamānopi “na sakkomī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1014_5: Itaresaṃ pana santikaṃ agantvā ācariyassa pavattiṃ suṇanto avidūre ṭhāne vasi.
atk-s0502a0:1014_6: Aparabhāge ācariyassa antevāsike anussarantassa kucchirogo uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:1014_17: bhante”ti taṃ mañcake nipajjāpetvā nāradaamaccappamukhe cattāro amacce “mama ayyassa pavattiṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a0:1014_19: Kappantevāsiko ācariyassa āgamanaṃ sutvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā itare “kaha”nti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:1014_21: Tepi ācariyassāgamanabhāvaṃ sutvā tattheva samosaritvā ācariyassa uṇhodakaṃ datvā phalāphalaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1016_0: Kathaṃ nu bhagavā kesī, kappassa ramati assame.
atk-s0502a0:1021_0: “Sāduṃ vā yadi vāsāduṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0502a0:1023_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānento “tadā rājā moggallāno ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:1023_4: pubbepi paṇḍitā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ patvā vissāsikaṭṭhānaṃ gamiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1023_5: mama sāvakā tumhākaṃ santike vissāsaṃ na labhanti maññe”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1023_6: Rājā “bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ mayā vissāsaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1023_7: kathaṃ nu kho karissāmīti sammāsambuddhassa ñātidhītaraṃ mama gehe kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1023_8: evaṃ sante ‘daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca sammāsambuddhassa ñātirājā’ti mama santikaṃ vissatthā nibaddhaṃ āgamissantī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0502a0:1023_9: “ekaṃ me dhītaraṃ dentū”ti sākiyānaṃ santikaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1023_17: na kho pana amhehi kulena sadiso,
atk-s0502a0:1023_19: Mahānāmo “mama dāsiyā kucchimhi jātā vāsabhakhattiyā nāma dhītā rūpasobhaggappattā atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1023_23: “Sammāsambuddhassa cūḷapituputtassa mahānāmassa sakkassa dhītā vāsabhakhattiyā nāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1024_5: pitarā saddhiṃ ekabhājane bhuñjantiṃ āneyyāthā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1024_7: tumhehi saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjantiṃ rājā icchatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1024_9: tātā”ti taṃ alaṅkārāpetvā attano bhojanakāle pakkosāpetvā tāya saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjanākāraṃ dassetvā dūtānaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:1024_10: Te taṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1024_11: Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso taṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne abhisiñci.
atk-s0502a0:1024_12: Sā na cirasseva suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1025_0: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase rājā dārakassa ayyakassa santikaṃ pesesi “sakyarājadhītā vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ vijātā,
atk-s0502a0:1025_2: Taṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā gato amacco thokaṃ badhiradhātuko,
atk-s0502a0:1025_4: so taṃ sutvā “vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ avijāyitvāpi sabbajanaṃ abhibhavi,
atk-s0502a0:1025_5: idāni pana rañño ativiya vallabhā bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1025_6: Badhiro amacco “vallabhā”ti vacanaṃ dussutaṃ sutvā “viṭaṭūbho”ti sallakkhetvā rājānaṃ upagantvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a0:1025_8: Rājā “porāṇakaṃ no kulasantakaṃ nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā taṃ nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1025_9: Athassa daharakāleyeva rājā “satthu piyaṃ karomī”ti senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1026_0: So kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhanto sattavassikakāle aññesaṃ kumārānaṃ mātāmahakulato hatthirūpakaassarūpakādīni āhariyamānāni disvā mātaraṃ pucchi – “amma,
atk-s0502a0:1026_5: tava sakyarājāno mātāmahā dūre pana vasanti,
atk-s0502a0:1026_6: tena te kiñci na pesentī”ti vañcesi.
atk-s0502a0:1026_9: kiṃ tattha gantvā karissatī”ti vāriyamānopi punappunaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:1026_11: So pitu ārocetvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:1026_16: “vandituṃ na sakkomā”ti tassa daharadahare kumāre janapadaṃ pahiṇitvā tasmiṃ kapilapuraṃ sampatte santhāgāre sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1027_2: So sabbe vandamāno vicaritvā ekampi attānaṃ vandantaṃ adisvā “kiṃ nu kho maṃ vandantā natthī”ti pucchi. Sākiyā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:1027_3: te kaniṭṭhakumārā janapadaṃ gatā”ti vatvā tassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1027_4: So katipāhaṃ vasitvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:1027_5: Athekā dāsī santhāgāre tena nisinnaphalakaṃ “idaṃ vāsabhakhattiyāya dāsiyā puttassa nisinnaphalaka”nti akkositvā paribhāsitvā khīrodakena dhovi.
atk-s0502a0:1027_6: Eko puriso attano āvudhaṃ pamussitvā nivatto taṃ gaṇhanto viṭaṭūbhakumārassa akkosanasaddaṃ sutvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a0:1027_7: “vāsabhakhattiyā dāsiyā kucchimhi mahānāmasakkaṃ paṭicca jātā”ti ñatvā balakāyassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1027_9: Taṃ sutvā viṭaṭūbho “ete tāva mama nisinnaphalakaṃ khīrodakena dhovantu,
atk-s0502a0:1027_10: ahaṃ pana rajje patiṭṭhitakāle etesaṃ galalohitaṃ gahetvā mama nisinnaphalakaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1027_11: Tasmiṃ sāvatthiṃ gate amaccā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1027_12: Rājā “mayhaṃ dāsidhītaraṃ adaṃsū”ti sākiyānaṃ kujjhitvā vāsabhakhattiyāya ca puttassa ca dinnaparihāraṃ
atk-s0502a0:1028_0: Tato katipāhaccayena satthā rājanivesanaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1028_2: tumhākaṃ kira ñātakehi dāsidhītā mayhaṃ dinnā,
atk-s0502a0:1028_3: tenassā ahaṃ saputtāya parihāraṃ acchinditvā dāsadāsīhi laddhabbamattameva dāpesi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1028_6: dadantehi nāma samānajātikā dātabbā assa, taṃ pana, mahārāja, vadāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1028_7: vāsabhakhattiyā khattiyarājadhītā khattiyarañño gehe abhisekaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:1028_12: tassā ca kucchimhi jātakumāro dvādasayojanikāya bārāṇasiyā rajjaṃ patvā kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma jāto”ti kaṭṭhahārijātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1028_13: Rājā dhammakathaṃ sutvā “pitugottameva kira pamāṇa”nti tussitvā vāsabhakhattiyāya ca puttassa ca pakatiparihārameva dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1029_0: Bandhulasenāpatissapi kho kusinārāyaṃ mallarājadhītā mallikā nāma bhariyā dīgharattaṃ puttaṃ na vijāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1029_1: Atha naṃ bandhulo “attano kulagharameva gacchā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1029_2: Sā “satthāraṃ disvāva gamissāmī”ti jetavanaṃ pavisitvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0502a0:1029_10: Sā tuṭṭhamānasā satthāraṃ vanditvā nivesanaṃ gantvā “kasmā nivattāsī”ti vuttā “dasabalena nivattitāmhī”ti
atk-s0502a0:1029_11: āha bandhulo “diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati dīghadassinā kāraṇa”nti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0502a0:1029_12: Sā na cirasseva gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā uppannadāhaḷā “dohaḷo me uppanno”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1029_14: “Vesālinagare gaṇarājakulānaṃ abhisekamaṅgalapokkharaṇiyaṃ otaritvā nhatvā pānīyaṃ pātukāmāmhi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1029_15: Bandhulo “sādhū”ti vatvā sahassathāmadhanuṃ gahetvā taṃ rathaṃ āropetvā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā rathaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1029_17: Mahālilicchavino ca dvārasamīpe eva nivesanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1029_18: So rathassa ummāre panighātasaddaṃ sutvāva “bandhulassa rathasaddo eso,
atk-s0502a0:1030_0: Pokkharaṇiyā anto ca bahi ca ārakkhā balavatī,
atk-s0502a0:1030_3: Bandhulasenāpati pana rathā otaritvā ārakkhake manusse vettena paharanto palāpetvā lohajālaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0502a0:1030_4: antopokkharaṇīyaṃ bhariyaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi nhatvā puna taṃ rathaṃ āropetvā nagarā nikkhamitvā āgatamaggeneva pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1030_6: Licchavirājāno kujjhitvā pañca rathasatāni āruyha “bandhulamallaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1030_9: so hi vo sabbe ghotessatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1030_11: “Tena hi tassa rathacakkassa yāva nābhito pathaviṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ disvā nivatteyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:1030_12: tato anivattantā purato asanisaddaṃ viya suṇissatha,
atk-s0502a0:1030_14: Tato anivattantā tumhākaṃ rathadhuresu chiddaṃ passissatha,
atk-s0502a0:1030_17: Te tassa vacanena anivattitvā taṃ anubandhiṃsu eva.
atk-s0502a0:1030_20: “Tena hi ekasseva rathassa paññāyanakāle maṃ āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1030_21: Sā yadā sabbe rathā eko viya hutvā paññāyiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1030_24: Bandhulo “tena hi imā rasmiyo gaṇhāhī”ti tassā rasmiyo datvā rathe ṭhitova dhanuṃ āropesi,
atk-s0502a0:1031_0: Licchavino taṃ ṭhānaṃ disvāpi na nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1031_6: so pañcannaṃ rathasatānaṃ rathasīse chiddaṃ katvā pañca rājasatāni parikarabandhanaṭṭhāne vinivijjhitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1031_7: Te attano paviddhabhāvaṃ ajānitvā, “tiṭṭha, re, tiṭṭha,
atk-s0502a0:1031_10: matakehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ yuddhaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1031_16: attano gharāni gantvā saṃvidhātabbaṃ saṃvidahitvā puttadāraṃ anusāsitvā sannāhaṃ mocethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1031_17: Te tathā katvā sabbepi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0502a0:1031_19: Sā soḷasakkhattuṃ yamake yamake putte vijāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1031_23: Pitarā saddhiṃ rājanivesanaṃ gacchantehi teheva rājaṅgaṇaṃ paripūri.
atk-s0502a0:1032_0: Athekadivasaṃ vinicchaye kūṭaṭṭaparājitā manussā bandhulaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā mahāviravaṃ viravantā vinicchayaamaccānaṃ kūṭaṭṭakaraṇaṃ tassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1032_1: So vinicchayaṃ gantvā taṃ aṭṭaṃ vicāretvā sāmikameva sāmikaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1032_3: Rājā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā tussitvā sabbepi te amacce hāretvā bandhulasseva vinicchayaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:1032_5: Tato te porāṇakavinicchayikā amaccā kiñci lañjaṃ alabhantā appalābhā hutvā “bandhulo rajjaṃ patthetī”ti rājakule paribhindiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1032_6: Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ saddahitvā cittaṃ niggahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1032_7: “Imasmiṃ idheva ghātiyamāne garahā me uppajjissatī”ti puna cintetvā payuttapurisehi paccantaṃ pahārāpetvā bandhulaṃ pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1032_11: “etthevassa dvattiṃsāya puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā āharathā”ti tehi saddhiṃ aññepi samatthe mahāyodhe pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1032_12: Tasmiṃ paccantaṃ gacchanteyeva “senāpati kira āgacchatī”ti payuttacorā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1032_13: So taṃ padesaṃ āvāsāpetvā saṇṭhāpetvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:1033_0: Athassa nagarato avidūre ṭhāne te yodhā puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chindiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1033_1: Taṃ divasaṃ mallikāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ dve aggasāvakā nimantitā honti.
atk-s0502a0:1033_2: Athassā pubbaṇhe eva “sāmikassa te saddhiṃ puttehi sīsaṃ chinna”nti paṇṇaṃ āharitvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1033_3: Sā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā kassaci kiñci avatvā paṇṇaṃ ucchaṅge ṭhapetvā bhikkhusaṅghameva parivisi.
atk-s0502a0:1033_4: Athassā paricārikāyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sappicāṭiṃ āharantiyo therānaṃ purato sappicāṭiṃ bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1033_7: Sā ucchaṅgato paṇṇaṃ nīharitvā “dvattiṃsāya puttehi saddhiṃ pitusīsaṃ chinnanti me imaṃ paṇṇaṃ āhariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1033_12: maccānaṃ idha jīvita”ntiādīni vatvā dhammaṃ desetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1033_17: rañño upari manopadosaṃ mā karitthā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0502a0:1034_0: Rañño carapurisā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā tesaṃ niddosabhāvaṃ rañño kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1034_1: Rājā saṃvegappatto tassā nivesanaṃ gantvā mallikañca suṇisāyo cassā khamāpetvā mallikāya varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1034_2: Sā “varo gahito me hotū”ti vatvā tasmiṃ gate matakabhattaṃ datvā nhatvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a0:1034_5: dvattiṃsāya me suṇisānaṃ mamañca kulagharagamanaṃ anujānāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1034_7: Sā dvattiṃsa suṇisāyo yathāsakāni kulāni pesesi,
atk-s0502a0:1035_0: Rājāpi bandhulasenāpatino bhāgineyyassa dīghakārāyanassa nāma senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1035_1: So pana “mātulo me iminā mārito”ti rañño otāraṃ gavesanto vicarati.
atk-s0502a0:1035_2: Rājāpi niraparādhassa bandhulassa māritakālato paṭṭhāya vippaṭisārī hutvā cittassādaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a0:1035_4: Tadā satthā sakyānaṃ medāḷupaṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0502a0:1035_5: Rājā tattha gantvā ārāmato avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1035_6: “mandena parivārena satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā pañcarājākakudhabhaṇḍāni dīghakārāyanassa datvā ekakova gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1035_8: Tasmiṃ gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe dīghakārāyano tāni pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni gahetvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ rājānaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:1035_9: rañño ekaṃ assaṃ ekañca upaṭṭhānakārikaṃ mātugāmaṃ ṭhapetvā nivattetvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1036_0: Rājā satthārā saddhiṃ piyakathaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nikkhanto senaṃ adisvā taṃ mātugāmaṃ pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a0:1036_2: viṭaṭūbhaṃ gahessāmī”ti rājagahanagaraṃ gacchanto vikāle dvāresu pidahitesu nagaraṃ patvā ekissā sālāya
atk-s0502a0:1036_3: nipajjitvā vātātapehi kilanto rattibhāge tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1036_5: kosalanarinda anātho jātosī”ti vippalapantiyā tassā itthiyā saddaṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1036_6: So mātulassa mahantena sakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:1037_0: Viṭaṭūbhopi rajjaṃ labhitvā taṃ veraṃ saritvā “sabbepi sākiye māressāmī”ti mahatiyā senāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:1037_1: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento ñātisaṅghassa vināsaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:1037_2: “ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā,
atk-s0502a0:1037_6: Tato viṭaṭūbhassa rajjasīmāya mahanto sandacchāyo nigrodho atthi.
atk-s0502a0:1037_8: kiṃ kāraṇā evarūpāya uṇhavelāya imasmiṃ kabaracchāye rukkhamūle nisīdatha,
atk-s0502a0:1037_12: “ñātakānurakkhanatthāya satthā āgato bhavissatī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nivattitvā sāvatthiṃyeva paccāgami.
atk-s0502a0:1038_0: Rājā sākiyānaṃ dosaṃ saritvā dutiyampi nikkhamitvā tatheva satthāraṃ passitvā puna nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:1038_1: Tatiyavārepi nikkhamitvā tatheva satthāraṃ passitvā puna nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:1038_2: Catutthavāre pana tasmiṃ nikkhante satthā sākiyānaṃ pubbakammaṃ oloketvā tesaṃ ekadivasaṃ nadiyaṃ visapakkhipanapāpakammassa
atk-s0502a0:1038_6: attanā marantāpi paresaṃ jīvitaṃ na voropenti.
atk-s0502a0:1038_9: na kho pana sakkā amhehi paraṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1038_10: attano kammaṃ dassetvā palāpessāmā”ti te katasannāhā nikkhamitvā yuddhaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1038_11: Tehi khittā sarā viṭaṭūbhassa purisānaṃ antarantarena gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:1038_13: Viṭaṭūbho disvā nanu bhaṇe “sākiyā asattaghātakāmhā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:1038_14: atha ca pana me purise nāsentīti.
atk-s0502a0:1039_7: So tato nivattitvā “ye ye pana bhaṇe ‘sākiyamhā’ti bhaṇanti,
atk-s0502a0:1039_9: mātāmahassa pana mahānāmasakkassa santike ṭhitānaṃ jīvitaṃ dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1039_10: Sākiyā gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassantā ekacce tiṇaṃ ḍaṃsitvā,
atk-s0502a0:1039_13: no”ti pucchitā yasmā te marantāpi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇanti,
atk-s0502a0:1039_20: Tesu tiṇaṃ ḍaṃsitvā ṭhitā tiṇasākiyā nāma,
atk-s0502a0:1039_21: naḷaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā naḷasākiyā nāma jātāti,
atk-s0502a0:1039_22: viṭaṭūbho avasese khīrapakepi dārake avissajjetvā ghātāpento lohitanadiṃ pavattetvā tesaṃ galalohitena phalakaṃ dhovāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1040_0: So mahānāmasakkaṃ gāhāpetvā nivatto “pātarāsavelāya pātarāsaṃ karissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne otaritvā bhojane
atk-s0502a0:1040_2: Khattiyā pana jīvitaṃ cajantāpi dāsiputtehi saddhiṃ na bhuñjanti.
atk-s0502a0:1040_8: sayameva me mataṃ seyyo”ti kese muñcitvā agge gaṇṭhiṃ katvā kesesu pādaṅguṭṭhake pavesetvā udake nimujji.
atk-s0502a0:1040_10: Nāgarājā “kiṃ nu kho”ti upadhārento taṃ ñatvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā taṃ attano phaṇe nisīdāpetvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1040_14: Tasmiṃ aticirāyante saraṃ vicināpetvā dīpālokena purisabbhantarānipi oloketvā adisvā “gato bhavissatī”ti pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1040_15: So rattibhāge aciravatiṃ patvā khandhāvāraṃ nivāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:1040_22: mayhaṃ nipannaṭṭhāne kipillikā”ti uṭṭhahitvā akatapāpakammā uttaritvā thale nipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1040_24: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā ghanavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0502a0:1040_25: Nadiyā ogho āgantvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ saddhiṃ parisāya samuddameva pāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1041_1: ‘evaṃ nāma koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā sākiyā māretabbā’ti ananucchavikameta”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1041_4: imasmiṃ attabhāve kiñcāpi sākiyānaṃ evaṃ maraṇaṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1041_5: pubbe katapāpakammavasena pana yuttamevetehi laddha”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1041_8: Sabbe ekato hutvā nadiyaṃ visaṃ pakkhipiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:1041_10: “viṭaṭūbho ettake sākiye māretvā āgacchanto attano manorathe matthakaṃ appatteyeva ettakaṃ janaṃ ādāya mahāsamudde macchakacchapabhakkho jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1041_13: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:1041_14: “imesaṃ sattānaṃ manorathe matthakaṃ appatteyeva maccurājā suttaṃ gāmaṃ ajjhottharanto mahogho viya jīvitindriyaṃ
