atk-s0502a0:1041_15: chinditvā catūsu apāyasamuddesu nimujjāpetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1044_0: Suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1045_0: Tattha byāsattamanasaṃ naranti sampatte vā asampatte vā laggamānasaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1045_2: yathā mālākāro pupphārāmaṃ pavisitvā “pupphāni pacinissāmī”ti tato pupphāni gahetvā aññamaññaṃ vā gacchaṃ patthento sakale pupphārāme manaṃ peseti,
atk-s0502a0:1045_3: “ito cito ca pupphāni pacinissāmī”ti tato pupphāni aggahetvā aññattha manaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0502a0:1045_5: evameva ekacco pupphārāmasadisaṃ pañcakāmaguṇamajjhaṃ otaritvā manoramaṃ rūpaṃ labhitvā manoramānaṃ saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbānaṃ aññataraṃ pattheti.
atk-s0502a0:1045_6: Añño tesu vā aññataraṃ labhitvā aññataraṃ pattheti,
atk-s0502a0:1045_7: rūpameva vā labhitvā aññaṃ apatthento tameva assādeti,
atk-s0502a0:1045_10: pabbajitānampi pariveṇavihārapattacīvarādīsūti evaṃ pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātāni pupphāni eva pacinantaṃ sampatte
atk-s0502a0:1045_11: vā asampatte vā kāmaguṇe byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1045_12: Suttaṃ gāmanti gāmassa gehabhittiādīnaṃ pana supanavasena supanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1045_13: sattānaṃ pana suttapamattataṃ upādāya sutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1045_14: Evaṃ suttaṃ gāmaṃ dve tīṇi yojanāni āyatagambhīro mahoghova maccu ādāya gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1045_15: Yathā so mahogho itthipurisagomahiṃsakukkuṭādīsu kiñci anavasesetvā sabbaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ samuddaṃ pāpetvā macchakacchapabhakkhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1045_16: evameva byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ maccu ādāya jīvitindriyamassa chinditvā catūsu apāyasamuddesu nimujjāpetīti.
atk-s0502a0:1046_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Mahājanassa sātthikā desanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1049_0: Pupphāni hevāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto patipūjikaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1050_0: Tattha kira mālabhārī nāma devaputto accharāsahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1050_1: Pañcasatā devadhītaro rukkhaṃ āruyha pupphāni pātenti,
atk-s0502a0:1050_2: pañcasatā patitāni pupphāni gahetvā devaputtaṃ alaṅkaronti.
atk-s0502a0:1050_5: Sā sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā jātakāle jātissarā hutvā “mālabhārīdevaputtassa bhariyāmhī”ti
atk-s0502a0:1050_6: anussarantī vuḍḍhimanvāya gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā sāmikassa santike abhinibbattiṃ patthesi.
atk-s0502a0:1050_7: Sā soḷasavassakāle parakulaṃ gatāpi salākabhattapakkhikabhattavassāvāsikādīni datvā,
atk-s0502a0:1050_8: “ayaṃ me sāmikassa santike nibbattanatthāya paccayo hotū”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a0:1050_9: Athassā bhikkhū “ayaṃ kumārikā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya patimeva patthetīti patipūjikā”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1050_14: imānipi bhikkhusaṅghassa paṭipādeyyāsī”ti vatvā āharitvā denti.
atk-s0502a0:1050_15: Sāpi etena niyāmena āgacchantī gacchantī ekapadavāre chapaññāsa kusaladhamme paṭilabhati.
atk-s0502a0:1050_18: Tassa padasā gamanakāle aññampi aññampīti cattāro putte paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:1051_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ katvā dhammaṃ sutvā sikkhāpadāni rakkhitvā divasapariyosāne taṃ khaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1051_1: nibbattena kenaci rogena kālaṃ katvā attano sāmikasseva santike nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1051_2: Itarāpi ettakaṃ kālaṃ devaputtaṃ alaṅkaronti eva.
atk-s0502a0:1051_3: Devaputto taṃ disvā “tvaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya na dissasi,
atk-s0502a0:1051_11: “Dasamāsaccayena mātu kucchito nikkhamitvā soḷasavassakāle parakulaṃ gantvā cattāro putte vijāyitvā dānādīni
atk-s0502a0:1051_12: puññāni katvā tumhe patthetvā āgantvā tumhākameva santike nibbattāmhi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1051_16: “Ettakaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbattamanussā kiṃ nu kho suttapamattā kālaṃ atikkāmenti,
atk-s0502a0:1051_19: “Asaṅkhyeyyaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbattā viya ajarāmarā viya ca niccaṃ pamattā,
atk-s0502a0:1051_21: Mālabhārīdevaputtassa mahāsaṃvego udapādi “vassasatamattamāyuṃ gahetvā nibbattamanussā kira pamattā nipajjitvā niddāyanti,
atk-s0502a0:1051_23: Manussānaṃ pana vassasataṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ eko rattindivo,
atk-s0502a0:1051_29: Tasmā tassa devaputtassa ekadivasopi nātikkanto muhuttasadisova kālo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1051_30: Evaṃ appāyukamanussānaṃ pamādo nāma ativiya ayuttoti.
atk-s0502a0:1052_0: Punadivase bhikkhū gāmaṃ paviṭṭhā āsanasālaṃ apaṭijaggitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1052_5: hiyyo ayyesu bhuñjitvā gatesu sāyanhasamaye matā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1052_6: Taṃ sutvā puthujjanā bhikkhū tassā upakāraṃ sarantā assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1052_8: Te bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pucchiṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1052_9: patipūjikā nāma upāsikā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya nānappakārāni puññāni katvā sāmikameva patthesi,
atk-s0502a0:1052_18: sā tassa pupphapilandhanaṭṭhānato cavitvā puna gantvā tasseva santike nibbattā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1052_24: pātova amhe parivisitvā sāyaṃ uppannabyādhinā matā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1052_28: teneva ime satte vatthukāmehi ceva kilesakāmehi ca atitte eva antako attano vase vattetvā kandante paridevante
atk-s0502a0:1056_0: Tattha pupphāni heva pacinantanti pupphārāme mālākāro nānāpupphāni viya attabhāvapaṭibaddhāni ceva upakaraṇapaṭibaddhāni
atk-s0502a0:1056_4: Atittaṃyeva kāmesūti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu pariyesanenapi paṭilābhenapi paribhogenapi nidhānenapi atittaṃ eva samānaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1056_5: Antako kurute vasanti maraṇasaṅkhāto antako kandantaṃ paridevantaṃ gahetvā gacchanto attano vasaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:1057_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1060_0: Yathāpi bhamaro pupphanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1061_0: Rājagahanagarassa kira avidūre sakkāraṃ nāma nigamo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1061_1: Tattheko macchariyakosiyo nāma seṭṭhi asītikoṭivibhavo paṭivasati.
atk-s0502a0:1061_2: So tiṇaggena telabindumpi paresaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a0:1061_7: Satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya sakalalokadhātuyaṃ bodhaneyyabandhave
atk-s0502a0:1061_8: olokento pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake vasantassa seṭṭhino sapajāpatikassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:1061_9: Tato purimadivase pana so rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ rājagehaṃ gantvā rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgacchanto ekaṃ chātajjhattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1061_10: janapadamanussaṃ kummāsapūraṃ kapallakapūvaṃ khādantaṃ disvā tattha pipāsaṃ uppādetvā attano gharaṃ gantvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1061_12: bahū manussā mayā saddhiṃ khāditukāmā bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1061_13: evaṃ me bahūni tilataṇḍulasappiphāṇitādīni parikkhayaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1061_14: na kassaci kathessāmī”ti taṇhaṃ adhivāsento carati.
atk-s0502a0:1061_15: So gacchante gacchante kāle uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto jāto.
atk-s0502a0:1061_16: Tato taṇhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto gabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcake upagūhitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:1061_17: Evaṃ gatopi dhanahānibhayena na kassaci kiñci kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1062_0: Atha naṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā, “kiṃ te, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1062_5: “Atha kiṃ te puttadhītāhi vā dāsakammakarādīhi vā kiñci amanāpaṃ kataṃ atthī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1062_8: Evaṃ vuttepi dhanahānibhayena kiñci avatvā nissaddova nipajji,
atk-s0502a0:1062_10: sāmi kismiñci te taṇhā atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1062_11: So vacanaṃ parigilanto viya “atthi me taṇhā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1062_23: “Tena hi te puttadāramattasseva pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1062_25: “Kiṃ pana tuyhañca mayhañca pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1062_27: “Tena hi ekakasseva te pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1062_29: Sakalataṇḍule ṭhapetvā bhinnataṇḍule ca uddhanakapallāni ca ādāya thokaṃ khīrasappimadhuphāṇitañca gahetvā
atk-s0502a0:1062_32: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ gāhāpetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha dāsiyo vissajjetvā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:1062_33: so ādito paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto sabbadvāresu sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā sattamatalaṃ abhiruhitvā tatthapi dvāraṃ pidahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1062_34: Bhariyāpissa uddhane aggiṃ jāletvā kapallaṃ āropetvā pūve pacituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:1063_2: rājagahassa avidūre sakkāranigame macchariyaseṭṭhi ‘kapallakapūve khādissāmī’ti aññesaṃ dassanabhayena sattabhūmike pāsāde kapallakapūve pacāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:1063_3: tvaṃ tattha gantvā seṭṭhiṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā ubhopi jāyampatike pūve ca khīrasappimadhuphāṇitāni ca gāhāpetvā attano balena jetavanaṃ ānehi,
atk-s0502a0:1063_4: ajjāhaṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre eva nisīdissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1064_1: bhante”ti satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva iddhibalena taṃ nigamaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa sīhapañjaradvāre
atk-s0502a0:1064_2: sunivattho supāruto ākāse eva maṇirūpakaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1064_4: So ahaṃ evarūpānaṃyeva dassanabhayena imaṃ ṭhānamāgato,
atk-s0502a0:1064_6: So gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassanto aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya dosena taṭataṭāyanto evamāha – “samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:1064_8: ākāse apade padaṃ dassetvā caṅkamantopi neva labhissasī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1064_9: Thero tasmiṃ eva ṭhāne aparāparaṃ caṅkami.
atk-s0502a0:1064_11: ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdantopi na labhissasiyevā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1064_14: āgantvā vātapānassa ummāre ṭhitopi na labhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1064_20: Seṭṭhino akkhīnaṃ sūciyā vijjhanakālo viya ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:1064_21: gehajjhāyanabhayena pana “tvaṃ pajjalantopi na labhissasī”ti avatvā “ayaṃ samaṇo suṭṭhu laggo,
atk-s0502a0:1064_24: “bhadde ekaṃ khuddakapūvaṃ pacitvā samaṇassa datvā uyyojehi na”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1064_25: Sā thokaṃ eva piṭṭhaṃ kapallapātiyaṃ pakkhipi,
atk-s0502a0:1064_26: mahāpūvo hutvā sakalapātiṃ pūretvā uddhumāto hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1065_0: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “bahuṃ tayā piṭṭhaṃ gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti sayameva dabbikaṇṇena thokaṃ piṭṭhaṃ gahetvā pakkhipi,
atk-s0502a0:1065_6: Tassā pacchito ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇhantiyā sabbe ekābaddhā allīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1065_11: Ubhopi janā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhantāpi viyojetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu eva.
atk-s0502a0:1065_12: Athassa pūvehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva sarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1065_17: Sā pacchiṃ ādāya theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1065_21: atthi yiṭṭha”nti dinnadānādīnaṃ phalaṃ gaganatale puṇṇacandaṃ viya dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1066_1: āgantvā imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīditvā paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Thero,
atk-s0502a0:1066_3: sammāsambuddho ‘pūve khādissāmī’ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre nisinno,
atk-s0502a0:1066_4: tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo nessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1066_5: seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pūve ca khīrādīni ca gaṇhāpetha,
atk-s0502a0:1066_11: kālaṃ anatikkamitvā ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1066_13: tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo attano iddhibalena nessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1066_14: tumhākaṃ pāsāde sopānasīsaṃ attano ṭhāne eva bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1067_0: Thero sopānasīsaṃ tattheva katvā “sopānapādamūlaṃ jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1067_2: Iti thero seṭṭhiñca seṭṭhibhariyañca uparipāsādā heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otaraṇakālato khippataraṃ jetavanaṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1067_3: Te ubhopi satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā kālaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1067_4: Satthā bhattaggaṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0502a0:1067_9: Seṭṭhi khīrasappimadhusakkharādīni dadamāno na khayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1067_10: Satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1067_13: Sakalavihāre bhikkhūnañca vighāsādānañca dinnesupi pariyanto na paññāyateva. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1067_14: pūvā parikkhayaṃ na gacchantī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1067_16: Atha ne dvārakoṭṭhakassa avidūre pabbhāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1067_18: Mahāseṭṭhi saha bhariyāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1067_20: Anumodanāvasāne ubhopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ vanditvā dvārakoṭṭhake sopānaṃ āruyha attano pāsādeyeva patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1068_0: Tato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhi asītikoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsaneyeva vikkiri.
atk-s0502a0:1068_4: anupahacca bhoge macchariyaseṭṭhiṃ muhutteneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pūve gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0502a0:1068_6: aho mahānubhāvo thero”ti therassa guṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1068_7: Satthā dibbāya sotadhātuyā kathaṃ sutvā āgantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1068_15: kulaṃ akilametvā aviheṭhetvā pupphato reṇuṃ gaṇhantena bhamarena viya upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaṃ jānāpetabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1068_16: tādiso mama putto moggallāno”ti theraṃ pasaṃsitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1071_0: Paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1072_1: Pupphanti pupphārāme caranto pupphañca vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayanto avināsento vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:1072_2: Paletīti evaṃ caritvā yāvadatthaṃ rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya ādāya paleti,
atk-s0502a0:1072_3: so evaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ekasmiṃ rukkhasusire taṃ rajamissakaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā anupubbena madhurarasaṃ madhuṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1072_4: na tassa pupphārāme vicaritapaccayā pupphaṃ vā vaṇṇagandhaṃ vāssa vigacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1072_6: Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekhāsekhabhedo anāgāriyamuni kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ gaṇhanto vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:1072_7: Na hi tassa gāme caraṇapaccayā kulānaṃ saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni vā honti.
atk-s0502a0:1072_9: Evaṃ caritvā ca pana nikkhamitvā sekhamuni tāva bahigāme udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nisinno
atk-s0502a0:1072_11: vanasaṇḍaṃ anupavisitvā ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto cattāro magge,
atk-s0502a0:1074_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vatvā uttaripi therassa guṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na,
atk-s0502a0:1074_3: pubbepi naṃ dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpesi evā”ti vatvā imamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a0:1076_0: Ubhinnaṃ piḷakā jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisa”nti. –
atk-s0502a0:1080_0: Na paresaṃ vilomānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1081_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekā gahapatānī puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a0:1081_1: Tassānantaragharesu manussā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā āgantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1081_2: “aho acchariyā buddhānaṃ dhammadesanā”ti nānappakārehi buddhaguṇe vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0502a0:1081_3: Sā buddhānaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotukāmā ājīvakassa etamatthaṃ kathetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1081_6: So “mā gacchāhī”ti nivāretvā taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānampi nivāresi eva.
atk-s0502a0:1081_7: Sā “ayaṃ mama vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a0:1081_8: satthāraṃ nimantetvā idheva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti sāyanhasamaye puttaṃ pakkositvā, “gaccha, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:1081_10: So gacchanto paṭhamataraṃ ājīvakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1081_21: “amhākaṃ gehaṃ asukaṭṭhāne vā asukavīthiyaṃ vā asukamaggena vā gantabba”nti mā ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1081_22: “Santike ṭhito viya aññena maggena gacchanto viya palāyitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1081_23: So ājīvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā nimantetvā ājīvakena vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ katvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1081_28: tassa sakkāraṃ ubhopi khādissāmā”ti vatvā punadivase ājīvako pātova taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1082_0: Paṭivissakamanussā taṃ gehaṃ allagomayena upalimpitvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā satthu nisīdanatthāya mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1082_1: Buddhehi saddhiṃ aparicitamanussā hi āsanapaññattiṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0502a0:1082_3: bodhimūle dasasahassisokadhātuṃ kampetvā sambodhiṃ pattadivaseyeva hi nesaṃ “ayaṃ maggo nirayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1082_10: Tasmā satthā pātova pattacīvaramādāya mahāupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a0:1082_11: Sā gehā nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā antonivesanaṃ pavesetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1082_13: Upāsikā katabhattakiccassa satthuno anumodanaṃ kāretukāmā pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1082_17: Ājīvakopi pacchāgabbhe nisinnova tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā saddaṃ sutvā sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1082_19: etassa evaṃ sakkāraṃ karotī”ti nānappakārena upāsikañca satthārañca akkosanto palāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1082_20: Upāsikā tassa kathāya lajjitā aññathattaṃ gataṃ cittaṃ desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1082_21: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ upāsike cittaṃ desanānugataṃ kātuṃ na sakkosī”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1082_22: etassa me kathāya cittaṃ aññathattaṃ upagata”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1082_23: Satthā “evarūpassa visabhāgajanassa kathitaṃ kathaṃ nāma āvajjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1082_24: evarūpaṃ asamannāharitvā attano katākatameva oloketuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1086_0: Tattha na paresaṃ vilomānīti paresaṃ vilomāni pharusāni mammacchedakavacanāni na manasikātabbāni.
atk-s0502a0:1086_1: Na paresaṃ katākatanti “asuko upāsako assaddho appasanno,
atk-s0502a0:1086_19: na bhāvanārāmatāya ussāhamattampī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ katākataṃ nāma na oloketabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1086_20: Attanova avekkheyyāti “kathaṃ bhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabba”nti
atk-s0502a0:1086_21: imaṃ ovādaṃ anussaranto saddhāpabbajito kulaputto “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1087_0: Desanāvasāne sā upāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1090_0: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto chattapāṇiupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_0: Sāvatthiyañhi chattapāṇi nāma upāsako tipiṭakadharo anāgāmī.
atk-s0502a0:1091_1: So pātova uposathiko hutvā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_7: Evaṃ anāgāmino pakatiyāva ekabhattikā ca brahmacārino ca honti.
atk-s0502a0:1091_8: Sopi tatheva uposathiko hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā dhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_9: Tasmiṃ samaye rājā pasenadi kosalo satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_10: Chattapāṇi upāsako taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “uṭṭhātabbaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0502a0:1091_13: tassa me padesarājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1091_14: rājā kho pana me anuṭṭhahantassa kujjhissati,
atk-s0502a0:1091_16: Rājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahantena hi rājā garukato hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1091_19: Paṇḍitapurisā nāma garutarānaṃ santike nisīditvā anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā na kujjhanti.
atk-s0502a0:1091_20: Rājā pana taṃ anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā kupitamānaso satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_23: ayaṃ chattapāṇi upāsako paṇḍito diṭṭhadhammo tipiṭakadharo atthānatthakusalo”ti upāsakassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1091_24: Rañño tassa guṇakathaṃ suṇantasseva cittaṃ mudukaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1092_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uparipāsāde ṭhito chattapāṇiṃ upāsakaṃ katabhattakiccaṃ chattamādāya upāhanamāruyha rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1092_1: So chattupāhanaṃ apanetvā rājānamupasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1092_9: “Yadi evaṃ kasmā purimadivase satthu santike nisinno maṃ disvā na uṭṭhahī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1092_12: padesarājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahanto satthari agāravaṃ pavedeyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1092_15: “Tumhe kira diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānatthānaṃ kusalā tipiṭakadharā amhākaṃ antepure dhammaṃ vācethā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1092_21: ‘purimadivase maṃ disvā na uṭṭhitomhī’ti mā kukkuccaṃ karothā”ti. “Deva,
atk-s0502a0:1092_25: gacchatha tumhe”ti taṃ uyyojetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ yāci, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1092_26: mallikā ca devī vāsabhakhattiyā ca dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇissāmāti vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:1092_27: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nibaddhaṃ mama gehaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ dhammaṃ uddisathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1092_32: Thero nibaddhaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ uddesaṃ uddisati.
atk-s0502a0:1092_33: Tāsu mallikā sakkaccaṃ gahetvā sajjhāyitvā uddesaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1093_8: Tumhākaṃ pana ñātidhītā neva sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a0:1093_12: mayā kathitadhammo nāma sakkaccamasuṇantassa aggaṇhantassa asajjhāyantassa adesentassa vaṇṇasampannaṃ agandhakapupphaṃ viya aphalo hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1093_13: sakkaccaṃ pana savanādīni karontassa mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:1096_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
atk-s0502a0:1099_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1100_3: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācāti subhāsitā vācā nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1100_5: Yathā pana agandhakapupphaṃ yo naṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0502a0:1100_7: evaṃ etampi yo naṃ sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi na samācarati,
atk-s0502a0:1100_8: tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1100_9: taṃ akubbato sutagandhañca vācāgandhañca paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati aphalā hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1100_14: Evanti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho pharati,
atk-s0502a0:1100_16: Kubbatoti yo sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi tattha kattabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1101_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1104_0: Yathāpi puppharāsimhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ upanissāya pubbārāme viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1105_0: Sā kira aṅgaraṭṭhe bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino aggamahesiyā sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1105_1: Tassā sattavassikakāle satthā selabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ bodhaneyyabandhavānaṃ upanissayasampadaṃ disvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0502a0:1106_1: tasmiṃ nagare pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:1106_8: bimbisārarañño pana vijite pañca amitabhogā nāma ahesuṃ – jotiko, jaṭilo, meṇḍako, puṇṇako,
atk-s0502a0:1106_10: Tesu ayaṃ meṇḍakaseṭṭhi dasabalassa attano nagaraṃ sampattabhāvaṃ ñatvā puttassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ dārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma,
atk-s0502a0:1106_13: tava parivārehi pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ pañca rathasatāni āruyha pañcahi dāsisatehi parivutā dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1106_15: Kāraṇākāraṇesu pana kusalattā yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi,
atk-s0502a0:1106_16: yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1106_18: Sā desanāvasāne pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:1106_19: Meṇḍakaseṭṭhipi kho satthāramupasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya svātanāya nimantetvā
atk-s0502a0:1106_20: punadivase attano nivesane paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā
atk-s0502a0:1107_0: Tena kho pana samayena bimbisāro ca pasenadi kosalo ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti.
atk-s0502a0:1107_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bimbisārassa santikaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahāpuññaṃ yāceyya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1107_5: So tattha gantvā raññā katapaṭisanthāro “kiṃ kāraṇā āgatosī”ti puṭṭho “‘tumhākaṃ vijite pañca amitabhogā mahāpuññā vasanti,
atk-s0502a0:1107_10: Rājā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā “jotikādīnaṃ mahākulānaṃ cālanaṃ nāma mahāpathaviyā cālanasadisaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1107_12: tena saddhiṃ mantetvā paṭivacanaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:1107_20: So taṃ ādāya sabbattha ekarattivāsena gacchanto ekaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ patvā nivāsaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:1107_30: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā tassa datvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1107_31: Tasmiṃ padese sayaṃ vasanaṭṭhānassa gahitattā nagarassa sāketantveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1108_0: Sāvatthiyampi kho migāraseṭṭhino putto puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumāro nāma vayappatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1108_6: So punappunaṃ vuccamāno “tena hi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ labhamāno tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1108_13: Mahāpuññāya hi itthiyā kesā morakalāpasadisā hutvā muñcitvā vissaṭṭhā nivāsanantaṃ paharitvā nivattitvā uddhaggā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0502a0:1108_15: dantāvaraṇaṃ bimbaphalasadisaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ samaṃ suphusitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1108_17: dantā sukkā samā aviraḷā ussāpetvā ṭhapitavajirapanti viya samacchinnasaṅkhapanti viya ca sobhanti,
atk-s0502a0:1108_19: kāḷiyā cuṇṇakādīhi avilitto eva chavivaṇṇo siniddho nīluppaladāmasadiso hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1108_22: dasakkhattuṃ vijātāpi kho pana sakiṃ vijātā viya avigatayobbanāyeva hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1108_24: Athassa mātāpitaro aṭṭhuttarasatabrāhmaṇe nimantetvā bhojetvā “pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā itthiyo nāma hontī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Āma, hontī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1108_25: “Tena hi evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ pariyesituṃ aṭṭha janā gacchantū”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “āgatakāle vo kattabbaṃ jānissāma,
atk-s0502a0:1108_28: diṭṭhakāle ca imaṃ pilandhanaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ datvā uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1109_0: Te mahantamahantāni nagarāni gantvā pariyesamānā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ adisvā nivattitvā āgacchantā
atk-s0502a0:1109_3: Tasmiṃ pana nagare anusaṃvaccharaṃ vivaṭanakkhattaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1109_4: Tadā bahi anikkhamanakulānipi parivārena saddhiṃ gehā nikkhamitvā appaṭicchannena sarīrena padasāva nadītīraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:1109_5: Tasmiṃ divase khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ puttāpi “attano samānajātikaṃ manāpaṃ kuladārikaṃ disvā mālāguḷena
atk-s0502a0:1109_6: parikkhipissāmā”ti taṃ taṃ maggaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0502a0:1109_7: Tepi kho brāhmaṇā nadītīre ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1109_8: “Tasmiṃ khaṇe visākhā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā hutvā sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā pañcahi kumārikāsatehi
atk-s0502a0:1109_9: parivutā nadiṃ gantvā nhāyissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a0:1109_11: Pañcasatā kumārikāyo vegena gantvā sālaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1109_12: Brāhmaṇā olokentā tāsu ekampi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ na passiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1109_15: Brāhmaṇā tassā cattāri kalyāṇāni disvā dante passitukāmā “alasajātikā amhākaṃ dhītā,
atk-s0502a0:1109_16: etissā sāmiko kañjikamattampi na labhissati maññe”ti aññamaññaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1109_20: Madhuro hi tassā saddo kaṃsatāḷasaro viya niccharati.
atk-s0502a0:1109_21: Atha ne puna madhurasaddena “kiṃ kāraṇā bhaṇathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1109_22: “Tava parivāritthiyo vatthālaṅkāre atemetvā vegena sālaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a0:1109_23: tuyhaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ vegena āgamanamattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1110_3: kāraṇaṃ pana sallakkhetvā javena nāgatāmhī”ti. “Kiṃ, ammā”ti? “Tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1110_6: “Katame cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, ammā”ti? Tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1110_7: abhisittarājā tāva sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito kacchaṃ bandhitvā rājaṅgaṇe javamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0502a0:1110_8: “kiṃ ayaṃ rājā gahapatiko viya dhāvatī”ti aññadatthu garahaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a0:1110_10: Rañño maṅgalahatthīpi alaṅkato javamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0502a0:1110_13: “kiṃ ayaṃ samaṇo gihī viya dhāvatī”ti kevalaṃ garahameva labhati,
atk-s0502a0:1110_16: “kiṃ esā itthī puriso viya dhāvatī”ti garahitabbāva hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1110_17: “ime cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, tātā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1110_19: mātāpitaro nāma dhītaraṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni saṇṭhāpetvā posenti.
atk-s0502a0:1110_22: Sace javamānānaṃ nivatthadussakaṇṇe vā akkamitvā bhūmiyaṃ vā pakkhalitvā patitakāle hattho vā pādo vā bhijjeyya,
atk-s0502a0:1110_25: Imaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā na dhāvitāmhi, tātā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1111_0: Brāhmaṇā tassā kathanakāle dantasampattiṃ disvā “evarūpā no dantasampatti diṭṭhapubbā”ti tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a0:1111_1: tuyhamevesā anucchavikā”ti vatvā taṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ pilandhayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1111_9: Sā “samānajātikaṃ no kula”nti adhivāsetvā pitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “amhākaṃ rathaṃ pesetū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1111_10: Kiñcāpi hi sā āgamanakāle padasā āgatā,
atk-s0502a0:1111_11: suvaṇṇamālāya pana pilandhanakālato paṭṭhāya tathā gantuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a0:1111_14: chattaṃ vā tālapaṇṇaṃ vā upari karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1111_15: tasmimpi asati nivatthasāṭakassa dasantaṃ ukkhipitvā aṃse khipantā gacchanti eva.
atk-s0502a0:1111_16: Tassā pana pitā pañca rathasatāni pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1111_29: dārikāya pana ārakkhamattāya laddhakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ aññena kāraṇenā”ti adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:1111_30: So tesaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā ekāhadvīhaṃ vasāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1112_0: Te sāvatthiṃ gantvā migāraseṭṭhissa “laddhā no dārikā”ti ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1112_4: khippameva naṃ ānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tattha gamanatthaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1112_5: Rājā “‘mahākulaṃ etaṃ mayā bimbisārassa santikā ānetvā sākete nivesitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1112_6: tassa sammānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti ahampi āgamissāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a0:1112_10: mahantaṃ rājabalaṃ ettakassa janassa kattabbayuttakaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:1112_14: Migāraseṭṭhi tāva mahante nagare gehagopakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesajanaṃ ādāya gantvā aḍḍhayojanamatte ṭhāne ṭhatvā “āgatāmhā”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1112_15: Dhanañcayaseṭṭhi bahupaṇṇākāraṃ pesetvā dhītarā saddhiṃ mantesi, “amma,
atk-s0502a0:1112_16: sasuro kira te kosalaraññā saddhiṃ āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1112_20: Paṇḍitā seṭṭhidhītā vajiraggatikhiṇañāṇā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā abhinīhārasampannā “sasurassa me asukagehaṃ paṭijaggatha,
atk-s0502a0:1112_22: uparājādīnaṃ asukānī”ti saṃvidahitvā dāsakammakare pakkosāpetvā “ettakā rañño kattabbakiccaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a0:1112_27: “‘Mayaṃ visākhāya maṅgalaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā na kiñci labhimha,
atk-s0502a0:1112_28: assarakkhaṇādīni karontā sukhaṃ na vicarimhā’ti keci vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1113_0: Taṃ divasameva visākhāya pitā pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā “dhītu me mahālatāpasādhanaṃ nāma karothā”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1113_2: Rājā katipāhaṃ vasitvāva dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “na sakkā seṭṭhinā amhākaṃ ciraṃ posanaṃ nāma kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1113_7: tumhākaṃ balakāyassa yaṃ yaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1113_10: Tato paṭṭhāya sāketanagaraṃ niccanakkhattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1113_11: Rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesaṃ mālāgandhavatthādīni paṭiyattāneva honti.
atk-s0502a0:1113_20: imasmiṃ nagare parijiṇṇā hatthisālādayo ceva parijiṇṇakāni ca gehāni gahetvā pacathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1113_24: dussakoṭṭhāgārāni vivaritvā thūlasāṭakehi vaṭṭiyo katvā telacāṭīsu temetvā bhattaṃ pacathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1114_0: Tasmiṃ pasādhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1114_4: Iti etehi ca aññehi ca ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1114_7: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne muddikā yojetvā katā suvaṇṇamayā gaṇṭhikā honti,
atk-s0502a0:1114_15: Tasmiṃ kho pana pasādhane ekaṃ moraṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1114_16: tassa dakkhiṇapakkhe rattasuvaṇṇamayāni pañca pattasatāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1114_23: So visākhāya matthakamajjhe pabbatakūṭe ṭhatvā naccanamayūro viya khāyati.
atk-s0502a0:1114_24: Pattanāḷisahassassa saddo dibbasaṅgītaṃ viya pañcaṅgikatūriyaghoso viya ca pavattati.
atk-s0502a0:1115_1: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarasāṭakaṃ datvā suttampi sūciyopi rajanampi attano santakameva adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1115_2: Tassa cīvaradānassa nissandena imaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:1115_5: Evaṃ mahāseṭṭhi catūhi māsehi dhītu parivacchaṃ katvā tassā deyyadhammaṃ dadamāno kahāpaṇapūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1115_15: “mama dhītu gataṭṭhāne ‘asukena nāma me attho’ti mā parassa gehadvāraṃ pahiṇī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1115_17: Ekekasmiṃ rathe sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā tisso tisso vaṇṇadāsiyo ṭhapetvā pañca rathasatāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1115_18: “Etaṃ nhāpentiyo bhojentiyo alaṅkarontiyo vicarathā”ti diyaḍḍhasahassaparicārikāyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1115_22: “gacchatha bhaṇe cūḷavajassa dvāraṃ vivaritvā tīsu gāvutesu tisso bheriyo gahetvā tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0502a0:1115_23: puthulato usabhamatte ṭhāne ubhosu passesu tiṭṭhatha.
atk-s0502a0:1115_24: Gāvīnaṃ tato paraṃ gantuṃ mā adattha.
atk-s0502a0:1115_27: Te gāvīnaṃ vajato nikkhamitvā gāvutaṃ gatakāle bherisaññaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1115_32: puthulato usabhamatte ṭhāne gāviyo aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsantiyo aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1116_2: Dvārasmiṃ pidahite visākhāya puññabalena balavagāvo ca dhenuyo ca uppatitvā uppatitvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1116_3: Manussānaṃ vārentānaṃ vārentānameva saṭṭhisahassā balavagāvo ca saṭṭhisahassā dhenuyo ca nikkhantā,
atk-s0502a0:1116_4: tattakā balavavacchā tāsaṃ dhenūnaṃ usabhā uppatitvā anubandhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1116_7: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kikissa rañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī nāma hutvā vīsatiyā
atk-s0502a0:1116_8: bhikkhusahassānaṃ pañcagorasadānaṃ dadamānā therānañca daharānañca sāmaṇerānañca pattaṃ pidahitvā, “alaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1116_11: Evaṃ tassa nissandena vāriyamānāpi gāvo nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1116_12: Seṭṭhinā ettakassa dhanassa dinnakāle seṭṭhibhariyā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1116_17: Ahañhi tāya saddhiṃ āgacchamānake gīvāya gahetvā na pahiṇāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1116_18: yānaṃ āruyha gamanakāleyeva etāya saddhiṃ gantukāmā gacchantu,
atk-s0502a0:1117_0: Atha “sve mama dhītā gamissatī”ti gabbhe nisinno dhītaraṃ samīpe nisīdāpetvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a0:1117_1: patikule vasantiyā nāma imañca imañca ācāraṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1117_2: Ayampi migāraseṭṭhi anantaragabbhe nisinno dhanañcayaseṭṭhino ovādaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a0:1118_1: sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo,
atk-s0502a0:1119_0: Imaṃ dasavidhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā punadivase sabbā seniyo sannipātetvā rājasenāya majjhe aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1119_2: tumhehi sodhetabbo”ti vatvā navakoṭiagghanakena mahālatāpasādhanena dhītaraṃ pasādhetvā nhānacuṇṇamūlakaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1119_3: catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ datvā yānaṃ āropetvā sāketassa sāmantā attano santakesu anurādhapuramattesu cuddasasu
atk-s0502a0:1119_7: “amhākaṃ ayyāya gamanakāle kiṃ amhākaṃ idhā”ti cuddasa gāmakā kiñci asesetvā nikkhamiṃsu?
atk-s0502a0:1119_8: Dhanañcayaseṭṭhipi rañño ca migāraseṭṭhino ca sakkāraṃ katvā thokaṃ anugantvā tehi saddhiṃ dhītaraṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi sabbapacchato yānake nisīditvā gacchanto balakāyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:1120_11: ko ete posessatī”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothetvā palāpetvā sesake “alaṃ amhākaṃ ettakehī”ti gahetvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_16: “paṭicchannayānena me pavisantiyā mahālatāpasādhanassa viseso na paññāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1120_17: Sā sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_20: evarūpā ayaṃ sampatti etissāva anucchavikā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1120_21: Iti sā mahāsampattiyā seṭṭhino gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_22: Gatadivase cassā sakalanagaravāsino “amhākaṃ dhanañcayaseṭṭhi attano nagaraṃ sampattānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a0:1120_24: Visākhā pahitapahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tasmiṃyeva nagare aññamaññesu kulesu sabbatthakameva dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_28: idaṃ mayhaṃ bhaginiyā dethā”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ vayānurūpaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesentī sakalanagaravāsino ñātake viya akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1120_30: Sā dāsīhi daṇḍadīpikā gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā vaḷavaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā telena makkhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1121_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi puttassa āvāhamaṅgalaṃ karonto dhuravihāre vasantampi tathāgataṃ amanasikaritvā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1121_1: naggasamaṇakesu patiṭṭhitena pemena codiyamāno “mayhaṃ ayyānampi sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ anekasatesu
atk-s0502a0:1121_2: navabhājanesu nirudakapāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā pañcasate acelake nimantāpetvā antogehaṃ pavesetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1121_5: Sā “arahanto”ti vacanaṃ sutvā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā tesaṃ bhojanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā te oloketvā,
atk-s0502a0:1121_8: dhī”ti seṭṭhiṃ garahitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0502a0:1121_9: Acelakā taṃ disvā sabbe ekappahāreneva seṭṭhiṃ garahiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:1121_12: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikaṃ mahākāḷakaṇṇiṃ idha pavesesi,
atk-s0502a0:1121_14: So “na sakkā mayā imesaṃ vacanamatteneva nikkaḍḍhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1121_16: daharā nāma jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1121_17: tumhe tuṇhī hothā”ti te uyyojetvā sayaṃ mahārahe āsane nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ nirudakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a0:1122_0: Tasmiṃ samaye eko piṇḍapātikatthero piṇḍāya caranto taṃ nivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1122_1: Visākhā sasuraṃ bījayamānā ṭhitā taṃ disvā “sasurassa ācikkhituṃ ayutta”nti yathā so theraṃ passati,
atk-s0502a0:1122_3: So pana bālo theraṃ disvāpi apassanto viya hutvā adhomukho bhuñjateva.
atk-s0502a0:1122_4: Visākhā “theraṃ disvāpi me sasuro saññaṃ na karotī”ti ñatvā,
atk-s0502a0:1122_7: So nigaṇṭhehi kathitakāle adhivāsetvāpi “purāṇaṃ khādatī”ti vuttakkhaṇeyeva hatthaṃ apanetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1122_10: ayaṃ maṃ evarūpe maṅgalakāle asucikhādakaṃ nāma karotī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1122_11: Tasmiṃ kho pana nivesane sabbepi dāsakammakarā visākhāya santakāva,
atk-s0502a0:1122_12: ko naṃ hatthe vā pāde vā gaṇhissati,
atk-s0502a0:1122_16: nāhaṃ tumhehi udakatitthato kumbhadāsī viya ānītā,
atk-s0502a0:1122_17: dharamānakamātāpitūnaṃ dhītaro nāma na ettakeneva nikkhamanti,
atk-s0502a0:1122_18: eteneva me kāraṇena pitā idhāgamanakāle aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā ‘sace me dhītu doso uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1122_19: sodheyyāthā’ti vatvā maṃ tesaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a0:1123_0: Seṭṭhi “kalyāṇaṃ esā kathetī”ti aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1123_1: “ayaṃ dārikā maṅgalakāle nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ nirudakapāyāsaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ maṃ ‘asucikhādako’ti vadatī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a0:1123_5: ekasmiṃ pana piṇḍapātikatthere gharadvāre ṭhite sasuro me appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjanto taṃ na manasikaroti,
atk-s0502a0:1123_6: ahaṃ “mayhaṃ sasuro imasmiṃ attabhāve puññaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1123_15: ayaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ majjhimayāme dāsīparivutā pacchāgehaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1123_18: imasmiṃ pana gehe ājāneyyavaḷavāya vijātāya saññampi akatvā nisīdituṃ nāma ayutta”nti daṇḍadīpikā gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:1123_19: uṇhodakādīnipi gāhāpetvā dāsīhi saddhiṃ gantvā vaḷavāya vijātaparihāraṃ kārāpesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1123_22: amhākaṃ dhītā tava gehe dāsīhipi akattabbayuttakaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1124_2: imissā pana pitā idhāgamanakāle imaṃ ovadanto guyhe paṭicchanne dasa ovāde adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1124_5: Imissā pana pitā “antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo”ti āha,
atk-s0502a0:1124_6: “sakkā nu kho amhehi ubhato paṭivissakagehānaṃ aggiṃ adatvā vasitu”nti?
atk-s0502a0:1124_8: mayhaṃ pitā na etaṃ sandhāya kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1124_10: tava sassusasurasāmikānaṃ aguṇaṃ disvā bahi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ gehe ṭhatvā mā kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1124_11: Evarūpo hi aggisadiso aggi nāma natthī”’ti.
atk-s0502a0:1125_2: imissā pana pitā “bāhirato aggi na anto pavesetabbo”ti āha,
atk-s0502a0:1125_3: “kiṃ sakkā amhehi anto aggimhi nibbute bāhirato aggiṃ anāharitu”nti?
atk-s0502a0:1125_5: mayhaṃ pitā na etaṃ sandhāya kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:1125_7: sace paṭivissakagehesu itthiyo vā purisā vā sassusasurasāmikānaṃ aguṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0502a0:1125_8: tehi kathitaṃ āharitvā “asuko nāma tumhākaṃ evañca evañca aguṇaṃ kathetī”ti puna mā katheyyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1125_9: “Etena hi agginā sadiso aggi nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1125_10: Evaṃ imasmimpi kāraṇe sā niddosāva ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1127_1: tesaṃ na dātabba”nti idampi ye yācitakaṃ gahetvā na paṭidenti,
atk-s0502a0:1128_0: “Dadantassāpi adadantassāpi dātabba”nti idaṃ pana daliddesu ñātimittesu sampattesu te paṭidātuṃ sakkontu vā mā vā,
atk-s0502a0:1129_0: “Sukhaṃ nisīditabba”nti idampi sassusasurasāmike disvā vuṭṭhātabbaṭṭhāne nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1130_0: “Sukhaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti idaṃ pana sassusasurasāmikehi puretaraṃ abhuñjitvā te parivisitvā sabbehi laddhāladdhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1130_1: ñatvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1131_0: “Sukhaṃ nipajjitabba”nti idampi sassusasurasāmikehi puretaraṃ sayanaṃ āruyha na nipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1131_1: tesaṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā pacchā sayaṃ nipajjituṃ yuttanti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1132_0: “Aggi paricaritabbo”ti idaṃ pana sassumpi sasurampi sāmikampi aggikkhandhaṃ viya uragarājānaṃ viya ca katvā passituṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1133_0: “Antodevatā namassitabbā”ti idampi sassuñca sasurañca sāmikañca devatā viya katvā daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1133_1: Evaṃ seṭṭhi imesaṃ dasaovādānaṃ atthaṃ sutvā paṭivacanaṃ apassanto adhomukho nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1134_0: Atha naṃ kuṭumbikā “kiṃ seṭṭhi aññopi amhākaṃ dhītu doso atthī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Natthi, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1134_1: “Atha kasmā naṃ niddosaṃ akāraṇena gehā nikkaḍḍhāpesī”ti evaṃ vutte visākhā āha – “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1134_2: kiñcāpi mayhaṃ sasurassa vacanena paṭhamameva gamanaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1134_3: pitā pana me āgamanakāle mama dosasodhanatthāya maṃ tumhākaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a0:1134_5: idāni ca mayhaṃ gantuṃ yutta”nti dāsidāse “yānādīhi sajjāpethā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1134_10: ahaṃ pana buddhasāsane aveccappasannassa kulassa dhītā,
atk-s0502a0:1134_12: sace mama ruciyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṭijaggituṃ labhāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1134_14: tvaṃ yathāruciyā tava samaṇe paṭijaggā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1135_0: Visākhā dasabalaṃ nimantāpetvā punadivase nivesanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1135_1: Naggasamaṇāpi satthu migāraseṭṭhino gehaṃ gamanabhāvaṃ sutvā gantvā gehaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1135_3: sasuro me āgantvā dasabalaṃ parivisatū”ti sāsanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1135_4: Atha naṃ gantukāmaṃ ājīvakā “mā kho tvaṃ, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:1135_6: So “suṇhā me sayameva parivisatū”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1135_7: Sā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā niṭṭhite bhattakicce puna sāsanaṃ pesesi –
atk-s0502a0:1135_9: Atha naṃ “idāni agamanaṃ nāma ativiya ayutta”nti dhammaṃ sotukāmatāya gacchantaṃ puna te āhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:1135_10: “tena hi samaṇassa gotamassa dhammaṃ suṇanto bahisāṇiyā nisīditvā suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1135_14: parakuṭṭe vā parasele vā paracakkavāḷe vā pana nisīda,
atk-s0502a0:1135_15: ahaṃ buddho nāma sakkomi taṃ mama saddaṃ sāvetu”nti mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viya amatavassaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1135_16: vassento viya ca dhammaṃ desetuṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:1136_0: Sammāsambuddhe ca pana dhammaṃ desente purato ṭhitāpi pacchato ṭhitāpi cakkavāḷasataṃ cakkavāḷasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1136_1: atikkamitvā ṭhitāpi akaniṭṭhabhavane ṭhitāpi “satthā mamaññeva oloketi,
atk-s0502a0:1136_3: Satthā hi taṃ taṃ olokento viya tena tena saddhiṃ sallapanto viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1136_5: Yathā cando gaganamajjhe ṭhito “mayhaṃ upari cando,
atk-s0502a0:1136_7: evameva yattha katthaci ṭhitānaṃ abhimukhe ṭhitā viya khāyanti.
atk-s0502a0:1136_8: Idaṃ kira tesaṃ alaṅkatasīsaṃ chinditvā añjitaakkhīni uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ uppāṭetvā parassa dāsatthāya
atk-s0502a0:1136_9: jālisadise putte kaṇhājināsadisā dhītaro maddisadisā pajāpatiyo pariccajitvā dinnadānassa phalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1136_10: Migāraseṭṭhipi kho tathāgate dhammadesanaṃ vinivattente bahisāṇiyaṃ nisinnova sahassa nayapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0502a0:1136_11: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya acalāya saddhāya samannāgato tīsu ratanesu nikkaṅkho hutvā sāṇikaṇṇaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0502a0:1136_13: “tvaṃ me ajjato paṭṭhāya mātā”ti taṃ mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1137_0: Mahāseṭṭhi suṇhāya thanaṃ vissajjetvā gantvā bhagavato dvīsu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā pāde pāṇīhi ca parisambāhanto
atk-s0502a0:1137_4: ettakaṃ kālaṃ yattha nāma dvinnaṃ mahapphalanti na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1137_5: idāni ca me suṇisaṃ nissāya ñātaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1137_7: suṇisā me imaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantī mama atthāya hitāya sukhāya āgatā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1139_0: Atthāya vata me bhaddā, suṇisā gharamāgatā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1140_2: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ gehaṃ sāsanassa vivaṭadvāraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1140_5: etissā bhāriyaṃ pasādhanaṃ niccakālaṃ pasādhetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:1140_6: sallahukamassā divā ca ratto ca sabbairiyāpathesu pasādhanayoggaṃ pasādhanaṃ kāressāmī”ti satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1140_7: ghanamaṭṭhakaṃ nāma pasādhanaṃ kāretvā tasmiṃ niṭṭhite buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1140_8: bhojetvā visākhaṃ soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā satthu sammukhe ṭhapetvā pasādhetvā satthāraṃ vandāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1140_10: Visākhāpi tato paṭṭhāya dānādīni puññāni karontī satthu santikā aṭṭha vare labhitvā gaganatale candalekhā
atk-s0502a0:1140_12: Tassā kira dasa puttā dasa dhītaro ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1140_13: Tesu ekekassa dasa dasa puttā dasa dasa dhītaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1140_14: Tesu tesupi ekekassa dasa dasa puttā dasa dasa dhītaro cāti evamassā puttanattapanattasantānavasena pavattāni
atk-s0502a0:1140_15: vīsādhikāni cattāri satāni aṭṭha ca pāṇasahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1141_0: “Visākhā vīsati puttā, nattā ca caturo satā;
atk-s0502a0:1143_9: Ye naṃ ṭhitaṃ nisinnaṃ nipannaṃ passanti,
atk-s0502a0:1143_13: Iti sā “catūsu iriyāpathesu asukairiyāpathena nāma na sobhatī”ti vattabbā na hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1143_14: Pañcannaṃ kho pana hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0502a0:1143_15: Rājā “visākhā kira pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāretī”ti sutvā tassā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā āgamanavelāya
atk-s0502a0:1143_24: kathaṃ nu kho taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a0:1143_26: vinasseyyā”ti dvīhi aṅgulīhi soṇḍāya gahetvā paṭipaṇāmesi.
atk-s0502a0:1144_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ visākhā migāramātā bahuputtā hoti bahunattā arogaputtā aroganattā abhimaṅgalasammatā,
atk-s0502a0:1144_1: tāvatakesu puttanattesu ekopi antarā maraṇaṃ patto nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0502a0:1144_2: Sāvatthivāsino maṅgalesu chaṇesu visākhaṃ paṭhamaṃ nimantetvā bhojenti.
atk-s0502a0:1144_3: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase mahājane maṇḍitapasādhite dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gacchante visākhāpi nimantitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:1144_4: bhuñjitvā mahālatāpasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgena

atk-s0502a0:1147_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā dāsī pamussitvā nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “ayye,

atk-s0502a0:1147_15: Theropi taṃ dāsiṃ disvāva “kimatthaṃ āgatāsī”ti pucchitvā,

atk-s0502a0:1148_0: Tasmā visākhā sayameva tassa mūlaṃ datvā satasahassādhikā nava koṭiyo sakaṭe āropetvā vihāraṃ netvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,

atk-s0502a0:1148_3: Taṃ pana vissajjetvā kappiyaṃ upanessāmīti vikkiṇāpentī aññaṃ taṃ gaṇhituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā ahameva tassa mūlaṃ gāhāpetvā āgatā,

atk-s0502a0:1149_1: bhaddiyassa nāma seṭṭhiputtassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā anāthapiṇḍikassa gehe bhattakiccaṃ katvā uttaradvārābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1149_2: Pakatiyā hi satthā visākhāya gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane vasati.

atk-s0502a0:1149_6: Visākhāpi taṃ divasaṃ “satthā uttaradvārābhimukho gato”ti sutvā vegena gantvā vanditvā āha –

atk-s0502a0:1149_14: Sā “addhā hetusampannaṃ kañci passissati bhagavā”ti cintetvā, “tena hi, bhante,

atk-s0502a0:1150_0: Atha satthā navahi māsehi cārikaṃ caritvā puna sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0502a0:1150_3: “Satthā jetavanavihāraṃ gacchatī”ti ca sutvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā satthāraṃ attano vihāraṃ netvā paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1150_4: imaṃ catumāsaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā idheva vasatha,
atk-s0502a0:1150_7: Sā tato paṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāre eva dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a0:1150_8: Athassā ekā sahāyikā satasahassagghanakaṃ ekaṃ vatthaṃ ādāya āgantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1150_9: “sahāyike ahaṃ imaṃ vatthaṃ tava pāsāde bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena attharitukāmā,
atk-s0502a0:1150_14: sayameva pāsādassa dve bhūmiyo gabbhasahassañca oloketvā attharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1150_15: Sā satasahassagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ gahetvā tattha tattha vicarantī tato appataramūlaṃ vatthaṃ adisvā “nāhaṃ

atk-s0502a0:1151_7: vihāramahe navāti sabbāpi sattavīsati koṭiyo sā buddhasāsane pariccaji.
atk-s0502a0:1151_8: Itthibhāve ṭhatvā micchādiṭṭhikassa gehe vasamānāya evarūpo mahāpariccāgo nāma aññissā natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1151_9: Sā vihāramahassa niṭṭhitadivase vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya puttanattapanattaparivutā “yaṃ yaṃ mayā pubbe patthitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1151_10: sabbameva matthakaṃ patta”nti pāsādaṃ anupariyāyantī pañcahi gāthāhi madhurasaddena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a0:1162_0: Bhikkhū tassā saddaṃ sutvā satthu ārocayiṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1162_1: amhehi ettake addhāne visākhāya gāyanaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1162_2: sā ajja puttanattapanattaparivutā gāyamānā pāsādaṃ anupariyāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1162_3: kiṃ nu khvassā pittaṃ vā kupitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1162_9: sā ‘patthitapatthanā me matthakaṃ pattā’ti tuṭṭhamānasā udānaṃ udānentī vicaratī”ti vatvā “kadā pana, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1163_2: ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma buddho loke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1163_8: tassa aggaupaṭṭhāyikā ekā upāsikā aṭṭha vare yācitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā satthāraṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggantī sāyaṃpātaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1163_9: Tassā ekā sahāyikā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ nibaddhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1163_10: Sā tassā satthārā saddhiṃ vissāsena kathanañca vallabhabhāvañca disvā,
atk-s0502a0:1163_11: ‘kiṃ nu kho katvā evaṃ buddhānaṃ vallatā hotī’ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pucchi – ‘bhante,

atk-s0502a0:1163_20: Sā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā osānadivase cīvarasāṭake datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “bhante,

atk-s0502a0:1163_22: tumhādisassa panekassa buddhassa santike aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggituṃ
atk-s0502a0:1163_24: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imissā patthanā”ti anāgataṃ āvajjento kappasatasahassaṃ oloketvā “kappasatasahassapariyosāne
atk-s0502a0:1163_26: tadā tvaṃ visākhā nāma upāsikā hutvā tassa santike aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi

atk-s0502a0:1164_1: kikissa kāsirañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī nāma hutvā parakulaṃ agantvā tāhi jeṭṭhabhaginīhi
atk-s0502a0:1164_2: saddhiṃ dīgharattaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa pādamūlepi “anāgate tumhādisassa

atk-s0502a0:1164_4: Sā tato paṭṭhāya pana devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ attabhāve meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0502a0:1164_5: Mayhaṃ sāsane bahūni puññāni akāsi. Iti kho,

atk-s0502a0:1164_10: yathā nāma cheko mālākāro nānāpupphānaṃ mahantaṃ rāsiṃ katvā nānappakāre mālāguṇe karoti,

atk-s0502a0:1167_0: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1168_2: Mālāguṇe bahūti ekato vaṇṭikamālādibhedā nānappakārā mālāvikatiyo.
atk-s0502a0:1168_3: Maccenāti maritabbasabhāvatāya “macco”ti laddhanāmena sattena cīvaradānādibhedaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ.

atk-s0502a0:1168_13: Uḷārāya ca pana saddhāya mandesu ca bhogesu na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1168_14: Uḷārāya ca pana saddhāya uḷāresu ca bhogesu sati sakkoti.

atk-s0502a0:1189_0: Tattha na pupphagandhoti tāvatiṃsabhavane paricchattakarukkho āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanasatiko,
atk-s0502a0:1189_1: tassa pupphānaṃ ābhā paññāsa yojanāni gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1189_4: paṭivātaṃ pana aṭṭhaṅgulamattampi gantuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:1189_7: Tagaramallikā vāti imesampi gandho eva adhippeto.
atk-s0502a0:1189_8: Sāragandhānaṃ aggassa hi lohitacandanassāpi tagarassapi mallikāyapi anuvātameva vāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1189_10: Satañca gandhoti sappurisānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ sīlagandho paṭivātameti.
atk-s0502a0:1189_12: Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati yasmā pana sappuriso sīlagandhena sabbāpi disā ajjhottharitvāva gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1189_13: tasmā “tassa gandho na paṭivātametī”ti na vattabbo.
atk-s0502a0:1189_16: Etesanti imesaṃ candanādīnaṃ gandhajātānaṃ gandhato sīlavantānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sīlagandhova anuttaro asadiso apaṭibhāgoti.
atk-s0502a0:1190_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1193_0: Appamatto ayaṃ gandhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahākassapattherassa piṇḍapātadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a0:1194_11: Tā therassa accharasaddaṃ sutvā santhambhitvā sammukhā ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo palāyitvā devalokameva gantvā,

atk-s0502a0:1195_0: Theropi “duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti nagarābhimukho gacchanto bahinagare eva taṃ vīthiṃ disvā olokento dve jane addasa.

atk-s0502a0:1195_7: Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:1195_9: tvaṃ apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā nisīda,
atk-s0502a0:1195_12: Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1196_0: Atha sakko “gehadvāre eko thero viya ṭhito,
atk-s0502a0:1196_3: So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni olambitvā nitthunanto
atk-s0502a0:1196_4: uṭṭhāya “kataro thero nu kho ayyo”ti thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1196_6: ayyo no mahākassapatthero cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1196_7: atthi nu kho kiñci gehe”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1196_10: lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1196_11: Thero “etehi dinnaṃ sākaṃ vā hotu kuṇḍakamuṭṭhi vā,
atk-s0502a0:1196_13: So antogharaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭiyā uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā therassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1197_6: “bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kataṃ duggatānaṃ sampattiṃ vilumpantena,
atk-s0502a0:1197_7: ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1197_10: “Kiṃ kāraṇā tvaṃ duggato devaloke rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1197_12: mayā pana anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1197_13: buddhuppāde vattamāne kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti
atk-s0502a0:1197_14: ime tayo samānadevaputtā mama āsannaṭṭhāne nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:1197_16: Ahañhi tesu devaputtesu ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ pavisāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1197_17: Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama sarīraṃ ottharati,
atk-s0502a0:1197_18: mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ sarīraṃ na ottharati,
atk-s0502a0:1197_21: ‘Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”’ti.
atk-s0502a0:1197_22: “Vañcetvā tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1197_27: So evaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ gahetvā theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “aho dānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1198_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
atk-s0502a0:1198_1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0502a0:1198_2: sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0502a0:1198_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1198_4: Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa etadahosi –
atk-s0502a0:1199_0: “Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni devatāsatāni ussukkaṃ āpannāni honti āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātapaṭilābhāya.
atk-s0502a0:1199_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tāni pañcamattāni devatāsatāni paṭikkhipitvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1200_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1200_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo rājagahe sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena sakkassa devānamindassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a0:1200_4: addasā kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1200_5: disvā gharā nikkhamitvā paccuggantvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭiyā odanaṃ uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā āyasmato mahākassapassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1200_6: So ahosi piṇḍapāto anekasūpo anekabyañjano anekarasabyañjano.
atk-s0502a0:1200_11: ‘sakko kho ayaṃ devānamindo’ti viditvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0502a0:1201_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a0:1202_0: Atha kho bhagavā vihāre ṭhito eva tassa taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhikkhū āmantetvā –
atk-s0502a0:1202_3: sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1202_6: “Vañcetvā tena mayhaṃ puttassa kassapassa piṇḍapāto dinno,
atk-s0502a0:1202_7: taṃ datvā tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1202_11: mama puttena sadisaṃ nāma piṇḍapātikaṃ devāpi manussāpi pihayantīti vatvā sayampi udānaṃ udāne”si.
atk-s0502a0:1203_0: “Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya sakkassa devānamindassa vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1203_1: abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānentassa “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1204_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a0:1209_2: sakko devānamindo mama puttassa sīlagandhena āgantvā piṇḍapātaṃ adāsī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1212_0: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1213_1: Yo ca sīlavatanti yo pana sīlavantānaṃ sīlagandho,
atk-s0502a0:1213_2: so tagaraṃ viya lohitacandanaṃ viya ca parittako na hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1213_4: Teneva kāraṇena vāti devesu uttamoti pavaro seṭṭho hutvā devesu ca manussesu ca sabbatthameva vāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1214_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1217_0: Tesaṃ sampannasīlānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharanto godhikattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1218_0: So hi āyasmā isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṃ viharanto appamatto ātāpī pahitatto sāmāyikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusitvā
atk-s0502a0:1218_1: ekassa anussāyikassa rogassa vasena tato parihāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1218_2: So dutiyampi tatiyampi chakkhattuṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā parihīno,
atk-s0502a0:1218_6: idāneva satthaṃ āharissāmī”ti kesoropanasatthakaṃ gahetvā galanāḷiṃ chindituṃ pañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:1218_7: Māro tassa cittaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthaṃ āharitukāmo,
atk-s0502a0:1218_8: satthaṃ āharantā kho pana jīvite nirapekkhā honti,
atk-s0502a0:1218_12: satthāraṃ vārāpessāmī”ti aññātakavesena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1224_0: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1225_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe therena satthaṃ āharitaṃ hoti. Satthā “māro aya”nti viditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1228_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ therassa satthaṃ āharitvā nipannaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1228_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pāpimā “kattha nu kho imassa paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita”nti dhūmarāsi viya timirapuñjo
atk-s0502a0:1228_2: viya ca hutvā sabbadisāsu therassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati.
atk-s0502a0:1228_3: Bhagavā taṃ dhūmatimirabhāvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassetvā “eso kho,
atk-s0502a0:1228_5: māro pāpimā godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati ‘kattha godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita’nti.
atk-s0502a0:1228_9: Māropi tassa viññāṇaṭṭhānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkonto kumārakavaṇṇo hutvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:1229_0: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disā anudisā svahaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:1230_0: Anvesaṃ nādhigacchāmi, godhiko so kuhiṃ gato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1236_0: Evaṃ vutte māro pāpimā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:1239_2: Tassa hi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ satampi sahassampi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1242_0: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1243_0: Tattha tesanti yathā appatiṭṭhitena viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto,
atk-s0502a0:1243_4: Sammadaññā vimuttānanti hetunā ñāyena kāraṇena jānitvā “tadaṅgavimuttiyā,
atk-s0502a0:1243_9: Māro maggaṃ na vindatīti evarūpānaṃ mahākhīṇāsavānaṃ sabbathāmena maggantopi māro gatamaggaṃ na vindati na labhati na passatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1244_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a0:1247_0: Yathā saṅkāraṭṭhānasminti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto garahadinnaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1248_0: Sāvatthiyañhi sirigutto ca garahadinno cāti dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1248_4: “tava sahāyakaṃ siriguttaṃ ‘kiṃ tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamasi,
atk-s0502a0:1248_5: tassa santike kiṃ labhissasī’ti vatvā yathā amhe upasaṅkamitvā amhākañca deyyadhammaṃ dassati,
atk-s0502a0:1248_7: Garahadinno tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ gantvā ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu siriguttaṃ evaṃ ovadati – “samma,
atk-s0502a0:1248_11: upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1248_12: Sirigutto tassa kathaṃ sutvāpi bahū divase tuṇhī hutvā nibbijjitvā ekadivasaṃ, “samma,
atk-s0502a0:1248_13: tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ āgantvā maṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādīsu evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0502a0:1248_14: ‘samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasi, mama, ayye,
atk-s0502a0:1248_20: sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ idaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1248_21: idaṃ na bhavissatī’ti sabbaṃ bhabbābhabbaṃ jānantī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1248_27: ajja mayā ayyānaṃ ñāṇānubhāvo ñāto, gaccha, samma, ayye,
atk-s0502a0:1248_29: So nigaṇṭhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te vanditvā “mayhaṃ sahāyako sirigutto svātanāya tumhe nimantetī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1248_32: siriguttassa amhesu pasannakālato paṭṭhāya kā nāma sampatti amhākaṃ na bhavissatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1249_1: So tasmiṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ubhato dīghaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā gūthakalalassa pūrāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1249_2: Bahiāvāṭe dvīsu pariyantesu khāṇuke koṭṭāpetvā tesu rajjuyo bandhāpetvā āsanānaṃ purimapāde āvāṭassa
atk-s0502a0:1249_4: “Evaṃ nisinnakāle evaṃ avaṃsirā patissantī”ti maññamāno yathā āvāṭo na paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1249_6: Mahantā mahantā cāṭiyo ṭhapāpetvā kadalipaṇṇehi ca setapilotikāhi ca mukhāni bandhāpetvā tā tucchā eva
atk-s0502a0:1249_8: Garahadinno pātova tassa gharaṃ vegena gantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1249_16: So “sādhū”ti vatvā gato tassa gatakāle pañcasatā nigaṇṭhā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1249_17: Sirigutto gehā nikkhamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena nigaṇṭhe vanditvā tesaṃ purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1249_22: Mama gehaṃ paviṭṭhānañhi vo neva yāgu atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1249_25: gūthaāvāṭe vo pātetvā pothessāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā purisānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1249_26: Evaṃ tesaṃ nisīdanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pacchimapasse ṭhatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni apaneyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:1250_7: “Amhākaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ ayyānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1250_9: “Attano attano pattāsanamūlesu ṭhatvā sabbepi ekappahāreneva nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1250_12: avasesā āsane nisīdantū’ti vattuṃ mā labhatū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1250_13: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā “imehi kathitakathaṃ amhehi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1250_14: Atha sabbe attano attano pattāsanamūle paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1250_15: khippaṃ ekappahāreneva nisīdathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1250_19: Sirigutto tesu patitesu dvāraṃ pidahitvā te uttiṇṇuttiṇṇe “atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ kasmā na jānāthā”ti
atk-s0502a0:1250_20: daṇḍehi pāthetvā “ettakaṃ etesaṃ vaṭṭissatī”ti dvāraṃ vivarāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1250_22: Gamanamagge pana tesaṃ sudhāparikammakataṃ bhūmiṃ picchilaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1250_23: Te tattha asaṇṭhahitvā patite patite puna pothāpetvā “alaṃ ettakaṃ tumhāka”nti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1250_25: nāsitamhā tayā”ti kandantā upaṭṭhākassa gehadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1251_0: Garahadinno taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā kuddho “nāsitamhi siriguttena,
atk-s0502a0:1251_1: hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandantānaṃ sadevake loke yathāruciyā dātuṃ samatthe nāma puññakkhettabhūte mama, ayye,
atk-s0502a0:1251_2: pothāpetvā byasanaṃ pāpesī”ti rājakulaṃ gantvā tassa kahāpaṇasahassaṃ daṇḍaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:1251_9: mayhaṃ sahāyako nigaṇṭhasāvako maṃ upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu abhiṇhaṃ evaṃ vadesi – “samma,
atk-s0502a0:1251_11: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasī”ti idaṃ ādiṃ katvā sirigutto sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “deva,
atk-s0502a0:1251_12: sace imasmiṃ kāraṇe daṇḍaṃ gahetuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1251_14: Rājā garahadinnaṃ oloketvā “saccaṃ kira te evaṃ vutta”nti āha. “Saccaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1251_15: Tvaṃ ettakampi ajānante satthāroti gahetvā vicaranto “sabbaṃ jānantī”ti kiṃ kāraṇā tathāgatasāvakassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1251_16: “Tayā āropitadaṇḍo tuyhameva hotū”ti evaṃ sveva daṇḍaṃ pāpito,
atk-s0502a0:1252_0: So taṃ kujjhitvā tato paṭṭhāya aḍḍhamāsamattampi siriguttena saddhiṃ akathetvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1252_2: etassa kulūpakānampi mayā byasanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti siriguttaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1252_7: tava mayā saddhiṃ akathanato na kathemī”ti. “Yaṃ, samma, kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1252_8: katameva taṃ na mayaṃ mettiṃ bhindissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1252_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ubhopi ekaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti nisīdanti.
atk-s0502a0:1252_13: mama satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vā ayyānaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ vā kiṃ te na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1252_15: tenassa kaṇḍuvanaṭṭhāne nakhena vilekhitaṃ viya ahosi. So,
atk-s0502a0:1252_23: kasmā mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:1252_27: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama bhikkhaṃ gaṇhituṃ vadehī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1253_2: pañcahi kira bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sve tassa bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a0:1253_3: purimadivase kho pana tassa kulūpakānaṃ mayā idaṃ nāma kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1253_5: tumhākaṃ suddhacittena bhikkhaṃ dātukāmatampi na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1253_9: Satthā “kiṃ nu kho so amhākaṃ kātu kāmo”ti āvajjetvā addasa “dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:1253_10: asītisakaṭamattāni khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā aggiṃ datvā amhe aṅgāraāvāṭe pātetvā niggaṇhitukāmo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1253_12: “kiṃ nu kho tattha gatapaccayā attho atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1253_21: ahaṃ tasmiṃ samāgame dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1253_23: sirigutto ca garahadinno ca sotāpannā bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1253_25: imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhaṃ adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:1254_0: Sirigutto gantvā satthu adhivāsanaṃ garahadinnassa ārocetvā “lokajeṭṭhassa sakkāraṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1254_1: Garahadinno “idānissa kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:1254_2: asītisakaṭamattāni khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā aggiṃ datvā khadiraṅgārarāsīnaṃ yojāpetvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0502a0:1254_3: dhamāpetvā khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ kārāpetvā āvāṭamatthake rukkhapadarāni ṭhapāpetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0502a0:1254_4: gomayena limpāpetvā ekena passena dubbaladaṇḍake attharitvā gamanamaggaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0502a0:1254_5: “evaṃ akkantaakkantakāle daṇḍakesu bhaggesu parivaṭṭetvā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patissantī”ti maññamāno gehapacchābhāge
atk-s0502a0:1254_8: Sirigutto pātova tassa gehaṃ gantvā “kato te, samma,
atk-s0502a0:1254_15: Micchādiṭṭhikena hi nimantite mahanto sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1255_0: Punadivase satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ garahadinnassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1255_1: So gehā nikkhamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito cintesi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1255_3: sattānaṃ soḷasahākārehi cittaṃ paricchindathā’ti evaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākena mayhaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1255_8: sabbe kho pana tumhe aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pātetvā niggaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1255_9: Evaṃ cintetvā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā “ito etha bhagavā”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1255_10: amhākaṃ gehaṃ āgatānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1255_12: “Ekekassa pavisitvā purato gantvā nisinnakāle pacchā aññena āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1255_14: “purato gacchantaṃ aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patitaṃ disvā avasesā na āgacchissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1255_17: Garahadinno aṅgārakāsuṃ patvā apasakkitvā ṭhito “purato yātha,
atk-s0502a0:1255_22: Satthā padumakaṇṇikā akkamanto gantvā paññatte buddhāsane nisīdi,
atk-s0502a0:1256_3: “Pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ gehe yāgu vā bhattādīni vā natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1256_6: Ahaṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ aṅgārassa pūraṃ kāresiṃ –
atk-s0502a0:1256_9: Sabbe padumakaṇṇikā akkamitvā gantvā paññattāsanesu nisinnā,
atk-s0502a0:1256_17: Taṃ khaṇaññeva tena yāsu cāṭīsu “yāgū”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1256_21: Taṃ sampattiṃ disvāva garahadinnassa sarīraṃ pītipāmojjena paripūritaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1256_23: So sakkaccaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā katabhattakiccassa satthuno anumodanaṃ kāretukāmo pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1256_24: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ime sattā paññācakkhuno abhāveneva mama sāvakānaṃ buddhasāsanassa guṇaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0502a0:1256_26: paññavanto sacakkhukā nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:1263_6: Puthujjaneti puthūnaṃ kilesānaṃ jananato evaṃladdhanāme lokiyamahājane.
atk-s0502a0:1263_8: yathā nāma mahāpathe chaḍḍite saṅkārarāsimhi asucijegucchiyapaṭikūlepi sucigandhaṃ padumaṃ jāyetha,
atk-s0502a0:1263_9: taṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ manoramaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ uparimatthake patiṭṭhānārahameva bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:1263_10: evameva saṅkārabhūtesupi puthujjanesu jāto nippaññassa mahājanassa acakkhukassa antare nibbattopi attano paññābalena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1263_11: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā pabbajito pabbajjāmattenapi,
atk-s0502a0:1263_13: Sammāsambuddhasāvako hi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu andhabhūte puthujjane atikkamitvā rocati virocati sobhatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1264_1: Garahadinno ca sirigutto ca sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1264_2: Te sabbaṃ attano dhanaṃ buddhasāsane vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1264_6: tathārūpaṃ nāma khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ bhinditvā padumāni uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1264_13: yaṃ mama etarahi buddhabhūtassa aṅgārarāsimhā padumāni uṭṭhitāni,
atk-s0502a0:1264_14: aparipakke ñāṇe vattamānassa bodhisattabhūtassapi me uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti vatvā, “kadā, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1273_0: Dīghā jāgarato rattīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasenadikosalañceva aññatarañca purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_0: Rājā kira pasenadi kosalo ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sabbasetaṃ ekaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ nāma hatthiṃ
atk-s0502a0:1274_1: abhiruyha mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:1274_2: Ussāraṇāya vattamānāya leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothiyamāno mahājano palāyanto gīvaṃ parivaṭṭetvāpi oloketiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1274_4: Aññatarassāpi duggatapurisassa bhariyā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparitale ṭhitā ekaṃ vātapānakavāṭaṃ vivaritvā rājānaṃ oloketvāva apagacchi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_5: Rañño puṇṇacando valāhakantaraṃ paviṭṭho viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_6: So tassā paṭibaddhacitto hatthikkhandhato patanākārappatto viya hutvā khippaṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:1274_7: antepuraṃ pavisitvā ekaṃ vissāsakaṃ amaccaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:1274_11: So gantvā tassā sasāmikabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā rañño “sasāmikā”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_12: Atha raññā “tena hi tassā sāmikaṃ pakkosāhī”ti vutte so gantvā, “ehi, bho,
atk-s0502a0:1274_14: So “bhariyaṃ me nissāya bhayena uppannena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā rañño āṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_15: Atha naṃ rājā “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya upaṭṭhāhī”ti āha. “Alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a0:1274_16: ahaṃ attano kammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ suṅkaṃ dadāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1274_19: ajjato paṭṭhāya maṃ upaṭṭhāhī”ti tassa phalakañca āvudhañca dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1274_22: Atha naṃ so maraṇabhayabhīto appamatto hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1275_0: Rājā tassa dosaṃ apassanto kāmapariḷāhe vaḍḍhante “ekamassa dosaṃ āropetvā rājāṇaṃ karissāmī”ti pakkosāpetvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1275_1: “ambho ito yojanamatthake nadiyā asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā sāyaṃ mama nhānavelāya kumuduppalāni ceva aruṇavatīmattikañca āhara.
atk-s0502a0:1275_6: piṭṭhi me rujjatī”ti vatvā acchituṃ labhantiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1275_10: kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikā nāma nāgabhavane uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1275_11: ahaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti cintento maraṇabhayabhīto vegena gehaṃ gantvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:1275_15: tāva sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uḷuṅkena kañjikaṃ harāpetvā yathāladdhena byañjanena saddhiṃ allameva bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1275_16: pacchiyaṃ opīḷetvā ādāya yojanikaṃ maggaṃ pakkhando,
atk-s0502a0:1275_18: So anucchiṭṭhaṃ katvāva thokaṃ bhattaṃ apanetvā bhuñjanto ekaṃ addhikaṃ disvā mayā apanetvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1275_19: thokaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ bhattameva atthi gahetvā bhuñja sāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:1275_21: Itaropi bhuñjitvā ekaṃ bhattamuṭṭhiṃ udake khipitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā mahantena saddena “imasmiṃ nadīpadese
atk-s0502a0:1275_22: adhivatthā nāgā supaṇṇā devatā ca vacanaṃ me suṇantu,
atk-s0502a0:1275_23: rājā mayhaṃ āṇaṃ kātukāmo ‘kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ āharā’ti maṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:1275_28: Ettakaṃ puññaphalaṃ tumhākaṃ pattiṃ katvā dammi,
atk-s0502a0:1275_29: mayhaṃ kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ āharathā”ti tikkhattuṃ anussāvesi.
atk-s0502a0:1275_30: Tattha adhivattho nāgarājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā mahallakavesena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ vadesī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1275_31: So punapi tatheva vatvā “mayhaṃ taṃ pattiṃ dehī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:1275_35: Evaṃ so dve tayo vāre pattiṃ āharāpetvā kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1276_4: So kālasseva dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā muddikaṃ attano santikaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1276_5: Itaropi puriso rañño nhānavelāyamevāgantvā dvāraṃ alabhanto dvārapālaṃ pakkosetvā “dvāraṃ vivarā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1276_7: rājā kālasseva muddikaṃ datvā rājagehaṃ āharāpesī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1276_9: dvāraṃ vivarā”ti vatvāpi “dvāraṃ alabhanto natthi me idāni jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1276_10: Kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti cintetvā dvārassa upariummāre mattikāpiṇḍaṃ khipitvā tassūpari pupphāni laggetvā mahāsaddaṃ karonto, “ambho,
atk-s0502a0:1276_11: nagaravāsino rañño mayā āṇattiyā gatabhāvaṃ jānātha,
atk-s0502a0:1276_12: rājā maṃ akāraṇena vināsetukāmo”ti tikkhattuṃ viravitvā “kattha nu kho gacchissāmī”ti cintetvā “bhikkhū nāma muduhadayā,
atk-s0502a0:1276_14: Ime hi nāma sattā sukhitakāle bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvampi ajānitvā dukkhābhibhūtakāle vihāraṃ gantukāmā honti,
atk-s0502a0:1276_15: tasmā sopi “me aññaṃ tāṇaṃ natthī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ phāsukaṭṭhāne nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:1276_16: Atha raññopi taṃ rattiṃ niddaṃ alabhantassa taṃ itthiṃ anussarantassa kāmapariḷāho uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:1276_18: “vibhātakkhaṇeyeva taṃ purisaṃ ghātāpetvā taṃ itthiṃ ānessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1277_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇeyeva saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattā cattāro purisā pakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā taṇḍulā
atk-s0502a0:1277_1: viya samparivattakaṃ paccamānā tiṃsāya vassasahassehi heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā aparehi tiṃsāya vassasahassehi
atk-s0502a0:1277_3: Te sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā parivattitvā lohakumbhimeva paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a0:1277_4: Rājā niddaṃ alabhanto majjhimayāmasamanantare taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhīto utrastamānaso “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ jīvitantarāyo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1277_6: udāhu me rajjaṃ vinassissatī”ti cintento sakalarattiṃ akkhīni nimīletuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1277_9: ‘rajjassa vā aggamahesiyā vā mayhaṃ vā kassa antarāyo bhavissatī’ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1277_10: tena me tvaṃ pakkosāpito”ti āha. Mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1277_11: kiṃ te saddā sutāti? “Ācariya, du- iti sa- iti na- iti so-
atk-s0502a0:1277_14: Brāhmaṇassa mahāandhakāraṃ paviṭṭhassa viya na kiñci paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1277_15: “na jānāmī”ti vutte “pana lābhasakkāro me parihāyissatī”ti bhāyitvā “bhāriyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1277_20: atthi kiñci pana paṭighātakāraṇa”nti āha. “Atthi, mahārāja, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0502a0:1277_25: Hatthisataṃ assasataṃ usabhasataṃ dhenusataṃ ajasataṃ urabbhasataṃ kukkuṭasataṃ sūkarasataṃ dārakasataṃ
atk-s0502a0:1277_26: dārikāsatanti evaṃ ekekaṃ pāṇajātiṃ sataṃ sataṃ katvā gaṇhāpento “sace migajātimeva gaṇhāpessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1277_28: Rājā “mama jīvitameva mayhaṃ lābho”ti cintetvā “sabbapāṇe sīghaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1278_0: “Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1278_1: pañca ca usabhasatāni pañca ca vacchatarasatāni pañca ca vacchatarisatāni pañca ca ajasatāni pañca ca urabbhasatāni thūṇūpanītāni honti yaññatthāya.
atk-s0502a0:1278_2: Yepissa te honti dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā,
atk-s0502a0:1278_3: tepi daṇḍatajjitā bhayatajjitā assumukhā rudamānā parikammāni karontī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1279_0: Mahājano attano attano puttadhītuñātīnaṃ atthāya paridevamāno mahāsaddamakāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1279_2: Atha mallikā devī taṃ saddaṃ sutvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ nu kho te, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1279_6: tvaṃ mama kaṇṇamūlena āsivisampi gacchantaṃ na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1279_9: svāhaṃ purohitaṃ pucchitvā jīvitantarāyo te paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1279_10: sabbasatayaññaṃ yajitvā jīvitaṃ labhissasī”ti sutvā “mama jīvitameva mayhaṃ lābho”ti ime pāṇe gaṇhāpesinti.
atk-s0502a0:1279_18: “Kahaṃ tayā aññassa maraṇena aññassa jīvitalābho diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0502a0:1279_19: andhabālassa brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ gahetvā kasmā mahājanassa upari dukkhaṃ khipasi,
atk-s0502a0:1279_20: dhuravihāre sadevakassa lokassa aggapuggalo atītādīsu appaṭihatañāṇo satthā vasati,
atk-s0502a0:1279_21: taṃ pucchitvā tassovādaṃ karohī”ti vutte rājā sallahukehi yānehi mallikāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0502a0:1279_22: kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1280_0: Atha naṃ satthā “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1280_7: tassa paṭighātatthāya sabbasate pāṇe gahetvā tesaṃ galalohitena yaññe yajite jīvitaṃ labhissasī’ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1280_19: pāpakammino satthā attano dukkhaṃ āvīkarontā evamāhaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1280_22: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ kammaṃ ācikkhituṃ “tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1281_0: Atīte vīsativassasahassāyukesu manussesu kassapo bhagavā loke uppajjitvā vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caramāno bārāṇasimagamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1281_1: Bārāṇasivāsino dvepi tayopi bahutarāpi ekato hutvā āgantukadānaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1281_2: Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ cattālīsakoṭivibhavā cattāro seṭṭhiputtā sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1281_8: pūjaṃ karissāmā”ti ekopi avatvā tesu eko tāva evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1281_17: ‘dhanaṃ dassāmā’ti vutte anicchamānā itthī nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1282_0: Te tato paṭṭhāya abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ dhanaṃ pesetvā vīsativassasahassāni pāradārikakammaṃ katvā kālaṃ katvā avīciniraye nibbattā.
atk-s0502a0:1282_1: Te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tattha kālaṃ katvā pakkāvasesena saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a0:1282_2: tiṃsāya vassasahassehi heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā punapi tiṃsāya vassasahassehi lohakumbhimukhaṃ patvā ekekaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1282_3: gāthaṃ vattukāmā hutvā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā puna parivattitvā,
atk-s0502a0:1282_5: paṭhamaṃ te kiṃ saddo nāma suto”ti? “Du- iti,
atk-s0502a0:1282_7: Satthā tena aparipuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ gāthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassento evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1285_0: Atha rañño imissā gāthāya atthaṃ pakāsetvā, “kiṃ te, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1285_1: dutiyasaddo tatiyasaddo catutthasaddo suto”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ nāmā”ti vutte avasesaṃ paripūrento –
atk-s0502a0:1288_0: “Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
atk-s0502a0:1289_0: Tadā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā.
atk-s0502a0:1290_0: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0502a0:1292_0: Paṭipāṭiyā imā gāthā vatvā tāsaṃ atthaṃ pakāsetvā “iti kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1292_1: te cattāro janā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmāpi vattuṃ asakkontā ekakameva akkharaṃ vatvā puna lohakumbhimeva paviṭṭhā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1293_0: Raññā kira pasenadikosalena tassa saddassa sutakālato paṭṭhāya te heṭṭhā bhassanti eva,
atk-s0502a0:1293_2: Rañño taṃ desanaṃ sutvā mahāsaṃvego uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:1293_4: ekaṃ kira buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cutā saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattitvā tattha saṭṭhivassasahassāni
atk-s0502a0:1293_5: paccitvā evampi nesaṃ dukkhā muccanakālo na paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1293_6: ahampi paradāre sinehaṃ katvā sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ na labhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1293_7: idāni ito paṭṭhāya paradāre mānasaṃ na bandhissāmī”ti cintetvā tathāgataṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1293_9: Sopi puriso tattheva nisinno taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “laddho me balavappaccayo”ti satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1293_10: raññā tāva ajja rattiyā dīghabhāvo ñāto,
atk-s0502a0:1293_11: ahaṃ pana hiyyo sayameva yojanassa dīghabhāvaṃ aññāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1293_12: Satthā dvinnampi kathaṃ saṃsanditvā “ekaccassa ratti dīghā hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1293_14: bālassa pana saṃsāro dīgho hotī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1297_3: Tassā dīghabhāvaṃ attānaṃ maṅkuṇasaṅghassa bhattaṃ katvā yāva sūriyuggamanā samparivattakaṃ semāno mahākusītopi,
atk-s0502a0:1297_4: subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sirisayane sayamāno kāmabhogīpi na jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:1297_5: sabbarattiṃ pana padhānaṃ padahanto yogāvacaro ca,
atk-s0502a0:1297_8: sīsarogādiphuṭṭho vā hatthapādacchedanādiṃ patto vā vedanābhibhūto ca,
atk-s0502a0:1297_13: Sakaladivasañhi maggaṃ gantvā kilanto paṭipathaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “purato gāmo kīvadūro”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a0:1297_14: “yojana”nti vutte thokaṃ gantvā aparampi pucchitvā tenāpi “yojana”nti vutte puna thokaṃ gantvā aparampi pucchati.
atk-s0502a0:1297_18: ekayojanaṃ dve tīṇi yojanāni viya maññeti.
atk-s0502a0:1297_19: Bālānanti idhalokaparalokatthaṃ pana ajānantānaṃ bālānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭassa pariyantaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1297_20: yaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedaṃ saddhammaṃ ñatvā saṃsārassa antaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1297_21: taṃ saddhammaṃ avijānataṃ saṃsāro dīgho nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1297_22: So hi attano dhammatāya eva dīgho nāma.
atk-s0502a0:1297_27: Bālānaṃ pana pariyantaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ atidīghoyevāti.
atk-s0502a0:1299_0: Rājā satthāraṃ vanditvā gacchantoyeva te satte bandhanā mocesi.
