atk-s0502a0:1299_1: Tattha itthipurisā bandhanā muttā sīsaṃ nhatvā sakāni gehāni gacchantā “ciraṃ jīvatu no, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:1299_3: taṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhimhā”ti mallikāya guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1299_6: attano paññaṃ nissāya ettakassa janassa jīvitadānaṃ adāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1299_7: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a0:1299_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a0:1299_11: idāneva attano paññaṃ nissāya mahājanassa jīvitadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:1299_12: pubbepi adāsiyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsanto atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a0:1300_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ rañño putto ekaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tattha nibbattāya devatāya āyāci –
atk-s0502a0:1300_5: So pitari kālakate rajjaṃ patvā “devatāya me ānubhāvena rajjaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1300_6: balimassā karissāmī”ti mahatiyā senāya nikkhamitvā ekaṃ rājānaṃ attano vase vattetvā tena saddhiṃ aparampi
atk-s0502a0:1300_7: aparampīti sabbe rājāno attano vase katvā saddhiṃ aggamahesīhi ādāya gacchanto uggasenassa nāma sabbakaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a0:1300_9: taṃ ohāya āgantvā “ettakajanaṃ visapānakaṃ pāyetvā māressāmī”ti rukkhamūlaṃ sodhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1300_11: “ayaṃ rājā ettake rājāno gaṇhanto ‘maṃ nissāya gahitā ime’ti cintetvā tesaṃ galalohitena mayhaṃ baliṃ kātukāmo,
atk-s0502a0:1300_17: Sā upadhārentī “nāhaṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ñatvā aññampi devataṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā “tvaṃ sakkhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1300_18: Tāyapi paṭikkhittā aññampi aññampīti evaṃ sakalacakkavāḷadevatāyo upasaṅkamitvā tāhipi paṭikkhittā catunnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1300_20: amhākaṃ pana rājā amhehi puññena ca paññāya ca visiṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:1300_21: taṃ pucchā”ti tehipi paṭikkhittakāle sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a0:1300_25: upāyaṃ pana te vakkhāmī”ti vatvā upāyaṃ ācikkhi – “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:1300_26: tvaṃ rañño passantasseva rattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā attano rukkhato nikkhamitvā gamanākāraṃ dassehi.
atk-s0502a0:1300_29: Atha naṃ vadeyyāsi ‘tvaṃ ekasatarājāno saddhiṃ aggamahesīhi ānetvā tesaṃ galalohitena baliṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a0:1300_30: mayhaṃ āyācitvā uggasenassa rañño deviṃ ohāya āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1300_33: sā rañño dhammaṃ desetvā ettakassa janassa jīvitadānaṃ dassatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1300_34: Iminā kāraṇena sakko devatāya imaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1301_1: Sā āgantvā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ pariyante nisinnampi attano rājānameva vandi.
atk-s0502a0:1301_2: Rājā “mayi sabbarājajeṭṭhake ṭhite sabbakaniṭṭhaṃ attano sāmikaṃ vandatī”ti tassā kujjhi.
atk-s0502a0:1301_5: ayaṃ pana me sāmiko issariyassa dāyako,
atk-s0502a0:1301_11: mayhaṃ rajjasiridāyikaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ devataṃ kasmā na vandasī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1301_13: tayā attano puññe ṭhatvā rājāno gahitā,
atk-s0502a0:1301_18: “tvaṃ ‘devatāya me ettakā rājāno gahetvā dinnā’ti vadesi,
atk-s0502a0:1301_19: idāni te devatāya upari vāmapasse rukkho agginā daḍḍho,
atk-s0502a0:1301_20: sā taṃ aggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ kasmā nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:1302_0: Sā kathayamānā ṭhitā rodi ceva hasi ca.
atk-s0502a0:1302_4: Atha “naṃ kiṃ kāraṇā rodasi ceva hasasi cā”ti? “Suṇāhi, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:1302_5: ahañhi atīte kuladhītā hutvā patikule vasantī sāmikassa sahāyakaṃ pāhunakaṃ āgataṃ disvā tassa bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1302_6: pacitukāmā ‘maṃsaṃ āharā’ti dāsiyā kahāpaṇaṃ datvā tāya maṃsaṃ alabhitvā āgatāya ‘natthi maṃsa’nti vutte
atk-s0502a0:1302_7: gehassa pacchimabhāge sayitāya eḷikāya sīsaṃ chinditvā bhattaṃ sampādesiṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1302_8: Sāhaṃ ekissāya eḷikāya sīsaṃ chinditvā niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena tassā lomagaṇanāya sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1302_9: ‘tvaṃ ettakaṃ janaṃ vadhitvā kadā dukkhā muccissasī’ti evamahaṃ tava dukkhaṃ anussarantī rodi”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1304_0: Bahūnaṃ kaṇṭhe chetvāna, kathaṃ kāhasi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1305_6: ayaṃ kira ekaṃ eḷikaṃ vadhitvā niraye pakkāvasesena tassā lomagaṇanāya sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:1305_7: ahaṃ ettakaṃ janaṃ vadhitvā kadā sotthiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti sabbe rājāno mocetvā attano mahallakatare vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:1305_8: daharadaharānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha sabbe khamāpetvā sakasakaṭṭhānameva pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1306_4: attano paññaṃ nissāya mahājanassa jīvitadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:1306_10: Evaṃ atītaṃ samodhānetvā puna dhammaṃ desento,
atk-s0502a0:1306_13: Pāṇātipātino hi dīgharattaṃ socantī”ti vatvā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1312_0: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1315_0: Carañce nādhigaccheyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto mahākassapattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1316_0: Theraṃ kira rājagahaṃ nissāya pippaliguhāyaṃ vasantaṃ dve saddhivihārikā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1316_2: eko tena kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya dassento mukhodakadantakaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiyāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1316_7: “ayaṃ niccakālaṃ mayā kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya katvā dasseti, hotu,
atk-s0502a0:1316_9: Tassa bhuñjitvā supantasseva nhānodakaṃ tāpetvā ekasmiṃ ghaṭe katvā piṭṭhikoṭṭhake ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a0:1316_10: udakatāpanabhājane pana nāḷimattaṃ udakaṃ sesetvā usumaṃ muñcantaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1316_11: Taṃ itaro sāyanhasamaye pabujjhitvā usumaṃ nikkhantaṃ disvā “udakaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ bhavissatī”ti vegena gantvā theraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1316_13: nhāyathā”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1316_16: Daharo aggisālaṃ gantvā bhājane uḷuṅkaṃ otāretvā tucchabhāvaṃ ñatvā “passatha duṭṭhassa kammaṃ tucchabhājanaṃ uddhane āropetvā kuhiṃ gato,
atk-s0502a0:1316_17: ahaṃ ‘koṭṭhake udaka’nti saññāya ārocesi”nti ujjhāyanto ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1316_18: Itaropi piṭṭhikoṭṭhakato udakaṃ āharitvā koṭṭhake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1317_1: “ayaṃ daharo ‘udakaṃ me tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ, etha, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1317_2: nhāyathā’ti vatvā idāni ujjhāyanto ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1317_3: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti upadhārento “ettakaṃ kālaṃ esa daharo iminā kataṃ vattaṃ attanāva kataṃ viya pakāsetī”ti
atk-s0502a0:1317_5: bhikkhunā nāma ‘attanā katameva kata’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1317_8: bhante’ti vatvā mayi pavisitvā ṭhite ghaṭaṃ ādāya ujjhāyanto gacchasi,
atk-s0502a0:1317_9: pabbajitassa nāma evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1317_11: udakamattakaṃ nāma nissāya maṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti kujjhitvā punadivase therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya na pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1317_12: Thero itarena saddhiṃ ekaṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1317_13: So tasmiṃ gate therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā “thero kahaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1317_18: “Evarūpaṃ kira nāma āhāraṃ dethā”ti vutte tena vuttaniyāmeneva sampādetvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1317_19: So antarāmaggeva taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a0:1317_20: Theropi gataṭṭhāne mahantaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ labhitvā attanā saddhiṃ gatadaharassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1317_21: So taṃ rajitvā attano nivāsanapārupanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1318_1: ‘tumhākaṃ kira aphāsukaṃ jāta’nti amhehi daharena vuttaniyāmeneva paṭiyādetvā āhāro pesito,
atk-s0502a0:1318_2: paribhuñjitvā vo phāsukaṃ jāta”nti vutte tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1318_3: Vihāraṃ pana gantvā taṃ daharaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ evamāha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:1318_8: So kujjhitvā there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “purimadivase udakamattaṃ nissāya maṃ musāvādiṃ katvā ajja attano
atk-s0502a0:1318_9: upaṭṭhākakule bhattamuṭṭhiyā bhuttakāraṇā maṃ ‘viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a0:1318_12: jānissāmissa kattabbayuttaka”nti punadivase there gāmaṃ pavisante sayaṃ vihāre ohīyitvā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a0:1318_13: paribhogabhājanāni bhinditvā therassa paṇṇasālāya aggiṃ datvā yaṃ na jhāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1318_14: taṃ muggarena paharanto bhinditvā nikkhamitvā palāto.
atk-s0502a0:1319_1: “therassa kira saddhivihāriko ovādamattaṃ asahanto kujjhitvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1319_2: Atheko bhikkhu aparabhāge rājagahā nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:1319_7: eko pana saddhivihāriko ovādamattena kujjhitvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1319_8: Satthā “na so idāneva ovādaṃ sutvā kujjhati,
atk-s0502a0:1320_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente himavantapadese eko siṅgilasakuṇo kulāvakaṃ katvā vasi.
atk-s0502a0:1320_1: Athekadivasaṃ deve vassante eko makkaṭo sītena kampamāno taṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1322_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, agāraṃ te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1323_1: yāya pana paññāya vicāretvā agāraṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1323_2: sā me paññā natthī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ viññāpetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1325_0: Yāhu seṭṭhā manussesu, sā me paññā na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1326_0: Atha naṃ “evarūpassa tava kathaṃ gharāvāso ijjhissatī”ti garahanto siṅgilo imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1331_0: Makkaṭo “ayaṃ maṃ anavaṭṭhitacittaṃ lahucittaṃ mittadubbhiṃ addhuvasīlaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1331_1: idānissa mittadubbhibhāvaṃ dassessāmī”ti kulāvakaṃ viddhaṃsetvā vippakiri.
atk-s0502a0:1331_2: Sakuṇo tasmiṃ kulāvakaṃ gaṇhante eva ekena passena nikkhamitvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1332_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0502a0:1332_6: pubbepi so ovādakkhaṇe kujjhitvā kuṭiṃ dūsesi,
atk-s0502a0:1332_7: mama puttassa kassapassa evarūpena bālena saddhiṃ vasanato ekakasseva nivāso seyyo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1335_0: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1336_0: Tattha caranti iriyāpathacāraṃ aggahetvā manasācāro veditabbo,
atk-s0502a0:1336_2: Seyyaṃ sadisamattanoti attano sīlasamādhipaññāguṇehi adhikataraṃ vā sadisaṃ vā na labheyya ce.
atk-s0502a0:1336_3: Ekacariyanti etesu hi seyyaṃ labhamāno sīlādīhi vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a0:1336_5: hīnena pana saddhiṃ ekato vasanto ekato saṃbhogaparibhogaṃ karonto sīlādīhi parihāyati.
atk-s0502a0:1336_7: “evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1336_8: Tasmā sace kāruññaṃ paṭicca “ayaṃ maṃ nissāya sīlādīhi vaḍḍhissatī”ti tamhā puggalā kiñci apaccāsīsanto taṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:1336_11: ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā ekībhāvameva thiraṃ katvā sabbairiyāpathesu ekakova vihareyya.
atk-s0502a0:1336_13: Natthi bāle sahāyatāti sahāyatā nāma cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā
atk-s0502a0:1336_14: vipassanāguṇā cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā.
atk-s0502a0:1340_0: Puttā matthīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ānandaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1341_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ānandaseṭṭhi nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhavo mahāmaccharī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1341_1: So anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ ñātake sannipātetvā puttaṃ mūlasiriṃ nāma tīsu velāsu evaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0502a0:1341_5: Ekekampi hi kahāpaṇaṃ vayaṃ karontassa pana khīyateva. Tasmā –
atk-s0502a0:1344_0: So aparena samayena attano pañca mahānidhiyo puttassa anācikkhitvā dhananissito maccheramalamalino kālaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1344_1: katvā tasseva nagarassa ekasmiṃ dvāragāmake caṇḍālānaṃ kulasahassaṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0502a0:1344_3: Rājā tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā puttamassa mūlasiriṃ pakkosāpetvā seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1344_4: Tampi caṇḍālakulasahassaṃ ekatova bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā jīvamānaṃ tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya neva bhatiṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a0:1344_6: Te “mayaṃ etarahi kammaṃ karontāpi piṇḍabhattampi na labhāma,
atk-s0502a0:1344_7: amhākaṃ antare kāḷakaṇṇiyā bhavitabba”nti dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā yāva tassa mātāpitaro visuṃ honti,
atk-s0502a0:1344_8: tāva vibhajitvā “imasmiṃ kule kāḷakaṇṇī uppannā”ti tassa mātaraṃ nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1345_1: tāva yāpanamattampi kicchena labhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_2: Tassa hatthā ca pādā ca akkhīni ca kaṇṇā ca nāsā ca mukhañca yathāṭhāne na ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1345_3: So evarūpena aṅgavekallena samannāgato paṃsupisācako viya ativirūpo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_4: Evaṃ santepi taṃ mātā na pariccaji.
atk-s0502a0:1345_6: Sā taṃ kicchena posayamānā taṃ ādāya gatadivase kiñci alabhitvā gehe katvā sayameva gatadivase bhatiṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a0:1345_7: Atha naṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jīvituṃ samatthakāle sā kapālakaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:1345_11: tattha bhikkhāya caritvā jīvāhī”ti taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_12: So gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto ānandaseṭṭhikāle nivuttaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jātissaro hutvā attano gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_13: Tīsu pana dvārakoṭṭhakesu na koci sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_14: Catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake mūlasiriseṭṭhino puttakā disvā ubbiggahadayā parodiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1345_15: Atha naṃ seṭṭhipurisā “nikkhama kāḷakaṇṇī”ti pothetvā nīharitvā saṅkāraṭṭhāne khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1345_16: Satthā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto theraṃ oloketvā tena puṭṭho taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1345_19: Satthā mūlasiriṃ āmantetvā “jānāsi eta”nti pucchitvā “na jānāmī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:1345_20: “pitā te ānandaseṭṭhī”ti vatvā asaddahantaṃ “ānandaseṭṭhi puttassa te pañca mahānidhiyo ācikkhāhī”ti ācikkhāpetvā saddahāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1348_0: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1349_3: iti bālo puttataṇhāya ceva dhanataṇhāya ca haññati vihaññati dukkhayati,
atk-s0502a0:1349_9: “Putte posessāmī”ti rattiñca divā ca thalajalapathādīsu nānappakārato vāyamantopi vihaññati,
atk-s0502a0:1349_11: Evaṃ vihaññassa ca attā hi attano natthi tena vighātena dukkhitaṃ attānaṃ sukhitaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa pavattiyampissa attā hi attano natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1349_12: maraṇamañce nipannassa māraṇantikāhi vedanāhi aggijālāhi viya pariḍayhamānassa chijjamānesu sandhibandhanesu,
atk-s0502a0:1349_13: bhijjamānesu aṭṭhisaṅghāṭesu nimīletvā paralokaṃ ummīletvā idhalokaṃ passantassāpi divase divase dvikkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a0:1349_14: nhāpetvā tikkhattuṃ bhojetvā gandhamālādīhi alaṅkaritvā yāvajīvaṃ positopi sahāyabhāvena dukkhaparittāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1349_15: kātuṃ asamatthatāya attā hi attano natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1349_16: Kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ puttā vā dhanaṃ vā tasmiṃ samaye kimeva karissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1349_17: ānandaseṭṭhinopi kassaci kiñci adatvā puttassatthāya dhanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā pubbe vā maraṇamañce nipannassa,
atk-s0502a0:1349_18: idāni vā imaṃ dukkhaṃ pattassa kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1349_19: Puttā vā dhanaṃ vā tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ dukkhaṃ hariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1350_0: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:1353_0: Yo bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto gaṇṭhibhedakacore ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1354_0: Te kira dve sahāyakā dhammassavanatthāya gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā eko dhammakathaṃ assosi,
atk-s0502a0:1354_2: Tesu eko dhammaṃ suṇamāno sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:1354_3: itaro ekassa dussante baddhaṃ pañcamāsakamattaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:1354_6: Atha naṃ sahāyakacoro attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ uppaṇḍayamāno “tvaṃ atipaṇḍitatāya attano gehe pākabhattamūlampi na nipphādesī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1354_7: Itaro pana “bālabhāveneva vatāyaṃ attano paṇḍitabhāvaṃ maññatī”ti taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetuṃ ñātīhi saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1354_8: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1356_0: “Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tena so;
atk-s0502a0:1357_0: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve ‘bālo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1358_0: Tattha yo bāloti yo andhabālo apaṇḍito samāno “bālo aha”nti attano bālyaṃ bālabhāvaṃ maññati jānāti.
atk-s0502a0:1358_1: Tena soti tena kāraṇena so puggalo paṇḍito vāpi hoti paṇḍitasadiso vā.
atk-s0502a0:1358_2: So hi “bālo aha”nti jānamāno aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto tena paṇḍitabhāvatthāya ovadiyamāno
atk-s0502a0:1358_3: anusāsiyamāno taṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhitvā paṇḍito vā hoti paṇḍitataro vā.
atk-s0502a0:1358_4: Sa ve bāloti yo ca bālo samāno “ko añño mayā sadiso bahussuto vā dhammakathiko vā vinayadharo vā dhutaṅgadharo vā atthī”ti evaṃ paṇḍitamānī hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1358_5: So aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ anupasaṅkamanto apayirupāsanto neva pariyattiṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a0:1359_0: Desanāpariyosāne itarassa ñātakehi saddhiṃ mahājano sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a0:1362_0: Yāvajīvampi ce bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1363_0: So kira mahātheresu paṭikkantesu dhammasabhaṃ gantvā dhammāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1363_1: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “ayaṃ bahussuto mahāthero bhavissatī”ti maññamānā khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1363_3: buddhehi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasamāno khandhadhātuāyatanamattampi na jānātī”ti garahitvā taṃ pavattiṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1363_4: Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1366_0: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1367_1: bālo nāmesa yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto “idaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1367_2: ettakaṃ buddhavacana”nti evaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vā “ayaṃ cāro,
atk-s0502a0:1367_11: idaṃ sacchikātabba”nti evaṃ paṭipattipaṭivedhadhammaṃ vā na jānāti.
atk-s0502a0:1367_14: Yathā hi dabbī yāva parikkhayā nānappakārāya sūpavikatiyā samparivattamānāpi “idaṃ loṇikaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1367_22: evameva bālo yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsamāno vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ na jānātīti.
atk-s0502a0:1368_0: Desanāvasāne āgantukā bhikkhū āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:1371_0: Muhuttamapi ce viññūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1372_0: Tesañhi bhagavā itthiṃ pariyesantānaṃ kappāsikavanasaṇḍe paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:1372_1: Tadā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ patvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā hutvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya vattamānā
atk-s0502a0:1372_2: punapi dīghassa addhuno accayena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā anamataggadhammadesanaṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva āsane
atk-s0502a0:1372_4: Bhikkhū “aho vatimehi bhikkhūhi khippameva dhammo viññāto”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1372_7: pubbepi ime tiṃsamattā sahāyakā dhuttā hutvā tuṇḍilajātake mahātuṇḍilassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvāpi khippameva dhammaṃ viññāya pañca sīlāni samādiyiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1372_8: te teneva upanissayena etarahi nisinnāsaneyeva arahattaṃ pattā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1375_0: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1376_1: viññū paṇḍitapuriso muhuttamapi ce aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati,
atk-s0502a0:1376_2: so tassa santike uggaṇhanto paripucchanto khippameva pariyattidhammaṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0502a0:1376_3: Tato kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā paṭipattiyaṃ ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā nāma anupahatajivhāpasādo puriso rasavijānanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1376_4: jivhagge ṭhapetvā eva loṇikādibhedaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti,
atk-s0502a0:1380_0: Caranti bālā dummedhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto suppabuddhakuṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1381_0: Tadā hi suppabuddhakuṭṭhi parisapariyante nisinno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a0:1381_1: attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocetukāmo parisamajjhe ogāhituṃ avisahanto mahājanassa satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:1381_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddhakuṭṭhi attano satthu sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo”ti
atk-s0502a0:1381_4: ñatvā “vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti gantvā ākāse ṭhitova etadavoca –
atk-s0502a0:1381_18: ahirika tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na yuttarūpo,
atk-s0502a0:1383_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1384_0: “Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
atk-s0502a0:1386_2: na te buddhehi vā paccekabuddhehi vā “daliddā”ti vuccantīti.
atk-s0502a0:1386_3: Sakko tassa kathaṃ sutvā taṃ antarāmagge ohāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ vacanapaṭivacanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1386_4: Atha naṃ bhagavā āha – “na kho, sakka,
atk-s0502a0:1386_5: sakkā tādisānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi suppabuddhakuṭṭhiṃ ‘buddho na buddho’ti vā,
atk-s0502a0:1386_8: Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhi satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro sammodamāno attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1386_9: Atha naṃ acirapakkantaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0502a0:1387_3: suppabuddhakuṭṭhinti imesaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ anekasate attabhāve gāvī hutvā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0502a0:1387_4: Te kira atīte cattāro seṭṭhiputtā hutvā ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ gaṇikaṃ uyyānaṃ netvā divasaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā sāyanhasamaye evaṃ sammantayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:1387_6: imissā amhehi dinnaṃ kahāpaṇasahassañca sabbañca pasādhanabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā imaṃ māretvā gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1387_8: mayā saddhiṃ abhiramitvā idāni maṃ māretukāmā,
atk-s0502a0:1387_9: jānissāmi nesaṃ kattabbayuttaka”nti tehi māriyamānā “ahaṃ yakkhinī hutvā yathā maṃ ete mārenti,
atk-s0502a0:1387_10: evameva te māretuṃ samatthā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1387_12: Sambahulā bhikkhū tassa kālakiriyaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā “tassa kā gati,
atk-s0502a0:1387_13: kena ca kāraṇena kuṭṭhibhāvaṃ patto”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1387_14: Satthā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tassa tāvatiṃsabhavane uppannabhāvañca tagarasikhipaccekabuddhaṃ disvā niṭṭhubhitvā
atk-s0502a0:1387_15: apasabyaṃ katvā dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena idāni kuṭṭhibhāvappattiñca byākaritvā,
atk-s0502a0:1387_17: ime sattā attanāva attano kaṭukavipākakammaṃ karontā vicarantī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā uttari dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1390_0: Karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1391_0: Tattha carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:1391_1: Bālāti idhalokatthañca paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:1391_3: Amitteneva attanāti attanā amittabhūtena viya verinā hutvā.
atk-s0502a0:1395_0: Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kassakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1396_0: So kira sāvatthito avidūre ekaṃ khettaṃ kasati.
atk-s0502a0:1396_1: Corā udakaniddhamanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā ekasmiṃ aḍḍhakule umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā udakaniddhamaneneva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1396_2: Eko coro te vañcetvā ekaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikāya katvā taṃ khettaṃ gantvā tehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetvā
atk-s0502a0:1396_3: ādāya gacchanto ovaṭṭikato patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a0:1396_4: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento taṃ kassakaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa antopaviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a0:1396_5: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārayamāno idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0502a0:1396_7: bhaṇḍasāmikā corānaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā ovaṭṭikato patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ disvā etaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0502a0:1396_8: maṃ ṭhapetvā tassa añño sakkhī nāma na bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1396_13: Kassako satthāraṃ disvā gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna kasituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:1396_14: Satthā tena saddhiṃ kiñci avatvāva sahassatthavikāya patitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ disvā ānandattheraṃ āha – “passa, ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:1397_0: Kassako taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mama velāya vā avelāya vā vicaraṇaṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1397_1: āsīviso kirettha atthī”ti cintetvā satthari ettakaṃ vatvā pakkante “māressāmi na”nti patodalaṭṭhiṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a0:1397_2: gato sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “imaṃ sandhāya satthārā kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃ ādāya nivatto,
atk-s0502a0:1397_3: abyattatāya ekamante ṭhapetvā paṃsunā paṭicchādetvā puna kasituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:1397_4: Manussā ca vibhātāya rattiyā gehe corehi katakammaṃ disvā padānupadaṃ gacchantā taṃ khettaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0502a0:1397_5: corehi bhaṇḍassa bhājitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā kassakassa padavalañjaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1397_6: Te tassa padānusārena gantvā thavikāya ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā thavikaṃ ādāya “tvaṃ gehaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1397_7: vilumpitvā khettaṃ kasamāno viya vicarasī”ti tajjetvā pothetvā netvā rañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1397_8: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa vadhaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1397_9: Rājapurisā taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1397_10: So kasāhi tāḷiyamāno aññaṃ kiñci avatvā “passānanda,
atk-s0502a0:1397_13: Atha naṃ rājapurisā “tvaṃ satthu ceva ānandattherassa ca kathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:1397_15: “rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhamāno kathessāmī”ti vutte rañño santikaṃ netvā rañño taṃ pavattiṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1397_16: Atha naṃ rājā “kasmā evaṃ kathesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1397_18: coro”ti vatvā kasanatthāya nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1397_19: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ bhaṇe loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ sakkhiṃ apadisati,
atk-s0502a0:1397_21: ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ ādāya sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:1397_22: “bhagavā kacci tumhe ānandattherena saddhiṃ etassa kassakassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a0:1397_32: tumhehi pana kathitakathaṃ kathetvā tena jīvitaṃ laddha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1397_35: paṇḍitena nāma yaṃ kammaṃ katvā pacchānutappaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1397_36: taṃ na kattabba”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1399_0: “Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;
atk-s0502a0:1401_0: Tattha na taṃ kammanti yaṃ nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā anussaranto anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati anusocati,
atk-s0502a0:1401_1: taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ niratthakaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1401_2: Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ anubhotīti.
atk-s0502a0:1405_0: Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sumanaṃ nāma mālākāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1406_0: So kira devasikaṃ bimbisārarājānaṃ pātova aṭṭhahi sumanapupphanāḷīhi upaṭṭhahanto aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhati.
atk-s0502a0:1406_1: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ pupphāni gahetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhamatte bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
atk-s0502a0:1406_2: vissajjetvā mahatā buddhānubhāvena mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1406_3: Bhagavā hi ekadā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo cīvarena paṭicchādetvā aññataro piṇḍapātiko viya carati tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1406_6: Tasmimpi divase sarīrato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjento mahantena buddhānubhāvena mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1406_8: oloketvā pasannacitto “kiṃ nu kho satthu adhikāraṃ karomī”ti cintetvā aññaṃ apassanto “imehi pupphehi
atk-s0502a0:1406_11: rājā imāni alabhanto maṃ bandhāpeyya vā ghātāpeyya vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājeyya,
atk-s0502a0:1406_13: Athassa etadahosi “rājā maṃ ghātetu vā bandhāpetu vā raṭṭhato pabbājetu vā,
atk-s0502a0:1406_14: so hi mayhaṃ dadamānopi imasmiṃ attabhāve jīvitamattaṃ dhanaṃ dadeyya,
atk-s0502a0:1406_15: satthupūjā pana me anekāsu kappakoṭīsu alaṃ hitāya ceva sukhāya cā”ti attano jīvitaṃ tathāgatassa pariccaji.
atk-s0502a0:1407_0: So “yāva me pasannaṃ cittaṃ na patikuṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1407_1: taṃ tāvadeva pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho udaggudaggo satthāraṃ pūjesi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0502a0:1407_2: Paṭhamaṃ tāva dveva pupphamuṭṭhiyo tathāgatassa upari khipi,
atk-s0502a0:1407_10: Evaṃ aṭṭha nāḷiyo aṭṭha muṭṭhiyo hutvā catūsu ṭhānesu tathāgataṃ parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1407_15: Pupphāni acittakānipi sacittakaṃ nissāya sacittakāni viya abhijjitvā apatitvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:1407_17: Satthu sarīrato satasahassavijjulatā viya raṃsiyo nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1407_18: Purato ca pacchato ca dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca sīsamatthakato ca nirantaraṃ nikkhantaraṃsīsu ekāpi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0502a0:1407_19: apalāyitvā sabbāpi satthāraṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā hutvā purato eva dhāvanti.
atk-s0502a0:1407_22: bahinagare nava koṭiyoti aṭṭhārasasu koṭīsu ekopi puriso vā itthī vā bhikkhaṃ gahetvā anikkhanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1407_23: Mahājano sīhanādaṃ nadanto celukkhepasahassāni karonto satthu puratova gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1407_24: Satthāpi mālākārassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ tigāvutappamāṇe nagare bhericaraṇamaggeneva acari.
atk-s0502a0:1408_0: So thokaññeva tathāgatena saddhiṃ caritvā manosilārase nimuggo viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto paviṭṭho satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a0:1408_1: thometvā vanditvā tucchapacchimeva gahetvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1408_5: “Rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā nīharatu,
atk-s0502a0:1408_9: Mahājano ukkuṭṭhisahassāni karonto satthārā saddhiṃ carati,
atk-s0502a0:1408_12: Athassa bhariyā andhabālatāya evarūpe pāṭihāriye pasādaṃ nāma ajanetvā taṃ akkositvā paribhāsitvā “rājāno nāma caṇḍā,
atk-s0502a0:1408_13: sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1408_14: tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā”ti putte ādāya rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā pakkositvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1408_15: “mama sāmiko tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi satthāraṃ pūjetvā tucchahattho gharaṃ āgantvā ‘kahaṃ pupphānī’ti mayā puṭṭho idaṃ nāma vadesi,
atk-s0502a0:1408_17: sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1408_18: tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā’ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā idhāgatā,
atk-s0502a0:1408_19: tena kataṃ kammaṃ sukataṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0502a0:1408_23: Rājā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphalaṃ patto saddho pasanno ariyasāvako cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1408_28: mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi tena pūjā katā”ti? “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1408_30: mama pupphehi pūjākārassa ahaṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā vegena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicari.
atk-s0502a0:1409_0: Satthā rañño cittappasādaṃ ñatvā bhericaraṇavīthiyā nagaraṃ caritvā rañño gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1409_1: Rājā pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ gehaṃ pavesetukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1409_3: Rājā taṃ ñatvā “sīghaṃ maṇḍapaṃ karothā”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva maṇḍapaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1409_5: Kasmā pana satthā rājagehaṃ na pāvisi?
atk-s0502a0:1410_4: rājaṅgaṇe pana maṃ nisinnaṃ mahājano daṭṭhuṃ labhissati,
atk-s0502a0:1410_6: Guṇavantānañhi guṇaṃ buddhā eva pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:1410_11: Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva catūhi pupphapaṭehi parikkhitto sīhanādaṃ nadanto mahājanena parivuto vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1410_12: Rājā satthāraṃ anugantvā nivatto mālākāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “mama āharitapupphehi kinti katvā satthāraṃ pūjesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1410_13: Mālākāro “rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājetūti jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjesiṃ devā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1410_14: Rājā “tvaṃ mahāpuriso nāmā”ti vatvā aṭṭha hatthī ca asse ca dāse ca dāsiyo ca mahāpasādhanāni ca aṭṭha
atk-s0502a0:1410_15: kahāpaṇasahassāni ca rājakulato nīharitvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitā aṭṭha nāriyo ca aṭṭha gāmavare cāti
atk-s0502a0:1411_1: “ajja pātova paṭṭhāya sīhanādasahassāni ceva celukkhepasahassāni ca pavattanti,
atk-s0502a0:1411_5: iminā mālākārena appamattakaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti mā sallakkhesi,
atk-s0502a0:1411_6: ayañhi mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1415_1: Satthu pana vihāraṃ gantvā gandhakuṭipavisanakāle tāni pupphāni dvārakoṭṭhake patiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1415_4: dharamānakabuddhassa jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pupphapūjaṃ katvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma labhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1415_5: Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā tiṇṇaṃ gamanānaṃ aññatarena gamanena dhammasabhaṃ gantvā buddhāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a0:1415_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0502a0:1415_9: yassa kammassa katattā pacchānutappaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1415_11: evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kattabbamevā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1417_0: “Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā nānutappati;
atk-s0502a0:1419_0: Tattha yaṃ katvāti yaṃ devamanussasampattīnañceva nibbānasampattiyā ca nibbattanasamatthaṃ sukhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā nānutappati,
atk-s0502a0:1419_1: atha kho diṭṭhadhammeyeva anussaritānussaritakkhaṇeyeva pītivegena patīto somanassavegena ca sumano hutvā
atk-s0502a0:1423_0: Madhuvā maññatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇattheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1424_0: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kappasatasahassaṃ puññāni kurumānā devesu
atk-s0502a0:1424_1: ca manussesu ca saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokato cavitvā sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1424_3: Athassā vayappattakāle sakalajambudīpe rājāno ca seṭṭhino ca seṭṭhissa santikaṃ sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:1424_10: Tassā pacchimabhavikattā taṃ vacanaṃ sīse āsittaṃ satapākatelaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1424_13: So tassā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhunīupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:1424_14: Tassā acirapabbajitāya eva uposathāgāre kālavāro pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1424_15: Sā dīpaṃ jāletvā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitvā dīpasikhāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā ṭhitāva punappunaṃ olokayamānā
atk-s0502a0:1424_16: tejokasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāhi ceva
atk-s0502a0:1425_0: Sā aparena samayena janapadacārikaṃ caritvā paccāgantvā andhavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1425_2: Athassā tattha kuṭikaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1425_4: Mātulaputto panassā nandamāṇavo nāma gihikālato paṭṭhāya paṭibaddhacitto.
atk-s0502a0:1425_5: So tassā āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā theriyā āgamanato puretarameva andhavanaṃ gantvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā heṭṭhāmañcake
atk-s0502a0:1425_6: nilīno theriyā āgantvā kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya mañcake nisinnamattāya bahi ātapato āgatattā
atk-s0502a0:1425_7: cakkhupathe andhakāre avigateyeva heṭṭhāmañcakato nikkhamitvā mañcakaṃ abhiruyha “mā nassi bāla,
atk-s0502a0:1425_8: mā nassi bālā”ti theriyā vāriyamānoyeva abhibhavitvā attanā patthitakammaṃ katvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1425_9: Athassa aguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya mahāpathavī dvedhā bhijji.
atk-s0502a0:1425_10: So pathaviṃ paviṭṭho gantvā mahāavīcimhi eva nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1425_16: bhikkhubhikkhūnī upāsakaupāsikāsu yo koci bālo pāpakammaṃ karonto madhusakkharādīsu kiñci deva madhurarasaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1425_17: khādamāno puriso viya tuṭṭhahaṭṭho udaggudaggo viya karotī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1427_0: “Madhuvā maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a0:1428_0: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1429_0: Tattha madhuvāti bālassa hi pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karontassa taṃ kammaṃ madhu viya madhurarasaṃ viya iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0502a0:1429_3: Pāpaṃ na paccatīti diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a0:1429_5: Yadā cāti yadā panassa diṭṭhadhamme vā vividhā kammakāraṇā kayiramānassa,
atk-s0502a0:1429_6: samparāye vā nirayādīsu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantassa taṃ pāpaṃ paccati,
atk-s0502a0:1429_7: atha so bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchati vindati paṭilabhatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1431_0: Aparena pana samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ mahājano kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti,
atk-s0502a0:1431_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a0:1431_17: yathā ca āragge sāsapo na vilimpati,
atk-s0502a0:1431_20: evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na vilimpati,
atk-s0502a0:1431_21: na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ brāhmaṇavagge gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1433_0: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1434_4: evaṃ kuladhītaropi mahantaṃ ñātigaṇañca bhogakkhandhañca pahāya pabbajitvā araññe viharanti.
atk-s0502a0:1434_5: Tā evaṃ viharamānā rāgarattā pāpapuggalā omānātimānavasena viheṭhentipi,
atk-s0502a0:1434_7: tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghassa antonagare vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1434_8: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nagarassa ekapasse bhikkhunisaṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1437_0: Māse māseti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jambukaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1438_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle gāmavāsī eko kuṭumbiko ekassa therassa vihāraṃ katvā taṃ tattha viharantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:1438_2: Atheko khīṇāsavo bhikkhu divā piṇḍāya caranto tassa gehadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1438_3: Kuṭumbiko taṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe pasanno gehaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ paṇītena bhojanena parivisitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1438_4: imaṃ sāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāseyyāthā”ti mahantaṃ sāṭakaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1438_7: sayanatthāya ca vo mañcakaṃ gāhāpetvā āgamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1438_8: Nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjanto kulūpako bhikkhu taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:1438_9: “ayaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ diṭṭhakassa evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1438_10: nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjantassa pana mayhaṃ na karotī”ti cintetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1438_11: Itaropi teneva saddhiṃ gantvā kuṭumbikena dinnasāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:1438_12: Kuṭambikopi nhāpitaṃ ādāya gantvā therassa kese ohārāpetvā mañcakaṃ attharāpetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1438_13: imasmiṃyeva mañcake sayathā”ti vatvā dvepi there svātanāya nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1439_0: Nevāsiko tassa taṃ sakkāraṃ kayiramānaṃ adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1439_1: Athassa so sāyaṃ therassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā catūhākārehi theraṃ akkosi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:1439_2: āgantuka kuṭumbikassa te gehe bhattaṃ bhuñjanato varataraṃ mīḷhaṃ khādituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1439_3: kuṭumbikena ānītanhāpitena kesohārāpanato varataraṃ tālaṭṭhikena kese luñcāpetuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1439_5: kuṭumbikena ābhatamañcake nipajjanato varataraṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitu”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1439_6: Theropi “mā esa bālo maṃ nissāya nassī”ti nimantanaṃ anādiyitvā pātova uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1439_7: Nevāsikopi pātova vihāre kattabbavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāya “idānipi āgantuko niddāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1439_8: ghaṇḍikasaddena pabujjheyyā”ti saññāya nakhapiṭṭheneva ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1439_9: Kuṭumbikopi sakkāraṃ katvā therānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ olokento nevāsikaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1439_14: tava nikkhantavelāya ovarakaṃ pavisitvā niddaṃ okkanto pātova uṭṭhāya mama vihārasammajjanasaddampi pānīyaghaṭaparibhojanīyaghaṭesu
atk-s0502a0:1439_15: udakasiñcanasaddampi ghaṇḍikasaddampi karontassa na jānātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1439_17: “tādisāya iriyāpathasampattiyā samannāgatassa me ayyassa yāva imamhā kālā niddāyanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1439_18: maṃ pana tassa sakkāraṃ karontaṃ disvā addhā iminā bhadantena kiñci vuttaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1439_19: So attano paṇḍitabhāvena taṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā tassa pattaṃ sādhukaṃ dhovitvā nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1440_2: imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne paluddho bhavissatī”ti antarāmagge taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ tattha olokento na addasa.
atk-s0502a0:1440_3: Atha naṃ ettakassa kammassa katattā vīsativassasahassāni katopi samaṇadhammo rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1440_4: Āyupariyosāne pana kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a0:1440_5: buddhuppāde rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ bahvannapāne kulaghare nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1440_6: So padasā gamanakālato paṭṭhāya neva sayane sayituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1440_15: kevalaṃ alajjanako ājīvakānaṃ esa anucchaviko”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ netvā “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājethā”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1440_17: Pabbājentā ca pana galappamāṇe āvāṭe ṭhapetvā dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ upariṃ padarāni datvā tesaṃ upari nisīditvā tālaṭṭhikhaṇḍena kese luñciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1440_18: Atha ne tassa mātāpitaro svātanāya nimantetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1441_4: Atha naṃ punappunaṃ vatvā anicchamānaṃ ohāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1441_5: Sopi tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā vaccakuṭiyā padaraṃ vivaritvā oruyha ubhohi hatthehi ālopaṃ ālopaṃ katvā gūthaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a0:1441_12: Evaṃ dutiye tatiye catutthepi divase tehi bahumpi vuccamāno “ahaṃ idheva bhavissāmī”ti gāmaṃ gantuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a0:1441_13: Ājīvakā “ayaṃ divase divase neva gāmaṃ pavisituṃ icchati,
atk-s0502a0:1441_17: pariggaṇhissāma na”nti gāmaṃ pavisantā ekaṃ dve jane tassa pariggaṇhanatthaṃ ohāya gamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1441_18: Te pacchato gacchantā viya hutvā nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1441_19: Sopi tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva vaccakuṭiṃ oruyha gūthaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a0:1442_0: Itare tassa kiriyaṃ disvā ājīvakānaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1442_3: ‘ājīvakā gūthaṃ khādamānā vicarantī’ti amhākaṃ akittiṃ pakāseyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1442_4: nāyaṃ amhākaṃ anucchaviko”ti taṃ attano santikā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1442_5: So tehi nīharito mahājanassa uccārakaraṇaṭṭhāne pattharito eko piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi.
atk-s0502a0:1442_8: So tattha gantvā rattiṃ gūthaṃ khāditvā mahājanassa sarīravalañjanatthāya āgamanakāle ekena hatthena
atk-s0502a0:1442_9: pāsāṇassa ekaṃ antaṃ olubbha ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā uddhaṃvātābhimukho mukhaṃ vivaritvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a0:1442_11: kasmā ayyo mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito”ti pucchati.
atk-s0502a0:1442_14: Atha “kasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ jaṇṇuke katvā ṭhitosi,
atk-s0502a0:1442_17: mayā dvīhi pādehi akkantā pathavī kampati,
atk-s0502a0:1442_18: tasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā ṭhitomhi.
atk-s0502a0:1442_25: na no evarūpā diṭṭhapubbā”ti yebhuyyena aṅgamagadhavāsino saṅkhubhitvā upasaṅkamitvā māse māse mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0502a0:1442_28: Aññañhi me khādantassa tapo nassatī”ti tehi abhihaṭaṃ na kiñci icchati.
atk-s0502a0:1442_30: tumhādisena ghoratapena paribhoge kate amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti punappunaṃ yācanti.
atk-s0502a0:1442_32: Mahājanassa pana yācanāya pīḷito tehi ābhatāni sappiphāṇitādīni kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a0:1442_33: alaṃ vo ettakaṃ hitāya sukhāya cā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1442_34: Evaṃ so pañcapaññāsa vassāni naggo gūthaṃ khādanto kese luñcanto bhūmiyaṃ sayamāno vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a0:1443_0: Buddhānampi kho paccūsakāle lokavolokanaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1443_1: Tasmā ekadivasaṃ bhagavato paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokentassa ayaṃ jambukājīvako ñāṇajālassa anto paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:1443_2: Satthā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjetvā tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattassūpanissayaṃ disvā “ahaṃ etaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1443_4: Imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mahājano sotthibhāvaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā punadivase rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:1443_7: ahamevā”ti evaṃ vatvā satthā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya tassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1444_2: so ca jegucche uccārapassāvadantakaṭṭhakiliṭṭhe piṭṭhipāsāṇe vasati,
atk-s0502a0:1444_3: devaṃ vassāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano ānubhāvena taṃ muhuttaṃyeva devaṃ vassāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1444_6: Satthā sāyaṃ jambukājīvakassa santikaṃ gantvā “jambukā”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1444_8: dujjano maṃ jambukavādena vadatī”ti cintetvā “ko eso”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1444_26: visuṃ visuṃ pana gahetvā vicaraṇaṃ dukkha’nti abbhantareneva gahetvā carāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1445_0: Satthā tassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre ekaṃ pabbhāraṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1445_1: taṃ niddisanto “etasmiṃ pabbhāre ko vasatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1445_8: Paṭhamayāme cattāro mahārājāno catuddisaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karontā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1445_9: Jambuko obhāsaṃ disvā “ko obhāso nāmeso”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:1445_14: dasahi dasa cakkavāḷāni obhāsetuṃ samattho mahābrahmā sakalaṃ araññaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karonto āgami.
atk-s0502a0:1445_15: Jambuko tampi disvā “ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pātova satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:1445_17: tumhākaṃ santikaṃ catasso disā obhāsento ke āgatā”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1445_21: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi uttaritaro”ti? “Āma, jambuka,
atk-s0502a0:1445_32: “Yaṃ loke brāhmaṇādayo khipitvā pakkhalitvā ‘namo mahābrahmuno’ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:1445_38: mayhaṃ pana pañca paññāsa vassāni idha vasantassa etesu ekopi maṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ nāgatapubbo.
atk-s0502a0:1445_39: Ahañhi ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vātabhakkho hutvā ṭhitakova vītināmesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1445_40: na tāva te mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatapubbā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1446_1: tvaṃ lokasmiṃ andhabālaṃ mahājanaṃ vañcayamāno mampi vañcetukāmo jāto,
atk-s0502a0:1446_2: nanu tvaṃ pañcapaññāsa vassāni gūthameva khādi,
atk-s0502a0:1446_6: Atha ca pana lokaṃ vañcento “ahaṃ vātabhakkho,
atk-s0502a0:1446_10: “mamampi vañcetukāmosi pubbepi tvaṃ pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya ettakaṃ kālaṃ gūthabhakkho bhūmisayo
atk-s0502a0:1446_20: So taṃ nivāsetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1446_21: Satthāpissa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:1446_22: So desanāvasāne saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pabbajjañca upasampadañca yāci.
atk-s0502a0:1446_24: Ayañhi khīṇāsavamahātheraṃ catūhi akkosehi akkositvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī tigāvutādhikaṃ yojanaṃ ussannā,
atk-s0502a0:1446_25: tāva avīcimhi paccitvā tattha pakkāvasesena pañcapaññāsa vassāni imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto.
atk-s0502a0:1446_27: Vīsati pana vassasahassāni iminā katassa samaṇadhammassa phalaṃ nāsetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0502a0:1446_29: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1446_30: Tāvadevassa gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo saṭṭhivassikamahāthero viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1447_0: Aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ tassa sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatadivaso kiresa,
atk-s0502a0:1447_1: tasmā ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatā tathāgataṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ ayyo jambuko mahā,
atk-s0502a0:1447_2: udāhu samaṇo gotamo”ti cintetvā “sace samaṇo gotamo mahā bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:1447_4: jambukājīvakassa pana mahantatāya samaṇo gotamo imassa santikaṃ āgato”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1447_8: ettakameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “satthā me,
atk-s0502a0:1447_10: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā oruyha vanditvā puna dvitālamattaṃ titālamattanti evaṃ sattatālamattaṃ vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1447_12: Taṃ disvā mahājano “aho buddhā nāma acchariyā anopamaguṇā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:1447_14: “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tumhehi ābhataṃ sakkāraṃ kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā ‘tapacaraṇaṃ pūremī’ti idha nivuṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:1447_15: sacepi iminā upāyena vassasataṃ tapacaraṇaṃ pūreyya,
atk-s0502a0:1447_16: yā cassa idāni kālaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā kukkuccāyitvā abhuñjantassa bhattacchedanakusalacetanā,
atk-s0502a0:1447_17: tassā taṃ tapacaraṇaṃ soḷasiṃ kalampi na agghatī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1450_0: Na so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ agghati soḷasi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1451_1: sace bālo apariññātadhammo sīlādiguṇā paribāhiro titthāyatane pabbajito “tapacaraṇaṃ pūressāmī”ti māse
atk-s0502a0:1451_2: māse patte kusaggena bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto vassasataṃ bhuñjeyya bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1451_4: kalaṃ agghati soḷasinti saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti ñātadhammā tulitadhammā.
atk-s0502a0:1451_7: Imesaṃ saṅkhātadhammānaṃ so bālo kalaṃ na agghati soḷasinti puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā.
atk-s0502a0:1451_9: yā cassa tathā tapacaraṇaṃ pūrentassa vassasataṃ cetanā yā ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ kālaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā kukkuccāyitvā
atk-s0502a0:1451_11: tassā cetanāya sā tāva dīgharattaṃ pavattacetanā soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghati.
atk-s0502a0:1451_14: taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato ekekaṃ puna soḷasa soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato ekassa koṭṭhāsassa yaṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1455_0: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ ahipetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1456_0: Ekasmiñhi divase jaṭilasahassassa abbhantaro āyasmā lakkhaṇatthero ca mahāmoggallānatthero ca “rājagahe piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti gijjhakūṭato otaranti.
atk-s0502a0:1456_1: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero ekaṃ ahipetaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1456_6: bhagavato santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti thero āha.
atk-s0502a0:1456_7: Tesu rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā nisinnesu lakkhaṇatthero pucchi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:1456_8: moggallānaṃ tvaṃ gijjhakūṭā otaranto sitaṃ pātukaritvā mayā sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ‘bhagavato santike maṃ puccheyyāsī’ti avaca,
atk-s0502a0:1456_16: tassa sīsato uṭṭhitā aggijālā yāva naṅguṭṭhā gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:1456_22: Imassa ceva ahipetassa kākapetassa ca pañcavīsatiyojaniko.
atk-s0502a0:1456_24: Kākapetampi mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭamatthake paccamānaṃ disvā tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1459_0: Kiṃ nu kammaṃ karitvāna, pattosi dukkhamīdisa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1463_1: kassapabuddhakāle sambahulā bhikkhū gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu,.
atk-s0502a0:1463_2: Manussā there disvā sampiyāyamānā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā pāde dhovitvā telaṃ makkhetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā
atk-s0502a0:1463_3: khajjakaṃ datvā piṇḍapātakālaṃ āgamayamānā dhammaṃ suṇantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1463_4: Dhammakathāvasāne therānaṃ patte ādāya attano attano gehā nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā āhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1463_5: Tadā ahaṃ kāko hutvā āsanasālāya chadanapiṭṭhe nilīno taṃ disvā ekena gahitapattato tikkhattuṃ mukhaṃ pūrento tayo kabaḷe aggahesiṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1463_6: Taṃ pana bhattaṃ neva saṅghassa santakaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1463_9: Attano attano gehaṃ netvā manussehi bhuñjitabbakaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1463_13: Svāhaṃ kālaṃ katvā tassa kammassa vipākena avīcimhi paccitvā tattha pakkāvasesena idāni gijjhakūṭe kākapeto
atk-s0502a0:1464_0: Idha pana thero “ahipetaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1464_6: tesaṃ ahitāya bhaveyyā’ti parānuddayāya na kathesi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1464_7: Lakkhaṇasaṃyuttepi hi mahāmoggallānena diṭṭhakāleyeva satthā tassa sakkhī hutvā vinītavatthūni kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:1464_9: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1465_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiṃ nissāya nadītīre paccekabuddhassa paṇṇasālaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1465_1: So tattha viharanto nibaddhaṃ nagare piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0502a0:1465_3: Eko bārāṇasivāsī puriso taṃ maggaṃ nissāya khettaṃ kasi.
atk-s0502a0:1465_4: Mahājano sāyaṃpātaṃ paccekabuddhassūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ khettaṃ maddanto gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:1465_5: Kassako ca “mā me khettaṃ maddathā”ti vārentopi vāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1465_7: “sace imasmiṃ ṭhāne paccekabuddhassa paṇṇasālā na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:1465_9: So paccekabuddhassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakāle paribhogabhājanāni bhinditvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1465_10: Paccekabuddho taṃ jhāmaṃ disvā yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1465_11: Mahājano gandhamālaṃ ādāya āgato jhāmapaṇṇasālaṃ disvā “kahaṃ nu kho no ayyo gato”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1465_12: Sopi mahājaneneva saddhiṃ gato mahājanamajjhe ṭhitakova evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1465_15: imaṃ pāpimaṃ nissāya mayaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhimhā”ti daṇḍādīhi pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1465_16: So avīcimhi nibbattitvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī yojanamattaṃ ussannā,
atk-s0502a0:1465_17: tāva niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena gijjhakūṭe ahipeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1465_24: tadā evarūpena dukkhena socatī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1467_0: “Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
atk-s0502a0:1469_0: Tattha sajjukhīraṃ vāti taṃ khaṇaṃyeva dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ abbhuṇhaṃ khīraṃ na muccati na pariṇamati.
atk-s0502a0:1469_2: yathā idaṃ sajjukhīraṃ taṃ khaṇaññeva na muccati na pariṇamati na pakatiṃ vijahati.
atk-s0502a0:1469_3: Yasmiṃ pana bhājane duhitvā gahitaṃ yāva tattha takkādiambilaṃ na pakkhipati,
atk-s0502a0:1469_14: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno vītaccitaṅgāro akkantopi chārikāya paṭicchannattā na tāva ḍahati,
atk-s0502a0:1469_15: chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā cammādīnaṃ ḍahanavasena yāva matthaluṅgā ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1469_17: taṃ bālaṃ dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve nirayādīsu nibbattaṃ ḍahantaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1473_0: Yāvadeva anatthāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto saṭṭhikūṭapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1474_0: Purimanayeneva hi mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1474_1: Therena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho “bhagavato santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā piṇḍāya caritvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisinnakāle puna puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:1474_3: tassa saṭṭhi ayakūṭasahassāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni uparimatthake patitvā patitvā uṭṭhahanti sīsaṃ bhindanti,
atk-s0502a0:1474_5: iminā attabhāvena mayā evarūpo attabhāvo na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0502a0:1476_0: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, vobhindanteva matthaka”nti. ādi –
atk-s0502a0:1477_3: mayāpesa satto bodhimaṇḍe nisinneneva diṭṭho ‘ye ca pana me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1477_4: tesaṃ ahitāya bhaveyyā’ti paresaṃ anukampāya na kathesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1477_5: idāni pana moggallānassa sakkhī hutvā kathemī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1477_6: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1478_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ sāḷittakasippe nipphattiṃ patto eko pīṭhasappi ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1478_1: So nagaradvāre ekassa vaṭarukkhassa heṭṭhā nisinno sakkharāni khipitvā tassa paṇṇāni chindanto “hatthirūpakaṃ no dassehi,
atk-s0502a0:1478_2: assarūpakaṃ no dassehī”ti gāmadārakehi vuccamāno icchiticchitāni rūpāni dassetvā tesaṃ santikā khādanīyādīni labhati.
atk-s0502a0:1478_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1478_5: Rañño ṭhitamajjhanhike rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhassa chiddāvachiddacchāyā sarīraṃ phari.
atk-s0502a0:1478_6: So “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti uddhaṃ olokento rukkhapaṇṇesu hatthirūpakādīni disvā “kassetaṃ kamma”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a0:1478_8: “mayhaṃ purohito atimukharo appamattakepi vutte bahuṃ bhaṇanto maṃ upaddaveti,
atk-s0502a0:1478_9: sakkhissasi tassa mukhe nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā khipitu”nti?
atk-s0502a0:1478_11: Ajalaṇḍikā āharāpetvā purohitena saddhiṃ tumhe antosāṇiyaṃ nisīdatha,
atk-s0502a0:1478_14: Itaro kattariyaggena sāṇiyā chiddaṃ katvā purohitassa raññā saddhiṃ kathentassa mukhe vivaṭamatte ekekaṃ ajalaṇḍikaṃ khipi.
atk-s0502a0:1478_17: Rājā tāya saññāya ajalaṇḍikānaṃ khīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “ācariya,
atk-s0502a0:1478_18: ahaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ kathento kathaṃ nittharituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1478_19: tumhe atimukharatāya nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā gilantāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ nāpajjathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1478_20: Brāhmaṇo maṅguubhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tato paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ vivaritvā raññā saddhiṃ sallapituṃ nasakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1478_21: Rājā pīṭhasappiguṇaṃ anussaritvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “taṃ nissāya me sukhaṃ laddha”nti tuṭṭho tassa sabbaṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1478_22: nāma dhanaṃ datvā nagarassa catūsu disāsu cattāro varagāme adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1478_23: Tamatthaṃ viditvā rañño atthadhammānusāsako amacco imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1479_0: “Sādhu kho sippakaṃ nāma, api yādisa kīdisaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:1481_0: So pana amacco tena samayena ayameva bhagavā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1481_1: Atheko puriso pīṭhasappinā laddhasampattiṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1481_2: “ayaṃ nāma pīṭhasappī hutvā imaṃ sippaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:1481_4: So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idaṃ me, ācariya,
atk-s0502a0:1481_8: ārādhessāmi na”nti tassa hatthapādaparikammādīni karonto cirassaṃ taṃ ārādhetvā punappunaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a0:1481_9: pīṭhasappī “ayaṃ me ativiya upakāro”ti taṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto sippaṃ sikkhāpetvā “nipphannaṃ te, tāta, sippaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1481_14: gāviṃ mārentassa sataṃ daṇḍo hoti manussaṃ mārentassa sahassaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1481_15: tvaṃ saputtadāropi taṃ nittharituṃ na sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:1481_19: So “sādhū”ti sakkharā ucchaṅge katvā tādisaṃ upadhārayamāno vicaranto gāviṃ disvā “ayaṃ sasāmikā”ti paharituṃ na visahi,
atk-s0502a0:1481_20: manussaṃ disvā “ayaṃ samātāpitiko”ti paharituṃ na visati.
atk-s0502a0:1482_0: Tena samayena sunetto nāma paccekabuddho taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya paṇṇasālāya viharati.
atk-s0502a0:1482_1: So taṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ nagaradvārantare disvā “ayaṃ nimātāpitiko,
atk-s0502a0:1482_3: imaṃ paharitvā sippaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti paccekabuddhassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotaṃ sandhāya sakkharaṃ khipi.
atk-s0502a0:1482_8: Manussā paccekabuddhe anāgacchante “kiñci aphāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā tattha gantvā taṃ parinibbutaṃ disvā rodiṃsu parideviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1482_9: Sopi mahājanaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā tattha gantvā paccekabuddhaṃ sañjānitvā “ayaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto dvārantare mama sammukhībhūto,
atk-s0502a0:1482_10: ahaṃ attano sippaṃ vīmaṃsanto imaṃ pahari”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1482_12: gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti pothetvā tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1482_13: So avīcimhi nibbattitvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī yojanamattaṃ ussannā,
atk-s0502a0:1482_14: tāva paccitvā vipākāvasesena gijjhakūṭamatthake saṭṭhikūṭapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1482_17: bālassa nāma sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ anatthāya uppajjati.
atk-s0502a0:1482_18: Bālo hi sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā labhitvā attano anatthameva karotī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0502a0:1486_3: yamhi vā issariye yase sampattiyañca ṭhito janena ñāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1486_6: Sippaṃ vā hi issariyādibhāvo vā bālassa anatthāyeva jāyati.
atk-s0502a0:1486_7: Taṃ nissāya so attano anatthameva karoti.
atk-s0502a0:1486_10: bālassa hi sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ kusalakoṭṭhāsaṃ ghātentameva uppajjati.
atk-s0502a0:1486_13: Tassa hi taṃ sukkaṃsaṃ hanantaṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ muddhaṃ vipātentaṃ viddhaṃsentameva hantīti.
atk-s0502a0:1490_0: Asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sudhammattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1491_0: Macchikāsaṇḍanagarasmiñhi citto nāma gahapati pañcavaggiyānaṃ abbhantaraṃ mahānāmattheraṃ nāma piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:1491_1: caramānaṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ pavesetvā bhojetvā bhattakiccāvasāne dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1491_2: suṇanto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā acalasaddho hutvā ambāṭakavanaṃ nāma attano uyyānaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kattukāmo
atk-s0502a0:1491_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe “patiṭṭhitaṃ buddhasāsana”nti udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi.
atk-s0502a0:1491_5: Mahāseṭṭhi uyyāne mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā sabbadisāhi āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivaṭadvāro ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1492_0: Aparena samayena cittassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā dve aggasāvakā tassa saṅgahaṃ kattukāmā macchikāsaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1492_1: Citto gahapati tesaṃ āgamanaṃ sutvā aḍḍhayojanamaggaṃ paccuggantvā te ādāya attano vihāraṃ pavesetvā āgantukavattaṃ katvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1492_5: Apica thokaṃ suṇāhī”ti tassa dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1492_6: So therassa dhammaṃ suṇantova anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1492_8: sve bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ mama gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pacchā nevāsikaṃ sudhammattheraṃ “tumhepi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1492_10: So “ayaṃ maṃ pacchā nimantetī”ti kuddho paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipi eva.
atk-s0502a0:1492_12: bhante”ti pakkamitvā punadivase attano nivesane mahādānaṃ sajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:1492_13: Sudhammattheropi paccūsakāleyeva “kīdiso nu kho gahapatinā aggasāvakānaṃ sakkāro sajjito,
atk-s0502a0:1492_14: sve gantvā passissāmī”ti cintetvā pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1493_2: piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti vatvā aggasāvakānaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ sakkāraṃ oloketvā gahapatiṃ jātiyā ghaṭṭetukāmo “uḷāro te, gahapati, sakkāro,
atk-s0502a0:1493_6: gahapatī”ti vatvā gahapatinā kākopamāya apasādito kujjhitvā “eso te, gahapati, āvāso,
atk-s0502a0:1493_7: pakkamissāmaha”nti vatvā yāvatatiyaṃ vāriyamānopi pakkamitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā cittena ca attanā ca vuttavacanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1493_8: Satthā “tayā upāsako saddho pasanno hīnena khuṃsito”ti tasseva dosaṃ āropetvā paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kārāpetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:1493_13: khamāhi me”ti vatvāpi “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto taṃ khamāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1493_16: tiṃsayojanaṃ tāva maggaṃ gantvā paccāgacchatū”ti khamanūpāyaṃ anācikkhitvāva uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1493_18: iminā saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakaṃ khamāpehī”ti vatvā “samaṇena nāma ‘mayhaṃ vihāro,
atk-s0502a0:1493_21: mayhaṃ upāsikā’ti mānaṃ vā issaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a0:1493_22: Evaṃ karontassa hi icchāmānādayo kilesā vaḍḍhantī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:1500_0: Iti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1501_0: Tattha asantanti yo bālo bhikkhu avijjamānaṃ sambhāvanaṃ iccheyya,
atk-s0502a0:1501_2: Pāpicchatāniddese vuttanayeneva bālo “asaddho dussīlo appassuto appavivitto kusīto anupaṭṭhitassati asamāhito
atk-s0502a0:1501_3: duppañño akhīṇāsavova samāno ‘aho vata maṃ jano ayaṃ saddho, sīlavā,
atk-s0502a0:1501_10: “Aho vata maṃ sakalavihāre bhikkhū parivāretvā pañhaṃ pucchantā vihareyyu”nti evaṃ icchācāre ṭhatvā purekkhārañca bhikkhūsu icchati.
atk-s0502a0:1501_11: Āvāsesūti saṅghikesu ca āvāsesu yāni vihāramajjhe paṇītasenāsanāni,
atk-s0502a0:1501_12: tāni attano sandiṭṭhasambhattādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento sayampi varataraṃ senāsanaṃ palibodhento,
atk-s0502a0:1501_13: sesānaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ paccantimāni lāmakasenāsanāni ceva amanussapariggahitāni ca “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento āvāsesu issariyaṃ icchati.
atk-s0502a0:1501_14: Pūjā parakulesu cāti neva mātāpitūnaṃ na ñātakānaṃ paresuyeva kulesu “aho vatime mayhameva dadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1501_15: na aññesa”nti evaṃ catuppaccayehi pūjaṃ icchati.
atk-s0502a0:1502_0: Mameva kata maññantūti yassa ca bālassa “yaṃkiñci vihāre uposathāgārādikaraṇavasena kataṃ navakammaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1502_1: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ therena katanti evaṃ gihī ca pabbajitā ca ubhopi mameva nissāya kataṃ parikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ maññantū”ti saṅkappo uppajjati.
atk-s0502a0:1502_2: Mamevātivasā assūti “gihī ca pabbajitā ca sabbepi mameva vase vattantu,
atk-s0502a0:1502_5: evarūpesu kiccākiccesu khuddakamahantesu karaṇīyesu kismiñci ekakiccepi mameva vase vattantu,
atk-s0502a0:1502_7: Iti bālassāti yassa bālassa sā ca icchā ayañca evarūpo saṅkappo uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1502_10: Kevalaṃ panassa candodaye samuddassa udakaṃ viya chasu dvāresu uppajjamānā taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1504_0: Sudhammattheropi imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tena anudūtena bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a0:1504_1: saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakassa cakkhupathe āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā upāsakaṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1504_4: khamatha me”ti paṭikhamāpito satthārā dinne ovāde ṭhatvā katipāheneva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1504_9: So tilataṇḍulasappiphāṇitavatthacchādanādīhi paripūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā “satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgacchantu,
atk-s0502a0:1504_10: piṇḍapātādīhi na kilamissantī”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpetvā bhikkhunīsaṅghassāpi upāsakānampi upāsikānampi ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1504_11: Tena saddhiṃ pañcasatā pañcasatā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca upāsakā ca upāsikāyo ca nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1504_12: So tesañceva attano parisāya cāti tiṇṇaṃ janasahassānaṃ yathā tiṃsayojane magge yāgubhattādīhi kiñci vekallaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1504_14: Tassa pana nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā yojane yojane devatā khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā dibbehi yāgukhajjakabhattapānakādīhi taṃ mahājanaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1504_16: Evaṃ devatāhi upaṭṭhiyamāno devasikaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto māsena sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:1504_18: Devatāhi ceva manussehi ca abhihaṭaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ vissajjentova agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1505_1: ajja vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya citto gahapati pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto āgantvā maṃ vandissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1505_3: tassa tumhākaṃ vandanakāle kiñci pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1505_7: Tassa āgantvā “maṃ vandanakāle rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese jaṇṇukamattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dibbapupphānaṃ ghanavassaṃ vassissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1505_8: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā nagaravāsino “evaṃ mahāpuñño kira citto nāma gahapati āgantvā ajja satthāraṃ vandissati,
atk-s0502a0:1505_10: mayampi taṃ mahāpuññaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya maggassa ubhosu passesu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1505_11: Vihārasamīpe āgatakāle pañca bhikkhusatāni paṭhamaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1505_13: tumhe pacchato āgacchathā”ti mahāupāsikāyo ṭhapetvā pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1505_14: Buddhānaṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne pana ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā ito vā etto vā na honti,
atk-s0502a0:1505_17: Tīṇi phalāni pattena ariyasāvakena olokitolokitaṭṭhānaṃ kampi.
atk-s0502a0:1505_19: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā dvīsu gopphakesu satthu pāde gahetvā vandi.
atk-s0502a0:1505_23: vasamāno ca sakalaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vihāreyeva nisīdāpetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1505_24: attanā saddhiṃ āgatepi antovihāreyeva katvā paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a0:1505_25: Ekadivasampi attano sakaṭesu kiñci gahetabbaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0502a0:1505_29: ahaṃ ‘tumhākaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī’ti āgacchanto māsaṃ antarāmagge ahosiṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1505_31: mayā ābhataṃ paṇṇākāraṃ kiñci gahetuṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1505_32: ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussehi ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva dānaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1506_1: upāsakassa ekaṃ padesaṃ tucchaṃ kāretvā dehī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1506_4: Upāsakopi attanā saddhiṃ āgatehi tīhi janasahassehi saddhiṃ tucchasakaṭehi puna maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a0:1506_6: tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata”nti sattahi ratanehi sakaṭāni pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1506_7: So attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva mahājanaṃ paṭijagganto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1506_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussehi abhihaṭapaṇṇākāreneva mahāvadānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1506_12: idāni pañca sakaṭasatāni tucchāni katvā māseneva kira gamissati,
atk-s0502a0:1506_14: tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata’nti pañca sakaṭasatāni sattaratanehi pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1506_15: So puna attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva kira mahājanaṃ paṭijagganto gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1506_17: etassa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantassevāyaṃ sakkāro uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1506_19: mama santikaṃ āgacchantassāpi aññattha gacchantassāpi etassa uppajjateva.
atk-s0502a0:1506_21: evarūpo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati,
atk-s0502a0:1506_22: tattha tatthevassa lābhasakkāro nibbattatī”ti vatvā satthā imaṃ pakiṇṇakavagge gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1508_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1510_0: Evaṃ vutte ānandatthero cittassa pubbakammaṃ pucchi. Athassa satthā ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0502a0:1511_1: ayaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0502a0:1511_2: migaluddakakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya ekadivasaṃ deve vassante migānaṃ māraṇattāya sattiṃ ādāya araññaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1511_3: gantvā mige olokento ekasmiṃ akaṭapabbhāre sasīsaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “eko, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:1511_5: bhattamassa āharissāmī”ti vegena gehaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ uddhane hiyyo,
atk-s0502a0:1511_7: ekasmiṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā aññe piṇḍapātacārike bhikkhū disvā tesampi patte ādāya paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a0:1511_8: parivisathā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetvā taṃ bhattaṃ puṭake pakkhipitvā ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphāni
atk-s0502a0:1511_9: ocinitvā pattapuṭe katvā therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1511_10: saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vatvā pattaṃ ādāya pūretvā therassa hatthe ṭhapetvā tehi pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā “yathā
atk-s0502a0:1511_11: me ayaṃ rasapiṇḍapāto pupphapūjāya saddhiṃ cittaṃ tosesi,
atk-s0502a0:1511_12: evaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne paṇṇākārasahassāni ādāya āgantvā mayhaṃ cittaṃ tosentu,
atk-s0502a0:1511_14: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:1511_16: Idānipissa jātadivase ceva idha ca āgatassa pupphavassavassanañca paṇṇākārābhihāro ca sattahi ratanehi sakaṭapūraṇañca tasseva kammassa nissandoti.
atk-s0502a0:1514_0: Aññā hi lābhūpanisāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vanavāsikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1515_0: Sāriputtattherasa kira pitu vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa sahāyako mahāsenabrāhmaṇo nāma rājagahe vasati.
atk-s0502a0:1515_1: Sāriputtatthero ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caranto tasmiṃ anukampāya tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1515_3: So “mama putto mayhaṃ gehadvāraṃ piṇḍāya carituṃ āgato bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1515_6: natthi me koci deyyadhammo”ti therassa sammukhā bhavituṃ asakkonto nilīyi.
atk-s0502a0:1515_10: Athekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇavācake thūlasāṭakena saddhiṃ pāyasapātiṃ labhitvā ādāya gehaṃ gantvāva theraṃ anussari,
atk-s0502a0:1515_12: Theropi taṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “brāhmaṇo deyyadhammaṃ labhitvā mama āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0502a0:1515_13: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya tassa gehadvāre ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1516_1: Atha naṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā antogehe nisīdāpetvā pāyasapātiṃ gahetvā therassa patte ākiri.
atk-s0502a0:1516_2: Thero upaḍḍhaṃ sampaṭicchitvā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi.
atk-s0502a0:1516_9: Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne tampi sāṭakaṃ datvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1516_11: Thero “evaṃ hotu brāhmaṇā”ti tassa anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto anupubbena cārikaṃ caranto jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1516_12: “Duggatakāle dinnadānaṃ pana ativiya tosetī”ti brāhmaṇopi taṃ dānaṃ datvā pasannacitto somanassajāto there adhimattaṃ sinehamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1516_13: So there sineheneva kālaṃ katvā sāvatthiyaṃ therassūpaṭṭhākakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1516_14: Taṃkhaṇeyeva panassa mātā “kucchiyaṃ me gabbho patiṭṭhito”ti ñatvā sāmikassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1517_0: Tassā accuṇhaatisītaatiambilādiparibhogaṃ vajjetvā sukhena gabbhaṃ parihariyamānāya evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji
atk-s0502a0:1517_1: “aho vatāhaṃ sāriputtattherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni nimantetvā gehe nisīdāpetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1517_2: datvā sayampi kāsāyavatthāni paridahitvā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisīditvā ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1517_4: Tassā kira so kāsāyavatthaparidahane dohaḷo kucchiyaṃ puttassa buddhasāsane pabbajjāya pubbanimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1517_5: Athassā ñātakā “dhammiko no dhītāya dohaḷo”ti sāriputtattheraṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1517_6: Sāpi ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ gahetvā āsanapariyante nisinnā ucchiṭṭhapāyasaṃ paribhuñji,
atk-s0502a0:1517_9: dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijātāya katamaṅgalesupi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1517_10: Pubbe kiresa dārakena brāhmaṇakāle dinnapāyasassa nissando.
atk-s0502a0:1518_0: Jātamaṅgaladivase pana taṃ dārakaṃ pātova nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā sirisayane satasahassagghanikassa kambalassa upari nipajjāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1518_1: So tattha nipannakova theraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ me pubbācariyo,
atk-s0502a0:1518_2: mayā theraṃ nissāya ayaṃ sampatti laddhā,
atk-s0502a0:1518_3: mayā imassa ekaṃ pariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sikkhāpadagahaṇatthāya ānīyamāno taṃ kambalaṃ cūḷaṅguliyā veṭhetvā aggahesi.
atk-s0502a0:1518_4: Athassa “aṅguliyaṃ kambalo laggo”ti te taṃ harituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1518_7: mā dārakaṃ rodāpethā”ti kambaleneva saddhiṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1518_8: So theraṃ vandanakāle kambalato aṅguliṃ apakaḍḍhitvā kambalaṃ therassa pādamūle pātesi.
atk-s0502a0:1518_9: Ñātakā “daharakumārena ajānitvā kata”nti avatvā “puttena no dinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1518_12: satasahassagghanikena kambalena pūjākārakassa tumhākaṃ dāsassa sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1518_16: Thero kira gihikāle upatissamāṇavo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1518_19: Evaṃ dārakassa nāmakaraṇamaṅgalaṃ katvā puna tassa āhāraparibhogamaṅgalepi puna tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalepi
atk-s0502a0:1518_20: dussagahaṇamaṅgalepi cūḷākappanamaṅgalepi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1519_2: pubbevāhaṃ ‘na mayā puttassa ajjhāsayo bhinditabbo’ti manaṃ akāsiṃ, pabbaja,
atk-s0502a0:1519_3: puttā”ti theraṃ nimantāpetvā tassa āgatassa bhikkhañca datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1519_5: imaṃ ādāya sāyaṃ vihāraṃ āgamissāmā”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā sāyanhasamaye mahantena sakkārasammānena puttaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā therassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:1519_12: ahaṃ tumhehi vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1519_13: Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā tassa paṭikūlamanasikāravasena tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:1519_15: Sabbaṃ kathetuṃ asakkontena pana tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbameva.
atk-s0502a0:1519_17: Kesādīsu ekekakoṭṭhāsesu arahattaṃ pattānaṃ bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi upāsakānampi upāsikānampi paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1519_18: Abyattā bhikkhū pana pabbajentā arahattassūpanissayaṃ nāsenti.
atk-s0502a0:1519_19: Tasmā thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1520_0: Mātāpitaro puttassa pabbajitasakkāraṃ karontā sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1520_1: Bhikkhūpi “nibaddhaṃ appodakamadhupāyasaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na sakkomā”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1520_2: Tassapi mātāpitaro sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1520_3: Sāmaṇero aṭṭhame divase bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1520_5: sakkāramassa karissāmā”ti pañcahi sāṭakasatehi cumbaṭakāni katvā pañca piṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā ādāya paṭipathe ṭhatvā adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1520_7: Evaṃ sāmaṇero dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassehi saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1521_0: Punekadivasaṃ sāmaṇero sītakāle vihāracārikaṃ caranto bhikkhū tattha tattha aggisālādīsu visibbente disvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1521_7: kambalatthikā mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti sakalavihāre ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1521_8: Atha bhikkhū “sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ gantvā kambalaṃ āharissāmā”ti sattavassikasāmaṇeraṃ nissāya sahassamattā bhikkhū nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1521_9: So “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kuto kambalaṃ labhissāmī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā te ādāya nagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1521_10: Sudinnassa hi dānassa evarūpo ānubhāvo hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1521_11: So bahinagareyeva gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto pañca kambalasatāni labhitvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1521_12: Manussā ito cito ca kambale āharanti.
atk-s0502a0:1522_0: Eko pana puriso āpaṇadvārena āgacchanto pañca kambalasatāni pasāretvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ āpaṇikaṃ disvā āha – “ambho,
atk-s0502a0:1522_6: “Evaṃ sante sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce,
atk-s0502a0:1522_9: Maccharino hi andhabālā evarūpesu dānaṃ dadamānesu maccharāyitvā asadisadānaṃ disvā maccharāyanto kāḷo viya niraye nibbattanti.
atk-s0502a0:1522_11: “ayaṃ puriso attano dhammatāya āgacchamāno ‘tava kambale paṭicchādehī’ti maṃ āha.
atk-s0502a0:1522_13: ahaṃ pana ‘mama santakaṃ sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce,
atk-s0502a0:1522_19: Dvepi kambale dasāya dasaṃ sambandhitvā tesaṃ antare pakkhipitvā paṭicchādesi.
atk-s0502a0:1522_20: Sāmaṇeropi bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1522_26: Te dvepi kambale nīharitvā sāmaṇerassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1523_1: Evaṃ ekadivasaṃyeva kambalasahassaṃ labhitvā bhikkhusahassassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1523_3: Evaṃ nāmakaraṇadivase dinnakambalo sattavassikakāle kambalasahassabhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1524_3: yathārūpe bhikkhusaṅghe appaṃ dinnaṃ bahuṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1525_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇero ekakambalassa nissandena sattavassikova kambalasahassaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:1525_1: Tassa jetavane viharantassa abhikkhaṇaṃ ñātidāyakā santikaṃ āgantvā kathāsallāpaṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a0:1525_3: “mayā idha vasantena ñātidāyakesu āgantvā kathentesu akathetumpi na sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:1525_4: etehi saddhiṃ kathāpapañcena attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:1525_5: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā araññaṃ paviseyya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1525_6: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a0:1525_8: ñātakā maṃ pakkosissantī”ti vīsati yojanasataṃ maggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1525_9: Athekena gāmadvārena gacchanto ekaṃ mahallakapurisaṃ disvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:1525_15: Mahallakaupāsakassa pana taṃ disvāva puttasineho udapādi.
atk-s0502a0:1525_18: Sāmaṇero tena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphaphalapaṭimaṇḍite rukkhapabbatapadese disvā “ayaṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a0:1525_20: ayaṃ upāsaka kiṃ padeso nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1525_21: Sopissa tesaṃ nāmāni ācikkhanto āraññakavihāraṃ patvā “idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1525_24: ko nāmo tva”nti nāmaṃ pucchitvā “ahaṃ vanavāsītisso nāma upāsakā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:1525_25: “sve amhākaṃ gāme bhikkhāya carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā nivattitvā antogāmameva gato.
atk-s0502a0:1526_0: Sāmaṇero paṭhamameva tisso nāma hutvā tato piṇḍapātadāyakatisso kambaladāyakatisso vanavāsītissoti tīṇi
atk-s0502a0:1526_1: nāmāni labhitvā sattavassabbhantare cattāri nāmāni labhi.
atk-s0502a0:1526_2: So punadivase pātova taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1526_6: Ekamanussopi tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā puna gehaṃ gantuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:1526_10: tumhesu imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vasantesu mayaṃ tīṇi saraṇāni gahetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya māsassa aṭṭha uposathakammāni upavasissāma,
atk-s0502a0:1526_12: So upakāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā nibaddhaṃ tattheva piṇḍapātacāraṃ cari.
atk-s0502a0:1526_15: So tatthevapaṭhamamāsañca dutiyamāsañca vītināmetvā tatiyamāse gacchante saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1527_0: Athassa pavāretvā vuṭṭhavassakāle upajjhāyo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1527_3: So attano parivāre pañcasate bhikkhū ādāya pakkanto,
atk-s0502a0:1527_8: Etenupāyena mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero upālitthero puṇṇattheroti sabbe mahāsāvakā pañcahi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1527_9: Sabbepi mahāsāvakānaṃ parivārā cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1527_10: Te vīsatiyojanasataṃ maggaṃ gantvā gocaragāmaṃ sampattā.
atk-s0502a0:1527_11: Sāmaṇerassa nibaddhūpaṭṭhāko upāsako dvāreyeva disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0502a0:1528_15: Upāsako oloketvā dhammasenāpatiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi mahāsāvake sañjānitvā nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva,
atk-s0502a0:1528_17: sāriputtattheraṃ ādiṃ katvā asīti mahāsāvakā attano attano parivārehi saddhiṃ sāmaṇerassa santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a0:1528_19: Manussā “tāvadeva mañcādīni gahetvā therānaṃ padānupadikā hutvā therehi saddhiṃyeva vihāraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1528_20: Sāmaṇero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sañjānitvā katipayānaṃ mahātherānaṃ pattacīvarāni paṭiggahetvā vattamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1528_21: Tassa therānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahantassa pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmentasseva andhakāro jātā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1528_28: ito pubbe dhammassavanampi natthī”ti. “Tena hi, sāmaṇera,
atk-s0502a0:1528_36: dukkhā muccathā’ti imāni dve padāni ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dhammakathaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:1528_38: “Sāmaṇero pana arahattaṃ patvāpi neva tesaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1529_3: ‘kathaṃ pana dukkhā muccantī’ti imesaṃ no dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ kathehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1529_5: bhante”ti cittabījaniṃ gahetvā dhammāsanaṃ āruyha pañcahi nikāyehi atthañca kāraṇañca ākaḍḍhitvā ghanavassaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1529_6: vassanto cātuddīpakamahāmegho viya khandhadhātuāyatanabodhipakkhiyadhamme vibhajanto arahattakūṭena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1529_9: sesajanā jātidukkhādīhi ceva nirayadukkhādīhi ca na parimuccantī”ti āha. “Sādhu, sāmaṇera,
atk-s0502a0:1529_13: Aruṇe uggacchante sāmaṇerassa upaṭṭhākamanussā dve bhāgā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1529_14: Ekacce “na vata no ito pubbe evarūpo kakkhaḷo diṭṭhapubbo.
atk-s0502a0:1529_15: Kathañhi nāma evarūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ jānanto ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantānaṃ manussānaṃ ekampi dhammapadaṃ na kathesī”ti kujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1529_17: ye mayaṃ evarūpaṃ bhadantaṃ guṇaṃ vā aguṇaṃ vā ajānantāpi upaṭṭhahimha,
atk-s0502a0:1529_18: idāni ca panassa santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ labhimhā”ti tussiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1530_0: Sammāsambuddhopi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento vanavāsītissassa upaṭṭhāke attano ñāṇajālassa
atk-s0502a0:1530_1: anto paviṭṭhe disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento imamatthaṃ upadhāresi “vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a0:1530_4: mayhaṃ puttassa pana sāmaṇerassa kuddhā nirayabhāgino bhavissanti,
