atk-s0502a0:1530_9: Bhikkhūpi sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantā sāmaṇeraṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ, tissa,
atk-s0502a0:1531_0: Satthā jetavanasmiṃyeva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya ekacittakkhaṇeneva gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ purato ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1531_2: Manussā udaggacittā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā khajjakaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1531_4: Gāmavāsino nīharitvā tassa sakkaccaṃ bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1531_5: So yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pattaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0502a0:1531_10: Thero satthu hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā sāmaṇerassa datvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:1531_11: attano pattaṭṭhāne nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1532_0: Gāmavāsino buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā anumodanaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1532_3: ye tumhe attano kulūpakaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nissāya sāriputtaṃ moggallānaṃ kassapaṃ anuruddhanti asītimahāsāvake dassanāya labhatha,

atk-s0502a0:1532_9: buddhānañceva bhikkhusaṅghassa ca ārādhanasamatthaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaṃ dassanāya labhāma,

atk-s0502a0:1532_18: ayaṃ padeso konāmo”ti pubbe tassa upāsakena dassitapadese pucchanto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1532_22: Satthā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a0:1532_25: pabbatamatthake ṭhito ito cito ca oloketvā kiṃ passasī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1532_29: “Mama dukkhitakāle rodantassa catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarena assunā bhavitabbanti idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1532_32: Ekekassa hi sattassa dukkhitakāle paggharitaassūni catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarānevā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1537_5: “Mayā marantena imasmiṃ ṭhāne katassa sarīranikkhepassa paricchedo ‘natthī’ti cintesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1537_8: Imesañhi sattānaṃ pathaviyaṃ nipajjitvā amataṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a0:1539_0: Asmiṃ padese daḍḍhāni, natthi loke anāmataṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1540_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0502a0:1541_0: Etaṃ ariyā sevanti, etaṃ loke anāmata”nti. (jā.1.2.31-32) –
atk-s0502a0:1542_1: Iti pathaviyaṃ sarīranikkhepaṃ katvā marantesu sattesu amatapubbapadese marantā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1543_0: Ānandatthero kira vīsavassasatikakāle āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ito sattame divase parinibbāyissāmī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1543_1: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rohiṇīnadiyā ubhayatīravāsikesu manussesu orimatīravāsikā “mayaṃ therassa bahūpakārā,

atk-s0502a0:1543_6: ime nāma anupakārāti na sakkā vattuṃ,

atk-s0502a0:1543_12: vūpasamamānopi maṃ nissāyeva vūpasamissatī”ti cintetvā “orimatīravāsinopi mayhaṃ upakārā,
atk-s0502a0:1543_17: Tato sattame divase majjhenadiyā sattatālappamāṇe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a0:1543_18: “mama sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā eko bhāgo orimatīre patatu,
atk-s0502a0:1543_19: eko bhāgo paratīre”ti adhiṭṭhāya yathānisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0502a0:1543_21: Sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā eko bhāgo orimatīre pati,
atk-s0502a0:1543_26: Manussā cattāro māse rodantā paridevantā “satthu pattacīvaraggāhake tiṭṭhante satthu ṭhitakālo viya no ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:1543_27: idāni no satthā parinibbuto”ti vippalapantā viravantā vicariṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:1544_4: apica kho pana me etesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā vanarati nāma uppajjatī”ti vatvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi vanavaṇṇanaṃ nāma kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1545_2: paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyassa ñātakā sattasu maṅgalesu pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1545_3: pabbajitakāle antovihāre buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satta divasāni appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1545_4: Pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ pavisanto dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassena saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:1545_7: idāni evarūpaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ chaḍḍetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā missakāhārena yāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:1545_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “āma,
atk-s0502a0:1545_16: ‘Evaṃ lābhaṃ labhissāmī’ti hi āraññikādidhutaṅgasamādānavasena lābhūpanisaṃ rakkhantassa bhikkhuno cattāro apāyā vivaṭadvārā eva tiṭṭhanti,

atk-s0502a0:1550_1: aññā nibbānagāminīti lābhūpanisā nāmesā aññā eva,
atk-s0502a0:1550_3: Lābhuppādakena hi bhikkhunā thokaṃ akusalakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:1550_7: Pāyasapātiyañhi vaṅkaṃ akatvā ujukameva hatthaṃ otāretvā ukkhipantassa hattho makkhitamattakova hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1550_8: vaṅkaṃ katvā otāretvā ukkhipantassa pana pāyasapiṇḍaṃ uddharantova nikkhamati,
atk-s0502a0:1550_11: Upadhisampadā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ bāhusaccaṃ parivāro araññavāsoti evarūpehi pana kāraṇehi uppanno lābho dhammiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1550_12: Nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrentena pana bhikkhunā kāyavaṅkādīni pahātabbāni.
atk-s0502a0:1550_17: Evametanti etaṃ lābhuppādanaṃ paṭipadañca nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadañca evaṃ ñatvā sabbesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1550_18: bujjhanaṭṭhena buddhassa savanante jātaṭṭhena ovādānusāsaniṃ vā savanaṭṭhena sāvako bhikkhu adhammikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1552_0: Imaṃ tividhampi vivekaṃ brūheyya vaḍḍheyya, upasampajja vihareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:1559_0: Nidhīnaṃva pavattāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ rādhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1560_0: So kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ duggatabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1560_1: So “bhikkhūnaṃ santike jīvissāmī”ti cintetvā vihāraṃ gantvā appaharitakaṃ karonto pariveṇaṃ sammajjanto mukhadhovanādīni dadanto antovihāreyeva vasi.
atk-s0502a0:1560_5: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti upadhārento “arahā
atk-s0502a0:1560_6: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā sāyanhasamaye vihāracārikaṃ caranto viya brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a0:1560_14: Satthā etasmiṃ nidāne bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a0:1560_16: atthi koci imassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ saratī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1560_18: ayaṃ me rājagahe piṇḍāya carantassa attano abhihaṭaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:1560_22: evaṃ katūpakāraṃ dukkhato mocetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vutte, “sādhu, bhante,

atk-s0502a0:1560_30: Tasmā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1561_0: Thero taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1561_1: Atha naṃ satthā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1561_16: pubbepi sāriputto kataññū katavedīyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ –
atk-s0502a0:1567_1: Tadā kira vaḍḍhakīhi pādassa arogakaraṇabhāvena kahaṃ attano upakāraṃ ñatvā sabbasetassa hatthipotakassa
atk-s0502a0:1567_2: dāyako ekacāriko hatthī sāriputtatthero ahosīti evaṃ theraṃ ārabbha jātakaṃ kathetvā rādhattheraṃ ārabbha,
atk-s0502a0:1567_4: bhikkhunā nāma rādhena viya suvacena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1567_6: ovādadāyako pana nidhiācikkhaṇako viya daṭṭhabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1571_0: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1572_0: Tattha nidhīnanti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1572_2: sukhena jīvanūpāyaṃ dassessāmī”ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvā”ti ācikkhitāraṃ viya.
atk-s0502a0:1572_3: Vajjadassinanti dve vajjadassino “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako ca,
atk-s0502a0:1572_4: aññātaṃ ñāpanatthāya ñātaṃ anuggahaṇatthāya sīlādīnamassa vuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokanena ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito ca.
atk-s0502a0:1572_6: Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti tajjetvāpi pothetvāpi nidhiṃ dassente kopaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a0:1572_8: evameva evarūpe puggale asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo,
atk-s0502a0:1572_11: mayhaṃ ācariyupajjhāyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā ovadantehi punapi maṃ vadeyyāthā”ti pavāretabbameva.
atk-s0502a0:1572_12: Niggayhavādinti ekacco hi saddhivihārikādīnaṃ asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā “ayaṃ me mukhodakadānādīhi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0502a0:1572_15: evaṃ me parihāni bhavissatī”ti vatthuṃ avisahanto na niggayhavādī nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1572_17: Yo pana tathārūpaṃ vajjaṃ disvā vajjānurūpaṃ tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto vihārā taṃ nīharanto sikkhāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:1572_25: Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyo hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1576_0: Ovadeyyānusāseyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto assajipunabbasukabhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1577_0: Te kira dve bhikkhū kiñcāpi aggasāvakānaṃ saddhivihārikā,
atk-s0502a0:1577_2: Te pāpakehi attano parivārehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ viharantā “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi
atk-s0502a0:1577_3: ropāpentipī”tiādikaṃ nānappakāraṃ anācāraṃ karontā kuladūsakakammaṃ katvā tato uppannehi paccayehi jīvikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1577_4: kappentā taṃ āvāsaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāvāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1577_5: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tesaṃ pabbājanīyakammakaraṇatthāya saparivāre dve aggasāvake āmantetvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a0:1577_7: tesu ye tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ na karonti,

atk-s0502a0:1577_12: paṇḍitānaṃ pana piyo hoti manāpo”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1580_0: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1581_0: Tattha ovadeyyāti uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma,

atk-s0502a0:1581_6: Ovadanto eva vā anusāsati nāmāti evaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyya.
atk-s0502a0:1581_9: Satañhi so piyo hotīti so evarūpo puggalo buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ piyo hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1581_10: Ye pana adiṭṭhadhammā avitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā,

atk-s0502a0:1585_0: Na bhaje pāpake mitteti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto channattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1586_0: So kira āyasmā “ahaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaputtena saddhiṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto tadā aññaṃ ekampi na passāmi,

atk-s0502a0:1586_5: So taṅkhaṇeyeva tuṇhī hutvā puna gantvā there akkosatiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1586_6: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ akkosantaṃ pakkosāpetvā satthā ovaditvā “channa,

atk-s0502a0:1588_0: “Na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame;

atk-s0502a0:1592_7: So satthari parinibbute ānandattherena ārocitaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ sutvā dukkhī dummano tikkhattuṃ mucchito patitvā “mā maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1592_8: nāsayitthā”ti yācitvā sammā vattaṃ pūrento na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a0:1595_0: Dhammapīti sukhaṃ setīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahākappinattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1596_1: atīte kira āyasmā mahākappino padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle katābhinīhāro saṃsāre saṃsaranto bārāṇasito
atk-s0502a0:1596_2: avidūre ekasmiṃ pesakāragāme jeṭṭhakapesakāro hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:1596_3: Tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā vassike cattāro māse janapade vasanti.

atk-s0502a0:1596_6: So “paccekabuddhā kira āgatā”ti sutvā tasmiṃ khaṇe nikkhamitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1596_9: tatiyadivase karissāmī”ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva pāvisi.

atk-s0502a0:1596_13: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā ñāṇasampannā itthī “sve, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1597_4: Gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena

atk-s0502a0:1597_12: Vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle “attano attano paṇṇasālāya vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā”ti
atk-s0502a0:1598_0: Gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā ito cutā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā gaṇadevaputtā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1598_1: Te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1598_4: Tā sabbāpi vayappattā parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ tesaṃyeva gehāni agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1598_6: “Satthā dhammaṃ desessatī”ti sutvā sabbepi te kuṭumbikā “dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti bhariyāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1598_8: Yesaṃ kulūpakā vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1598_21: Te taṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ nāma ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1598_22: Navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1598_23: Niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1599_0: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā sabbehi samānaṃ akatvā attano paññāya ṭhitā “atirekataraṃ katvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a0:1599_1: pūjessāmī”ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā anumodanakāle
atk-s0502a0:1599_2: satthāraṃ anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1599_4: anojā eva ca me nāmaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1599_6: Te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko
atk-s0502a0:1599_7: kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:1599_9: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa bhariyā maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare rājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:1599_12: Sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā anojādevī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1599_13: Sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ gehāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1599_14: Te sabbe rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1599_15: Yadā rājā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicari,
atk-s0502a0:1599_17: Tasmiṃ assena vā rathena vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti?
atk-s0502a0:1599_18: Evaṃ te ekato hutvā katānaṃ puññānaṃ ānubhāvena ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1599_23: Rājā tesu supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0502a0:1599_25: Rājā te pātova bhojetvā “gacchatha dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa
atk-s0502a0:1599_26: vā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ āharathā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1599_27: Te catūhi dvārehi nikkhamitvā tīṇi yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā sāsanaṃ alabhitvā paccāgacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:1600_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ assaṃ āruyha amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto kilantarūpe pañcasatavāṇijake
atk-s0502a0:1600_2: addhā imesaṃ santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī”ti te pakkosāpetvā “kuto āgacchathā”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0502a0:1600_5: “Atthi pana vo padese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna”nti. “Deva,
atk-s0502a0:1600_8: Rājā tāvadeva pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ asakkonto muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1600_11: Rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0502a0:1600_14: vo satasahassaṃ dadāmī”ti vatvā “aññampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthī”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0502a0:1600_16: Rājā tampi sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “dhammo uppanno”ti vutte “idhāpi
atk-s0502a0:1600_17: vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi sāsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:1600_20: Rājā tampi sutvā tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “saṅgho”ti pade vutte “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ oloketvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1600_25: saṅgho uppanno’ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1600_26: satthāraṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi, deva,
atk-s0502a0:1600_28: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijake āha –
atk-s0502a0:1600_29: “anojā nāma devī tumhākaṃ tīṇi satasahassāni dassati,
atk-s0502a0:1600_30: evañca pana naṃ vadeyyātha ‘rañño kira te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1600_34: Amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1600_35: Rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:1601_0: Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ mahākappino
atk-s0502a0:1601_1: vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1601_2: pahāya amaccasahassehi parivuto maṃ uddissa pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati.
atk-s0502a0:1601_3: So saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0502a0:1601_4: paccuggamanamassa karissāmī”ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ paccuggacchanto sayameva
atk-s0502a0:1601_5: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre nigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0502a0:1601_7: “Rājāpi āgacchanto ekaṃ nadiṃ patvā “kā nāmesā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1601_12: “Atthi panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo vā”ti? “Natthi, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1601_15: Ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto,
atk-s0502a0:1601_16: tesaṃ me ānubhāvena imaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ āvajjetvā “itipi so bhagavā
atk-s0502a0:1601_17: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti buddhānussatiṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena udakapiṭṭhiṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:1602_0: So taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1602_5: Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti dhammānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:1602_6: Tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1602_11: Imaṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:1602_12: Taṃ pana nadiṃ atikkamitvā gacchanto satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo addasa.
atk-s0502a0:1602_18: addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto mahāgotamabuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1602_19: So tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro rasmianusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā manosilārase nimujjanto
atk-s0502a0:1602_20: viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena,
atk-s0502a0:1602_24: Satthā “āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvara”nti upadhārento “ime kulaputtā paccekabuddhasahassassa cīvarasahassaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1602_26: Anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana”nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha,
atk-s0502a0:1602_28: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1602_29: Te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā paccorohitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1603_0: Tepi vāṇijakā rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā pahitabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā deviyā “āgacchantū”ti vutte pavisitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1603_7: kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāpesī”ti? “Devi,
atk-s0502a0:1603_14: Sāpi “taṃ sutvā purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre ‘buddho’ti padaṃ sutvā, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:1603_17: ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassaṃ dadamānena.
atk-s0502a0:1603_18: Ahañhi vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre tīṇi satasahassāni dammi,
atk-s0502a0:1603_20: Te idañcidañcāti itarānipi dve sāsanāni ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1603_21: Devī purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre tatheva sutvā tīṇi tīṇi satasahassāni dāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:1603_22: evaṃ te sabbānipi dvādasa satasahassāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1604_11: “Kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1604_13: tumhe kira taṃ sampattiṃ yathāruci paribhuñjathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1604_16: so tāva rājā sāsanaṃ sutvā magge ṭhitakova tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto,
atk-s0502a0:1604_17: mayā pana tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tīṇi ratanāni navahi satasahassehi pūjitāni,
atk-s0502a0:1604_18: na kho panesā sampatti nāma raññoyeva dukkhā,
atk-s0502a0:1604_20: Ko raññā chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jāṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati,
atk-s0502a0:1604_25: tena hi ethā”ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā puṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1604_26: tatheva pucchitvā sabbapavattiṃ sutvā “rañño gatamaggaṃ olokethā”ti vatvā “sindhavānaṃ padavalañjaṃ na passāma,
atk-s0502a0:1604_27: devī”ti vutte “rājā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto saccakiriyaṃ katvā gato bhavissati.
atk-s0502a0:1604_29: tesameva anubhāvena idaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ anussaritvā rathasahassaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:1604_32: Eteneva upāyena itarā dve nadiyo uttari.
atk-s0502a0:1605_0: Atha satthā tassāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā attano santike nisinnā bhikkhū na paññāyanti,
atk-s0502a0:1605_2: Sāpi gacchantī gacchantī satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo disvā tatheva cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1605_3: mahākappino tumhākaṃ uddissa nikkhanto āgatettha maññe, kahaṃ so,
atk-s0502a0:1605_7: Tā sabbāpi tuṭṭhacittā “idheva kira nisinnā sāmike passissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1605_10: Mahākappinatthero tāsaṃ vaḍḍhitadhammadesanaṃ suṇanto saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1605_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatte dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1605_12: Tāsaṃ kira āgatakkhaṇeyeva attano sāmike kāsāvadhare muṇḍakasīse disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:1605_14: Tasmā acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitakāle tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatteyeva dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1606_1: tumhākaṃ tāva pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti vatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1606_2: Evaṃ kira vutte “satthā uppalavaṇṇāya āgamanaṃ cintesī”ti ekacce vadanti.
atk-s0502a0:1606_5: Tā anupubbena janapadacārikaṃ caramānā antarāmagge mahājanena abhihaṭasakkārasammānā padasāva vīsayojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1606_7: Satthāpi bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya ākāseneva jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1606_8: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1606_13: attano kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha kathesi maññe”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1606_14: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina,
atk-s0502a0:1606_17: taṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā anudānabhāvaṃ vā jānātī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1606_20: mama putto kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udāneti,
atk-s0502a0:1606_21: puttassa pana me dhammapīti nāma dhammarati nāma uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:1606_22: so amatamahānibbānaṃ ārabbha eva udānaṃ udānesī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1610_2: Dhammo ca nāmesa na sakkā bhājanena yāguādīni viya pātuṃ?
atk-s0502a0:1610_3: Navavidhaṃ pana lokuttaradhammaṃ nāmakāyena phusanto ārammaṇato sacchikaronto pariññābhisamayādīhi dukkhādīni
atk-s0502a0:1610_8: Ariyappavediteti buddhādīhi ariyehi pavedite satipaṭṭhānādibhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme.
atk-s0502a0:1610_9: Sadā ramatīti evarūpo dhammapīti vippasannena cetasā viharanto paṇḍiccena samannāgato sadā ramati abhiramatīti.
atk-s0502a0:1614_0: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṇḍitasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1615_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddho vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivāro bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1615_1: Manussā attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā aṭṭhapi dasapi ekato hutvā agantukadānādīni adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1616_1: kiṃ parena samādapitenā’ti attanāva dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:1616_8: no bhogasampadaṃ ekacco attanāpi na deti,
atk-s0502a0:1617_0: Taṃ sutvā samīpe ṭhito eko paṇḍitapuriso cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1617_9: sabbehi saddhiṃ svātanāya mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1617_15: tattakānaṃ dānaṃ dethā”ti ārocetvā vicaranto attano attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā “mayaṃ dasannaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a0:1617_18: mayaṃ pañcasatāna”nti vutte sabbesaṃ vacanaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya paṇṇe āropesi.
atk-s0502a0:1618_0: Tena ca samayena tasmiṃ nagare atiduggatabhāveneva “mahāduggato”ti paññāto eko puriso atthi.
atk-s0502a0:1618_8: mayhaṃ pana sve yāguatthāya taṇḍulanāḷimattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1618_12: Tasmā so tena “natthī”ti vuttepi tuṇhībhūto ahutvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1618_14: imasmiṃ nagare subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhumavatthaṃ nivāsetvā nānābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā sirisayane sayamānā bahū janā sampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0502a0:1618_15: tvaṃ pana divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kucchipūraṇamattampi na labhasi,
atk-s0502a0:1618_16: evaṃ santepi ‘ahaṃ pubbe puññaṃ akatattā kiñci na labhāmī’ti na jānāsī”ti? “Jānāmi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1618_19: kiṃ tayā bhatiṃ katvāpi yathābalaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1618_20: So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva saṃvegappatto hutvā “mayhampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṇṇe āropehi,
atk-s0502a0:1618_21: kiñcideva bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1618_22: Itaro “kiṃ ekena bhikkhunā paṇṇe āropitenā”ti na āropesi?
atk-s0502a0:1618_30: mayaṃ pubbepi kiñci adatvā idāni duggatā jātā,
atk-s0502a0:1618_31: mayaṃ ubhopi bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a0:1618_32: sāmī”ti vatvā ubhopi gehā nikkhamitvā bhatiṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1619_6: “Tena hi mayaṃ sve dve tīṇi bhikkhusatāni bhojessāma, ehi,
atk-s0502a0:1619_8: Mahāduggato daḷhaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahussāhappatto vāsiṃ pahāya pharasuṃ gaṇhanto,
atk-s0502a0:1619_9: pharasuṃ pahāya vāsiṃ gaṇhanto dārūni phāleti.
atk-s0502a0:1619_11: tvaṃ ajja ativiya ussāhappatto kammaṃ karosi,
atk-s0502a0:1619_16: ‘ahaṃ duggato’ti tuṇhībhāvaṃ anāpajjitvā ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī’ti vadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1619_18: kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti pucchitvā “yaṃ tumhe kāressatha,
atk-s0502a0:1619_19: taṃ karomī”ti vutte udukkhalasālaṃ pavesetvā suppamusalādīni dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1619_20: Sā naccantī viya tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vīhiṃ koṭṭeti ceva ophuṇāti ca.
atk-s0502a0:1619_24: imaṃ bhatiṃ katvā mayampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1619_25: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhibhariyāpi tassaṃ “aho vatāyaṃ dukkarakārikā”ti pasīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1619_26: Seṭṭhi mahāduggatassa dārūnaṃ phālitakāle “ayaṃ te bhatī”ti sālīnaṃ catasso nāḷiyo dāpetvā “ayaṃ te tuṭṭhidāyo”ti aparāpi catasso nāḷiyo dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1620_4: Seṭṭhibhariyāpi puna tassā ekaṃ sappikaroṭikañceva dadhibhājanañca kaṭukabhaṇḍañca suddhataṇḍuḷināḷiñca dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1620_5: Iti ca ubhinnampi nava taṇḍulanāḷiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1620_6: Te “deyyadhammo no laddho”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pātova uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1620_9: So antarāpaṇe paṇṇaṃ adisvā nadītīraṃ gantvā “ajja ayyānaṃ bhojanaṃ dātuṃ labhissāmī”ti pahaṭṭhamānaso gāyanto paṇṇaṃ uccinati.
atk-s0502a0:1620_10: Mahājālaṃ khipitvā ṭhito kevaṭṭo “mahāduggatassa saddena bhavitabba”nti taṃ pakkositvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:1620_22: “Ime macche gahetvā pādagghanakāni aḍḍhagghanakāni kahāpaṇagghanakāni ca uddānāni karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1620_24: Baddhabaddhe macche nagaravāsino nimantitanimantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya hariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1620_30: “Tena hi mayā attano atthāya vālukāya nikhaṇitvā cattāro rohitamacchā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0502a0:1620_32: ime gahetvā gacchā”ti te macche tassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1621_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahāduggataṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a0:1621_1: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “mahāduggato ‘ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī’ti bhariyāya saddhiṃ hiyyo
atk-s0502a0:1621_3: kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti cintetvā “manussā paṇṇe āropitasaññāya bhikkhū gahetvā attano attano gehesu nisīdāpessanti,
atk-s0502a0:1621_4: mahāduggato maṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ na labhissatī”ti upadhāresi.
atk-s0502a0:1621_6: Tasmā satthā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā “mahāduggataṃ saṅgaṇhissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1621_7: Mahāduggatepi macche gahetvā gehaṃ pavisante sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1621_9: mahāduggato ‘ekassa bhikkhuno bhikkhaṃ dassāmī’ti attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ bhatiṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1621_10: kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti cintetvā “natthetassa añño bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:1621_11: satthā pana mahāduggatassa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno.
atk-s0502a0:1621_12: Mahāduggato attano upakappanakaṃ yāgubhattaṃ paṇṇasūpeyyampi tathāgatassa dadeyya,
atk-s0502a0:1621_13: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ mahāduggatassa gehaṃ gantvā bhattakārakakammaṃ kareyya”nti aññātakavesena tassa gehasamīpaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1621_14: gantvā “atthi nu kho kassaci kiñci bhatiyā kātabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:1621_21: tuyhaṃ pana kiñci dātabbaṃ bhatiṃ na passāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1621_30: So tassa gehaṃ pavisitvā telataṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:1621_32: Dānaveyyāvaṭikopi paṇṇe āropitaniyāmeneva tesaṃ tesaṃ gehāni bhikkhū pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1622_0: Mahāduggato tassa santikaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ pattabhikkhuṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1622_1: So tasmiṃ khaṇe satiṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ tava bhikkhuṃ pamuṭṭho”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1622_2: Mahāduggato tikhiṇāya sattiyā kucchiyaṃ pahaṭo viya, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1622_4: ahaṃ tayā hiyyo samādapito bhariyāya saddhiṃ divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā ajja pātova paṇṇatthāya nadītīre āhiṇḍitvā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1622_5: dehi me ekaṃ bhikkhu”nti bāhā paggayha paridevi.
atk-s0502a0:1622_11: tayā esa ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhussa bhikkhaṃ dehī’ti samādapito”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1622_13: yo tvaṃ ettake bhikkhū saṃvidahanto etassa ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nādāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1622_14: So tesaṃ vacanena maṅkubhūto taṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:1622_18: manussā paṇṇe āropitaniyāmena attano attano pattabhikkhū nayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1622_19: attano gehe nisinnabhikkhuṃ nīharitvā dento nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1622_20: satthā pana mukhaṃ dhovitvā gandhakuṭiyameva nisinno,
atk-s0502a0:1622_21: rājayuvarājasenāpatiādayo satthu gandhakuṭito nikkhamanaṃ olokentā nisinnā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā ‘gamissāmā’ti.
atk-s0502a0:1623_1: Atha naṃ aññesu divasesu vihāre vighāsādabhāvena diṭṭhattā rājayuvarājādayo,
atk-s0502a0:1623_7: Satthāraṃ pana vandituṃ āgacchāmī”ti vadanto gantvā gandhakuṭiyā ummāre sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1623_11: Satthā gandhakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā pattaṃ nīharitvā tassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1623_14: Satthārā dinnapattañhi koci issariyavasena gahetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1623_17: satthu pattaṃ amhākaṃ dehi ettakaṃ nāma te dhanaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a0:1623_23: Avasesā taṃ yācitvā pattaṃ alabhitvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1623_24: Rājā pana “mahāduggato dhanena palobhiyamānopi satthu pattaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a0:1623_25: satthārā ca sayaṃ dinnapattaṃ koci gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:1623_27: iminā deyyadhammassa dinnakāle satthāraṃ ādāya gehaṃ netvā mayhaṃ sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1623_28: Sakkopi devarājā yāgukhajjakabhattasūpeyyapaṇṇādīni sampādetvā satthu nisīdanārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1624_4: Buddhā ca nāma gehaṃ pavisantā na onamitvā pavisanti.
atk-s0502a0:1624_5: Gehañhi pavisanakāle mahāpathavī vā heṭṭhā ogacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1624_8: Puna nikkhamitvā gatakāle sabbaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1624_9: Tasmā satthā ṭhitakova gehaṃ pavisitvā sakkena paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1624_12: tayā amhākaṃ yācantānampi satthu patto na dinno,
atk-s0502a0:1624_19: iminā deyyadhamme dinne satthāraṃ gehaṃ netvā attano sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī’ti cintetvā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1624_23: Sakkopi satthāraṃ yāguādīni datvā sakkaccaṃ parivisi.
atk-s0502a0:1624_24: Satthāpi katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1625_2: Sakko nivattitvā mahāduggatassa gehadvāre ṭhito ākāsaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a0:1625_3: Tāvadeva ākāsato sattaratanavassaṃ vassitvā tassa gehe sabbabhājanāni pūretvā sakalaṃ gehaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a0:1625_5: Tassa bhariyā dārake hatthesu gahetvā nīharitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1625_6: So satthāraṃ anugantvā nivatto dārake bahi disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi. “Sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1625_7: sakalaṃ no gehaṃ sattahi ratanehi puṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1625_9: So “ajjeva me dānena vipāko dinno”ti cintetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā,
atk-s0502a0:1625_14: ajjeva matthakaṃ patta”nti cintetvā taṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:1625_17: Rājā sakaṭasahassaṃ pesetvā dhanaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe okirāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1625_19: Rājā nagare sannipātāpetvā “imasmiṃ nagare atthi kassaci ettakaṃ dhana”nti pucchi. “Natthi, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1625_22: Rājā tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1626_0: Athassa pubbe ekassa seṭṭhino gehaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā “ettha jāte gacche harāpetvā gehaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1626_1: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhetvā samaṃ katvā bhūmiyā khaññamānāya aññamaññaṃ āhacca nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1626_4: So gehaṃ kāretvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1626_5: Tato parampi yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanto puññāni karitvā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0502a0:1627_0: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule
atk-s0502a0:1627_2: Athassā mātāpitaro gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1627_3: Tassā aparena samayena evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji –
atk-s0502a0:1627_4: “aho vatāhaṃ dhammadesanāpatiṃ ādiṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ rohitamaccharasena dānaṃ datvā kāsāyāni
atk-s0502a0:1627_5: vatthāni nivāsetvā āsanapariyante nisinnā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1627_8: Athassā tato aparesupi sattasu maṅgalesu rohitamaccharaseneva dhammasenāpatittherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni bhojesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1627_10: Ayamassa pana mahāduggatakāle dinnassa rohitamaccharasadānasseva nissando.
atk-s0502a0:1627_12: dāsassa vo sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti mātarā vutte thero āha –
atk-s0502a0:1627_14: imassa dārakassa kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe jaḷā eḷamūgāpi paṇḍitā jātā,
atk-s0502a0:1627_15: tasmā me puttassa paṇḍitotveva nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1627_17: Jātadivasato paṭṭhāya panassa “nāhaṃ mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti mātu cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:1627_20: ‘ahaṃ tava ajjhāsayaṃ na bhindissāmicceva manaṃ uppādesi”’nti vatvā theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1627_22: ahaṃ imaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā ñātake sannipātāpetvā “mama puttassa gihikāle
atk-s0502a0:1627_23: kattabbasakkāraṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā taṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā “imaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1628_1: tumhākaṃ ovāda”nti vutte “tena hi ehī”ti kese temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:1628_2: Mātāpitaropissa sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva vasantā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa rohitamaccharaseneva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1628_3: Thero aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:1628_6: Na tāvassa pattacīvaraggahaṇāni vā iriyāpatho vā pāsādiko hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1628_8: Thero hi bhikkhusaṅghe antogāmaṃ paviṭṭhe sakalavihāraṃ vicaranto asammajjanaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tucchabhājanesu
atk-s0502a0:1628_9: pānīyaparibhojanīyāni upaṭṭhapetvā dunnikkhittāni mañcapīṭhādīni paṭisāmetvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0502a0:1628_10: Apica “aññatitthiyā tucchavihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘passatha samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānānī’ti
atk-s0502a0:1628_11: vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti sakalavihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0502a0:1628_12: Tasmā taṃ divasampi sāmaṇerena pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā divātaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1629_0: Sāmaṇero upajjhāyena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge mātikaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1629_5: “Ito cito ca udakaṃ āharitvā attano sassakammaṃ sampādentī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1629_13: “sace evarūpampi acittakaṃ attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1629_14: kasmā sacittakāpi cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1629_15: Atheso purato gacchanto usukāre saradaṇḍakaṃ aggimhi tāpetvā akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā ujukaṃ karonte disvā, “ime, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1629_23: “sace acittakaṃ gahetvā aggimhi tāpetvā ujuṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:1629_24: kasmā sacittakāpi attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1629_25: Atheso purato gacchanto dārūni araneminābhiādīni tacchante disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1629_35: kasmā sacittakā attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1629_39: Thero “ayaṃ adhunā pabbajito daharasāmaṇero maṃ anubandhamāno evaṃ vadetī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvāva “āhara,
atk-s0502a0:1630_1: mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharanto rohitamaccharaseneva āhareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1630_3: attano puññena alabhantā mama puññena labhissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1630_4: Thero “daharasāmaṇerassa bahi nisinnakassa paripanthopi bhaveyyā”ti kuñjikaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ vasanagabbhassa
atk-s0502a0:1630_5: dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā nisīdeyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1630_6: So tathā katvā attano karajakāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā attabhāvaṃ sammasanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1630_7: Athassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1630_8: So “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti upadhārento “paṇḍitasāmaṇero upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a0:1630_9: mayāpi tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje āmantetvā “vihārassa upavane vasante sakuṇe
atk-s0502a0:1630_10: palāpetvā samantato ārakkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā candadevaputtaṃ “candamaṇḍalaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāhī”ti,
atk-s0502a0:1630_11: sūriyadevaputtaṃ “sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā sayaṃ gantvā āviñchanarajjuṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0502a0:1630_14: So antarābhatteyeva attabhāvaṃ sammasitvā tīṇi phalāni pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1631_1: tassa upakappanakaṃ bhojanaṃ asukakule nāma sakkā laddhu”nti ekaṃ pemagāravayuttaṃ upaṭṭhākakulaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1631_2: Tattha ca manussā taṃ divasaṃ rohitamacche labhitvā therasseva āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1631_4: bhaddakaṃ vo kataṃ idhāgacchantehī”ti antogehe pavesetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā rohitamaccharasenassa piṇḍapātaṃ adaṃsu.

atk-s0502a0:1719_17: Te loketi imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā nāma arahattapattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena,
atk-s0502a0:1719_18: carimacittanirodhena khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā,
atk-s0502a0:1719_19: anupādāno viya padīpo apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:1726_0: Gataddhinoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jīvakambavane viharanto jīvakena puṭṭhapañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1727_0: Ekasmiṃ pana samaye devadatto ajātasattunā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā gijjhakūṭaṃ abhiruhitvā paduṭṭhacitto “satthāraṃ vadhissāmī”ti silaṃ pavijjhi.
atk-s0502a0:1727_2: Tato bhijjitvā gatā papaṭikā bhagavato pādaṃ paharitvā lohitaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0502a0:1727_5: Satthā tatopi jīvakambavanaṃ gantukāmo “tattha maṃ nethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1727_7: Jīvako taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vaṇapaṭikammatthāya tikhiṇabhesajjaṃ datvā vaṇaṃ bandhitvā satthāraṃ etadavoca – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1727_8: mayā antonagare ekassa manussassa bhesajjaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1727_10: idaṃ bhesajjaṃ yāva mamāgamanā baddhaniyāmeneva tiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1727_11: So gantvā tassa purisassa kattabbakiccaṃ katvā dvārapidahanavelāya āgacchanto dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:1727_14: yvāhaṃ aññatarassa purisassa viya tathāgatassa pāde tikhiṇabhesajjaṃ datvā vaṇaṃ bandhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1727_16: tasmiṃ amuccamāne sabbarattiṃ bhagavato sarīre pariḷāho uppajjissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1727_18: jīvako sāyaṃ āgacchanto dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:1727_23: Jīvako antoaruṇeyeva satthu santikaṃ vegena āgantvā “kiṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1727_26: bodhimaṇḍeyeva sabbapariḷāho vūpasanto”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1731_0: Tattha gataddhinoti gatamaggassa kantāraddhā vaṭṭaddhāti dve addhā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:1731_1: Tesu kantārapaṭipanno yāva icchitaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0502a0:1731_3: etasmiṃ pana patte gataddhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1731_8: vaṭṭaṃ pana khepetvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo gataddhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:1731_13: Pariḷāho na vijjatīti duvidho pariḷāho kāyiko cetasiko cāti.
atk-s0502a0:1731_14: Tesu khīṇāsavassa sītuṇhādivasena uppannattā kāyikapariḷāho anibbutova,
atk-s0502a0:1731_16: Satthā pana dhammarājatāya desanāvidhikusalatāya cetasikapariḷāhavasena desanaṃ vinivattento, “jīvaka,
atk-s0502a0:1731_17: paramatthena evarūpassa khīṇāsavassa pariḷāho na vijjatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1735_0: Uyyuñjantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1736_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā rājagahe vuṭṭhavasso “addhamāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1736_1: Vattaṃ kiretaṃ buddhānaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caritukāmānaṃ “evaṃ bhikkhū attano pattapacanacīvararajanādīni
atk-s0502a0:1736_2: katvā sukhaṃ gamissantī”ti “idāni addhamāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1736_3: Bhikkhūsu pana attano pattacīvarādīni karontesu mahākassapattheropi cīvarāni dhovi.
atk-s0502a0:1736_5: imasmiṃ nagare anto ca bahi ca aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasanti.
atk-s0502a0:1736_10: Te therassa catūhi paccayehi sammānasakkāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a0:1736_11: Ettakaṃ upakāraṃ pahāya esa kahaṃ gamissati?
atk-s0502a0:1736_14: Satthā kira yaṃ kandaraṃ patvā nivattetabbayuttake bhikkhū “tumhe ito nivattatha,
atk-s0502a0:1737_1: “imasmiṃ nagare anto ca bahi ca aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasanti.
atk-s0502a0:1737_5: Athassa etadahosi –“kassapassa hete manussā ñātakā ca upaṭṭhākā ca,
atk-s0502a0:1737_13: nanu idāneva amhehi vuttaṃ ‘mahākassapo kasmā cīvarāni dhovati,
atk-s0502a0:1737_17: Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā nivattitvā ṭhito āha –
atk-s0502a0:1737_24: tumhe kassapaṃ ‘kulesu ca paccayesu ca laggo’ti vadetha,
atk-s0502a0:1737_26: Eso hi pubbe patthanaṃ karontoyeva ‘catūsu paccayesu alaggo candūpamo hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ samattho bhaveyya’nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1737_27: Natthetassa kule vā paccaye vā laggo,
atk-s0502a0:1737_28: ahaṃ candopamappaṭipadañceva ariyavaṃsappaṭipadañca kathento mama puttaṃ kassapaṃ ādiṃ katvā kathesi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1738_7: ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādī”ti vatvā padumuttarapādamūle tena ṭhapitapatthanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1738_8: ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ therassa pubbacaritaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1738_10: Satthā pana imaṃ therassa pubbacaritaṃ vitthāretvā “iti kho,
atk-s0502a0:1738_12: ahaṃ candopamappaṭipadañceva ariyavaṃsappaṭipadañca mama puttaṃ kassapaṃ ādiṃ katvā kathesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1738_13: mama puttassa kassapassa paccayesu vā kulesu vā vihāresu vā pariveṇesu vā laggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1738_14: pallale otaritvā tattha caritvā gacchanto rājahaṃso viya katthaci alaggoyeva mama putto”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1741_0: Haṃsāva pallalaṃ hitvā, okamokaṃ jahanti te”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1742_0: Tattha uyyuñjanti satīmantoti sativepullappattā khīṇāsavā attanā paṭividdhaguṇesu jhānavipassanādīsu
atk-s0502a0:1742_2: Na nikete ramanti teti tesaṃ ālaye rati nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:1742_5: yathā gocarasampanne pallale sakuṇā attano gocaraṃ gahetvā gamanakāle “mama udakaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1742_8: mama kaṇṇikā”ti tasmiṃ ṭhāne kañci ālayaṃ akatvā anapekkhāva taṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya uppatitvā ākāse kīḷamānā gacchanti;
atk-s0502a0:1742_9: evamevaṃ khīṇāsavā yattha katthaci viharantāpi kulādīsu alaggā eva viharitvā gamanasamayepi taṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya gacchantā “mama vihāro,
atk-s0502a0:1746_0: Yesaṃ sannicayo natthīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1747_0: So kirāyasmā antogāme ekaṃ vīthiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā puna aparaṃ vīthiṃ caritvā sukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1747_1: kūraṃ ādāya vihāraṃ haritvā paṭisāmetvā “nibaddhaṃ piṇḍapātapariyesanaṃ nāma dukkha”nti katipāhaṃ jhānasukhena
atk-s0502a0:1747_2: vītināmetvā āhārena atthe sati taṃ paribhuñjati.
atk-s0502a0:1747_3: Bhikkhū ñatvā ujjhāyitvā tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1747_4: Satthā etasmiṃ nidāne āyatiṃ sannidhikāraparivajjanatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvāpi therena
atk-s0502a0:1747_5: pana apaññatte sikkhāpade appicchataṃ nissāya katattā tassa dosābhāvaṃ pakāsento anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a0:1750_0: Suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro;
atk-s0502a0:1752_5: Tattha vihāre vasantassa bhikkhuno ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1752_12: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena pana bhojanassa parijānanaṃ tīraṇapariññā,
atk-s0502a0:1752_15: Suññato animitto cāti ettha appaṇihitavimokkhopi gahitoyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1752_22: tehi ca vimuttanti appaṇihito vimokkhoti vuccati.
atk-s0502a0:1752_23: Phalasamāpattivasena taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharantānaṃ ayaṃ tividho vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro.
atk-s0502a0:1752_24: Gati tesaṃ durannayāti yathā nāma ākāsena gatānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ padanikkhepassa adassanena gati durannayā na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1752_25: evameva yesaṃ ayaṃ duvidho sannicayo natthi,
atk-s0502a0:1752_32: nava sattāvāsāti imesu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu iminā nāma gatāti gamanassa apaññāyanato gati durannayā na sakkā paññāpetunti.
atk-s0502a0:1756_0: Yassāsavāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1757_0: Ekasmiñhi divase thero jiṇṇacīvaro saṅkārakūṭādīsu cīvaraṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0502a0:1757_1: Tassa ito tatiye attabhāve purāṇadutiyikā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā jālinī nāma devadhītā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:1757_2: Sā theraṃ coḷakāni pariyesamānaṃ disvā therassa atthāya terasahatthāyatāni catuhatthavitthatāni tīṇi
atk-s0502a0:1757_3: dibbadussāni gahetvā “sacāhaṃ imāni iminā nīhārena dassāmi,
atk-s0502a0:1757_4: thero na gaṇhissatī”ti cintetvā tassa coḷakāni pariyesamānassa purato ekasmiṃ saṅkārakūṭe yathā nesaṃ dasantamattameva paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:1757_6: Thero tena maggena coḷakapariyesamānaṃ caranto nesaṃ dasantaṃ disvā tattheva gahetvā ākaḍḍhamāno vuttappamāṇāni
atk-s0502a0:1757_7: dibbadussāni disvā “ukkaṭṭhapaṃsukūlaṃ vata ida”nti ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:1757_8: Athassa cīvarakaraṇadivase satthā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro vihāraṃ gantvā nisīdi,
atk-s0502a0:1758_0: Devadhītāpi antogāmaṃ pavisitvā “bhontā ayyassa no anuruddhattherassa cīvaraṃ karonto satthā asītimahāsāvakaparivuto
atk-s0502a0:1758_2: yāguādīni ādāya vihāraṃ gacchathā”ti bhikkhaṃ samādapesi.
atk-s0502a0:1758_8: Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kiṃ evaṃbahukehi yāguādīhi,
atk-s0502a0:1758_9: nanu nāma pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā ettakaṃ nāma āharathā”ti ñātakā ca upaṭṭhākā ca vattabbā siyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1758_10: anuruddhatthero attano ñātiupaṭṭhākānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ ñāpetukāmo maññe”ti,
atk-s0502a0:1758_20: Na hi khīṇāsavā paccayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0502a0:1758_21: ayaṃ pana piṇḍapāto devatānubhāvena nibbatto”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1761_0: Suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro;
atk-s0502a0:1763_0: Tattha yassāsavāti yassa cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā.
atk-s0502a0:1763_1: Āhāre ca anissitoti āhārasmiñca taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito.
atk-s0502a0:1763_2: Padaṃ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pādehi akkamitvā gatā,
atk-s0502a0:1763_7: tiracchānayonipadena vā”tiādinā nayena padaṃ paññāpetuṃ nāma na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:1767_0: Yassindriyānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto mahākaccāyanattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1768_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā mahāpavāraṇāya migāramātuyā pāsādassa heṭṭhā mahāsāvakaparivuto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1768_2: So panāyasmā dūratopi āgantvā dhammassavanaṃ paggaṇhātiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:1768_3: Tasmā mahātherā nisīdantā mahākaccāyanattherassa āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1768_4: Sakko devarājā dvīhi devalokehi devaparisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā dibbagandhamālādīhi satthāraṃ pūjetvā ṭhito mahākaccāyanattheraṃ adisvā kiṃ nu kho mama, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:1768_7: Theropi taṃ khaṇaññeva āgantvā attano āsane nisinnameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:1768_8: Sakko theraṃ disvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā “sādhu vata me, ayyo, āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1768_9: ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā ubhohi hatthehi pāde sambāhitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1768_12: avasesamahāsāvakānaṃ evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ akaritvā mahākaccāyanaṃ disvā vegena gopphakesu gahetvā ‘sādhu vata me, ayyo, āgato,
atk-s0502a0:1768_13: ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī’ti vatvā ubhohi hatthehi pāde sambāhitvā pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1768_16: mama puttena mahākaccāyanena sadisā indriyesu guttadvārā bhikkhū devānampi manussānampi piyāyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a0:1768_17: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1774_1: yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0502a0:1774_2: tassa navavidhaṃ mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa.
atk-s0502a0:1778_0: Pathavisamoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1779_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmā sāriputto vuṭṭhavasso cārikaṃ pakkamitukāmo bhagavantaṃ āpucchitvā vanditvā attano parivārena saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:1779_2: Thero ca nāmagottavasena paññāyamāne bhikkhū nāmagottavasena kathetvā nivattāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:1779_4: “aho vata mampi nāmagottavasena paggaṇhanto kathetvā nivattāpeyyā”ti thero mahābhikkhusaṅghassa antare taṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a0:1779_5: So “aññe viya bhikkhū na maṃ paggaṇhātī”ti there āghātaṃ bandhi.
atk-s0502a0:1779_6: Therassapi saṅghāṭikaṇṇo tassa bhikkhuno sarīraṃ phusi,
atk-s0502a0:1779_8: So “dāni thero vihārūpacāraṃ atikkanto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “āyasmā maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1779_9: sāriputto tumhākaṃ aggasāvakomhīti kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ bhindanto viya paharitvā akhamāpetvāva cārikaṃ pakkanto”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1780_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmoggallānatthero ca ānandatthero ca cintesuṃ –
atk-s0502a0:1780_1: “amhākaṃ aggajeṭṭhabhātarā imassa bhikkhuno apahaṭabhāvaṃ satthā no na jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:1780_2: sīhanādaṃ pana nadāpetukāmo bhavissatīti parisaṃ sannipātāpessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1780_5: idānāyasmā sāriputto bhagavato sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1780_8: Thero “nāyaṃ bhikkhu mayā pahaṭo”ti avatvāva attano guṇakathaṃ kathento “yassa nūna, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1780_10: so idha aññataraṃ sabrahmacāriṃ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṃ pakkameyyā”ti vatvā “seyyathāpi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1780_12: asucimpi nikkhipantī”tiādinā nayena attano pathavīsamacittatañca āpotejovāyo rajoharaṇacaṇḍālakumārakausabhachinnavisāṇasamacittatañca
atk-s0502a0:1780_13: ahikuṇapādīhi viya attano kāyena aṭṭiyanañca medakathālikā viya attano kāyapariharaṇañca pakāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:1780_14: Imāhi ca pana navahi upamāhi there attano guṇe kathente navasupi ṭhānesu udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi.
atk-s0502a0:1780_15: Rajoharaṇacaṇḍālakumārakamedakathāliko pamānaṃ pana āharaṇakāle puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1781_0: There attano guṇaṃ kathenteyeva abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno sakalasarīre ḍāho uppajji,
atk-s0502a0:1781_1: so tāvadeva bhagavato pādesu patitvā attano abbhācikkhanadosaṃ pakāsetvā accayaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:1781_5: yāvassa sattadhā muddhā na phalatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:1781_6: Thero ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “khamāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1781_12: evarūpassa nāma musāvādena abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno upari appamattakampi kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā akatvā
atk-s0502a0:1781_13: sayameva ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha khamāpetī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1781_19: sakkā sāriputtasadisānaṃ kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā uppādetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1781_22: indakhīlasadisaṃ pasannaudakarahadasadisañca sāriputtassa citta”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1787_2: yathā nāma pathaviyaṃ sucīni gandhamālādīnipi nikkhipanti,

atk-s0502a0:1965_14: So asiṃ bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā tassa pādamūle urena nipajjitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1965_16: amhe dūratova disvā sahassamattāpi manussā pavedhanti,
atk-s0502a0:1965_17: dve tisso kathā kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0502a0:1965_19: ukkāmukhe suvaṇṇaṃ viya supupphitakaṇikāraṃ viya ca te mukhaṃ virocati,
atk-s0502a0:1965_20: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1966_0: “Tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
atk-s0502a0:1968_0: Sāmaṇero jhānā vuṭṭhāya tassa dhammaṃ desento,
atk-s0502a0:1968_2: khīṇāsavassa attabhāvo nāma sīse ṭhapitabhāro viya hoti,
atk-s0502a0:1968_3: so tasmiṃ bhijjante vā nassante vā tussateva,
atk-s0502a0:1968_4: na bhāyatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:1972_0: Na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:1973_0: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā pañca corasatāni oloketvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:1973_7: tātā”ti tato pañcasatāpi corā sāmaṇeraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1973_8: So tesaṃ asidhārāhi eva kese ceva vatthadasā ca chinditvā tambamattikāya rajitvā tāni kāsāyāni acchādāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:1973_9: dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā te ādāya gacchanto cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1973_12: Corānañhi maṃ gahetvā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya tesu ekopi assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:1973_14: no’ti cintentānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhimukhaṃ na bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:1973_16: So pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro tattha gantvā attano dassanena paṭiladdhaassāsehi tehi “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1973_19: ime maṃ māretukāmā hutvā māretuṃ asakkontā mama guṇe pasīditvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0502a0:1973_22: ahaṃ satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti te bhikkhū vanditvā itare ādāya upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ saṃkicca,
atk-s0502a0:1973_27: “sādhū”ti theraṃ vanditvā te ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārāpi “kiṃ saṃkicca,
atk-s0502a0:1973_34: tumhākaṃ corakammaṃ katvā dussīle patiṭṭhāya vassasataṃ jīvanato idāni sīle patiṭṭhāya ekadivasampi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1973_35: seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1977_1: Sīlavantassāti dussīlassa vassasataṃ jīvanato sīlavantassa dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino ekadivasampi ekamuhuttampi jīvitaṃ seyyo,
atk-s0502a0:1978_0: Desanāvasāne te pañcasatāpi bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:1979_0: Aparena samayena saṃkicco upasampadaṃ labhitvā dasavasso hutvā sāmaṇeraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:1979_1: So pana tasseva bhāgineyyo adhimuttasāmaṇero nāma.
atk-s0502a0:1979_2: Atha naṃ thero paripuṇṇavassakāle āmantetvā “upasampadaṃ te karissāmi, gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:1979_3: ñātakānaṃ santike vassaparimāṇaṃ pucchitvā ehī”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:1979_4: So mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge pañcasatehi corehi balikammatthāya māriyamāno tesaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1979_5: desetvā pasannacittehi tehi “na te imasmiṃ ṭhāne amhākaṃ atthibhāvo kassaci ārocetabbo”ti vissaṭṭho paṭipathe
atk-s0502a0:1979_6: mātāpitaro āgacchante disvā tameva maggaṃ paṭipajjantānampi tesaṃ saccamanurakkhanto nārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1979_7: Tesaṃ corehi viheṭhiyamānānaṃ “tvampi corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā maññe,
atk-s0502a0:1979_8: amhākaṃ nārocesī”ti paridevantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā te mātāpitūnampi anārocitabhāvaṃ ñatvā pasannacittā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1979_9: Sopi saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya te sabbe pabbājetvā upajjhāyassa santikaṃ ānetvā tena satthu santikaṃ pesito gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1979_12: bhante”ti vutte purimanayeneva anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imameva gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1985_0: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto khāṇukoṇḍaññattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1986_0: So kira thero satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto arahattaṃ patvā “satthu ārocessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a0:1986_1: tato āgacchanto antarāmagge kilanto maggā okkamma ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno jhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0502a0:1986_2: Athekaṃ gāmaṃ vilumpitvā pañcasatā corā attano balānurūpena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā sīsenādāya gacchantā dūraṃ gantvā kilantarūpā “dūraṃ āgatāmha,
atk-s0502a0:1986_3: imasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe vissamissāmā”ti maggā okkamma piṭṭhipāsāṇassa santikaṃ gantvā theraṃ disvāpi “khāṇuko aya”nti saññino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1986_4: Atheko coro therassa sīse bhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a0:1986_6: Evaṃ pañcasatāpi corā pañcahi bhaṇḍikasatehi theraṃ parikkhipitvā sayampi nisinnā niddāyitvā aruṇuggamanakāle
atk-s0502a0:1986_7: pabujjhitvā attano attano bhaṇḍikaṃ gaṇhantā theraṃ disvā “amanusso”ti saññāya palāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1986_12: mayaṃ khāṇukasaññino ahumhā”ti theraṃ khamāpetvā corajeṭṭhakena “ahaṃ ayyassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a0:1986_13: vutte sesā “mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā sabbepi ekacchandā hutvā theraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1986_14: Thero saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya sabbepi te pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:1986_16: So tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā “kiṃ, koṇḍañña,
atk-s0502a0:1986_17: antevāsikā te laddhā”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1986_20: na no aññassa evarūpo ānubhāvo diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0502a0:1986_23: evarūpe duppaññakamme patiṭṭhāya vassasataṃ jīvanato idāni vo paññāsampadāya vattamānānaṃ ekāhampi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1986_24: seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:1990_0: Tattha duppañño nippañño. Paññavantassāti sappaññassa. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a0:1991_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1994_0: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sappadāsattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1995_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado aparena samayena ukkaṇṭhitvā
atk-s0502a0:1995_2: pabbajjāya ṭhatvā maraṇamhi me seyyo”ti cintetvā attano maraṇūpāyaṃ cintento vicarati.
atk-s0502a0:1995_3: Athekadivasaṃ pātova katabhattakiccā bhikkhū vihāraṃ gantvā aggisālāya sappaṃ disvā taṃ ekasmiṃ kuṭe
atk-s0502a0:1995_4: pakkhipitvā kuṭaṃ pidahitvā ādāya vihārā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:1995_5: Ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhupi bhattakiccaṃ katvā āgacchanto te bhikkhū disvā “kiṃ idaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:1995_9: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “iminā attānaṃ ḍaṃsāpetvā marissāmī”ti “āharatha,
atk-s0502a0:1995_10: ahaṃ taṃ chaḍḍessāmī”ti tesaṃ hatthato kuṭaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinno tena sappena attānaṃ ḍaṃsāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:1995_12: So kuṭe hatthaṃ otāretvā ito cito ca āloleti,
atk-s0502a0:1995_16: gharasappo eso”ti taṃ pahāya vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:1995_22: mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā susuyanto dukkhena amhehi gahito,
atk-s0502a0:1995_23: kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ tvaṃ vadesī”ti āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:1995_24: tena attānaṃ ḍaṃsāpentopi mukhe aṅguliṃ pakkhipentopi taṃ ḍaṃsāpetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1996_0: Athekadivasaṃ nhāpito dve tayo khure ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā ekaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ekena bhikkhūnaṃ kese ohāreti.
atk-s0502a0:1996_1: So bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ khuraṃ gahetvā “iminā gīvaṃ chinditvā marissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ rukkhe gīvaṃ upanidhāya
atk-s0502a0:1996_2: khuradhāraṃ galanāḷiyaṃ katvā ṭhito upasampadāmāḷato paṭṭhāya attano sīlaṃ āvajjento vimalacandamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0502a0:1996_3: viya sudhotamaṇikhandhamiva ca nimmalaṃ sīlaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:1996_4: Tassa taṃ olokentassa sakalasarīraṃ pharantī pīti uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:1996_5: So pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā khuraṃ ādāya vihāramajjhaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:1996_8: “‘Iminā khurena galanāḷiṃ chinditvā marissāmī’ti gatomhi, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1996_11: Ahañhi “iminā khurena galanāḷiṃ chindissāmī”ti ñāṇakhurena sabbakilese chindinti.
atk-s0502a0:1996_12: Bhikkhū “ayaṃ abhūtena aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:1996_15: khīṇāsavā nāma sahatthā attānaṃ jīvitā voropentī”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1996_18: kimassa arahattūpanissayakāraṇaṃ “kasmā so sappo etaṃ na ḍaṃsatī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:1996_20: so tāva sappo imassa ito tatiye attabhāve dāso ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:1996_21: so attano sāmikassa sarīraṃ ḍaṃsituṃ na visahatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:1996_22: Evaṃ tāva nesaṃ satthā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:1996_23: Tato paṭṭhāya ca so bhikkhu sappadāso nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a0:1997_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kireko kulaputto satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā uppannasaṃvego pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a0:1997_1: aparena samayena anabhiratiyā uppannāya ekassa sahāyakassa bhikkhuno ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:1997_2: So tassa abhiṇhaṃ gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1997_3: Taṃ sutvā itaro sāsane abhiramitvā pubbe anabhiratakāle malaggahite samaṇaparikkhāre ekasmiṃ soṇḍitīre nimmale karonto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:1997_6: uppabbajanto ime parikkhāre tuyhaṃ dātukāmo ahosi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:1997_8: “iminā mayhaṃ pabbajitena vā uppabbajitena vā ko attho,
atk-s0502a0:1997_12: ye mayaṃ kapālahatthā parakulesu bhikkhāya carāma,
atk-s0502a0:1997_13: puttadārehi saddhiṃ ālāpasallāpaṃ na karomā”tiādīni vadanto gihibhāvassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:1997_14: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā puna ukkaṇṭhito hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:1997_15: “ayaṃ mayā ‘ukkaṇṭhitomhī’ti vutte paṭhamaṃ gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ kathetvā idāni abhiṇhaṃ guṇaṃ katheti,
atk-s0502a0:1997_16: ‘kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”’nti cintento “imesu samaṇaparikkhāresu lobhenā”ti ñatvā sayameva attano cittaṃ nivattesi.
atk-s0502a0:1997_17: Evamassa kassapasammāsambuddhakāle ekassa bhikkhuno ukkaṇṭhāpitattā idāni anabhirati uppannā.
atk-s0502a0:1997_18: Yo pana teneva tadā vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammo kato,
atk-s0502a0:1998_0: Imamatthaṃ te bhikkhū bhagavato santikā sutvā uttariṃ pucchiṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:1998_1: ayaṃ kira bhikkhu khuradhāraṃ galanāḷiyaṃ katvā ṭhitova arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0502a0:1998_2: uppajjissati nu kho ettakena khaṇena arahattamaggo”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0502a0:1998_4: āraddhavīriyassa bhikkhuno pādaṃ ukkhipitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentassa pāde bhūmiyaṃ asampatteyeva arahattamaggo uppajjati.
atk-s0502a0:1998_5: Kusītassa puggalassa hi vassasataṃ jīvanato āraddhavīriyassa khaṇamattampi jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2002_0: Tattha kusītoti kāmavitakkādīhi tīhi vitakkehi vītināmento puggalo.
atk-s0502a0:2002_2: Vīriyamārabhato daḷhanti duvidhajjhānanibbattanasamatthaṃ thiraṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhantassa.
atk-s0502a0:2006_0: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṭācāraṃ theriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_0: Sā kira sāvatthiyaṃ cattālīsakoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi abhirūpā.
atk-s0502a0:2007_1: Taṃ soḷasavassuddesikakāle sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatale rakkhantā vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2007_2: Evaṃ santepi sā ekena attano cūḷūpaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji.
atk-s0502a0:2007_3: Athassā mātāpitaro samajātikakule ekassa kumārassa paṭissuṇitvā vivāhadivasaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2007_4: Tasmiṃ upakaṭṭhe sā taṃ cūḷūpaṭṭhākaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:2007_6: mayi patikulaṃ gate mama paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgatopi tattha pavesanaṃ na labhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:2007_8: idāneva maṃ gahetvā yena vā tena vā palāyassū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2007_11: “Tena hi ahaṃ sve pātova nagaradvārassa asukaṭṭhāne nāma ṭhassāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2007_12: tvaṃ ekena upāyena nikkhamitvā tattha āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā dutiyadivase saṅketaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_13: Sāpi pātova kiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā kese vikkiritvā kuṇḍakena sarīraṃ makkhitvā kuṭaṃ ādāya dāsīhi
atk-s0502a0:2007_14: saddhiṃ gacchantī viya gharā nikkhamitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_15: So taṃ ādāya dūraṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ gāme nivāsaṃ kappetvā araññe khettaṃ kasitvā dārupaṇṇādīni āharati.
atk-s0502a0:2007_16: Itarā kuṭena udakaṃ āharitvā sahatthā koṭṭanapacanādīni karontī attano pāpassa phalaṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0502a0:2007_18: Sā paripuṇṇagabbhā “idha me koci upakārako natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2007_21: tattha me gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti sāmikaṃ yāci. So “kiṃ, bhadde, kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:2007_22: maṃ disvā tava mātāpitaro vividhā kammakāraṇā kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2007_23: na sakkā mayā tattha gantu”nti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_24: Sā punappunaṃ yācitvāpi gamanaṃ alabhamānā tassa araññaṃ gatakāle paṭivissake āmantetvā “sace so āgantvā maṃ apassanto ‘kahaṃ gatā’ti pucchissati,
atk-s0502a0:2007_25: mama attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ācikkheyyāthā”ti vatvā gehadvāraṃ pidahitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_26: Sopi āgantvā taṃ apassanto paṭivissake pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nivattessāmi na”nti anubandhitvā
atk-s0502a0:2007_27: taṃ disvā nānappakāraṃ yāciyamānopi nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:2007_30: kammajavātā me calitā”ti vatvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā samparivattamānā kicchena dārakaṃ vijāyitvā “yassatthāyāhaṃ kulagharaṃ gaccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2007_31: so attho nipphanno”ti punadeva tena saddhiṃ gehaṃ āgantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a0:2008_0: Tassā aparena samayena puna gabbho patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:2008_1: Sā paripuṇṇagabbhā hutvā purimanayeneva sāmikaṃ yācitvā gamanaṃ alabhamānā puttaṃ aṅkenādāya tatheva
atk-s0502a0:2008_2: pakkamitvā tena anubandhitvā “tiṭṭhāhī”ti vutte nivattituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a0:2008_3: Atha nesaṃ gacchantānaṃ mahā akālamegho udapādi samantā vijjulatāhi ādittaṃ viya meghatthanitehi,
atk-s0502a0:2008_10: So hatthagatāya vāsiyā ito cito ca upadhārento ekasmiṃ vammikamatthake jātaṃ gumbaṃ disvā chindituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:2008_11: Atha naṃ vammikato nikkhamitvā ghoraviso āsīviso ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0502a0:2008_12: Taṅkhaṇaññevassa sarīraṃ antosamuṭṭhitāhi aggijālāhi ḍayhamānaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇaṃ hutvā tattheva pati.
atk-s0502a0:2008_13: Itarāpi mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamānā tassa āgamanaṃ olokentīpi taṃ adisvāva aparampi puttaṃ vijāyi.

atk-s0502a0:2065_10: Pārupanassa hi abhāvena na sakkā amhehi ekato gantu”nti. Brāhmaṇī, “sāmi,

atk-s0502a0:2065_13: Athassa sarīraṃ pharamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.

atk-s0502a0:2066_24: hatthī cattāro asse cattāri kahāpaṇasahassāni catasso itthiyo catasso dāsiyo cattāro purise caturo gāmavare”ti
atk-s0502a0:2066_25: evaṃ yāva sabbasatā cattāri cattāri katvā sabbacatukkaṃ nāma assa dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2067_3: idāni katena kalyāṇakammena ajjameva vipāko dinno”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2067_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,

atk-s0502a0:2067_13: Kalyāṇakammaṃ karontena hi uppannaṃ cittaṃ ahāpetvā taṅkhaṇaññeva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2067_14: Dandhaṃ kataṃ kusalañhi sampattiṃ dadamānaṃ dandhameva dadāti,

atk-s0502a0:2070_0: Dandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2071_0: Tattha abhittharethāti turitaturitaṃ sīghasīghaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2071_1: Gihinā vā hi “salākabhattadānādīsu kiñcideva kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti citte uppanne yathā aññe okāsaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0502a0:2071_4: Pabbajitena vā upajjhāyavattādīni karontena aññassa okāsaṃ adatvā “ahaṃ pure,
atk-s0502a0:2071_6: Pāpā cittanti kāyaduccaritādipāpakammato vā akusalacittuppādato vā sabbathāmena cittaṃ nivāraye.

atk-s0502a0:2071_9: no”ti evaṃ cikkhallamaggena gacchanto viya dandhaṃ puññaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:2071_10: tassa ekasāṭakassa viya maccherasahassaṃ pāpaṃ okāsaṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a0:2075_0: Pāpañca purisoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto seyyasakattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2076_1: attano anabhiratiṃ tassa ārocetvā tena paṭhamasaṅghādisesakamme samādapito uppannuppannāya anabhiratiyā taṃ kammamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2076_2: Satthā tassa kiriyaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “evaṃ kira tvaṃ karosī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a0:2076_4: ananucchavikaṃ moghapurisā”ti nānappakārato garahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā “evarūpañhi kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammepi
atk-s0502a0:2076_5: samparāyepi dukkhasaṃvattanikameva hotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2078_0: “Pāpañce puriso kayirā, na naṃ kayirā punappunaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2079_0: Na tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, dukkho pāpassa uccayo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2080_2: taṅkhaṇeyeva paccavekkhitvā “idaṃ appatirūpaṃ oḷārika”nti na naṃ kayirā punappunaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2080_3: Yopi tamhi chando vā ruci vā uppajjeyya,
atk-s0502a0:2080_7: Pāpassa hi uccayo vuḍḍhi idhalokepi samparāyepi dukkhameva āvahatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2084_0: Puññañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lājadevadhītaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_0: Āyasmā hi mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharanto jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā sattame divase vuṭṭhāya dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0502a0:2085_1: bhikkhācāraṭṭhānaṃ olokento ekaṃ sālikhettapālikaṃ itthiṃ sālisīsāni gahetvā lāje kurumānaṃ disvā “saddhā nu kho,
atk-s0502a0:2085_2: assaddhā”ti vīmaṃsitvā “saddhā”ti ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho me saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2085_3: no”ti upadhārento “visāradā kuladhītā mama saṅgahaṃ karissati,
atk-s0502a0:2085_4: katvā ca pana mahāsampattiṃ labhissatī”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya sālikhettasamīpeyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_5: Kuladhītā theraṃ disvāva pasannacittā pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā “tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0502a0:2085_6: bhante”ti vatvā lāje ādāya vegena gantvā therassa patte ākiritvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2085_7: tumhehi diṭṭhadhammassa bhāginī assa”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_9: Sāpi theraṃ vanditvā attanā dinnadānaṃ āvajjamānā nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:2085_10: Tāya ca pana kedāramariyādāya gamanamagge ekasmiṃ bile ghoraviso sappo nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:2085_11: So therassa kāsāyapaṭicchannaṃ jaṅghaṃ ḍaṃsituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_12: Itarā dānaṃ āvajjamānā nivattantī taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_13: Sappo bilā nikkhamitvā taṃ ḍaṃsitvā tattheva pātesi.
atk-s0502a0:2085_14: Sā pasannacittena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne suttappabuddhā viya sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitena
atk-s0502a0:2085_16: Sā dvādasayojanikaṃ ekaṃ dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā accharāsahassaparivutā pubbakammapakāsanatthāya
atk-s0502a0:2085_17: suvaṇṇalājabharitena olambakena suvaṇṇasarakena paṭimaṇḍite vimānadvāre ṭhitā attano sampattiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a0:2085_18: “kiṃ nu kho me katvā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti dibbena cakkhunā upadhārentī “ayyassa me mahākassapattherassa
atk-s0502a0:2086_0: Sā evaṃ parittakena kammena evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhitvā “na dāni mayā pamajjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:2086_1: ayyassa vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā pātova kanakamayaṃ sammajjaniñceva
atk-s0502a0:2086_2: kacavarachaḍḍanakañca pacchiṃ ādāya gantvā therassa pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2086_3: Thero taṃ disvā “kenaci daharena vā sāmaṇerena vā vattaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a0:2086_6: Tatiyadivase pana thero tassā sammajjanisaddaṃ sutvā tālacchiddādīhi ca paviṭṭhaṃ sarīrobhāsaṃ disvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā “ko esa sammajjatī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2086_8: “Nanu mayhaṃ evaṃnāmikā upaṭṭhāyikā nāma natthī”ti. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2086_9: sālikhettaṃ rakkhamānā lāje datvā pasannacittā nivattantī sappena daṭṭhā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsadevaloke uppannā,
atk-s0502a0:2086_10: mayā ayyaṃ nissāya ayaṃ sampatti laddhā,
atk-s0502a0:2086_11: idānipi tumhākaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā ‘sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ karissāmī’ti āgatāmhi,
atk-s0502a0:2086_18: ito paṭṭhāya imaṃ ṭhānaṃ mā āgamī”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2086_20: tumhākaṃ vattaṃ katvā sampattiṃ me thiraṃ kātuṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2086_22: mā maṃ anāgate cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinnehi dhammakathikehi ‘mahākassapattherassa kira ekā devadhītā
atk-s0502a0:2086_23: āgantvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpesī’ti vattabbataṃ kari,
atk-s0502a0:2086_28: Thero “nāyaṃ mama vacanaṃ suṇātī”ti cintetvā “tuvaṃ pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti accharaṃ pahari.
atk-s0502a0:2086_29: Sā tattha saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī ākāse uppatitvā añjaliṃ paggayha, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2086_31: thāvaraṃ kātuṃ dethā”ti rodantī ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2087_0: Satthā jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassā roditasaddaṃ sutvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā devadhītāya sammukhe
atk-s0502a0:2087_1: nisīditvā kathento viya “devadhīte mama puttassa kassapassa saṃvarakaraṇameva bhāro,
atk-s0502a0:2087_2: puññatthikānaṃ pana ‘ayaṃ no attho’ti sallakkhetvā puññakaraṇameva bhāro.
atk-s0502a0:2087_3: Puññakaraṇañhi idha ceva samparāye ca sukhamevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2090_0: Tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, sukho puññassa uccayo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2091_4: Tassa akaraṇakkhaṇepi tamhi puññe chandaṃ ruciṃ ussāhaṃ karotheva.
atk-s0502a0:2091_7: Puññassa hi uccayo vuḍḍhi idhalokaparalokasukhāvahanato sukhoti.
atk-s0502a0:2092_0: Desanāvasāne devadhītā pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake ṭhitāva sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a0:2095_0: Pāpopi passatī bhadranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2096_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko hi vihārameva uddissa catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane vikiritvā satthari jetavane viharante devasikaṃ tīṇi mahāupaṭṭhānāni gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:2096_1: gacchanto ca “kiṃ nu kho ādāya āgatoti sāmaṇerā vā daharā vā hatthampi me olokeyyu”nti tucchahattho nāma na gatapubbo.
atk-s0502a0:2096_5: Evaṃ niccakālameva divase divase dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0502a0:2096_9: nadītīre nidahitvā ṭhapitā udakena kūle bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2096_12: paṇītaṃ pana katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:2097_0: So ekadivasaṃ satthārā “dīyati pana te, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:2097_6: Cittasmiñhi paṇīte buddhādīnaṃ dinnadānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2097_7: apica tvaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ dānaṃ desi,
atk-s0502a0:2097_8: ahaṃ pana velāmakāle sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahādānaṃ pavattayamānopi tisaraṇagatampi kañci nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2097_10: Tasmā ‘lūkhaṃ me dāna’nti mā cintayī”ti vatvā velāmasuttamassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2097_11: Athassa dvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā devatā satthari ceva satthusāvakesu ca gehaṃ pavisantesu tesaṃ tejena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī,
atk-s0502a0:2097_13: tathā gahapatiṃ paribhindissāmī”ti taṃ vattukāmāpi issarakāle kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:2097_14: idāni “panāyaṃ duggato gaṇhissati me vacana”nti rattibhāge seṭṭhissa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2097_15: Atha seṭṭhi naṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2097_16: Ahaṃ te mahāseṭṭhi catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā devatā,
atk-s0502a0:2097_19: Mahāseṭṭhi tayā pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvāva samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2097_20: idāni duggato hutvāpi taṃ na muñcasiyeva,
atk-s0502a0:2097_21: evaṃ vattamāno katipāheneva ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:2097_23: atipariccāgato oramitvā kammante payojento kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhāpehīti.
atk-s0502a0:2097_24: Ayaṃ me tayā dinnaovādoti. Āma, seṭṭhīti. Gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:2097_25: nāhaṃ tādisīnaṃ satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi sakkā kampetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2097_29: Sā sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī dārake ādāya nikkhami,
atk-s0502a0:2097_30: nikkhamitvā ca pana aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā “seṭṭhiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva vasissāmī”ti nagarapariggāhakaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2097_32: maṃ seṭṭhissa santikaṃ netvā khamāpetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2097_34: nāhaṃ tassa santikaṃ gantuṃ ussahāmī”ti taṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2097_35: Sā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tehipi paṭikkhittā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “ahaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a0:2097_36: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā dārake hatthena gahetvā anāthā vicarāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2098_0: Atha naṃ so “ahampi tava kāraṇā seṭṭhiṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2098_1: ekaṃ pana te upāyaṃ kathessāmī”ti āha. Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0502a0:2098_3: seṭṭhino āyuttakavesaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhissa hatthato paṇṇaṃ āropetvā vohārūpajīvīhi gahitaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2098_4: attano ānubhāvena sodhetvā tucchagabbhe pūretvā mahāsamuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2098_5: aññampi asukaṭṭhāne nāma assāmikaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2098_6: taṃ sabbaṃ saṃharitvā tassa tucchagabbhe pūretvā daṇḍakammaṃ katvā khamāpehīti.
atk-s0502a0:2098_8: devā”ti vuttanayeneva taṃ sabbaṃ katvā puna tassa sirigabbhaṃ obhāsayamānā ākāse ṭhatvā “ko eso”ti vutte
atk-s0502a0:2098_10: mayā andhabālatāya yaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2098_12: Sakkassa hi me vacanena catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ saṃharitvā tucchagabbhapūraṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2098_18: So taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā tāya katakammaṃ sabbaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2098_20: yaṃ mayā andhabālatāya tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānitvā pāpakaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2098_21: taṃ me khamathā”ti satthāraṃ khamāpetvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2098_22: Satthā kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākavasena seṭṭhiñceva devatañca ovadanto “idha, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:2098_30: tadā bhadrameva passatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2100_0: “Pāpopi passatī bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a0:2101_0: Yadā ca paccatī pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
atk-s0502a0:2103_0: “Bhadropi passatī pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a0:2104_0: Yadā ca paccatī bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2105_1: Sopi hi purimasucaritānubhāvena nibbattaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavamāno bhadrampi passati.
atk-s0502a0:2105_2: Yāva pāpaṃ na paccatīti yāvassa taṃ pāpakammaṃ diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti.
atk-s0502a0:2105_3: Yadā panassa taṃ diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:2105_5: samparāye ca apāyadukkhaṃ anubhonto so pāpo pāpāniyeva passati.
atk-s0502a0:2105_7: Sopi hi purimaduccaritānubhāvena nibbattaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavamāno pāpaṃ passati.
atk-s0502a0:2105_8: Yāva bhadraṃ na paccatīti yāvassa taṃ bhadraṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti.
atk-s0502a0:2105_11: samparāye ca dibbasampattisukhaṃ anubhavamāno so bhadro bhadrāniyeva passatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2106_0: Desanāvasāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2109_0: Māvamaññetha pāpassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ asaññataparikkhāraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2110_0: So kira yaṃ kiñci mañcapīṭhādibhedaṃ parikkhāraṃ bahi paribhuñjitvā tattheva chaḍḍeti.
atk-s0502a0:2110_3: parikkhāro nāma paṭisāmitabbo”ti vutte “appakaṃ mayā kataṃ, āvuso, etaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2110_7: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ karosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2110_8: So satthārā pucchitopi “kiṃ etaṃ bhagavā appakaṃ mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2110_11: Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhūhi evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:2110_13: Ajjhokāse ṭhapitañhi vivaṭamukhaṃ bhājanaṃ deve vassante kiñcāpi ekabindunā na pūrati,
atk-s0502a0:2110_15: evamevaṃ pāpaṃ karonto puggalo anupubbena mahantaṃ pāparāsiṃ karotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2114_0: Bālo pūrati pāpassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācina”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2115_2: Na mandaṃ āgamissatīti “appamattakaṃ me pāpakaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2115_3: kadā etaṃ vipaccissatī”ti evaṃ pāpaṃ nāvajāneyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2115_4: Udakumbhopīti deve vassante mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃ kiñci kulālabhājanaṃ yathā taṃ ekekassāpi udakabinduno nipātena anupubbena pūrati,
atk-s0502a0:2115_5: evaṃ bālapuggalo thokaṃ thokampi pāpaṃ ācinanto karonto vaḍḍhento pāpassa pūratiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2116_1: Satthāpi “ajjhokāse seyyaṃ santharitvā paṭipākatikaṃ akaronto imaṃ nāma āpattimāpajjatī”ti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesīti.
atk-s0502a0:2119_0: Māvamaññetha puññassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto biḷālapādakaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2120_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye sāvatthivāsino vaggabandhanena buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ denti.
atk-s0502a0:2122_0: Atheko paṇḍitapuriso taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “aho acchariyamidaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2122_1: ahaṃ dāni ubhayasampattisaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ uṭṭhāya gamanakāle āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2122_10: so tattakānaṃ yāguādīnaṃ atthāya taṇḍulādīni detu,
atk-s0502a0:2122_11: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacāpetvā dānaṃ dassāmā”ti ugghosento vicari.
atk-s0502a0:2123_0: Atha naṃ eko seṭṭhi attano āpaṇadvāraṃ sampattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ attano pahonake bhikkhū animantetvā pana
atk-s0502a0:2123_1: sakalagāmaṃ samādapento vicaratī”ti kujjhitvā “tayā gahitabhājanaṃ āharā”ti tīhi aṅgulīhi gahetvā thoke
atk-s0502a0:2123_5: So tato paṭṭhāya biḷālapādakaseṭṭhi nāma jāto,
atk-s0502a0:2123_6: sappiphāṇitādīni dentopi karaṇḍaṃ kuṭe pakkhipitvā ekato koṇaṃ katvā binduṃ binduṃ paggharāyanto thokathokameva adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_7: Upāsako avasesehi dinnaṃ ekato katvā iminā dinnaṃ visuṃyeva aggahesi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_8: So seṭṭhi tassa kiriyaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho esa mayā dinnaṃ visuṃ gaṇhātī”ti cintetvā tassa pacchato pacchato ekaṃ cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ pahiṇi “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:2123_11: So gantvā “seṭṭhissa mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti yāgubhattapūvānaṃ atthāya ekaṃ dve taṇḍule pakkhipitvā muggamāsepi
atk-s0502a0:2123_16: mama nāme gahitamatteyeva naṃ paharitvā māressāmī”ti nivāsanantare churikaṃ bandhitvā punadivase gantvā bhattagge aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_17: So puriso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2123_18: mayā mahājanaṃ samādapetvā imaṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2123_19: tattha samādapitamanussā attano attano balena bahūnipi thokānipi taṇḍulādīni adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2123_22: “ahaṃ ‘asukena nāma accharāya gaṇhitvā taṇḍulādīni dinnānīti mama nāme gahitamatte imaṃ māressāmī’ti āgato,
atk-s0502a0:2123_23: ayaṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ katvā ‘yehipi nāḷiādīhi minitvā dinnaṃ,
