atk-s0502a0:2123_30: “Kiṃ ida”nti ca tena vutte sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_31: Taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā satthā “kiṃ ida”nti dānaveyyāvaṭikaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_32: So atītadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2123_33: Atha naṃ satthā “evaṃ kira seṭṭhī”ti pucchitvā, “āma,
atk-s0502a0:2123_36: mādisassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā ‘appaka’nti na avamaññitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2123_37: Paṇḍitamanussā hi puññaṃ karontā vivaṭabhājanaṃ viya udakena anukkamena puññena pūrantiyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a0:2123_38: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2127_0: Dhīro pūrati puññassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācina”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2128_3: evaṃ parittakaṃ kammaṃ kahaṃ maṃ dakkhissati,
atk-s0502a0:2128_5: kadā etaṃ vipaccissatī”ti evaṃ puññaṃ māvamaññetha na avajāneyya.
atk-s0502a0:2128_6: Yathā hi nirantaraṃ udabindunipātena vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ kulālabhājanaṃ pūrati,
atk-s0502a0:2128_7: evaṃ dhīro paṇḍitapuriso thokaṃ thokampi puññaṃ ācinanto puññassa pūratīti.
atk-s0502a0:2129_0: Desanāvasāne so seṭṭhi sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2132_0: Vāṇijovāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahādhanavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2133_0: Tassa kira vāṇijassa gehe pañcasatā corā otāraṃ gavesamānā otāraṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2133_1: Aparena samayena vāṇijo pañca sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi –
atk-s0502a0:2133_2: “ahaṃ asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma vāṇijjatthāya gacchāmi, ye, ayyā,
atk-s0502a0:2133_6: Taṃ sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2133_7: Tepi corā “so kira vāṇijo nikkhanto”ti gantvā aṭaviyaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2133_8: Vāṇijopi gantvā aṭavimukhe ekasmiṃ gāme vāsaṃ katvā dve tayopi divase goṇasakaṭādīni saṃvidahi,
atk-s0502a0:2133_9: tesaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ detiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2133_11: tassa nikkhamanadivasaṃ ñatvā ehī”ti ekaṃ purisaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2133_12: So taṃ gāmaṃ gantvā ekaṃ sahāyakaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:2133_15: Athassa so “mayaṃ pañcasatā corā etassatthāya aṭaviyaṃ ṭhitā”ti ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a0:2133_22: vāṇijassa saññaṃ dassāmī”ti so tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kadā gamissathā”ti pucchitvā “tatiyadivase”ti vutte mayhaṃ vacanaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a0:2133_23: aṭaviyaṃ kira tumhākaṃ atthāya pañcasatā corā ṭhitā,
atk-s0502a0:2133_28: “Tena hi ‘kiṃ me etto gatenā’ti nivattitvā gehameva gamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2133_29: Tasmiṃ cirāyante puna tehi corehi pesito puriso āgantvā taṃ sahāyakaṃ pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nivattitvā
atk-s0502a0:2133_30: gehameva kira gamissatī”ti gantvā corānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2133_31: Taṃ sutvā corā tato nikkhamitvā itarasmiṃ magge aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2133_32: tasmiṃ cirayante punapi te corā tassa santikaṃ purisaṃ pesesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2133_33: So tesaṃ tattha ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puna vāṇijassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2133_35: evaṃ sante neva etto gamissāmi, na ito,
atk-s0502a0:2133_36: idheva bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2133_37: corā kira maṃ vilumpitukāmā magge ṭhitā,
atk-s0502a0:2133_39: ahaṃ etto vā ito vā agantvā thokaṃ idheva bhavissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2133_42: Bhikkhū “evaṃ sante mayaṃ nivattissāmā”ti vāṇijaṃ āpucchitvā punadeva sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2133_45: mahādhanavāṇijena saddhiṃ na gamitthā”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2133_46: mahādhanavāṇijassa vilumpanatthāya dvīsupi maggesu corā pariyuṭṭhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2133_48: mayaṃ pana taṃ āpucchitvā āgatā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2133_51: jīvitukāmo viya puriso halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a0:2133_52: bhikkhunāpi ‘tayo bhavā corehi pariyuṭṭhitamaggasadisā’ti ñatvā pāpaṃ parivajjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a0:2137_4: yathā ca jīvitukāmo halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a0:2137_5: evaṃ paṇḍito bhikkhu appamattakānipi pāpāni parivajjeyyāti.
atk-s0502a0:2138_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2141_0: Pāṇimhi ceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2142_0: Rājagahe kira ekā seṭṭhidhītā vayappattā sattabhūmikapāsādassa upari sirigabbhe ārakkhaṇatthāya ekaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2142_1: paricārikaṃ datvā mātāpitūhi vāsiyamānā ekadivasaṃ sāyanhasamaye vātapānena antaravīthiṃ olokentī pañca
atk-s0502a0:2142_2: pāsasatāni pañca sūlasatāni ādāya mige vadhitvā jīvamānaṃ ekaṃ kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ pañca migasatāni
atk-s0502a0:2142_3: vadhitvā tesaṃ maṃsena mahāsakaṭaṃ pūretvā sakaṭadhure nisīditvā maṃsavikkiṇanatthāya nagaraṃ pavisantaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2142_4: disvā tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā paricārikāya hatthe paṇṇākāraṃ datvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:2142_5: etassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā gamanakālaṃ ñatvā ehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:2142_6: Sā gantvā tassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:2142_8: So “ajja maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā pātova asukadvārena nāma nikkhamitvā gamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2142_9: Sā tena kathitakathaṃ sutvā āgantvā tassā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2142_10: Seṭṭhidhītā attanā gahetabbayuttakaṃ vatthābharaṇajātaṃ saṃvidahitvā pātova malinavatthaṃ nivāsetvā kuṭaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2142_11: ādāya dāsīhi saddhiṃ udakatitthaṃ gacchantī viya nikkhamitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāgamanaṃ olokentī aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2142_14: So taṃ disvā “ahaṃ taṃ ‘asukassa nāma dhītā’ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2142_19: tvaṃ tuṇhī hutvā attano sakaṭaṃ pājehīti.
atk-s0502a0:2142_22: sirī nāma attano santikaṃ āgacchantī nivāretuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2142_23: So tassā nissaṃsayena āgamanakāraṇaṃ ñatvā taṃ sakaṭaṃ āropetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2142_24: Tassā mātāpitaro ito cito ca pariyesāpetvā apassantā “matā bhavissatī”ti matakabhattaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2142_25: Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya paṭipāṭiyā satta putte vijāyitvā te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento kukkuṭamittaṃ saputtaṃ sasuṇisaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:2143_1: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti upadhārento tesaṃ pannarasannampi sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa pāsaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_2: Taṃ divasaṃ pāse baddho ekamigopi nāhosi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_3: Satthā tassa pāsamūle padavalañjaṃ dassetvā purato ekassa gumbassa heṭṭhā chāyāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_4: Kukkuṭamitto pātova dhanuṃ ādāya pāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya pāse olokayamāno pāse baddhaṃ ekampi migaṃ adisvā satthu padavalañjaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2143_7: So satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā gacchanto gumbamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a0:2143_10: Satthā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ datvā vissajjetuṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_11: So saraṃ vissajjetumpi oropetumpi asakkonto phāsukāhi bhijjantīhi viya mukhato kheḷena paggharantena kilantarūpo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2143_12: Athassa puttā gehaṃ gantvā “pitā no cirāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2143_13: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vatvā “gacchatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:2143_14: pitu santika”nti mātarā pesitā dhanūni ādāya gantvā pitaraṃ tathāṭhitaṃ disvā “ayaṃ no pitu paccāmitto
atk-s0502a0:2143_15: bhavissatī”ti sattapi janā dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā buddhānubhāvena yathā nesaṃ pitā ṭhito,
atk-s0502a0:2143_17: Atha nesaṃ mātā “kiṃ nu kho me puttāpi cirāyantī”ti vatvā sattahi suṇisāhi saddhiṃ gantvā te tathāṭhite
atk-s0502a0:2143_18: disvā “kassa nu kho ime dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā”ti olokentī satthāraṃ disvā bāhā paggayha –
atk-s0502a0:2143_29: Atha te nesaṃ mātā seṭṭhidhītā “khippaṃ dhanūni chaḍḍetvā pitaraṃ me khamāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2144_0: Satthā tesaṃ muducittataṃ ñatvā dhanuṃ otāretuṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_3: Atha nesaṃ satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_4: Desanāvasāne kukkuṭamitto saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca attapañcadasamo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_5: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_11: so attapañcadasamo acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhāya tīsu ratanesu nikkaṅkho hutvā pāṇātipātakammassa akārako jātoti.
atk-s0502a0:2144_15: sā kulagehe kumārikā hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0502a0:2144_16: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kukkuṭamittassa kira bhariyā kumārikakāle eva sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tassa gehaṃ gantvā satta putte labhi,
atk-s0502a0:2144_22: Sopi tāya dinnāni ādāya gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:2144_23: kiṃ nu kho sotāpannāpi pāṇātipātaṃ karontī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2144_26: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a0:2144_29: sā pana ‘sāmikassa vacanaṃ karomī’ti tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_30: ‘Idaṃ gahetvā esa gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karotū’ti tassā cittaṃ natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2144_31: Pāṇitalasmiñhi vaṇe asati visaṃ gaṇhantassa taṃ visaṃ anuḍahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:2144_32: evamevaṃ akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ akarontassa dhanuādīni nīharitvā dadatopi pāpaṃ nāma na hotī”ti
atk-s0502a0:2144_33: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2146_0: “Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2148_3: Yasmā nābbaṇaṃ visamanveti avaṇañhi pāṇiṃ visaṃ anvetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:2148_4: evameva dhanuādīni nīharitvā dentassāpi akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ akubbato pāpaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2148_5: avaṇaṃ pāṇiṃ visaṃ viya nāssa cittaṃ pāpaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2150_1: “ko nu kho kukkuṭamittassa saputtassa sasuṇisassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayo,
atk-s0502a0:2150_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2150_8: “kiṃ nu kho imassa cetiyassa mattikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:2150_13: Te haritālamanosilā koṭṭetvā tilatelena saṃsanditvā iṭṭhakāya ghaṭetvā suvaṇṇena khacitvā anto ciniṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2150_16: Te yāva dhātunidhānā cetiye niṭṭhite cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:2151_0: Atheko gāmavāsiko seṭṭhi “ahaṃ jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti dhātunidhāne ekaṃ hiraññakoṭiṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2151_1: Taṃ disvā raṭṭhavāsino “ayaṃ nagaraseṭṭhi dhanameva saṃharati,
atk-s0502a0:2151_2: evarūpe cetiye jeṭṭhako bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:2151_3: gāmavāsī pana koṭidhanaṃ pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhako jāto”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2151_4: So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ dve koṭiyo datvā jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti dve koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2151_5: Itaro “ahameva jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti tisso koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2151_6: Evaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā nagaravāsī aṭṭha koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2151_15: saputtadāro ca cetiyassa dāso bhavissāmī”ti satta putte satta suṇisāyo bhariyañca gahetvā attanā saddhiṃ cetiyassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:2151_18: ayameva jeṭṭhako hotū”ti taṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2151_19: Iti te soḷasapi janā cetiyassa dāsā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2151_21: Evaṃ santepi cetiyameva paṭijaggitvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2151_22: Tesu ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasantesu imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhariyā tato cavitvā rājagahe seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:2151_24: Adiṭṭhasaccassa pana paṭisandhi nāma bhāriyāti tassā sāmiko samparivattamāno gantvā nesādakule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:2151_25: Tassa saha dassaneneva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ pubbasineho ajjhotthari.
atk-s0502a0:2153_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:2154_1: Puttāpissā devalokā cavitvā tassā eva kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2154_2: suṇisāyopissā tattha tattha nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2154_3: Evaṃ te sabbepi tadā cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā tassa kammassānubhāvena sotāpattiphalaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0502a0:2157_0: Yo appaduṭṭhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokaṃ nāma sunakhaluddakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pubbaṇhasamaye dhanuṃ ādāya sunakhaparivuto araññaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ekaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:2158_1: pavisantaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā kujjhitvā “kāḷakaṇṇi me diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:2158_2: ajja kiñci na labhissāmī”ti cintetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_3: Theropi gāme piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco puna vihāraṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_4: Itaropi araññe vicaritvā kiñci alabhitvā paccāgacchanto puna theraṃ disvā “ajjāhaṃ imaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ disvā araññaṃ gato kiñci na labhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2158_6: sunakhehi naṃ khādāpessāmī”ti saññaṃ datvā sunakhe vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_11: Thero vegena ekaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā purisappamāṇe ṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_13: Luddako gantvā “rukkhaṃ abhiruhatopi te mokkho natthī”ti taṃ saratuṇḍena pādatale vijjhi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_15: Itaro tassa yācanaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ vijjhiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2158_16: Thero ekasmiṃ pādatale vijjhiyamāne taṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyaṃ pādaṃ olambitvā tasmiṃ vijjhiyamāne tampi ukkhipati,
atk-s0502a0:2158_17: evamassa so yācanaṃ anādiyitvāva dvepi pādatalāni vijjhiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2158_18: Therassa sarīraṃ ukkāhi ādittaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2158_19: So vedanānuvattiko hutvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:2158_21: Taṃ patamānaṃ kokaṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya parikkhipantameva pati.
atk-s0502a0:2158_22: Sunakhā “thero patito”ti saññāya cīvarantaraṃ pavisitvā attano sāmikaṃ luñjitvā khādantā aṭṭhimattāvasesaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2159_0: Atha nesaṃ thero ekaṃ sukkhadaṇḍakaṃ bhañjitvā khipi.
atk-s0502a0:2159_1: Sunakhā theraṃ disvā “sāmikova amhehi khādito”ti ñatvā araññaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2159_2: Thero kukkuccaṃ uppādesi “mama cīvarantaraṃ pavisitvā esa naṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:2159_4: So rukkhā otaritvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2159_5: mama cīvaraṃ nissāya so upāsako naṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:2159_8: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “bhikkhu arogaṃ te sīlaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2159_12: atītepi appaduṭṭhānaṃ padussitvā vināsaṃ pattoyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a0:2160_0: Atīte kireko vejjo vejjakammatthāya gāmaṃ vicaritvā kiñci kammaṃ alabhitvā chātajjhatto nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre
atk-s0502a0:2160_1: sambahule kumārake kīḷante disvā “ime sappena ḍaṃsāpetvā tikicchitvā āhāraṃ labhissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ rukkhabile
atk-s0502a0:2160_5: Atheko kumārako sappaṃ gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā nīharitvā tassa sappabhāvaṃ ñatvā viravanto avidūre ṭhitassa vejjassa matthake khipi.
atk-s0502a0:2160_6: Sappo vejjassa khandhaṭṭhikaṃ parikkhipitvā daḷhaṃ ḍaṃsitvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:2160_7: evamesa koko sunakhaluddako pubbepi appaduṭṭhassa padussitvā vināsaṃ pattoyevāti.
atk-s0502a0:2161_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2163_0: “Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;
atk-s0502a0:2164_0: Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2165_0: Tattha appaduṭṭhassāti attano vā sabbasattānaṃ vā aduṭṭhassa.
atk-s0502a0:2165_7: Paṭivātanti yathā ekena purisena paṭivāte ṭhitaṃ paharitukāmatāya khitto sukhumo rajoti tameva purisaṃ pacceti,
atk-s0502a0:2165_9: evameva yo puggalo apaduṭṭhassa purisassa pāṇippaharādīni dadanto padussati,
atk-s0502a0:2165_11: samparāye vā nirayādīsu vipaccamānaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vipākadukkhavasena paccetīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2166_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2169_0: Gabbhameketi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto maṇikārakulūpakaṃ tissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2170_0: So kira thero ekassa maṇikārassa kule dvādasa vassāni bhuñji.
atk-s0502a0:2170_1: Tasmiṃ kule jayampatikā mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā theraṃ paṭijaggiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2170_2: Athekadivasaṃ so maṇikāro therassa purato maṃsaṃ chindanto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2170_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā pasenadi kosalo ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ “imaṃ dhovitvā vijjhitvā pahiṇatū”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:2170_4: Maṇikāro salohiteneva hatthena taṃ paṭiggahetvā peḷāya upari ṭhapetvā hatthadhovanatthaṃ anto pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:2170_6: So lohitagandhena maṃsasaññāya taṃ maṇiṃ therassa passantasseva gili.
atk-s0502a0:2170_7: Maṇikāro āgantvā maṇiṃ apassanto “maṇi kena gahito”ti bhariyañca puttake ca paṭipāṭiyā pucchitvā tehi
atk-s0502a0:2170_12: ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā therassa na kiñci vajjaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2170_21: So tasmiṃ asampaṭicchante puna bhariyaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:2170_27: So “sabbeva mayaṃ dāsattaṃ upagacchantā maṇimūlaṃ na agghāmā”ti rajjuṃ gahetvā therassa sīsaṃ veṭhetvā daṇḍena ghaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a0:2170_28: Therassa sīsato ca kaṇṇanāsāhi ca lohitaṃ pagghari,
atk-s0502a0:2170_32: Atha naṃ maṇikāro there uppannakodhavegena “tvaṃ kiṃ karosī”ti pādena paharitvā khipi.
atk-s0502a0:2171_1: sīse veṭhanaṃ tāva me sithilaṃ katvā imaṃ koñcaṃ olokehi “mato vā, no vā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2171_6: na te ahaṃ marantopi maṇiṃ ācikkhissanti.
atk-s0502a0:2171_7: So tassa udaraṃ phāletvā maṇiṃ disvā pavedhento saṃviggamānaso therassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamatha, me, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2171_14: pakatiniyāmeneva me gehe nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti. “Upāsaka,
atk-s0502a0:2171_15: na dānāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paresaṃ gehassa antochadanaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2171_17: ito paṭṭhāya pādesu āvahantesu gehadvāre ṭhitova bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2172_0: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0502a0:2174_0: Idañca pana vatvā thero teneva byādhinā na cirasseva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2174_1: Koñco maṇikārassa bhariyāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:2174_3: Maṇikārassa bhariyā there muducittatāya kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:2174_4: Bhikkhū satthāraṃ tesaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a0:2174_9: anāsavā pana parinibbāyantī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2178_0: Tattha gabbhanti idha manussagabbhova adhippeto. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0502a0:2182_0: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tayo jane ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2183_0: Satthari kira jetavane viharante sambahulā bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya āgacchantā ekaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2183_1: Gāmavāsino te sampatte ādāya āsanasālāya nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā piṇḍapātavelaṃ āgamayamānā dhammaṃ suṇantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2183_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhattaṃ pacitvā sūpabyañjanaṃ dhūpayamānāya ekissā itthiyā bhājanato aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā chadanaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:2183_3: Tato ekaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ uṭṭhahitvā jalamānaṃ ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:2183_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko kāko ākāsena gacchanto tattha gīvaṃ pavesetvā tiṇavalliveṭhito jhāyitvā gāmamajjhe pati.
atk-s0502a0:2183_8: iminā katakammaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati,
atk-s0502a0:2184_0: Aparesampi bhikkhūnaṃ satthu dassanatthāya nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchantānaṃ nāvā samudde niccalā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2184_2: Nāvikassa ca bhariyā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā dassanīyā pāsādikā,
atk-s0502a0:2184_8: Nāviko “na sakkā ekissā atthāya mahājanaṃ nāsetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2184_10: Sā gahetvā udake khipiyamānā maraṇabhayatajjitā viravaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2184_11: Taṃ sutvā nāviko ko attho imissā ābharaṇehi naṭṭhehi,
atk-s0502a0:2184_12: sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā ekaṃ pilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā chaḍḍetha naṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2184_13: ahaṃ panetaṃ udakapiṭṭhe plavamānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkhissāmī tasmā yathā naṃ ahaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2184_14: tathā ekaṃ vālukakuṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā samudde khipathāti.
atk-s0502a0:2184_17: Bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ ko añño etissā itthiyā katakammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0502a0:2184_18: satthāraṃ tassā kammaṃ pucchissāmā”ti icchitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā nāvāto oruyha pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2185_0: Aparepi satta bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya gacchantā sāyaṃ ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2185_2: Tesaṃ tadeva labhitvā tattha nipannānaṃ rattibhāge kūṭāgāramatto pāsāṇo pavaṭṭamāno āgantvā leṇadvāraṃ pidahi.
atk-s0502a0:2185_3: Nevāsikā bhikkhū “mayaṃ imaṃ leṇaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ pāpayimhā,
atk-s0502a0:2185_5: apanessāma na”nti samantā sattahi gāmehi manusse sannipātetvā vāyamantāpi ṭhānā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2185_7: Evaṃ santepi sattāhaṃ pāsāṇaṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2185_9: Sattame divase pāsāṇo sayameva pavaṭṭitvā apagato.
atk-s0502a0:2185_10: Bhikkhū nikkhamitvā “amhākaṃ imaṃ pāpaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati,
atk-s0502a0:2185_12: Te purimehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge samāgantvā sabbe ekatova satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā
atk-s0502a0:2185_13: satthārā katapaṭisanthārā attanā attanā diṭṭhānubhūtāni kāraṇāni paṭipāṭiyā pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2186_2: so tāva kāko attanā katakammameva anubhosi.
atk-s0502a0:2186_3: Atītakāle hi bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kassako attano goṇaṃ damento dametuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:2186_4: So hissa goṇo thokaṃ gantvā nipajji,
atk-s0502a0:2186_5: pothetvā uṭṭhāpitopi thokaṃ gantvā punapi tatheva nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:2186_6: So vāyamitvā taṃ dametuṃ asakkonto kodhābhibhūto hutvā ‘ito dāni paṭṭhāya sukhaṃ nipajjissasī’ti palālapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2186_7: viya karonto palālena tassa gīvaṃ paliveṭhetvā aggimadāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2186_11: So tassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena sattakkhattuṃ kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā evameva ākāse jhāyitvāva mato”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2187_3: Sā hi atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ ekassa gahapatikassa bhariyā udakaharaṇakoṭṭanapacanādīni sabbakiccāni sahattheneva akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2187_4: Tassā eko sunakho taṃ gehe sabbakiccāni kurumānaṃ olokentova nisīdati.
atk-s0502a0:2187_5: Khette bhattaṃ harantiyā dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ vā atthāya araññaṃ gacchantiyā tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchati.
atk-s0502a0:2187_8: Sā tesaṃ kathāya maṅku hutvā sunakhaṃ leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā palāpeti,
atk-s0502a0:2187_10: So kirassā tatiye attabhāve bhattā ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:2187_12: Kiñcāpi hi anamatagge saṃsāre jāyā vā pati vā abhūtapubbā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2187_13: avidūre pana attabhāve ñātakesu adhimatto sineho hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2187_14: tasmā so sunakho taṃ vijahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:2187_15: Sā tassa kujjhitvā khettaṃ sāmikassa yāguṃ haramānā rajjuṃ ucchaṅge ṭhapetvā agamāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2187_17: Sā sāmikassa yāguṃ datvā tucchakuṭaṃ ādāya ekaṃ udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā samīpe oloketvā ṭhitassa sunakhassa saddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2187_18: Sunakho “cirassaṃ vata me ajja madhurakathā laddhā”ti naṅguṭṭhaṃ cālento taṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a0:2187_19: Sā taṃ gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā ekāya rajjukoṭiyā kuṭaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ rajjukoṭiṃ sunakhassa gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā kuṭaṃ udakābhimukhaṃ pavaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a0:2187_20: Sunakho kuṭaṃ anubandhanto udake patitvā tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2187_21: Sā tassa kammassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate vālukakuṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhittā kālamakāsīti.
atk-s0502a0:2188_3: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasivāsino satta gopālakadārakā ekasmiṃ aṭavipadese sattāhavārena gāviyo vicarantā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2188_4: gāviyo vicāretvā āgacchantā ekaṃ mahāgodhaṃ disvā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2188_8: sve āgantvā gaṇhissāmā”ti ekeko ekekaṃ sākhabhaṅgamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya sattapi janā satta chiddāni pidahitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2188_9: Te punadivase taṃ godhaṃ amanasikatvā aññasmiṃ padese gāviyo vicāretvā sattame divase gāviyo ādāya gacchantā
atk-s0502a0:2188_10: taṃ vammikaṃ disvā satiṃ paṭilabhitvā “kā nu kho tassā godhāya pavattī”ti attanā attanā pidahitāni chiddāni
atk-s0502a0:2188_12: Godhā jīvite nirālayā hutvā aṭṭhicammāvasesā pavedhamānā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:2188_13: Te taṃ disvā anukampaṃ katvā “mā naṃ māretha,
atk-s0502a0:2188_14: sattāhaṃ chinnabhattā jātā”ti tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “sukhena gacchāhī”ti vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2188_15: Te godhāya amāritattā niraye tāva na pacciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2188_16: Te pana satta janā ekato hutvā cuddasasu attabhāvesu satta satta divasāni chinnabhattā ahesuṃ. Tadā,
atk-s0502a0:2188_18: tumhehi sattahi gopālakehi hutvā taṃ kammaṃ katanti.
atk-s0502a0:2188_19: Evaṃ satthā tehi puṭṭhapuṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2189_2: pāpakammaṃ katvā ākāse uppatitassapi samuddaṃ pakkhandassāpi pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhassāpi mokkho natthī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2189_6: yattha ṭhito pāpakammato mucceyyā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2191_0: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a0:2192_0: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2193_1: sace hi koci “iminā upāyena pāpakammato muccissāmī”ti antalikkhe vā nisīdeyya,
atk-s0502a0:2193_5: Puratthimādīsu jagatipadesesu pathavībhāgesu na so vālaggamattopi okāso atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2197_0: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto suppabuddhaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2198_0: So kira “ayaṃ mama dhītaraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhanto ca,
atk-s0502a0:2198_1: mama puttaṃ pabbājetvā tassa veriṭṭhāne ṭhito cā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2198_2: “na dānissa nimantanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhuñjituṃ dassāmī”ti gamanamaggaṃ pidahitvā antaravīthiyaṃ suraṃ
atk-s0502a0:2198_4: Athassa satthari bhikkhusaṅghaparivute taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgate “satthā āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So āha –
atk-s0502a0:2198_7: nāssa maggaṃ dassāmī”ti punappunaṃ vuccamānopi tatheva vatvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2198_8: Satthā mātulassa santikā maggaṃ alabhitvā tato nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:2198_11: Satthāpi nivattanto sitaṃ katvā ānandattherena “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2198_12: sitassa pātukammassa paccayo”ti puṭṭho āha – “passasi, ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:2198_14: Bhāriyaṃ tena kammaṃ kataṃ mādisassa buddhassa maggaṃ adentena,
atk-s0502a0:2198_15: ito sattame divase heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2198_16: Carapuriso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā suppabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ mama bhāgineyyena nivattantena vutta”nti puṭṭho yathāsutaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2198_17: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “na dāni mama bhāgineyyassa kathāya doso atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2198_20: Evaṃ santepi naṃ idāni musāvādena niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2198_21: So hi maṃ ‘sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī’ti aniyamena avatvā ‘heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatī”’ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2198_22: “Ito dāni paṭṭhāyāhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ na gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2198_23: atha naṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ apavisitvā musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti attano upabhogajātaṃ sabbaṃ sattabhūmikapāsādassa
atk-s0502a0:2198_24: upari āropetvā sopānaṃ harāpetvā dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā ekekasmiṃ dvāre dve dve malle ṭhapetvā “sacāhaṃ pamādena
atk-s0502a0:2198_26: nivāreyyātha ma”nti vatvā sattame pāsādatale sirigabbhe nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2198_29: suppabuddho na kevalaṃ pāsādatale vehāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāse vā nisīdatu,
atk-s0502a0:2198_33: mayā vuttaṭṭhāneyeva so pathaviṃ pavisissatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2200_0: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a0:2201_0: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya maccū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2202_1: maccūti yasmiṃ padese ṭhitaṃ maraṇaṃ nappasaheyya nābhibhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:2204_0: Sattame divase satthu bhikkhācāramaggassa niruddhavelāya heṭṭhāpāsāde suppabuddhassa maṅgalasso uddāmo hutvā taṃ taṃ bhittiṃ pahari.
atk-s0502a0:2204_1: So upari nisinnovassa saddaṃ sutvā “kimeta”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2204_4: Atha naṃ so gaṇhitukāmo hutvā nisinnaṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya dvārābhimukho ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:2204_7: Dvāre ṭhitā mallā taṃ gīvāyaṃ gahetvā heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2204_8: Etenupāyena sattasupi talesu dvārāni sayameva vivaṭāni,
atk-s0502a0:2204_10: Tattha tattha mallā taṃ gīvāyameva gahetvā heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2204_11: Atha naṃ heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūlaṃ sampattameva mahāpathavī vivaramānā bhijjitvā sampaṭicchi,
atk-s0502a0:2210_0: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2211_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye sattarasavaggiyehi senāsane paṭijaggite chabbaggiyā bhikkhū “nikkhamatha,
atk-s0502a0:2211_2: amhākaṃ etaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā tehi “na mayaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a0:2211_3: amhehi paṭhamaṃ paṭijaggita”nti vutte te bhikkhū pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2211_5: Satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti ārocite “na,
atk-s0502a0:2211_7: ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2211_9: so imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti pahāradānasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0502a0:2211_13: maccuno bhāyantī’ti ñatvā paro na paharitabbo,
atk-s0502a0:2211_14: na ghātetabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2214_0: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2215_0: Tattha sabbe tasantīti sabbepi sattā attani daṇḍe patante tassa daṇḍassa tasanti.
atk-s0502a0:2215_4: Yathā hi raññā “sabbe sannipatantū”ti bheriyā carāpitāyapi rājamahāmatte ṭhapetvā sesā sannipatanti,
atk-s0502a0:2215_5: evamidha “sabbe tasantī”ti vuttepi hatthājāneyyo assājāneyyo usabhājāneyyo khīṇāsavoti ime cattāro ṭhapetvā avasesāva tasantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0502a0:2215_6: Imesu hi khīṇāsavo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā maraṇakasattaṃ apassanto na bhāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2215_7: itare tayo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattā attano paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sattaṃ apassantā na bhāyantīti.
atk-s0502a0:2215_8: Na haneyya na ghātayeti yathā ahaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2215_9: evaṃ aññepi sattāti neva paraṃ pahareyya na paharāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2219_0: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2220_0: Teyeva ekasmiñhi samaye teneva kāraṇena purimasikkhāpade sattarasavaggiye pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2220_2: Idhāpi satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti ārocite “na,
atk-s0502a0:2220_4: ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2220_6: so imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti talasattikasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0502a0:2220_11: tatheva nesaṃ jīvitaṃ piya’nti ñatvā paro na paharitabbo na ghāṭetabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2223_0: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2224_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyanti khīṇāsavaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ madhuraṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2224_1: khīṇāsavo pana jīvite vā maraṇe vā upekkhakova hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2228_0: Sukhakāmāni bhūtānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule kumārake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2229_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto antarāmagge sambahule kumārake ekaṃ gharasappajātikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2229_1: ahiṃ daṇḍakena paharante disvā “kumārakā kiṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “ahiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2229_2: daṇḍakena paharāmā”ti vutte “kiṃ kāraṇā”ti puna pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena,
atk-s0502a0:2229_3: bhante”ti vutte “tumhe ‘attano sukhaṃ karissāmā’ti imaṃ paharantā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sukhalābhino na bhavissatha.
atk-s0502a0:2229_4: Attano sukhaṃ patthentena hi paraṃ paharituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2232_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2235_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2236_0: Tattha yo daṇḍenāti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi vā viheṭheti.
atk-s0502a0:2236_1: Pecca so na labhate sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ vā paramatthabhūtaṃ vā nibbānasukhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0502a0:2236_2: Dutiyagāthāya pecca so labhateti so puggalo paraloke vuttappakāraṃ tividhampi sukhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2237_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te kumārakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:2240_0: Māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto koṇḍadhānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2241_0: Tassa kira pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ therena saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0502a0:2241_3: Antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya caratopissa manussā ekaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2241_5: ayaṃ pana tumhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti vatvā dutiyampi dadanti.
atk-s0502a0:2242_1: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhū ekamātukucchito nikkhantasadisā ativiya samaggā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2242_2: Dīghāyukabuddhakāle ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā anuchamāsaṃ vā bhikkhū uposathatthāya sannipatanti.
atk-s0502a0:2242_4: Te ekā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattadevatā disvā “ime bhikkhū ativiya samaggā,
atk-s0502a0:2242_5: sakkā nu kho ime bhinditu”nti cintetvā attano bālatāya cintitasamanantarameva āgantvā tesu ekena, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:2242_7: sarīrakiccenamhi atthiko”ti vutte sā devatā ekaṃ manussitthivaṇṇaṃ māpetvā therassa gacchantaraṃ pavisitvā nikkhamanakāle ekena hatthena kesakalāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2242_8: ekena nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhāpayamānā tassa piṭṭhito nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:2242_10: tamāgamayamāno pana purato ṭhitabhikkhu nivattitvā olokayamāno taṃ tathā katvā nikkhamantaṃ passi.
atk-s0502a0:2242_12: Itaro taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano santikaṃ āgatakāle āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:2242_16: Idāneva te mayā pacchato nikkhamamānā taruṇaitthī idaṃ nāma karontī diṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a0:2242_18: So asaniyā matthake avatthaṭo viya mā maṃ, āvuso, nāsehi,
atk-s0502a0:2242_21: kiṃ tava saddahissāmī”ti daṇḍako viya bhijjitvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2242_22: uposathaggepi “nāhaṃ iminā saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2242_24: sīle aṇumattampi kāḷaṃ natthī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2242_26: Devatā taṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti cintetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2242_30: So tassā ākāse ṭhatvā kathentiyā saddahitvā uposathaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2242_31: na pana there pubbe viya muducitto ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2243_0: Āyupariyosāne pana te therā yathāsukhaṃ devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2243_1: Devatā apīcimhi nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha paccitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a0:2243_3: Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya taṃ itthirūpaṃ tatheva paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2243_5: Taṃ tathāvicarantaṃ disvā bhikkhū anāthapiṇḍikaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:2243_8: Imañhi nissāya sesabhikkhūnaṃ ayaso uppajjissatī”ti. Kiṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2244_2: koṇḍadhānatthero ekaṃ itthiṃ gahetvā vicaranto sabbesaṃ ayasaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0502a0:2244_10: ahaṃ taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti so sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ gantvā taṃ senāsanaṃ purisehi parikkhipāpetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_11: Thero mahāsaddaṃ sutvā vihārā nikkhamitvā pamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_12: Tampissa itthirūpaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitaṃ rājā addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2244_13: Thero rañño āgamanaṃ ñatvā vihāraṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_16: So dvārantarepi heṭṭhāmañcepi olokento adisvāva theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2244_21: “Idāni mayā tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti vuttepi “ahaṃ na passāmi”ccevāha.
atk-s0502a0:2244_24: There nikkhamitvā pamukhe ṭhite puna sā therassa piṭṭhipasse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_25: Rājā taṃ disvā puna uparitalaṃ abhiruhi,
atk-s0502a0:2244_27: Puna rājā taṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu olokentopi adisvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2244_28: kahaṃ sā itthī”ti puna theraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_31: mayā idāneva tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti āha. Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:2244_32: mahājanopi “me pacchato pacchato itthī vicaratī”ti vadati,
atk-s0502a0:2244_35: ito tāva otarathā”ti vatvā there otaritvā pamukhe ṭhite puna taṃ tassa piṭṭhipasse ṭhitaṃ disvā uparitalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a0:2244_37: So puna theraṃ pucchitvā tena “na passāmi”cceva vutte “paṭirūpakameveta”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2244_38: evarūpe saṃkilese tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito vicarante añño koci tumhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ na dassati,
atk-s0502a0:2244_40: ahameva catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2245_2: ‘etaṃ vihārato nīharā’ti vutte āgantvā catūhi paccayehi nimantetvā gato”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2245_5: Sopi pubbe bhikkhū kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto “tumhe dussīlā,
atk-s0502a0:2245_9: koṇḍadhānatthero amhehi vutto amhe ‘dussīlā’tiādīni vatvā akkosatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2245_20: “Ime kira tayā saddhiṃ itthiṃ vicarantiṃ disvā vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:2245_23: Tvaṃ adisvāva imehi saddhiṃ kasmā kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:2245_24: nanu pubbe taveva pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya idaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2245_25: idāni kasmā puna pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2245_28: Atha nesaṃ satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā “bhikkhu idaṃ pāpakammaṃ nissāya tvaṃ imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:2245_29: idāni te puna tathārūpaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2245_30: mā puna bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kiñci kathehi,
atk-s0502a0:2245_32: evaṃ karonto nibbānappatto nāma bhavissatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2248_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2251_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2252_0: Tattha māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti kañci ekapuggalampi pharusaṃ mā avaca.
atk-s0502a0:2252_3: Sārambhakathāti esā karaṇuttarā yugaggāhakathā nāma dukkhā.
atk-s0502a0:2252_4: Paṭidaṇḍāti kāyadaṇḍādīhi paraṃ paharantassa tādisā paṭidaṇḍā ca tava matthake pateyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2252_5: Sace neresīti sace attānaṃ niccalaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi.
atk-s0502a0:2252_6: Kaṃso upahato yathāti mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ chinditvā talamattaṃ katvā ṭhapitakaṃsathālaṃ viya.
atk-s0502a0:2252_7: Tañhi hatthapādehi vā daṇḍakena vā pahaṭampi saddaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a0:2252_8: esa pattosīti sace evarūpo bhavituṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:2252_9: imaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno idāni appattopi eso nibbānappatto nāma.
atk-s0502a0:2252_10: Sārambho te na vijjatīti evaṃ sante ca pana “tvaṃ dussīlo,
atk-s0502a0:2252_11: tumhe dussīlā”tievamādiko uttarakaraṇavācālakkhaṇo sārambhopi te na vijjati,
atk-s0502a0:2253_1: koṇḍadhānattheropi satthārā dinnaovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:2253_2: na cirasseva ākāse uppatitvā paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0502a0:2256_0: Yathā daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto visākhādīnaṃ upāsikānaṃ uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2257_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ mahāuposathadivase pañcasatamattā itthiyo uposathikā hutvā vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2257_6: tāhi “taruṇabhāveyeva patikulagamanatthāyā”ti vutte taṃ sabbampi tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tā ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭipāṭiyā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:2257_7: Taṃ sutvā satthā “visākhe imesaṃ sattānaṃ jātiādayo nāma daṇḍahatthakagopālakasadisā,
atk-s0502a0:2257_10: byādhi maraṇassa santikaṃ pesetvā maraṇaṃ kuṭhāriyā chindantā viya jīvitaṃ chindati,
atk-s0502a0:2257_11: evaṃ santepi vivaṭṭaṃ patthentā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2257_12: vaṭṭameva pana patthentī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2260_0: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, āyuṃ pājenti pāṇina”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2261_0: Tattha pājetīti cheko gopālo kedārantaraṃ pavisantiyo gāvo daṇḍena nivāretvā teneva pothento sulabhatiṇodakaṃ gocaraṃ neti.
atk-s0502a0:2261_2: Gopālako viya hi jarā ca maccu ca,
atk-s0502a0:2261_5: Tattha jāti tāva sattānaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ jarāya santikaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0502a0:2261_8: Tameva maraṇaṃ kuṭhāriyā chedaṃ viya chinditvā gacchatīti idamettha opammasampaṭipādanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2265_0: Atha pāpāni kammānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajagarapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2266_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭato otaranto dibbena cakkhunā pañcavīsatiyojanikaṃ ajagarapetaṃ nāma addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2266_1: Tassa sīsato aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:2266_7: satthu santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā satthu santikaṃ gatakāle lakkhaṇattherena puṭṭho āha –
atk-s0502a0:2266_11: ahaṃ taṃ disvā ‘na vata me evarūpo attabhāvo diṭṭhapubbo’ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2266_14: sāvakā viharantī”tiādīni vadanto therassa kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “mayāpi eso,
atk-s0502a0:2266_17: ‘ye ca pana me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2266_18: tesaṃ taṃ ahitāya assā’ti na kathesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2266_19: idāni moggallānaṃ sakkhiṃ labhitvā kathemī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi tassa pubbakammaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2267_0: Kassapabuddhakāle kira sumaṅgalaseṭṭhi nāma suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi bhūmiṃ santharitvā vīsatiusabhaṭṭhāne tattakeneva
atk-s0502a0:2267_1: dhanena vihāraṃ kāretvā tāvattakeneva vihāramahaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:2267_2: So ekadivasaṃ pātova satthu santikaṃ gacchanto nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya kāsāvaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā kalalamakkhitehi
atk-s0502a0:2267_3: pādehi nipannaṃ ekaṃ coraṃ disvā “ayaṃ kalalamakkhitapādo rattiṃ vicaritvā divā nipannamanusso bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2267_5: jānissāmi te kattabba”nti āghātaṃ bandhitvā sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:2267_8: so ettakenāpi kopaṃ nibbāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa cūḷūpaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā “kiṃ te seṭṭhino
atk-s0502a0:2267_9: piya”nti puṭṭho “gandhakuṭito aññaṃ tassa piyataraṃ natthī”ti sutvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a0:2267_10: gandhakuṭiṃ jhāpetvā kopaṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti satthari piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe pānīyaparibhojanīyaghaṭe bhinditvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ aggiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2267_11: Seṭṭhi “gandhakuṭi kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā āgacchanto jhāmakāle āgantvā gandhakuṭiṃ jhāmaṃ olokento vālaggamattampi
atk-s0502a0:2267_12: domanassaṃ akatvā vāmabāhuṃ samañjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena mahāapphoṭanaṃ apphoṭesi.
atk-s0502a0:2267_13: Atha naṃ samīpe ṭhitā pucchiṃsu – “kasmā, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2267_14: ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā katagandhakuṭiyā jhāmakāle apphoṭesī”ti? So āha –
atk-s0502a0:2267_16: aggiādīhi asādhāraṇe buddhassa sāsane dhanaṃ nidahituṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2267_17: ‘punapi ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kātuṃ labhissāmī’ti tuṭṭhamānaso apphoṭesi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2267_18: So puna tattakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2267_20: “ahaṃ imaṃ amāretvā maṅkukātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, hotu,
atk-s0502a0:2267_21: māressāmi na”nti nivāsanantare churikaṃ bandhitvā sattāhaṃ vihāre vicarantopi okāsaṃ na labhi.
atk-s0502a0:2267_22: Mahāseṭṭhipi satta divasāni buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2267_23: mama ekena purisena sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2267_27: ahaṃ imasmiṃ dāne paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ tassa dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2268_0: Taṃ sutvā coro “bhāriyaṃ vata me kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2268_1: evaṃ aparādhakārake mayi imassa kopamattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2268_2: imasmimpi dāne mayhameva paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:2268_4: evarūpaṃ me purisaṃ akhamāpentassa devadaṇḍopi me matthake pateyyā”ti gantvā seṭṭhissa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a0:2268_8: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “tayā me idañcidañca kata”nti sabbaṃ pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a0:2268_12: So ekadivasaṃ nagarā nikkhantena tena vuttavacanaṃ sāretvā “iminā me kāraṇena kopo uppādito”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2268_15: taṃ me khamāhī”ti coraṃ khamāpetvā “uṭṭhehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2268_17: tātā”ti āha. Sace me, sāmi, khamasi,
atk-s0502a0:2268_18: saputtadāraṃ maṃ gehe dāsaṃ karohīti. Tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2268_19: tvaṃ mayā ettake kathite evarūpaṃ chedanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2268_20: gehe vasantena pana saddhiṃ na sakkā kiñci kathetuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2268_21: na me tayā gehe vasantena kiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2268_23: Coro taṃ kammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne avīcimhi nibbatto dīgharattaṃ tattha paccitvā vipākāvasesena idāni gijjhakūṭe pabbate paccatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2269_2: bālā nāma pāpāni kammāni karontā na bujjhanti,
atk-s0502a0:2269_3: pacchā pana attanā katakammehi ḍayhamānā attanāva attano dāvaggisadisāva hontī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2271_0: “Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0502a0:2273_0: Tattha atha pāpānīti na kevalaṃ bālo kodhavasena pāpāni karoti,
atk-s0502a0:2273_2: Pāpaṃ karonto ca “pāpaṃ karomī”ti abujjhanako nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2273_3: “Imassa kammassa evarūpo nāma vipāko”ti ajānanatāya “na bujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2273_4: Sehīti so tehi attano santakehi kammehi dummedho nippañño puggalo niraye nibbattitvā aggiḍaḍḍhova tappatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2277_0: Yo daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2278_2: ‘kena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa lābhasakkāro mahā hutvā nibbatto’ti.
atk-s0502a0:2278_6: So hi devalokaṃ gantvā devatāhi katakammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhantī’ti.
atk-s0502a0:2278_7: Niraye nibbattānampi kammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī’ti.
atk-s0502a0:2278_8: Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhiharanti,
atk-s0502a0:2278_11: Te “attheko upāyo”ti sabbe ekacchandā hutvā “yaṃkiñci katvā taṃ mārāpessāmā”ti attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā
atk-s0502a0:2278_12: kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā purisaghātakammaṃ katvā carante core pakkosāpetvā “mahāmoggallānatthero nāma
atk-s0502a0:2278_14: tattha gantvā taṃ mārethā”ti tesaṃ kahāpaṇe adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2278_15: Corā dhanalobhena sampaṭicchitvā “theraṃ māressāmā”ti gantvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2278_16: Thero tehi parikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuñcikacchiddena nikkhamitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2278_17: Te corā taṃ divasaṃ theraṃ adisvā punekadivasaṃ gantvā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2278_18: Thero ñatvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a0:2278_19: Evaṃ te paṭhamamāsepi majjhimamāsepi theraṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2278_20: Pacchimamāse pana sampatte thero attanā katakammassa ākaḍḍhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā na apagacchi.
atk-s0502a0:2278_21: Corā gantvā theraṃ gahetvā taṇḍulakaṇamattānissa aṭṭhīni karontā bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2278_22: Atha naṃ “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2279_0: Thero “satthāraṃ passitvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ jhānaveṭhanena veṭhetvā thiraṃ katvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2279_10: Tādisassa hi me sāvakassa idāni dassanaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0502a0:2279_12: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā parinibbānadivase sāriputtatthero viya nānappakārā iddhiyo
atk-s0502a0:2279_13: katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāṭaviṃ gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2279_14: “Theraṃ kira corā māresu”nti ayampi kathā sakalajambudīpe patthari.
atk-s0502a0:2279_15: Rājā ajātasattu core pariyesanatthāya carapurise payojesi.
atk-s0502a0:2279_16: Tesupi coresu surāpāne suraṃ pivantesu eko ekassa piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi.
atk-s0502a0:2279_18: tvaṃ kasmā me piṭṭhiṃ pātesī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2279_21: Kiṃ pana mayā pahaṭabhāvaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsīti?
atk-s0502a0:2279_23: mayā pahaṭo”ti vadantānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā te carapurisā te sabbe core gahetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2279_28: Rājā pañcasate naggasamaṇake gāhāpetvā pañcasatehi corehi saddhiṃ rājaṅgaṇe nābhippamāṇesu āvāṭesu nikhaṇāpetvā palālehi paṭicchādāpetvā aggiṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2279_29: Atha nesaṃ jhāmabhāvaṃ ñatvā ayanaṅgalehi kasāpetvā sabbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2280_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2280_6: moggallāno imasseva attabhāvassa ananurūpaṃ maraṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:2280_7: pubbe pana tena katassa kammassa anurūpameva maraṇaṃ patto”ti vatvā “kiṃ panassa, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2281_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasivāsī eko kulaputto sayameva koṭṭanapacanādīni kammāni karonto mātāpitaro paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a0:2281_2: tvaṃ ekakova gehe ca araññe ca kammaṃ karonto kilamasi,
atk-s0502a0:2281_7: tāva vo sahatthā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti tena paṭikkhittā punappunaṃ taṃ yācitvā kumārikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2281_8: Sā katipāhameva te upaṭṭhahitvā pacchā tesaṃ dassanampi anicchantī “na sakkā tava mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a0:2281_9: ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti ujjhāyitvā tasmiṃ attano kathaṃ aggaṇhante tassa bahigatakāle makacivākakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0502a0:2281_10: ca yāgupheṇañca gahetvā tattha tattha ākiritvā tenāgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhā āha –
atk-s0502a0:2281_13: na sakkā etehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2281_14: Evaṃ tāya naṃ punappunaṃ kathayamānāya evarūpopi pūritapāramī satto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhijji. So “hotu,
atk-s0502a0:2281_17: asukaṭṭhāne nāma tumhākaṃ ñātakā āgamanaṃ paccāsīsanti,
atk-s0502a0:2281_18: tattha gamissāmā”ti te yānakaṃ āropetvā ādāya gacchanto aṭavimajjhaṃ pattakāle, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2281_22: ahaṃ otarāmī”ti pitu hatthe rasmiyo datvā otaritvā gacchanto saddaṃ parivattetvā corānaṃ uṭṭhitasaddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2281_26: So mātāpitaro tathāviravantepi corasaddaṃ karonto koṭṭetvā māretvā aṭaviyaṃ khipitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0502a0:2282_2: moggallāno ettakaṃ kammaṃ katvā anekavassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate evameva koṭṭetvā saṃcuṇṇito maraṇaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a0:2282_3: Evaṃ moggallānena attano kammānurūpameva maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2282_5: Appaduṭṭhesu hi padussanto dasahi kāraṇehi anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇātiyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2288_0: Garukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe.
atk-s0502a0:2291_0: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ, bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅguraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2295_1: Appaduṭṭhesūti paresu vā attani vā niraparādhesu.
atk-s0502a0:2295_2: Dasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānanti dasasu dukkhakāraṇesu aññataraṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2295_10: idaṃ vā rājāparādhitakammaṃ tayā kata”nti evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ vā.
atk-s0502a0:2295_11: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnanti attano avassayo bhavituṃ samatthānaṃ ñātīnaṃ parikkhayaṃ vā.
atk-s0502a0:2295_19: Aggi ḍahatīti ekasaṃvacchare dvattikkhattuṃ aññasmiṃ ḍāhake avijjamānepi asaniaggi vā patitvā ḍahati,
atk-s0502a0:2295_20: attanova dhammatāya uṭṭhito pāvako vā ḍahatiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2295_21: Nirayanti diṭṭheva dhamme imesaṃ dasannaṃ ṭhānānaṃ aññataraṃ patvāpi ekaṃsena samparāye pattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “nirayaṃ sopapajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2299_0: Na naggacariyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2300_0: Sāvatthivāsī kireko kuṭumbiko bhariyāya kālakatāya pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:2300_1: So pabbajanto attano pariveṇañca aggisālañca bhaṇḍagabbhañca kāretvā sabbampi bhaṇḍagabbhaṃ sappimadhutelādīhi pūretvā pabbaji,
atk-s0502a0:2300_2: pabbajitvā ca pana attano dāse pakkosāpetvā yathārucikaṃ āhāraṃ pacāpetvā bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a0:2300_7: Tassekadivasaṃ cīvarapaccattharaṇāni sukkhāpentassa senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā bhikkhū passitvā “kassimāni,
atk-s0502a0:2300_10: tvañca pana evaṃ appicchassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ bahuparikkhāro jāto”ti taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2300_15: mayā appicchatāya dhamme desite evaṃ bahubhaṇḍo jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2300_16: So tāvattakeneva kupito “iminā dāni nīhārena carissāmī”ti pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā parisamajjhe ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2300_17: Atha naṃ satthā upatthambhayamāno nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe hirottappagavesako dakarakkhasakālepi hirottappaṃ gavesamāno dvādasa vassāni vihāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2300_18: kasmā idāni evaṃ garuke buddhasāsane pabbajitvā catuparisamajjhe pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā hirottappaṃ pahāya ṭhitosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2300_19: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2300_20: Bhikkhū tassa atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2301_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ bodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:2301_3: Tesaṃ mātari kālakatāya rājā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2301_6: Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭho “puttassa te varaṃ dammī”ti āha. Sāpi kho, “deva,
atk-s0502a0:2301_7: icchitakāle gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā puttassa vayappattakāle rājānaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:2301_10: Rājā “mama dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalantā vicaranti,
atk-s0502a0:2301_11: na sakkā tassa rajjaṃ dātu”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānameva disvā “ayaṃ me puttānaṃ anatthampi kareyyā”ti putte pakkosāpetvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:2301_17: araññe vasitvā mamaccayenāgantvā rajjaṃ gaṇhathā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:2301_18: Te pitaraṃ vanditvā pāsādā otarante rājaṅgaṇe kīḷamāno sūriyakumāro disvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā tehi saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:2301_19: Tesaṃ himavantaṃ paviṭṭhakāle bodhisatto maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā sūriyakumāraṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2301_20: etaṃ saraṃ gantvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca amhākampi paduminipaṇṇehi udakaṃ āharā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2301_21: So pana saro vessavaṇṇassa santikā ekena dakarakkhasena laddho hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2301_23: “ṭhapetvā devadhammajānanake ye ca aññe imaṃ saraṃ otaranti,
atk-s0502a0:2301_25: Tato paṭṭhāya so taṃ saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe devadhamme pucchitvā ajānante khādati,
atk-s0502a0:2301_27: tena ca “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma candimasūriyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2301_28: Atha naṃ “tvaṃ devadhamme na jānāsī”ti udakaṃ pavesetvā attano bhavane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2301_29: Bodhisattopi taṃ cirāyantaṃ disvā candakumāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:2301_30: Sopi tena “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma catasso disā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2301_31: Dakarakkhaso tampi udakaṃ pavesetvā tattheva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2302_0: Bodhisatto tasmimpi cirāyante “antarāyena bhavitabba”nti sayaṃ gantvā dvinnampi otaraṇapadaṃyeva disvā
atk-s0502a0:2302_1: “ayaṃ saro rakkhasapariggahito”ti ñatvā khaggaṃ sannayhitvā dhanuṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2302_2: Rakkhaso taṃ anotarantaṃ disvā vanakammikapurisavesenāgantvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:2302_5: kasmā imaṃ saraṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca bhisamulālaṃ khāditvā pupphāni pilandhitvā na gacchasī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2302_6: Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva “esa so yakkho”ti ñatvā “tayā me bhātaro gahitā”ti āha. Āma,
atk-s0502a0:2302_12: Atthi pana te devadhammehi atthoti? Āma, atthīti.
atk-s0502a0:2302_16: Yakkho bodhisattaṃ nhāpetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā alaṅkaritvā alaṅkatamaṇḍapamajjhe pallaṅkaṃ āropetvā sayamassa pādamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2302_17: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “sakkaccaṃ suṇāhī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2305_0: Yakkho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno bodhisattaṃ āha – “paṇḍita,
atk-s0502a0:2305_8: Yasmā jeṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā kaniṭṭhaṃ āharāpento jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ na karosīti,
atk-s0502a0:2305_11: Mayañhi etaṃ nissāya imaṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a0:2305_12: Etassa hi atthāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ etassa mātā rajjaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a0:2305_13: amhākaṃ pana pitā taṃ varaṃ adatvā amhākaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya araññe vāsaṃ anujāni,
atk-s0502a0:2305_14: so kumāro anivattitvā amhehi saddhiṃ āgato.
atk-s0502a0:2305_15: “Taṃ araññe eko yakkho khādī”ti vuttepi na koci saddahissati.
atk-s0502a0:2305_19: devadhammesu ca vattasī”ti dve bhātaro ānetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2305_20: Atha naṃ bodhisatto yakkhabhāve ādīnavaṃ kathetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2305_21: So tena susaṃvihitārakkho tasmiṃ araññe vasitvā pitari kālakate yakkhaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā candakumārassa uparajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2305_22: sūriyakumārassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ datvā yakkhassa ramaṇīye ṭhāne āyatanaṃ kārāpetvā yathā so lābhaggappatto hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2306_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rakkhaso bahubhaṇḍikabhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:2306_4: Evaṃ satthā jātakaṃ kathetvā “evaṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a0:2306_5: pubbe devadhamme gavesamāno hiriottappasampanno vicaritvā idāni catuparisamajjhe iminā nīhārena ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a0:2306_7: Na hi sāṭakapaṭikkhepādimattena samaṇo nāma hotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2308_0: “Na naggacariyā na jaṭā na paṅkā, nānāsakā thaṇḍilasāyikā vā;
atk-s0502a0:2310_6: yo hi macco “evaṃ ahaṃ lokanissaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ suddhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti imesu naggacariyādīsu yaṃ kiñci samādāya vatteyya,
atk-s0502a0:2310_9: Na hi etāni susamādinnānipi aṭṭhavatthukāya kaṅkhāya avitiṇṇabhāvena avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ maccaṃ sodhentīti.
atk-s0502a0:2314_0: Alaṅkato cepīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto santatimahāmattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2315_0: So hi ekasmiṃ kāle rañño pasenadikosalassa paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametvā āgato.
atk-s0502a0:2315_1: Athassa rājā tuṭṭho satta divasāni rajjaṃ datvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ itthiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2315_2: So satta divasāni surāmadamatto hutvā sattame divase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato nhānatitthaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2315_3: gacchanto satthāraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā hatthikkhandhavaragatova sīsaṃ cāletvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2315_4: Satthā sitaṃ katvā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2315_5: sitapātukaraṇe hetū”ti ānandattherena puṭṭho sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0502a0:2315_8: ajja sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova mama santikaṃ āgantvā catuppadikagāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā sattatālamatte ākāse nisīditvā parinibbāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2315_9: Mahājano therena saddhiṃ kathentassa satthu vacanaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a0:2315_13: ajja kira esa evaṃ surāmadamatto yathālaṅkatova etassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0502a0:2316_0: Santatimahāmattopi nhānatitthe divasabhāgaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā āpānabhūmiyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2316_1: Sāpi itthī raṅgamajjhaṃ otaritvā naccagītaṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a0:2316_2: Tassā sarīralīḷāya dassanatthaṃ sattāhaṃ appāhāratāya taṃ divasaṃ naccagītaṃ dassayamānāya antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2316_4: Sā taṅkhaṇaññeva mukhena ceva akkhīhi ca vivaṭehi kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2316_6: sāmī”ti ca vuttamatteyeva balavasokena abhibhūto taṅkhaṇaññevassa sattāhaṃ pītasurā tattakapāle udakabindu viya parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2316_7: So “na me imaṃ sokaṃ aññe nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissanti aññatra tathāgatenā”ti balakāyaparivuto sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2316_9: taṃ me tumhe nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissathā’ti āgatomhi,
atk-s0502a0:2316_11: Atha naṃ satthā “sokaṃ nibbāpetuṃ samatthasseva santikaṃ āgatosi.
atk-s0502a0:2316_12: Imissā hi itthiyā imināva ākārena matakāle tava rodantassa paggharitaassūni catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato atirekatarānī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2317_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2318_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:2319_0: Gāthāpariyosāne santatimahāmatto arahattaṃ patvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento tassa appavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2319_2: Satthā tena katakammaṃ jānantopi “musāvādena niggaṇhanatthaṃ sannipatitā micchādiṭṭhikā okāsaṃ na labhissanti,
atk-s0502a0:2319_3: ‘buddhalīḷañceva santatimahāmattalīḷañca passissāmā’ti sannipatitā sammādiṭṭhikā iminā katakammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a0:2319_4: puññesu ādaraṃ karissantī”ti sallakkhetvā “tena hi tayā katakammaṃ mayhaṃ kathehi,
atk-s0502a0:2319_5: kathento ca bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito akathetvā sattatālamatte ākāse ṭhito kathehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2319_7: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ekatālappamāṇaṃ uggamma orohitvā puna satthāraṃ vanditvā uggacchanto paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0502a0:2319_8: sattatālappamāṇe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “suṇātha me, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2320_0: Ito ekanavutikappe vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle ahaṃ bandhumatinagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā cintesiṃ –
atk-s0502a0:2320_1: “kiṃ nu kho paresaṃ chedaṃ vā pīḷaṃ vā akaraṇakamma”nti upadhārento dhammaghosakakammaṃ disvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a0:2320_2: taṃ kammaṃ karonto mahājanaṃ samādapetvā “puññāni karotha,
atk-s0502a0:2320_7: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ karothā”ti ugghosento vicarāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2320_8: Tassa mayhaṃ saddaṃ sutvā buddhapitā bandhumatimahārājā maṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2320_10: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsetvā mahājanaṃ puññakammesu samādapento vicarāmī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2320_14: imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ pilandhitvā assapiṭṭhe nisinnova vicarā”ti mayhaṃ muttādāmasadisaṃ pupphadāmaṃ datvā dantaṃ assaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2320_15: Atha maṃ raññā dinnaparihārena tatheva ugghosetvā vicarantaṃ puna rājā pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2320_20: Tatiyavārepi me rājā saddaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2320_23: rathopi te nānucchaviko”ti mayhaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahāpasādhanañca datvā ekañca hatthiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2320_24: Svāhaṃ sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhe nisinno asīti vassasahassāni dhammaghosakakammaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2320_25: tassa me ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāyato candanagandho vāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2321_0: Evaṃ so attano pubbakammaṃ kathetvā ākāse nisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2321_5: Tā patte pakkhipitvā catumahāpathe thūpaṃ kāresi “mahājano vanditvā puññabhāgī bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2321_7: santatimahāmatto gāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattoyeva ākāse nisīditvā parinibbuto,
atk-s0502a0:2321_8: kiṃ nu kho etaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati udāhu brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2321_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2321_14: ‘brāhmaṇo’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2326_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2327_2: vatthālaṅkārādīhi alaṅkato cepi puggalo kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya,
atk-s0502a0:2327_3: rāgādivūpasamena santo indriyadamanena danto catumagganiyamena niyato seṭṭhacariyāya brahmacārī kāyadaṇḍādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2327_5: So evarūpo bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇotipi samitapāpattā samaṇotipi bhinnakilesattā bhikkhūtipi vattabboyevāti.
atk-s0502a0:2331_0: Hirīnisedhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pilotikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2332_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye ānandatthero ekaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍanivatthaṃ kapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantaṃ dārakaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a0:2332_1: “kiṃ te evaṃ vicaritvā jīvanato pabbajjā na uttaritarā”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2332_2: ko maṃ pabbājessatī”ti vutte “ahaṃ pabbājessāmī”ti taṃ ādāya gantvā sahatthā nhāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:2332_3: Tañca pana nivatthapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā olokento parissāvanakaraṇamattampi gayhūpagaṃ kañci padesaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2332_4: adisvā kapālena saddhiṃ ekissā rukkhasākhāya ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2332_5: So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ paribhuñjamāno mahagghāni cīvarāni acchādetvā
atk-s0502a0:2332_6: vicaranto thūlasarīro hutvā ukkaṇṭhitvā “kiṃ me janassa saddhādeyyaṃ nivāsetvā vicaraṇena,
atk-s0502a0:2332_7: attano pilotikameva nivāsessāmī”ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā pilotikaṃ gahetvā “ahirika nillajja evarūpānaṃ vatthānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2332_8: acchādanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya imaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho bhikkhāya carituṃ gacchasī”ti taṃ
atk-s0502a0:2332_11: So taṃ pilotikaṃ tattheva paṭisāmetvā nivattitvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0502a0:2332_12: So katipāhaccayena punapi ukkaṇṭhitvā tatheva vatvā nivatti,
atk-s0502a0:2332_14: Taṃ evaṃ aparāparaṃ vicarantaṃ disvā bhikkhū “kahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:2332_16: So “ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchāmāvuso”ti vatvā eteneva nīhārena attano pilotikakhaṇḍameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:2332_30: mama putto saṃsagge sati ācariyassa santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a0:2332_32: attanāva attānaṃ nisedhetvā arahattaṃ patto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2335_0: Yo niddaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasāmiva.
atk-s0502a0:2343_0: Tattha anto uppannaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ hiriyā nisedhetīti hirīnisedho.
atk-s0502a0:2343_3: Yo niddanti appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karonto attano uppannaṃ niddaṃ apaharanto bujjhatīti apabodheti.
atk-s0502a0:2343_4: Kasāmivāti yathā bhadro asso attani patamānaṃ kasaṃ apaharati,
atk-s0502a0:2344_2: yathā bhadro asso pamādamāgamma kasāya niviṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:2344_3: ahampi nāma kasāya pahaṭo”ti aparabhāge ātappaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a0:2344_5: evaṃbhūtā lokiyalokuttarāya duvidhāya saddhāya ca catupārisuddhisīlena ca kāyikacetasikavīriyena ca aṭṭhasamāpattisamādhinā
atk-s0502a0:2344_6: ca kāraṇākāraṇajānanalakkhaṇena dhammavinicchayena ca samannāgatā hutvā tissannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā vijjānaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2344_8: Upaṭṭhitasatitāya patissatā hutvā idaṃ anappakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pajahissathāti.
atk-s0502a0:2348_0: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sukhasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2349_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiseṭṭhino gandhakumāro nāma putto ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2349_1: Rājā tassa pitari kālakate taṃ pakkosāpetvā samassāsetvā mahantena sakkārena tasseva seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2349_7: “kiṃ pana te imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā na gamiṃsū”ti. “Sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2349_9: Attanā kataṃ kusalākusalameva hi ādāya sattā gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2349_14: pūjaṃ vā karissāmī”ti acintetvā “idaṃ sabbaṃ khāditvāva gamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:2349_15: So satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā phalikamayaṃ nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0502a0:2349_25: taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanadivase satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0502a0:2350_1: Sopi satasahassagghanake nhānakoṭṭhake satasahassagghanake phalake nisīditvā soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi
atk-s0502a0:2350_2: nhatvā taṃ sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā tasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2350_3: Athassa tasmiṃ āsittakūpadhāne taṃ pātiṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassagghanakaṃ bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2350_4: So nāṭakaparivuto evarūpāya sampattiyā taṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a0:2350_5: Aparena samayena eko gāmikamanusso attano paribbayāharaṇatthaṃ dāruādīni yānake pakkhipitvā nagaraṃ gantvā sahāyakassa gehe nivāsaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:2350_13: etassa mahāsampattiṃ passāmā”ti nagaravāsī janapadavāsiṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2350_16: “mayhaṃ etāya pātiyā bhattapiṇḍe pipāsā jātā”ti. Samma,
atk-s0502a0:2350_20: So taṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto parisapariyante ṭhatvā “paṇamāmi te,
atk-s0502a0:2350_21: sāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ nicchāretvā “ko eso”ti vutte ahaṃ, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:2350_23: “Ayaṃ eko gāmavāsī tumhākaṃ pātiyaṃ bhattapiṇḍe pipāsaṃ upādesi,
atk-s0502a0:2350_37: tassa tassa dadamāno ahaṃ kiṃ bhuñjissāmīti? Sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2350_42: tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mama gehe bhatiṃ karotu,
atk-s0502a0:2350_45: sammā”ti sahāyakaṃ vatvā puttadāraṃ pahāya “bhattapātiatthāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karissāmī”ti seṭṭhissa gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:2350_46: So bhatiṃ karonto sabbakiccāni sakkaccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2350_47: Gehe vā araññe vā rattiṃ vā divā vā sabbāni kattabbakammāni katāneva paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2350_51: dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karontena,
atk-s0502a0:2351_0: Athassa seṭṭhi attano sāyapātarāsatthāya dve sahassāni,
atk-s0502a0:2351_1: tassa pātarāsatthāya sahassanti tīṇi sahassāni dāpetvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:2351_3: Vatvā ca pana ṭhapetvā ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ nāma piyabhariyaṃ avasesajanampi “ajja tameva parivārethā”ti vatvā sabbasampattiṃ tassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:2351_4: So seṭṭhino nhānodakena tasseva koṭṭhake tasmiṃ phalake nisinno nhatvā tasseva nivāsanasāṭake nivāsetvā tasseva pallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2351_6: “bhattabhatiko gandhaseṭṭhissa gehe tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā pātiṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:2351_12: Athassa hatthadhovanavelāya gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho sattame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “kattha
atk-s0502a0:2351_13: nu kho ajja bhikkhācāratthāya gacchāmī”ti upadhārento bhattabhatikaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2351_14: Atha so “ayaṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā bhattapātiṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:2351_16: natthī”ti upadhārento “atthī”ti ñatvā “saddhāpi ekacce saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:2351_17: sakkhissati nu kho me saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā “sakkhissati ceva mama ca saṅgahakaraṇaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0502a0:2351_18: labhissatī”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā parisantarena gantvā tassa purato
atk-s0502a0:2352_1: “ahaṃ pubbe adinnabhāvena ekissā bhattapātiyā atthāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni paragehe bhatiṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2352_2: idāni me idaṃ bhattaṃ ekaṃ rattindivaṃ rakkheyya,
atk-s0502a0:2352_6: So tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhattapātito ekapiṇḍampi mukhe aṭṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ vinodetvā sayameva
atk-s0502a0:2352_7: pātiṃ ukkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā pātiṃ aññassa hatthe datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:2352_8: pātiṃ vāmahatthena gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena tassa patte bhattaṃ ākiri.
atk-s0502a0:2352_9: Paccekabuddho bhattassa upaḍḍhasesakāle pattaṃ hatthena pidahi.
atk-s0502a0:2352_11: ekova paṭiviso na sakkā dvidhā kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2352_15: Attano hi thokampi anavasesetvā dinnaṃ niravasesadānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a0:2352_17: So tathā karonto sabbaṃ datvā puna vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2352_18: ekaṃ bhattapātiṃ nissāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni me paragehe bhatiṃ karontena dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2352_22: cintāmaṇi viya te sabbakāmadado manosaṅkappā puṇṇacando viya pūrentū”ti anumodanaṃ karonto –
atk-s0502a0:2354_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā.
atk-s0502a0:2356_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, maṇi jotiraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2357_0: Vatvā “ayaṃ mahājano yāva gandhamādanapabbatagamanā maṃ passanto tiṭṭhatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2358_1: So tattha gantvā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vibhajitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2358_6: Mahājano paccekabuddhānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vibhajitvā diyyamānaṃ disvā sādhukārasahassāni pavattesi,
atk-s0502a0:2358_10: tenāyaṃ mahājano parihāsaṃ karonto sannipatito nadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2358_13: evaṃ hontū”ti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2358_14: Seṭṭhi taṃ sutvāva pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “aho dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2358_15: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ evarūpāya sampattiyā ṭhito kiñci dātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā idaṃ nāma kata”nti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a0:2358_17: sahassaṃ gahetvā tava dāne mayhampi pattiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2358_19: Seṭṭhipissa sabbaṃ attano santakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2359_5: Tattha nirodhasamāpattiraho arahā vā anāgāmī vā dakkhiṇeyyo vatthusampadā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:2359_6: Paccayānaṃ dhammena samena uppatti paccayasampadā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:2359_7: Dānato pubbe dānakāle pacchā bhāgeti tīsu kālesu cetanāya somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttabhāvo cetanāsampadā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:2359_10: bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhāvena paccayo dhammato uppanno,
atk-s0502a0:2359_12: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamatto paccekabuddho guṇātirekoti catassopi sampadā nipphannā.
atk-s0502a0:2359_13: Etāsaṃ ānubhāvena diṭṭheva dhamme mahāsampattiṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0502a0:2359_14: Tasmā so seṭṭhino santikā sampattiṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:2359_15: Aparabhāge ca rājāpi iminā katakammaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā sahassaṃ datvā pattiṃ gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0502a0:2359_18: So gandhaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sahāyo hutvā ekato khādanto pivanto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a0:2359_19: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule
atk-s0502a0:2359_21: Athassa mātā laddhagabbhaparihārā katipāhaccayena “aho vatāhaṃ pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0502a0:2359_22: satarasabhojanaṃ datvā kāsāyavatthanivatthā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisinnā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2359_23: ucchiṭṭhāvasesakaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti dohaḷinī hutvā tatheva katvā dohaḷaṃ paṭivinodesi.
atk-s0502a0:2359_24: Sā sesamaṅgalesupi tathārūpameva dānaṃ datvā puttaṃ vijāyitvā nāmaggahaṇadivase “puttassa me, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2359_27: puttassa me paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe kassaci dukkhaṃ nāma na bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2359_28: tenevassa sukhakumāroti nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti vutte tadevassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpadāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_0: Tadā evañcassa mātu “nāhaṃ mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:2360_1: Sā tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalādīsupi tatheva dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_5: nāhaṃ tava ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2360_7: imāhaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā ñātake sannipātetvā “puttassa me gihikāle kattabbaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2360_8: kiccaṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti vatvā puttaṃ alaṅkaritvā mahantena sirisobhaggena vihāraṃ netvā therassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_13: Mātāpitaropissa pabbajjāya sakkāraṃ karontā antovihāreyeva sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a0:2360_14: satarasabhojanaṃ datvā sāyaṃ attano gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2360_15: Aṭṭhame divase sāriputtatthero bhikkhusaṅghe gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe vihāre kattabbakiccaṃ katvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_16: Sāmaṇero antarāmagge mātikādīni disvā paṇḍitasāmaṇero viya pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_18: Sāmaṇero tāni kāraṇāni sutvā “sace tumhe attano pattacīvaraṃ gaṇheyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:2360_19: ahaṃ nivatteyya”nti vatvā therena tassa ajjhāsayaṃ abhinditvā,
atk-s0502a0:2360_21: dehi mama pattacīvara”nti pattacīvare gahite theraṃ vanditvā nivattamāno, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2360_22: mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharamāno satarasabhojanaṃ āhareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2360_24: Attano puññena alabhanto mama puññena labhissatha, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a0:2360_25: Athassa thero kuñcikaṃ datvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:2360_26: Sopi vihāraṃ āgantvā therassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya attano kāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2361_0: Tassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:2361_1: Sakko “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti olokento sāmaṇeraṃ disvā “sukhasāmaṇero attano upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a0:2361_2: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje pakkosāpetvā “gacchatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:2361_4: Te tathā katvā sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2361_9: Sāmaṇero ekaggacittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:2361_11: kassa nu kho ghare sakkā laddhu”nti olokento ekaṃ ajjhāsayasampannaṃ upaṭṭhākatulaṃ disvā tattha gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2361_12: sādhu vo kataṃ ajja idhāgacchantehī”ti tehi tuṭṭhamānasehi pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a0:2361_13: yāva bhattakālaṃ dhammakathaṃ yācito tesaṃ sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ kathetvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2361_14: Athassa satarasabhojanaṃ datvā taṃ ādāya gantukāmaṃ theraṃ disvā “bhuñjatha, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2361_15: aparampi te dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2361_16: Thero taṃ ādāya “sāmaṇero me chāto”ti turitaturito vihāraṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2361_17: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā pātova nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova āvajjesi –
atk-s0502a0:2361_18: “ajja sukhasāmaṇero upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a0:2361_20: So tiṇṇaṃyeva maggaphalānaṃ pattabhāvaṃ disvā uttaripi upadhārento “sakkhissatāyaṃ ajja arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2361_21: sāriputto pana ‘sāmaṇero me chāto’ti vegena bhattaṃ ādāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0502a0:2361_22: sace imasmiṃ arahattaṃ appatte bhattaṃ āharissati,
atk-s0502a0:2361_24: mayā gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:2362_1: Atha naṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:2362_7: Sāmaṇeropi nikkhamitvā upajjhāyassa vattaṃ katvā “bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti vutte therassa bhattena anatthikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2362_8: ñatvā sattavassikakumāro taṅkhaṇaññeva arahattaṃ patto nīcāsanaṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhanto bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:2362_10: Tasmiṃ kāle cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2362_16: kiṃ nu kho ajja pubbaṇho balavā jāto,
atk-s0502a0:2362_24: atha ca pana sūriyo nabhamajjhaṃ atikkantoyeva paññāyatī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2362_27: Ajja hi cattāro mahārājāno sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2362_33: tacchake cakkādīni karonte disvā attānaṃ dametvā arahattaṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2365_0: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2366_0: Tattha subbatāti suvadā, sukhena ovaditabbā anusāsitabbāti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0502a0:2373_0: Ko nu hāso kimānandoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhāya sahāyikāyo ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2374_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā kulaputtā “evaṃ imā appamādavihāriniyo bhavissantī”ti attano attano bhariyāyo visākhaṃ mahāupāsikaṃ sampaṭicchāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2374_1: Tā uyyānaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gacchantiyo tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:2374_2: Tā ekasmiṃ kāle “sattāhaṃ surāchaṇo bhavissatī”ti chaṇe saṅghuṭṭhe attano attano sāmikānaṃ suraṃ paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2374_3: Te sattāhaṃ surāchaṇaṃ kīḷitvā aṭṭhame divase kammantabheriyā nikkhantāya kammante agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2374_4: Tāpi itthiyo “mayaṃ sāmikānaṃ sammukhā suraṃ pātuṃ na labhimhā,
atk-s0502a0:2374_7: tathā pivissāmā”ti visākhāya santikaṃ gantvā “icchāma, ayye,
atk-s0502a0:2374_9: tena hi kattabbakiccāni katvā nikkhamathā”ti vutte tāya saddhiṃ gantvā paṭicchannākārena suraṃ nīharāpetvā uyyāne pivitvā mattā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2374_11: idāni maṃ ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikā visākhā suraṃ pivitvā vicaratī’ti titthiyāpi garahissantī”ti cintetvā tā itthiyo āha –
atk-s0502a0:2374_19: Atha tāsaṃ sāmikā “itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca kaha”nti pucchitvā “gilānā”ti sutvā “addhā etāhi avasesasurā
atk-s0502a0:2374_20: pītā bhavissantī”ti sallakkhetvā tā pothetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2374_21: Tā aparasmimpi chaṇavāre tatheva suraṃ pivitukāmā visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a0:2374_22: uyyānaṃ no nehī”ti vatvā “pubbepi me tumhehi ayaso uppādito,
atk-s0502a0:2374_24: na vo ahaṃ nessāmī”ti tāya paṭikkhittā “idāni evaṃ na karissāmā”ti sammantayitvā puna taṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu, “ayye,
atk-s0502a0:2374_30: Tā caṅkoṭakehi gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā surāpuṇṇe muṭṭhivārake hatthehi olambetvā mahāpaṭe pārupitvā
atk-s0502a0:2374_31: visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ pavisamānā ekamantaṃ gantvā muṭṭhivārakeheva suraṃ pivitvā
atk-s0502a0:2374_32: vārake chaḍḍetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ satthu purato nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2375_4: Athekā mārakāyikā devatā “imāsaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā samaṇassa gotamassa purato vippakāraṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā tāsaṃ sarīre adhimucci.
atk-s0502a0:2375_5: Tāsu ekaccā satthu purato pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2375_7: Satthā “kiṃ ida”nti āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “na idāni mārakāyikānaṃ otāraṃ labhituṃ dassāmi.
atk-s0502a0:2375_8: Na hi mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūrentena mārakāyikānaṃ otāralābhatthāya pūritā”ti tā saṃvejetuṃ bhamukalomato rasmiyo vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a0:2375_12: Satthā nisinnapallaṅke antarahito sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā uṇṇālomato rasmiṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a0:2375_14: Atha satthā tā itthiyo āmantetvā “tumhehi mama santikaṃ āgacchamānāhi pamattāhi āgantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a0:2375_15: Tumhākañhi pamādeneva mārakāyikā devatā otāraṃ labhitvā tumhe hasādīnaṃ akaraṇaṭṭhāne hasādīni kārāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:2375_16: idāni tumhehi rāgādīnaṃ aggīnaṃ nibbāpanatthāya ussāhaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2377_0: “Ko nu hāso kimānando, niccaṃ pajjalite sati;
atk-s0502a0:2379_2: imasmiṃ lokasannivāse rāgādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi niccaṃ pajjalite sati ko nu tumhākaṃ hāso vā tuṭṭhi vā?
atk-s0502a0:2379_4: Aṭṭhavatthukena hi avijjāndhakārena onaddhā tumhe tasseva andhakārassa vidhamanatthāya kiṃ kāraṇā ñāṇappadīpaṃ na gavesatha na karothāti.
atk-s0502a0:2380_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi tā itthiyo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2381_0: Satthā tāsaṃ acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sinerumatthakā otaritvā buddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2381_3: Evarūpā hi nāma imā itthiyo tumhādisassa buddhassa purato nisīditvā iriyāpathamattampi saṇṭhāpetuṃ asakkontiyo
atk-s0502a0:2381_7: Etañhi nissāya aneke sattā anayabyasanaṃ pattā”ti vatvā “kadā panesā, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2381_8: uppannā”ti vutte tassā uppattiṃ vitthārena kathetuṃ atītaṃ āharitvā kumbhajātakaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0502a0:2384_0: Passa cittakatanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sirimaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2385_1: Ekasmiṃ pana antovasse sumanaseṭṭhiputtassa bhariyāya puṇṇakaseṭṭhissa dhītāya uttarāya nāma upāsikāya
atk-s0502a0:2385_2: aparajjhitvā taṃ pasādetukāmā tassā gehe bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ katabhattakiccaṃ satthāraṃ khamāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:2388_3: Evaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā pana sirimā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ datvā saṅghassa aṭṭhakabhattaṃ nibaddhaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2388_4: Ādito paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ aṭṭha bhikkhū gehaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:2388_6: khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni vatvā tesaṃ patte pūreti.
atk-s0502a0:2388_9: Athekadivasaṃ eko bhikkhu tassā gehe aṭṭhakabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tiyojanamatthake ekaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2388_10: Atha naṃ sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ pucchiṃsu – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:2388_18: Sā hi itthī evarūpā ca evarūpā cā”ti tassā guṇe vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0502a0:2389_0: Atheko bhikkhu tassā guṇakathaṃ sutvā adassaneneva sinehaṃ uppādetvā “mayā gantvā taṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a0:2389_1: attano vassaggaṃ kathetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā “sve, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:2389_2: tasmiṃ gehe tvaṃ saṅghatthero hutvā aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhissasī”ti sutvā taṅkhaṇaññeva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya
