atk-s0502a0:2727_0: Pathabyā ekarajjenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kālaṃ nāma anāthapiṇḍikassa puttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2728_0: So kira tathāvidhassa saddhāsampannassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā neva satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2728_5: karī”ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ na suṇāti.
atk-s0502a0:2728_7: “ayaṃ evarūpaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā vicaranto avīciparāyaṇo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:2728_9: yaṃ mayi passante mama putto nirayaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0502a0:2728_10: Imasmiṃ kho pana loke dhanadānena abhijjanakasatto nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2728_13: uposathiko hutvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā ehi,
atk-s0502a0:2728_14: kahāpaṇasataṃ te dassāmī”ti. Dassatha, tātāti. Dassāmi, puttāti.
atk-s0502a0:2728_15: So yāvatatiyaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā uposathiko hutvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2728_20: So “kahāpaṇe aggahetvā na bhuñjissāmī”ti āhaṭāhaṭaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2728_21: Athassa pitā pīḷaṃ asahanto kahāpaṇabhaṇḍaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2728_22: So taṃ hatthena gahetvāva āhāraṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a0:2729_2: satthu purato ṭhatvā ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:2729_3: Sopi vihāraṃ gantvā satthu purato ṭhatvāva ekameva padaṃ uggaṇhitvā palāyitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2729_5: So taṃ padaṃ asallakkhetvā uparipadaṃ uggaṇhissāmīti ṭhatvā assosiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2729_6: Uggaṇhissāmīti suṇantova kira sakkaccaṃ suṇāti nāma.
atk-s0502a0:2729_7: Evañca kira suṇantānaṃ dhammo sotāpattimaggādayo deti.
atk-s0502a0:2729_10: So “uparipadaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti ṭhatvā suṇantova sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2730_0: So punadivase buddhappamukhena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃyeva sāvatthiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:2730_1: Mahāseṭṭhi taṃ disvā “ajja mama puttassa ākāro ruccatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:2730_3: “aho vata me pitā ajja satthu santike kahāpaṇe na dadeyya,
atk-s0502a0:2730_5: Satthā panassa hiyyova kahāpaṇassa kāraṇā uposathikabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2730_7: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa yāguṃ dāpetvā puttassapi dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2730_11: Mahāseṭṭhi satthu bhattakiccāvasāne puttassa purato sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2730_12: mayā te ‘sahassaṃ dassāmī’ti vatvā uposathaṃ samādāpetvā vihāraṃ pahito.
atk-s0502a0:2730_14: So satthu purato kahāpaṇe diyyamāne disvā lajjanto “alaṃ me kahāpaṇehī”ti vatvā, “gaṇha,
atk-s0502a0:2730_17: ajja me puttassa ākāro ruccatī”ti vatvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2730_18: mahāseṭṭhī”ti vutte “mayā esa purimadivase ‘kahāpaṇasataṃ te dassāmī’ti vatvā vihāraṃ pesito.
atk-s0502a0:2730_19: Punadivase kahāpaṇe aggahetvā bhuñjituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0502a0:2730_20: ajja pana diyyamānepi kahāpaṇe na icchatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2730_23: ajja tava puttassa cakkavattisampattitopi devalokabrahmalokasampattīhipi sotāpattiphalameva vara”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2734_1: Saggassa gamanena vāti chabbīsatividhassa saggassa adhigamanena.
atk-s0502a0:2734_2: Sabbalokādhipaccenāti na ekasmiṃ ettake loke nāgasupaṇṇavemānikapetehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2734_4: Sotāpattiphalaṃ varanti yasmā ettake ṭhāne rajjaṃ kāretvāpi nirayādīhi amuttova hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2734_5: sotāpanno pana pihitāpāyadvāro hutvā sabbadubbalopi aṭṭhame bhave na nibbattati,
atk-s0502a0:2741_0: Yassa jitanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhimaṇḍe viharanto māradhītaro ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2741_1: Desanaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā puna kururaṭṭhe māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2742_0: Kururaṭṭhe kira māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa dhītā māgaṇḍiyāyeva nāma ahosi uttamarūpadharā.
atk-s0502a0:2742_1: Taṃ patthayamānā anekabrāhmaṇamahāsālā ceva khattiyamahāsālā ca “dhītaraṃ no detū”ti māgaṇḍiyassa pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2742_2: Sopi “na tumhe mayhaṃ dhītu anucchavikā”ti sabbe paṭikkhipateva.
atk-s0502a0:2742_3: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2742_4: disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento brāhmaṇassa ca brāhmaṇiyā ca tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2742_6: Satthā pātova pattacīvaramādāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2742_7: Brāhmaṇo satthu rūpasiriṃ olokento “imasmiṃ loke iminā sadiso puriso nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2742_9: imassa me dhītaraṃ dassāmā”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ āha – “samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:2742_11: ahaṃ tassā anucchavikaṃ purisaṃ apassanto taṃ na kassaci adāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2742_13: ahaṃ te dhītaraṃ pādaparicārikaṃ katvā dātukāmo,
atk-s0502a0:2742_16: Satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā neva abhinandi,
atk-s0502a0:2743_1: ajja me dhītu anucchaviko puriso diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:2743_2: tassa naṃ dassāmā”ti dhītaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā ādāya brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2743_4: Satthā brāhmaṇena vuttaṭṭhāne aṭṭhatvā tattha padacetiyaṃ dassetvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2743_5: Buddhānaṃ kira padacetiyaṃ “idaṃ asuko nāma passatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā akkantaṭṭhāneyeva paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2743_7: Brāhmaṇo attanā saddhiṃ gacchamānāya brāhmaṇiyā “kahaṃ so”ti puṭṭho “imasmiṃ ṭhāne tiṭṭhāhīti taṃ avaca”nti
atk-s0502a0:2743_12: mayā so samaṇo diṭṭho ‘dhītaraṃ te dassāmī’ti vutto,
atk-s0502a0:2743_16: idaṃ pana nikkilesasseva pada”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2748_2: tuṇhībhūtāva ehī”ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ so puriso”ti tassā dassetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:2748_4: Satthā “na me tava dhītāya attho”ti avatvā,
atk-s0502a0:2748_9: suṇissāmī”ti vutte abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya atītaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:2749_1: mahāsatto rajjasiriṃ pahāya kaṇṭakaṃ āruyha channasahāyo abhinikkhamanto nagaradvāre ṭhitena mārena “siddhattha, nivatta,
atk-s0502a0:2749_2: ito te sattame divase cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavissatī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2749_7: “Tena hi sace ajjato paṭṭhāya kāmavitakkādīnaṃ ekampi vitakkaṃ vitakkessasi,
atk-s0502a0:2749_9: So tato paṭṭhāya otārāpekkho satta vassāni mahāsattaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0502a0:2750_0: Satthāpi chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā paccattapurisakāraṃ nissāya bodhimūle sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0502a0:2750_2: Tasmiṃ samaye māro “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ anubandhitvā otārāpekkhopi imassa kiñci khalitaṃ nāddasaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2750_3: atikkanto idāni esa mama visaya”nti domanassappatto mahāmagge nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2750_4: Athassa taṇhā aratī ragāti imā tisso dhītaro “pitā no na paññāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2750_5: kahaṃ nu kho etarahī”ti olokayamānā taṃ tathā nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā “kasmā, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:2750_10: mayaṃ taṃ attano vase katvā ānessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2750_13: mayaṃ itthiyo nāma idāneva naṃ rāgapāsādīhi bandhitvā ānessāma,
atk-s0502a0:2750_14: tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:2751_5: nānappakārehi taṃ palobhessāmā”ti ekekā kumārikavaṇṇādivasena sataṃ sataṃ attabhāve abhinimminitvā kumāriyo, avijātā,
atk-s0502a0:2751_8: mahallakitthiyo ca hutvā chakkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:2751_10: Tampi bhagavā na manasākāsi yathā taṃ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti.
atk-s0502a0:2751_13: evarūpaṃ nāma vītarāgānaṃ purato kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a0:2751_15: Kena taṃ kāraṇena attano vasaṃ nessathā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2762_0: Tattha yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyatīti yassa sammāsambuddhassa tena tena maggena jitaṃ rāgādikilesajātaṃ puna asamudācaraṇato nāvajīyati,
atk-s0502a0:2762_3: yassa jitaṃ kilesajātaṃ rāgādīsu koci eko kilesopi loke pacchato vattī nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2762_5: Anantagocaranti anantārammaṇassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena apariyanta gocaraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2762_6: Kena padenāti yassa hi rāgapadādīsu ekapadampi atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2762_9: taṃ apadaṃ buddhaṃ tumhe kena padena nessatha.
atk-s0502a0:2763_0: Dutiyagāthāya taṇhā nāmesā saṃsibbitapariyonandhanaṭṭhena jālamassā atthītipi jālakārikātipi jālūpamātipi jālinī.
atk-s0502a0:2763_1: Rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu visattatāya visattamanatāya visāharatāya visapupphatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya visattikā.
atk-s0502a0:2763_2: Sā evarūpā taṇhā yassa kuhiñci bhave netuṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2763_3: taṃ tumhe apadaṃ buddhaṃ kena padena nessathāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2764_0: Desanāvasāne bahūnaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Māradhītaropi tattheva antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2765_2: ahaṃ pubbe imā tisso māradhītaro addasaṃ semhādīhi apalibuddhena suvaṇṇakkhandhasadisena attabhāvena samannāgatā,
atk-s0502a0:2765_4: Tava dhītu sarīraṃ dvattiṃsākārakuṇapaparipūraṃ bahivicitto viya asucighaṭo.
atk-s0502a0:2765_5: Sace hi mama pādo asucimakkhito bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:2765_7: tathāpissā sarīre ahaṃ pāde na phuseyya”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2773_0: Ye jhānapasutā dhīrāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā saṅkassanagaradvāre bahū devamanusse ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2774_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājagahaseṭṭhi parissayamocanatthañceva pamādena galitānaṃ ābharaṇādīnaṃ rakkhaṇatthañca
atk-s0502a0:2774_2: Atheko rattacandanarukkho gaṅgāya uparitīre jāto gaṅgodakena dhotamūlo patitvā tattha tattha pāsāṇesu saṃbhajjamāno vippakiri.
atk-s0502a0:2774_3: Tato ekā ghaṭappamāṇā ghaṭikā pāsāṇehi ghaṃsiyamānā udakaūmīhi pothiyamānā maṭṭhā hutvā anupubbena vuyhamānā
atk-s0502a0:2774_5: Seṭṭhi “kimeta”nti vatvā “rukkhaghaṭikā”ti sutvā taṃ āharāpetvā “kiṃ nāmeta”nti upadhāraṇatthaṃ vāsikaṇṇena tacchāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2774_7: Seṭṭhi pana neva sammādiṭṭhi na micchādiṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a0:2774_13: “imasmiṃ loke ‘mayaṃ arahanto mayaṃ arahanto’ti vattāro bahū,
atk-s0502a0:2774_15: Gehe bhamaṃ yojetvā pattaṃ likhāpetvā sikkāya ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthamatte ākāse olambāpetvā ‘sace arahā atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2774_19: So cintitaniyāmeneva pattaṃ likhāpetvā veḷuparamparāya ussāpetvā “yo imasmiṃ loke arahā,
atk-s0502a0:2774_20: so ākāsenāgantvā imaṃ pattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2775_3: Atha chaṭṭhe divase nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto antevāsike pesesi –
atk-s0502a0:2775_11: Nāṭaputto sayaṃ gantukāmo antevāsikānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2775_12: “ahaṃ ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipitvā uppatitukāmo viya bhavissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2775_15: dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaṃ arahattaguṇaṃ mahājanassa mā dassayitthā’ti vatvā maṃ hatthesu ca
atk-s0502a0:2775_16: pādesu ca gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pāteyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2775_21: mā te appamattakassa kāraṇā mama ākāse uppatanaṃ rucci,
atk-s0502a0:2775_24: Tato nāṭaputto “tena hi apetha apethā”ti antevāsike apanetvā “ākāse uppatissāmī”ti ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2775_27: chavassa lāmakassa dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaguṇena mahājanassa dassitena ko attho”ti taṃ hatthapādesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2775_33: Evaṃ titthiyā cha divasāni vāyamitvāpi taṃ pattaṃ na labhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2776_0: Sattame divase āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ca āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa ca “rājagahe piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a0:2776_1: gantvā ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupanakāle dhuttakā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ambho pubbe cha
atk-s0502a0:2776_3: Rājagahaseṭṭhino pana ajja sattamo divaso pattaṃ ussāpetvā ‘sace arahā atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2776_6: Ajja no loke arahantānaṃ natthibhāvo ñāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2776_7: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:2776_11: ime buddhassa sāsanaṃ pariggaṇhantā viya vadanti.
atk-s0502a0:2776_13: gaccha taṃ pattaṃ ākāsena gantvā gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2776_18: “Gaṇhāvuso”ti vutte āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tigāvutaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2776_19: piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ pādantena paṭicchādento tulapicu viya ākāse uṭṭhāpetvā rājagahanagarassa upari sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a0:2776_21: So tigāvutapamāṇassa nagarassa pidhānaṃ viya paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2776_22: Nagaravāsino “pāsāṇo no avattharitvā gaṇhātī”ti bhītā suppādīni matthake katvā tattha tattha nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2776_23: Sattame vāre thero piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:2776_31: Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi urena nipajjitvā “otaratha sāmī”ti vatvā ākāsato otiṇṇaṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā pattaṃ otārāpetvā catumadhurapuṇṇaṃ katvā therassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2776_33: Athassa ye araññagatā vā suññāgāragatā vā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2776_36: So tesaṃ tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2777_0: Satthā taṃ anubandhitvā unnādentassa mahājanassa saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:2777_3: tassa santike eso saddo”ti sutvā bhāradvājaṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā evaṃ kata”nti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2777_7: evaṃ kata”nti theraṃ garahitvā taṃ pattaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ bhedāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ añjanapisanatthāya dāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:2778_0: Titthiyā “samaṇo kira gotamo taṃ pattaṃ bhedāpetvā pāṭihāriyassa akaraṇatthāya sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2778_1: paññāpesī”ti sutvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti,
atk-s0502a0:2778_3: Idāni amhehi okāso laddho”ti nagaravīthīsu ārocentā vicariṃsu “mayaṃ attano guṇaṃ rakkhantā pubbe dārumayapattassa
atk-s0502a0:2778_4: kāraṇā attano guṇaṃ mahājanassa na dassayimhā,
atk-s0502a0:2778_5: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā pattakamattassa kāraṇā attano guṇaṃ mahājanassa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2778_6: Samaṇo gotamo attano paṇḍitatāya pattaṃ bhedāpetvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:2778_7: idāni mayaṃ teneva saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2779_0: Rājā bimbisāro taṃ kathaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “tumhehi kira, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2779_3: Idāni titthiyā “tumhehi saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:2779_7: Nanu tumhehi sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti. Nāhaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:2779_10: Tumhe ṭhapetvā aññattha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ nāma hoti, bhanteti. Tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:2779_22: yathā tava tiyojanasatike rajje āṇā pavattati,
atk-s0502a0:2779_23: attano uyyāne ambādīni khādantassa daṇḍo natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2779_30: samaṇena kira gotamena sāvakānaṃyeva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2780_11: Titthiyā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ito kira catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena samaṇo gotamo sāvatthiyaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati,
atk-s0502a0:2780_14: Athassa vakkhāma ‘mayaṃ samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā’ti vadimhā.
atk-s0502a0:2780_20: Te manussehi “kimida”nti pucchitā heṭṭhā cintitaniyāmeneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2781_1: Titthiyāpi tena saddhiṃyeva gantvā upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā satasahassaṃ labhitvā khadirathambhehi maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2781_2: kāretvā nīluppalehi chādāpetvā “idha pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2781_7: maṃ ṭhapetvā ko añño kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti? “Sakko,
atk-s0502a0:2781_13: Titthiyā “ambarukkhamūle kira pāṭihāriyaṃ karissatī”ti sutvā attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ ārocetvā yojanabbhantare
atk-s0502a0:2781_14: ṭhāne antamaso tadahujātampi ambapotakaṃ uppāṭetvā araññe khipāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2782_1: Raññopi uyyānapālo kaṇḍo nāma ekaṃ piṅgalakipillikehi katapattapuṭassa antare mahantaṃ ambapakkaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a0:2782_2: tassa gandharasalobhena sampatante vāyase palāpetvā rañño khādanatthāya ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a0:2782_4: “rājā imaṃ ambaṃ khāditvā mayhaṃ aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā kahāpaṇe dadeyya,
atk-s0502a0:2782_7: avassaṃ taṃ me dīghakālaṃ hitāvahaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2782_10: Athassa thero catumahārājadattiyaṃ pattaṃ nīharitvā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_11: Satthā pattaṃ upanāmetvā ambapakkaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattheva nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_13: Athassa tasmiṃ nisinne thero pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā ambapakkaṃ madditvā pānakaṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_18: Hatthe dhovitamatteyeva naṅgalasīsamattakkhandho hutvā ubbedhena paṇṇāsahattho ambarukkho uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_20: uddhaṃ ekāti pañca mahāsākhā paṇṇāsahatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2782_21: So tāvadeva pupphaphalasañchanno hutvā ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne paripakkaambapiṇḍidharo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_22: Pacchato āgacchantā bhikkhū ambapakkāni khādantā eva āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2782_23: Rājā “evarūpo kira ambarukkho uṭṭhito”ti sutvā “mā naṃ koci chindī”ti ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_24: So pana kaṇḍena ropitattā kaṇḍambarukkhotveva paññāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2782_25: Dhuttakāpi ambapakkāni khāditvā “hare duṭṭhatitthiyā ‘samaṇo kira gotamo kaṇḍambarukkhamūle pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2782_26: karissatī’ti tumhehi yojanabbhantare tadahujātāpi ambapotakā uppāṭāpitā,
atk-s0502a0:2782_27: kaṇḍambo nāma aya”nti vatvā te ucchiṭṭhaambaṭṭhīhi pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2783_0: Sakko vātavalāhakaṃ devaputtaṃ āṇāpesi “titthiyānaṃ maṇḍapaṃ vātehi uppāṭetvā ukkārabhūmiyaṃ khipāpehī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2783_5: So tathā karonto titthiyānaṃ paggharitasedasarīre rajovaṭṭiyā okiri.
atk-s0502a0:2783_10: Te nigaṇṭhā lajjamānā hutvā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2783_11: Evaṃ palāyantesu purāṇakassapassa upaṭṭhāko eko kassako “idāni me ayyānaṃ pāṭihāriyakaraṇavelā,
atk-s0502a0:2783_12: gantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmī”ti goṇe vissajjetvā pātova ābhataṃ yāgukuṭañceva yottakañca gahetvā āgacchanto purāṇaṃ tathā palāyantaṃ disvā, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2783_17: So tena dinnaṃ kuṭañca yottañca ādāya nadītīraṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ yottena attano gīvāya bandhitvā lajjanto
atk-s0502a0:2783_18: kiñci akathetvā rahade patitvā udakapubbuḷe uṭṭhāpento kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:2784_3: Satthā sannipatitāya chattiṃsayojanikāya parisāya vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya “idāni pāṭihāriyakaraṇavelā”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā pamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2784_4: Atha naṃ gharaṇī nāma iddhimantī ekā anāgāmiupāsikā upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2784_5: mādisāya dhītari vijjamānāya tumhākaṃ kilamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2784_9: ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷagabbhe mahāpathaviṃ udakaṃ katvā udakasakuṇikā viya nimujjitvā pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ attānaṃ dassessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2784_12: Mahājano maṃ disvā “kā esā”ti vutte vakkhati “gharaṇī nāmesā,
atk-s0502a0:2784_16: Atha naṃ satthā “jānāmi te gharaṇī evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2784_17: na panāyaṃ tavatthāya baddho mālāpuṭo”ti vatvā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2784_19: addhā mayā uttaritaraṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho añño atthī”ti ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2784_20: Satthāpi “evameva tesaṃ guṇo pākaṭo bhavissatīti evaṃ chattiṃsayojanikāya parisāya majjhe sīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti maññamāno aparepi pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:2784_23: bhante”ti satthu purato ṭhitāva sīhanādaṃ nadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2784_24: Tesu kira cūḷaanāthapiṇḍiko “mādise anāgāmiupāsake putte vijjamāne satthu kilamanakiccaṃ natthī”ti cintetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2784_25: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2784_26: dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā imissā parisāya majjhe mahāmeghagajjitasadisena saddena brahmaapphoṭanaṃ nāma apphoṭessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2784_27: Mahājano “kiṃ nāmeso saddo”ti pucchitvā “cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikassa kira brahmaapphoṭanasaddo nāmā”ti vakkhati.
atk-s0502a0:2784_29: buddhānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī”ti tumhe adisvāva palāyissantīti.
atk-s0502a0:2784_30: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassapi tatheva vatvā pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0502a0:2785_0: Athekā paṭisambhidappattā sattavassikā cīrasāmaṇerī kira nāma satthāraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2785_3: sineruñca cakkavāḷapabbatañca himavantañca āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā ahaṃ haṃsasakuṇī
atk-s0502a0:2785_4: viya tato tato nikkhamitvā asajjamānā gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2785_5: mahājano maṃ disvā ‘kā esā’ti pucchitvā ‘cīrasāmaṇerī’ti vakkhati.
atk-s0502a0:2785_7: buddhānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī’ti tumhe adisvāva palāyissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2785_8: Ito paraṃ evarūpāni vacanāni vuttānusāreneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0502a0:2785_9: Tassāpi bhagavā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti vatvā pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0502a0:2785_10: Atheko paṭisambhidappatto khīṇāsavo cundasāmaṇero nāma jātiyā sattavassiko satthāraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0502a0:2785_11: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2785_12: jambudīpassa dhajabhūtaṃ mahājamburukkhaṃ khandhe gahetvā cāletvā mahājambupesiyo āharitvā imaṃ parisaṃ khādāpessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2785_14: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassa pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2786_0: Atha uppalavaṇṇā therī satthāraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2786_1: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭhā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2786_2: samantā dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ dassetvā āvaṭṭato chattiṃsayojanāya parisāya parivuto cakkavattirājā hutvā āgantvā tumhe vandissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_3: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassāpi pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a0:2786_5: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2786_6: sinerupabbatarājānaṃ dantantare ṭhapetvā māsasāsapabījaṃ viya khādissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_8: “Imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kaṭasārakaṃ viya saṃvellitvā aṅgulantare nikkhipissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_10: “Mahāpathaviṃ kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattetvā mahājanaṃ pathavojaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_12: “Vāmahatthe pathaviṃ katvā ime satte dakkhiṇahatthena aññasmiṃ dīpe ṭhapessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_14: “Sineruṃ chattadaṇḍaṃ viya katvā mahāpathaviṃ ukkhipitvā tassupari ṭhapetvā chattahattho bhikkhu viya ekahatthenādāya ākāse caṅkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2786_15: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassapi pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0502a0:2786_16: So “jānāti maññe satthā mayā uttaritaraṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattha”nti ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2787_0: Atha naṃ satthā “nāyaṃ moggallānaṃ tavatthāya baddho bālāpuṭo.
atk-s0502a0:2787_2: mama dhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2787_4: yaṃ idāni mama dhuraṃ vahituṃ samattho nāma bhaveyya.
atk-s0502a0:2787_5: Ahetukatiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattakālepi mama dhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma nāhosiyevā”ti vatvā “kadā pana,
atk-s0502a0:2789_0: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti. –
atk-s0502a0:2790_0: Idaṃ kaṇhausabhajātakaṃ vitthāretvā puna tameva vatthuṃ visesetvā dassento –
atk-s0502a0:2793_0: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahū”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2794_1: Kathetvā ca pana satthā ratanacaṅkamaṃ abhiruhi,
atk-s0502a0:2794_2: purato dvādasayojanikā parisā ahosi tathā pacchato ca uttarato ca dakkhiṇato ca.
atk-s0502a0:2794_3: Ujukaṃ pana catuvīsatiyojanikāya parisāya majjhe bhagavā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2795_2: Idhaṃ tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi,
atk-s0502a0:2795_46: ekekalomakūpato udakadhārā pavattati channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjeṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2795_48: buddhanimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti…pe…
atk-s0502a0:2795_50: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.
atk-s0502a0:2796_0: Idaṃ pana pāṭihāriyaṃ bhagavā tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamitvā akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2796_3: Na pana udakadhārāya pavattanaṭṭhānato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0502a0:2796_4: aggikkhandhassa pavattanaṭṭhānato udakadhārā pavattatīti dassetuṃ “heṭṭhimakāyato uparimakāyato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2796_8: Ubhayampi kira cetaṃ yāva brahmalokā uggantvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ patati.
atk-s0502a0:2796_9: “Channaṃ vaṇṇāna”nti vuttā panassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ghaṭehi āsiñcamānaṃ vilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya yantanālikato
atk-s0502a0:2796_10: nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya ca ekacakkavāḷagabbhato uggantvā brahmalokaṃ āhacca paṭinivattitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭimeva gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2796_11: Ekacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ vaṅkagopānasikaṃ viya bodhigharaṃ ahosi ekālokaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2797_0: Taṃdivasaṃ satthā caṅkamitvā pāṭihāriyaṃ karonto antarantarā mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2797_1: Kathento ca janaṃ nirassāsaṃ akatvā tassa assāsavāraṃ deti.
atk-s0502a0:2797_3: Tassa sādhukārapavattanakāle satthā tāvamahatiyā parisāya cittaṃ olokento ekekassa soḷasannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena cittācāraṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2797_5: Yo yo yasmiñca dhamme yasmiñca pāṭihīre pasanno,
atk-s0502a0:2797_8: Evaṃ dhamme desiyamāne pāṭihīre ca kariyamāne mahājanassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2797_9: Satthā pana tasmiṃ samāgame attano manaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2797_12: Bhagavato caṅkamanakāle nimmito ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesi,
atk-s0502a0:2797_13: nimmitassa caṅkamanakāle bhagavā ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a0:2797_15: Evaṃ karontassa satthu pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā tasmiṃ samāgame vīsatiyā pāṇakoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2798_0: Satthā pāṭihīraṃ karontova “kattha nu kho atītabuddhā idaṃ pāṭihīraṃ katvā vassaṃ upentī”ti āvajjetvā
atk-s0502a0:2798_1: “tāvatiṃsabhavane vassaṃ upagantvā mātu abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desentī”ti disvā dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā yugandharamatthake
atk-s0502a0:2798_2: ṭhapetvā itaraṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā sinerumatthake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2798_5: Satthā pādaṃ pasāretvā akkamīti na sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2798_6: Tassa hi pādukkhipanakāleyeva pabbatā pādamūlaṃ āgantvā sampaṭicchiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2798_7: satthārā akkamanakāle te pabbatā uṭṭhāya sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2798_11: satthari panettha vassāvāsaṃ upagate aññā devatā hatthampi ṭhapetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0502a0:2798_12: Ayaṃ kho pana paṇḍukambalasilā dīghato saṭṭhiyojanā,
atk-s0502a0:2798_16: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā attano saṅghāṭiṃ silāsanaṃ paṭicchādayamānaṃ khipi.
atk-s0502a0:2798_20: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā nīcapīṭhakaṃ mahāpaṃsukūliko viya paṇḍukambalasilaṃ antocīvarabhogeyeva katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2798_22: candassa atthaṅgamitakālo viya sūriyassa ca atthaṅgamitakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2799_0: “Gato nu cittakūṭaṃ vā, kelāsaṃ vā yugandharaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2800_0: Na no dakkhemu sambuddhaṃ, lokajeṭṭhaṃ narāsabha”nti. –
atk-s0502a0:2801_2: so ‘evarūpāya me parisāya evarūpaṃ pāṭihīraṃ kata’nti lajjāya aññaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā gato bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:2801_3: na dāni taṃ dakkhissāmā”ti paridevantā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:2803_0: Na no dakkhemu sambuddhaṃ, lokajeṭṭhaṃ narāsabha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2804_2: So sayaṃ jānantopi “paresampi guṇā pākaṭā hontū”ti ajjhāsayena “anuruddhaṃ pucchathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2804_5: Tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā mātu abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desetuṃ gatoti.
atk-s0502a0:2804_9: Te “satthāraṃ adisvā na gamissāmā”ti tattheva khandhāvāraṃ bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2804_11: Tāya ca mahatiyā parisāya sarīranighaṃso nāma na paññāyi,
atk-s0502a0:2805_4: Tasmā taṃ temāsaṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikova tassā parisāya yāpanaṃ yāgubhattaṃ khādanīyaṃ tambulatelagandhamālāpilandhanāni ca adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2805_7: Satthārampi mātu abhidhammadesanatthaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagataṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2812_0: Evaṃ sabbā devatā attano sarīrappabhāya abhibhavitvā nisinnassa panassa mātā tusitavimānato āgantvā dakkhiṇapasse nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2812_3: So mahesakkhāsu devatāsu sannipatantīsu apagantvā dvādasayojanike ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:2812_5: Satthā te ubhopi oloketvā attano sāsane dakkhiṇeyyapuggalānaṃ dinnadānassa mahapphalabhāvaṃ ñāpetukāmo evamāha – “aṅkura,
atk-s0502a0:2812_6: tayā dīghamantare dasavassasahassaparimāṇakāle dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā mahādānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2812_7: idāni mama samāgamaṃ āgantvā dvādasayojanike ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:2817_0: So saddho pathavītalaṃ pāpuṇi. Sabbāpi naṃ sā parisā assosi. Evaṃ vutte –
atk-s0502a0:2819_0: Kiṃ mayhaṃ tena dānena, dakkhiṇeyyena suññataṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2820_0: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2822_4: sukhette appakabījaṃ vapanakassako viya dakkhiṇeyyasampadaṃ alattha”nti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pabhāvento āha –
atk-s0502a0:2824_0: Na phalaṃ vipulaṃ hoti, napi toseti kassakaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2826_0: Na phalaṃ vipulaṃ hoti, napi toseti dāyakaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2828_0: Sammā dhāraṃ pavecchante, phalaṃ toseti kassakaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2830_0: Appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti. ;
atk-s0502a0:2831_1: So kira anuruddhattherassa antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa attano ābhataṃ kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2831_2: Tadā tassa puññaṃ aṅkurena dasavassasahassāni dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā dinnadānato mahapphalataraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2832_2: evaṃ taṃ sukhettesu vuttabījaṃ viya mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2832_4: tena te dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ na jāta”nti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento –
atk-s0502a0:2838_0: Vatvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2840_0: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2842_0: Tasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2844_0: Tasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2846_0: Tasmā hi vigaticchesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2847_0: Desanāvasāne aṅkuro ca indako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2848_0: Atha satthā devaparisāya majjhe nisinno mātaraṃ ārabbha “kusalā dhammā,
atk-s0502a0:2848_3: Evaṃ tayo māse nirantaraṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2848_4: Kathento pana bhikkhācāravelāya “yāva mamāgamanā ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū”ti nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0502a0:2848_5: himavantaṃ gantvā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2848_7: Sāriputtatthero tattha gantvā satthu vattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:2848_10: ajja mayā ettako nāma dhammo bhāsito,
atk-s0502a0:2848_11: tvaṃ attano antevāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vācehī”ti therassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2848_12: Yamakapāṭihīre kira pasīditvā pañcasatā kulaputtā therassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2848_14: Vatvā ca pana devalokaṃ gantvā nimmitabuddhena desitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:2848_15: Theropi gantvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:2848_16: Te satthari devaloke viharanteyeva sattapakaraṇikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2849_0: Te kira kassapabuddhakāle khuddakavagguliyo hutvā ekasmiṃ pabbhāre olambantā dvinnaṃ therānaṃ caṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a0:2849_1: abhidhammaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā sare nimittaṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2849_3: imā dhātuyo nāmā”ti ajānitvā sare nimittagahaṇamatteneva tato cutā devaloke nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:2849_4: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā sāvatthiyaṃ kulagharesu nibbattā.
atk-s0502a0:2849_5: Yamakapāṭihīre uppannapasādā therassa santike pabbajitvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ sattapakaraṇikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2849_6: Satthāpi teneva nīhārena taṃ temāsaṃ abhidhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:2850_0: Sāpi kho chattiṃsayojanaparimaṇḍalā parisā “idāni sattame divase mahāpavāraṇā bhavissatī”ti mahāmoggallānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha –
atk-s0502a0:2850_3: na hi mayaṃ satthāraṃ adisvā gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2850_4: Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “sādhāvuso”ti vatvā tattheva pathaviyaṃ nimuggo sinerupādaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a0:2850_5: “maṃ abhiruhantaṃ parisā passatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya maṇiratanena āvutaṃ paṇḍukambalasuttaṃ viya paññāyamānarūpova
atk-s0502a0:2850_9: Theropi satthu pāde sīsena ukkhipanto viya abhiruhitvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2850_17: ahaṃ ito sattame divase mahāpavāraṇāya saṅkassanagaradvāre otarissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2850_21: uposathikā hutvā dhuravihāraṃ dhammassavanatthāya gacchantā viya āgaccheyyāthāti tesaṃ āroceyyāsīti.
atk-s0502a0:2851_3: Sakko suvaṇṇamayaṃ maṇimayaṃ rajatamayanti tīṇi sopānāni māpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2851_6: Tesu dakkhiṇapasse suvaṇṇamayaṃ sopānaṃ devatānaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:2851_9: Satthāpi sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā devorohaṇasamaye yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā uddhaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:2852_1: Taṃ divasaṃ buddhasiriṃ oloketvā chattiṃsayojana parimaṇḍalāya parisāya ekopi buddhabhāvaṃ apatthento nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2852_5: Pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya dakkhiṇapasse ṭhatvā satthu gandhabbamadhuradibbavīṇāya saddena pūjaṃ karonto otari, mātali,
atk-s0502a0:2852_6: saṅgāhako vāmapasse ṭhatvā dibbagandhamālāpupphaṃ gahetvā namassamāno pūjaṃ katvā otari,
atk-s0502a0:2852_9: Satthā iminā parivārena saddhiṃ otaritvā saṅkassanagaradvāre patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:2852_10: Sāriputtattheropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā yasmā sāriputtattherena tathārūpāya buddhasiriyā otaranto satthā ito pubbe na diṭṭhapubbo, tasmā –
atk-s0502a0:2853_0: “Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe, na suto uda kassaci;
atk-s0502a0:2855_5: evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatā buddhā devamanussānaṃ piyā hontiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2859_0: Tattha ye jhānapasutāti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti imesu dvīsu jhānesu āvajjanasamāpajjanaadhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇehi
atk-s0502a0:2859_2: Nekkhammūpasame ratāti ettha pabbajjā nekkhammanti na gahetabbā,
atk-s0502a0:2859_4: Devāpīti devāpi manussāpi tesaṃ pihayanti patthenti.
atk-s0502a0:2859_5: Satīmatanti evarūpaguṇānaṃ tesaṃ satiyā samannāgatānaṃ sambuddhānaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2859_6: “Aho vata mayaṃ buddhā bhaveyyāmā”ti buddhabhāvaṃ icchamānā pihayantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2861_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ kira avijahitameva yamakapāṭihīraṃ katvā devaloke vassaṃ vasitvā saṅkassanagaradvāre otaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2861_1: Tattha pana dakkhiṇapādassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2861_2: Satthā tattha ṭhatvā puthujjanādīnaṃ visaye pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0502a0:2861_3: puthujjanā attano visaye pañhe vissajjetvā sotāpannavisaye pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2861_8: So pācīnadisaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbadisā olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:2861_10: Aṭṭhasu disāsu devamanussā uddhaṃ yāva brahmalokā heṭṭhā bhūmaṭṭhā ca yakkhanāgasupaṇṇā añjaliṃ paggahetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2862_0: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha;
atk-s0502a0:2863_0: Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2864_0: Imaṃ buddhavisaye puṭṭhapañhaṃ sutvā ‘satthā maṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ pucchatī’ti pañhe nikkaṅkho,
atk-s0502a0:2864_1: khandhādīsu pana katarena nu kho mukhena imaṃ paṭipadaṃ kathento ‘ahaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkhissāmī’ti mama ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati,
atk-s0502a0:2864_2: so mayā naye adinne kathetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0502a0:2864_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sāriputto mama ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathento khandhavasena kathessatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2864_7: Therassa saha nayadānena so pañho nayasatena nayasahassena nayasatasahassena upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2864_8: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā taṃ pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2864_9: Ṭhapetvā kira sammāsambuddhaṃ añño sāriputtattherassa paññaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2864_10: Teneva kira thero satthu purato ṭhatvā sīhanādaṃ nadi – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2864_11: sakalakappampi deve vuṭṭhe ‘ettakāni bindūni mahāsamudde patitāni,
atk-s0502a0:2864_13: ettakāni pabbate’ti gaṇetvā lekhaṃ āropetuṃ samattho”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2864_17: Tassa āyasmato paññāya upamā nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2866_0: Mahiyā mattikā khīye, na khīye mama buddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2867_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2867_2: mayā ekasmiṃ pañhe vissajjite ekaṃ vā vālukaṃ ekaṃ vā udakabinduṃ ekaṃ vā paṃsukhaṇḍaṃ akhipitvā pañhānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2867_3: satena vā sahassenavā satasahassena vā vissajjite gaṅgāya vālukādīsu ekekaṃ ekamante khipeyya,
atk-s0502a0:2867_6: Evaṃ mahāpaññopi hi bhikkhu buddhavisaye pañhassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā adisvā satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvāva pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:2867_8: “yaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho sabbopi jano kathetuṃ na sakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:2867_10: Satthā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na idāneva sāriputto yaṃ pañhaṃ mahājano vissajjetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:2867_12: pubbepi anena vissajjitoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharituṃ –
atk-s0502a0:2875_0: Kiccho manussapaṭilābhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bārāṇasiyaṃ upanissāya sattasirīsakarukkhamūle viharanto
atk-s0502a0:2876_0: So kira pubbe kassapabuddhasāsane daharabhikkhu hutvā gaṅgāya nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchanto ekasmiṃ erakagumbe
atk-s0502a0:2876_1: erakapattaṃ gahetvā nāvāya vegasā gacchamānāyapi na muñci,
atk-s0502a0:2876_3: So “appamattakaṃ eta”nti āpattiṃ adesetvā vīsati vassasahassāni araññe samaṇadhammaṃ katvāpi maraṇakāle
atk-s0502a0:2876_4: erakapattena gīvāya gahito viya āpattiṃ desetukāmopi aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ apassamāno “aparisuddhaṃ me sīla”nti
atk-s0502a0:2876_5: uppannavippaṭisāro tato cavitvā ekarukkhadoṇikanāvappamāṇo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:2876_7: So nibbattakkhaṇeyeva attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ahetukayoniyaṃ maṇḍūkabhakkhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:2876_9: So aparabhāge ekaṃ dhītaraṃ labhitvā majjhe gaṅgāya udakapiṭṭhe mahantaṃ phalaṃ ukkhipitvā dhītaraṃ tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā naccāpetvā gāyāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2876_11: “addhā ahaṃ idha iminā upāyena buddhe uppanne tassa uppannabhāvaṃ suṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2876_13: tassa mahantena nāgabhavanena saddhiṃ dhītaraṃ dassāmīti anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ uposathadivase taṃ dhītaraṃ phaṇe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2878_0: Kathaṃsu virajo hoti, kathaṃ bāloti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2880_0: Sakalajambudīpavāsino “nāgamāṇavikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti gantvā attano attano paññābalena paṭigītaṃ katvā gāyanti.
atk-s0502a0:2880_2: Tassā anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ phaṇe ṭhatvā evaṃ gāyantiyāva ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vītivattaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2880_3: Atha amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā ekadivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento erakapattaṃ ādiṃ katvā uttaramāṇavaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2880_4: nāma attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “ajja erakapattassa
atk-s0502a0:2880_6: ayaṃ uttaramāṇavo mayā dinnaṃ paṭigītaṃ gaṇhantova sotāpanno hutvā taṃ ādāya nāgarājassa santikaṃ gamissati.
atk-s0502a0:2880_7: So taṃ sutvā ‘buddho uppanno’ti ñatvā mama santikaṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0502a0:2880_8: ahaṃ tasmiṃ āgate mahāsamāgame gāthaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2880_9: gāthāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0502a0:2880_10: So tattha gantvā bārāṇasito avidūre satta sirīsakarukkhā atthi,
atk-s0502a0:2880_13: Satthā avidūre ṭhāne gacchantaṃ uttaramāṇavaṃ disvā “ehi,
atk-s0502a0:2880_17: Atha naṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinnaṃ āha “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:2880_22: Atha naṃ attano jānananiyāmeneva vadantaṃ “na uttaraṃ etaṃ paṭigītaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2882_0: Arajjaṃ virajo hoti, rajjaṃ bāloti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2884_1: kiṃsu adhippatī rājāti kiṃ adhippati rājā nāma hoti?
atk-s0502a0:2884_2: Kiṃsu rājā rajjissaroti kathaṃ pana rājā rajjissaro nāma hoti?
atk-s0502a0:2884_3: Kathaṃsu virajo hotīti kathaṃ nu kho so rājā virajo nāma hotīti?
atk-s0502a0:2885_1: chadvārādhippatī rājāti yo channaṃ dvārānaṃ adhippati,
atk-s0502a0:2885_4: Rajjamāno rajjissaroti yo pana tesu ārammaṇesu rajjati,
atk-s0502a0:2885_6: Arajjanti arajjamāno pana virajo nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2886_1: tayā imasmiṃ gīte gāyite imassa gītassa imaṃ paṭigītaṃ gāyissati –
atk-s0502a0:2888_0: Yogakkhemī kathaṃ hoti, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2892_2: taṃ oghaṃ paṇḍito sammappadhānasaṅkhātena yogena nudati.
atk-s0502a0:2892_3: So sabbehi kāmayogādīhi visaṃyutto yogakkhemī nāma vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2893_0: Uttaro imaṃ paṭigītaṃ gaṇhantova sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:2893_1: So sotāpanno hutvā taṃ gāthaṃ ādāya gantvā, “ambho,
atk-s0502a0:2893_3: okāsaṃ me dethā”ti vatvā nirantaraṃ ṭhitassa mahājanassa jaṇṇunā akkamanto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2893_4: Nāgamāṇavikā pitu phaṇe ṭhatvā naccamānā “kiṃsu adhippatī rājā”ti gītaṃ gāyati?
atk-s0502a0:2893_6: Puna nāgamāṇavikā “kenassu vuyhatī”ti tassa gītaṃ gāyati?
atk-s0502a0:2893_7: Athassā paṭigītaṃ gāyanto uttaro “oghena vuyhatī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0502a0:2893_8: Nāgarājā taṃ sutvāva buddhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ evarūpaṃ padaṃ nāma na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2893_10: loke buddho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso naṅguṭṭhena udakaṃ pahari,
atk-s0502a0:2893_13: Ito cito ca usabhamatte ṭhāne manussā udake nimujjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2893_14: So ettakaṃ mahājanaṃ phaṇe ṭhapetvā ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:2893_21: Nāgarājā gantvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīnaṃ antaraṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2893_25: tumhādisassa buddhassa sāvako hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2893_27: Appamattakaṃ erakapattachindanamattaṃ nissāya ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ gahetvā urena parisakkanaṭṭhāne nibbattosmi,
atk-s0502a0:2893_30: na tumhādisassa buddhassa dassana”nti satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a0:2893_35: idaṃ kicchena kasirena labbhatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2897_1: mahantena hi vāyāmena mahantena kusalena laddhattā manussattapaṭilābho nāma kiccho dullabho.
atk-s0502a0:2897_2: Nirantaraṃ kasikammādīni katvā jīvitavuttiṃ ghaṭanatopi parittaṭṭhāyitāyapi maccānaṃ jīvitaṃ kicchaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2897_3: Anekesupi kappesu dhammadesakassa puggalassa dullabhatāya saddhammassavanampi kicchaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2897_4: Mahantena vāyāmena abhinīhārassa samijjhanato samiddhābhinīhārassa ca anekehipi kappakoṭisahassehi dullabhuppādato buddhānaṃ uppādopi kicchoyeva,
atk-s0502a0:2898_3: So yesu paṭisandhigahaṇatacajahanavissaṭṭhaniddokkamanasajātiyāmethunasevanacutisaṅkhātesu pañcasu ṭhānesu nāgasarīrameva gahetvā kilamanti,
atk-s0502a0:2898_4: tesu akilamanabhāvaṃ patvā māṇavarūpeneva vicarituṃ labhatīti.
atk-s0502a0:2901_0: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2902_1: “satthārā sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ mātāpitaro āyuparicchedo bodhi sāvakasannipāto aggasāvakasannipāto aggasāvakaupaṭṭhākoti idaṃ sabbaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2902_3: kiṃ nu kho tesampi ayameva uposatho, añño”ti?
atk-s0502a0:2902_5: Yasmā pana tesaṃ buddhānaṃ kālabhedova ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:2902_7: Vipassī sammāsambuddho hi sattame sattame saṃvacchare uposathaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2902_8: Ekadivasaṃ dinnovādoyeva hissa sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ alaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2902_9: Sikhī ceva vessabhū ca chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe saṃvacchare uposathaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:2902_11: Kassapadasabalo chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse uposathaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2902_12: Ekadivasaṃ dinnovādo eva hissa channaṃ māsānaṃ alaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2902_13: Tasmā satthā tesaṃ imaṃ kālabhedaṃ ārocetvā “ovādagāthā pana nesaṃ imāyevā”ti vatvā sabbesaṃ ekameva uposathaṃ āvi karonto imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2914_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti.
atk-s0502a0:2915_1: Upasampadāti abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kusalassa uppādanañceva uppāditassa ca bhāvanā.
atk-s0502a0:2915_2: Sacittapariyodapananti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi attano cittassa vodāpanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2916_0: Khantīti yā esā titikkhāsaṅkhātā khantī nāma,
atk-s0502a0:2916_1: idaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paramaṃ uttamaṃ tapo.
atk-s0502a0:2916_2: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca anubuddhā cāti ime tayo buddhā nibbānaṃ uttamantī vadanti.
atk-s0502a0:2916_3: Na hi pabbajitoti pāṇiādīhi paraṃ apahananto viheṭhento parūpaghātī pabbajito nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a0:2916_4: Na samaṇoti vuttanayeneva paraṃ viheṭhayanto samaṇopi na hotiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2917_9: Ettha hi anūpavādena vācasikaṃ sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2917_17: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tissopi sikkhā kathitā eva hontīti.
atk-s0502a0:2921_0: Na kahāpaṇavassenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anabhiratabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2922_0: So kira sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā uddesaṃ uggaṇhāhī”ti upajjhāyena pesito tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2922_2: So puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā taṃ pakkosituṃ samatthaṃ kañci alabhitvā puttasokena vippalapantoyeva āsannamaraṇo
atk-s0502a0:2922_3: hutvā “idaṃ me puttassa pattacīvaramūlaṃ kareyyāsī”ti kahāpaṇasataṃ kaniṭṭhassa hatthe datvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2922_4: So daharassa āgatakāle pādamūle nipatitvā pavaṭṭento roditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:2922_6: mayhaṃ pana tena kahāpaṇasataṃ hatthe ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2922_8: Daharo “na me kahāpaṇehi attho”ti paṭikkhipitvā aparabhāge cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:2922_12: So anabhiratiyā pīḷito vissaṭṭhasajjhāyanakammaṭṭhāno paṇḍurogī viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2922_13: Atha naṃ daharasāmaṇerā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “ukkaṇṭhitomhī”ti vutte ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2922_14: Atha naṃ te satthu santikaṃ netvā satthu dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2922_17: atthi pana te koci jīvitapaccayo”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0502a0:2922_22: Tena hi katthaci tāva sakkharā āhara,
atk-s0502a0:2922_23: gaṇetvā jānissāma “sakkā vā tāvattakena jīvituṃ, no vā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2922_30: kuddālavāsipharasuatthāyā”ti evaṃ gaṇiyamāne taṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0502a0:2922_31: Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu tava kahāpaṇā appakā,
atk-s0502a0:2922_33: atīte kira cakkavattirajjaṃ kāretvā apphoṭitamattena dvādasayojanaṭṭhāne kaṭippamāṇena ratanavassaṃ vassāpetuṃ samattho yāva chattiṃsa sakkā cavanti,
atk-s0502a0:2922_34: ettakaṃ kālaṃ devarajjaṃ kāretvāpi maraṇakāle taṇhaṃ apūretvāva kālamakāsī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āharitvā mandhātujātakaṃ vitthāretvā –
atk-s0502a0:2924_0: Sabbeva dāsā mandhātu, ye pāṇā pathavissitā”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:2925_0: Imissā gāthāya anantarā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2928_0: Appassādā dukhā kāmā, iti viññāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a0:2932_0: Tattha kahāpaṇavassenāti yaṃ so apphoṭetvā sattaratanavassaṃ vassāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:2932_2: Tenapi hi vatthukāmakilesakāmesu titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:2932_7: Api dibbesūti sace hi devānaṃ upakappanakakāmehi nimanteyyāpi āyasmā samiddhi viya evampi tesu kāmesu ratiṃ na vindatiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:2932_8: Taṇhakkhayaratoti arahatte ceva nibbāne ca abhirato hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2932_10: Sammāsambuddhasāvakoti sammāsambuddhena desitassa dhammassa savanena jāto yogāvacarabhikkhūti.
atk-s0502a0:2933_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2936_0: Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vālikarāsimhi nisinnaṃ aggidattaṃ nāma kosalarañño purohitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2937_1: Atha naṃ pitari kālakate rājā pasenadi kosalo “pitu me purohito”ti gāravena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a0:2937_2: tassa attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatakāle paccuggamanaṃ karoti, “ācariya,
atk-s0502a0:2937_6: na kho pana rājūnaṃ niccakālameva sakkā cittaṃ gahetuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2937_7: Samānavayeneva hi saddhiṃ rajjasukhaṃ nāma sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:2937_10: So rājānaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sattāhena sabbaṃ attano dhanaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā bāhirakapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:2937_12: So tehi saddhiṃ aṅgamagadhānañca kururaṭṭhassa ca antare vāsaṃ kappetvā imaṃ ovādaṃ deti, “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:2937_14: so nadito ekekaṃ vālukapuṭaṃ uddharitvā imasmiṃ okiratū”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2937_15: Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā kāmavitakkādīnaṃ uppannakāle tathā kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2937_18: Aṅgamagadhavāsino ceva kururaṭṭhavāsino ca māse māse tesaṃ mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ abhiharitvā dānaṃ denti.
atk-s0502a0:2937_19: Atha nesaṃ aggidatto imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2938_0: Bodhisattopi katābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ patvā tasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane viharanto
atk-s0502a0:2938_1: paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento aggidattabrāhmaṇaṃ saddhiṃ antevāsikehi attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2938_2: disvā “sabbepi ime arahattassa upanissayasampannā”ti ñatvā sāyanhasamaye mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:2938_4: kiṃ passasi aggidattabrāhmaṇaṃ mahājanaṃ atitthe pakkhandāpentaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2938_5: gaccha tesaṃ ovādaṃ dehī”ti. Bhante, bahū ete,
atk-s0502a0:2938_15: sabbepi vaggavaggena uṭṭhaheyyu”nti attano ānubhāvena thūlaphusitakaṃ devaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2938_16: Te thūlaphusitakesu patantesu uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya attano attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2938_17: Thero aggidattassa brāhmaṇassa paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā “aggidattā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2938_18: So therassa saddaṃ sutvā “maṃ imasmiṃ loke nāmena ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:2938_19: ko nu kho maṃ nāmena ālapatī”ti mānathaddhatāya “ko eso”ti āha. “Ahaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2938_22: “Ajja me ekarattiṃ idha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ tvaṃ ācikkhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2938_37: visuṃ pana naṃ gahetvā vicarituṃ dukkhanti abbhantareneva naṃ gahetvā vicarāmi,
atk-s0502a0:2938_45: Etasmiṃ pana vālukarāsimhi ko vasatīti. Eko,
atk-s0502a0:2939_1: Nāgarājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo ito āgacchati,
atk-s0502a0:2939_5: aññe na sakkontī’ti maññe sallakkhetī”ti sayampi dhūmāyi.
atk-s0502a0:2939_6: Dvinnampi sarīrato uggatā dhūmā yāva brahmalokā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2939_7: Ubhopi dhūmā theraṃ abādhetvā nāgarājānameva bādhenti.
atk-s0502a0:2939_9: Theropi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā tena saddhiṃyeva pajjali.
atk-s0502a0:2939_12: Athassa sakalasarīraṃ ukkāhi padittaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2939_16: bhaddako vata samaṇo amhākaṃ vacanaṃ asutvā naṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2939_17: Thero nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā vālukarāsimhi nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:2939_18: Nāgarājā vālukarāsiṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā kūṭāgārakucchipamāṇaṃ phaṇaṃ māpetvā therassa upari dhāresi.
atk-s0502a0:2940_0: Isigaṇā pātova “samaṇassa matabhāvaṃ vā amatabhāvaṃ vā jānissāmā”ti therassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ vālukarāsimatthake
atk-s0502a0:2940_1: nisinnaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggayha abhitthavantā āhaṃsu – “samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:2940_3: “Kiṃ na passatha mama upariphaṇaṃ dhāretvā ṭhita”nti?
atk-s0502a0:2940_5: samaṇassa evarūpo nāma nāgarājā damito”ti theraṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2940_14: imassa pana ānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha satthāraṃ abhitthavi.
atk-s0502a0:2940_17: tvaṃ tava sāvakānañca upaṭṭhākānañca ovādaṃ dadamāno kinti vatvā desī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2940_20: Etāni hi saraṇaṃ gato sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ ovādaṃ dammīti.
atk-s0502a0:2940_24: buddhaṃ dhammaṃ saṅghaṃ pana saraṇaṃ gantvā sakalavaṭṭadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:2942_0: “Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni ca;
atk-s0502a0:2948_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0502a0:2956_1: Pabbatānīti tattha tattha isigilivepullavebhārādike pabbate ca mahāvanagosiṅgasālavanādīni vanāni ca
atk-s0502a0:2956_2: veḷuvanajīvakambavanādayo ārāme ca udenacetiyagotamacetiyādīni rukkhacetyāni ca te te manussā tena tena
atk-s0502a0:2956_3: bhayena tajjitā bhayato muccitukāmā puttalābhādīni vā patthayamānā saraṇaṃ yantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2956_4: Netaṃ saraṇanti etaṃ sabbampi saraṇaṃ neva khemaṃ na uttamaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2956_5: na ca etaṃ paṭicca jātiādidhammesu sattesu ekopi jātiādito sabbadukkhā pamuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2957_0: Yo cāti idaṃ akhemaṃ anuttamaṃ saraṇaṃ dassetvā khemaṃ uttamaṃ saraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2957_2: yo ca gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādikaṃ buddhadhammasaṅghānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:2957_3: nissāya seṭṭhavasena buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a0:2957_4: tassapi taṃ saraṇagamanaṃ aññatitthiyavandanādīhi kuppati calati.
atk-s0502a0:2957_5: Tassa pana acalabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ maggena āgatasaraṇameva pakāsanto cattāri ariyasaccāni sammappaññāya passatīti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2957_6: Yo hi etesaṃ saccānaṃ dassanavasena etāni saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a0:2957_8: so ca puggalo etaṃ saraṇaṃ paṭicca sakalasmāpi vaṭṭadukkhā pamuccati,
atk-s0502a0:2957_9: tasmā etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2958_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te isayo saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2958_3: Te taṅkhaṇeyeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikatherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2958_4: So ca sabbesampi aṅgamagadhakururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ sakkāraṃ ādāya āgamanadivaso ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:2958_5: Te sakkāraṃ ādāya āgatā sabbepi te isayo pabbajite disvā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ aggidattabrāhmaṇo mahā,
atk-s0502a0:2958_6: udāhu samaṇo gotamo”ti cintetvā samaṇassa gotamassa āgatattā “aggidattova mahā”ti maññiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2958_10: So “ahampi ettakameva paccāsīsāmī”ti iddhibalena sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā punappunaṃ oruyha satthāraṃ vanditvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0502a0:2961_0: Dullabhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2962_0: Thero hi ekadivasaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:2962_3: usabho goājanīyo dakkhiṇapathetiādīni vadantena satthārā hatthiājānīyādīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānādīni kathitāni,
atk-s0502a0:2962_4: purisājānīyo pana kahaṃ nu kho uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2962_5: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā etamatthaṃ pucchi. Satthā, “ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:2962_7: ujukato pana tiyojanasatāyāme vitthārato aḍḍhateyyasate āvaṭṭato navayojanasatappamāṇe majjhimapadesaṭṭhāne uppajjati.
atk-s0502a0:2962_8: Uppajjanto ca pana na yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā kule uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:2962_9: khattiyamahāsālabrāhmaṇamahāsālakulānaṃ pana aññatarasmiṃyeva uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2965_0: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukhamedhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2966_2: so sabbattha paccantadese vā nīcakule vā na jāyati,
atk-s0502a0:2966_3: majjhimadesepi mahājanassa abhivādanādisakkārakaraṇaṭṭhāne khattiyabrāhmaṇakulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ kule jāyati.
atk-s0502a0:2966_4: Evaṃ jāyamāno yattha so jāyati dhīro uttamapañño sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0502a0:2966_5: taṃ kulaṃ sukhamedhatīti sukhappattameva hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:2970_0: Sukho buddhānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2971_1: kiṃ nu kho imasmiṃ loke sukha”nti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ?
atk-s0502a0:2971_2: Tattha keci “rajjasukhasadisaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2971_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:2971_13: sammodamānabhāvoti idameva sukha”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:2974_0: Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī, samaggānaṃ tapo sukho”ti.
atk-s0502a0:2975_0: Tattha buddhānamuppādoti yasmā buddhā uppajjamānā mahājanaṃ rāgakantārādīhi tārenti,
atk-s0502a0:2975_2: Yasmā saddhammadesanaṃ āgamma jātiādidhammā sattā jātiādīhi muccanti,
atk-s0502a0:2975_6: Samaggānaṃ pana ekacittānaṃ yasmā buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ dhutaṅgāni vā pariharituṃ samaṇadhammaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:2976_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2979_0: Pūjāraheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā cārikaṃ caramāno kassapadasabalassa suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2980_0: Tathāgato sāvatthito nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge todeyyagāmassa samīpe mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0502a0:2980_2: Tatra nisinno sugato dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pesetvā avidūre kasikammaṃ karontaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:2980_3: So brāhmaṇo āgantvā tathāgataṃ anabhivanditvā tameva devaṭṭhānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:2980_4: Sugatopi “imaṃ padesaṃ kinti maññasi brāhmaṇā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:2980_7: “Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ vandantena tayā sādhu kataṃ brāhmaṇā”ti sugato taṃ sampahaṃsesi.
atk-s0502a0:2980_8: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū “kena nu kho kāraṇena bhagavā evaṃ sampahaṃsesī”ti saṃsayaṃ sañjanesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2980_9: Tato tathāgato tesaṃ saṃsayamapanetuṃ majjhimanikāye ghaṭikārasuttantaṃ vatvā iddhānubhāvena kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0502a0:2980_10: yojanubbedhaṃ kanakacetiyaṃ aparañca kanakacetiyaṃ ākāse nimminitvā mahājanaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0502a0:2980_12: evaṃvidhānaṃ pūjārahānaṃ pūjā yuttatarāvā”ti vatvā mahāparinibbānasutte dassitanayeneva buddhādike cattāro
atk-s0502a0:2980_13: thūpārahe pakāsetvā sarīracetiyaṃ uddissacetiyaṃ paribhogacetiyanti tīṇi cetiyāni visesato paridīpetvā
atk-s0502a0:2986_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:2987_2: Pūjārahe pūjayatoti abhivādanādīhi ca catūhi ca paccayehi pūjentassa.
atk-s0502a0:2988_3: Natthi kutoci bhavato vā ārammaṇato vā etesaṃ bhayanti akutobhayā,
atk-s0502a0:2988_5: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātunti puññaṃ gaṇetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0502a0:2988_8: imaṃ ettakanti kenacīti apisaddo idha sambandhitabbo,
atk-s0502a0:2988_11: Mānenāti tividhena mānena tīraṇena dhāraṇena pūraṇena vā.
atk-s0502a0:2988_12: Tīraṇaṃ nāma idaṃ ettakanti nayato tīraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:2988_15: Kenaci puggalena imehi tīhi mānehi buddhādike pūjayato puññaṃ vipākavasena gaṇetuṃ na sakkā pariyantarahitatoti
atk-s0502a0:2988_16: dvīsu ṭhānesu pūjayato kiṃ dānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dharamāne buddhādī pūjayato na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:2988_17: puna te tādise kilesaparinibbānanimittena khandhaparinibbānena nibbutepi pūjayato na sakkā saṅkhātunti bhedā yujjanti.
atk-s0502a0:2989_0: “Tiṭṭhante nibbute cāpi, same citte samaṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:2991_7: Tasmiṃ samāgame caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:2998_0: Susukhaṃ vatāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sakkesu viharanto kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ ñātake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:2999_0: Sākiyakoliyā kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni karonti.
atk-s0502a0:2999_1: Atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsikānampi kammakārā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:2999_8: “tumhesu koṭṭhake pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe ca gahetvā pacchipasibbakādihatthā
atk-s0502a0:2999_13: Mayampi na dassāmāti evaṃ kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:2999_14: sopi aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3000_2: ye soṇasiṅgālādayo viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:3000_3: etesaṃ hatthino ceva assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3000_4: Sākiyakammakārāpi vadanti “tumhe idāni kuṭṭhino dārake gahetvā gajjatha,
atk-s0502a0:3000_5: ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:3000_6: etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3000_7: Te gantvā tasmiṃ kamme niyuttānaṃ amaccānaṃ kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:3000_9: Tato sākiyā “bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasitakānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā”ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3000_10: Koliyāpi “kolarukkhavāsīnaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā”ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3001_0: Satthāpi paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento ñātake disvā “mayi agacchante ime nassissanti,
atk-s0502a0:3001_1: mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekakova ākāsena gantvā rohiṇinadiyā majjhe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:3001_2: Ñātakā satthāraṃ disvā āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3001_10: senāpati jānissatī”ti iminā upāyena yāva dāsakammakare pucchitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:3001_19: “Ayuttaṃ tumhākaṃ appamattataṃ udakaṃ nissāya anagghe khattiye nāsetu”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3001_21: Atha te satthā āmantetvā “kasmā mahārājā evarūpaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a0:3001_29: ahaṃ anussukko viharāmī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:3011_3: pabbajitā vā pana vejjakammādivasena jīvitavuttiṃ uppādetvā “sukhena jīvāmā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a0:3011_5: ye mayaṃ pañcahi verīhi verinesu manussesu averino,
atk-s0502a0:3011_7: pañcakāmaguṇapariyesane ussukesu tāya pariyesanāya abhāvena anussukāti.
atk-s0502a0:3015_0: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāmāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pañcasālāya brāhmaṇagāme viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3016_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā pañcasatānaṃ kumārikānaṃ sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vihāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3016_1: Tāpi kumārikāyo ekasmiṃ nakkhattadivase nadiṃ gantvā nhatvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā gāmābhimukhiyo pāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3016_2: Satthāpi taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0502a0:3016_3: Atha māro sakalagāmavāsīnaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā yathā satthā kaṭacchubhattamattampi na labhati,
atk-s0502a0:3016_4: evaṃ katvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhamantaṃ satthāraṃ gāmadvāre ṭhatvā āha – “api, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:3016_8: yathāhaṃ piṇḍaṃ na labheyya”nti? “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:3016_12: sabbesaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā imassa purato pāṇiṃ paharitvā hassakeḷiṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3016_13: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tā kumārikāyo gāmadvāraṃ patvā satthāraṃ disvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3016_17: kiñci alabhitvāpi ābhassaraloke mahābrahmāno viya pītisukheneva vītināmessāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3018_0: “Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, yesaṃ no natthi kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:3020_0: Tattha yesaṃ noti yesaṃ amhākaṃ palibujjhanatthena rāgādīsu kiñcanesu ekampi kiñcanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0502a0:3020_1: Pītibhakkhāti yathā ābhassarā devā pītibhakkhā hutvā pītisukheneva vītināmenti,
atk-s0502a0:3024_0: Jayaṃ veranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño parājayaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3025_0: So kira kāsikagāmaṃ nissāya bhāgineyyena ajātasattunā saddhiṃ yujjhanto tena tayo vāre parājito tatiyavāre cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:3025_6: rājā kira kāsikagāmakaṃ nissāya tayo vāre parājito,
atk-s0502a0:3025_7: so idāni parājitvā āgato ‘khīramukhampi dārakaṃ parājetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:3025_8: kiṃ me jīvitenā’ti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipanno”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3025_12: parājito pana dukkhaṃ setiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3029_0: Tattha jayanti paraṃ jinanto veraṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0502a0:3029_1: Parājitoti parena parājito “kadā nu kho paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti dukkhaṃ seti sabbiriyāpathesu dukkhameva viharatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3029_2: Upasantoti abbhantare upasantarāgādikileso khīṇāsavo jayañca parājayañca hitvā sukhaṃ seti,
atk-s0502a0:3033_0: Natthi rāgasamoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuladārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3034_0: Tassā kira mātāpitaro āvāhaṃ katvā maṅgaladivase satthāraṃ nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3034_2: Sāpi kho vadhukā bhikkhusaṅghassa udakaparissāvanādīni karontī aparāparaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0502a0:3034_4: Tassa rāgavasena olokentassa anto kileso samudācari.
atk-s0502a0:3034_7: Hatthaṃ pasāretvā “taṃ vadhukaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti pana cittaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3034_8: Satthā tassajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā yathā taṃ itthiṃ na passati,
atk-s0502a0:3034_12: na hi rāgagginā sadiso aggi nāma,
atk-s0502a0:3034_15: nibbānasukhasadisaṃ sukhampi natthiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3037_0: Natthi khandhasamā dukkhā, natthi santiparaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3038_0: Tattha natthi rāgasamoti dhūmaṃ vā jālaṃ vā aṅgāraṃ vā adassetvā antoyeva jhāpetvā bhasmamuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ samattho rāgena samo añño aggi nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:3038_5: Santiparanti nibbānato uttariṃ aññaṃ sukhampi natthi.
atk-s0502a0:3039_0: Desanāvasāne kumārikā ca kumārako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3039_1: Tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanākāraṃ akāsīti.
atk-s0502a0:3042_0: Jighacchāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā āḷaviyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3043_0: Ekasmiñhi divase satthā jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento āḷaviyaṃ ekaṃ duggatamanussaṃ
atk-s0502a0:3043_1: disvā tassūpanissayasampattiṃ ñatvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro āḷaviṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3043_3: Sopi duggatamanusso “satthā kira āgato”ti sutvā “satthu santike dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti manaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3043_6: udāhu dhammaṃ suṇāmī”ti cintetvā “goṇaṃ pariyesitvā pacchā dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti pātova gehā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:3043_7: Āḷavivāsinopi buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā parivisitvā anumodanatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3043_10: tasmiṃ āgateyeva dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:3044_0: Sopi manusso divā goṇaṃ disvā gogaṇe pakkhipitvā “sacepi aññaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:3044_1: satthu vandanamattampi karissāmī”ti jighacchāpīḷitopi gehaṃ gamanāya manaṃ akatvā vegena satthu santikaṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3044_6: So satthārā vuttaṭṭhāneyeva taṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhādanīyabhojanīyehi sakkaccaṃ parivisi.
atk-s0502a0:3044_8: Ṭhapetvā kira imaṃ ṭhānaṃ tīsu piṭakesu aññattha gatāgatassa bhattavicāraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:3044_10: Athassa satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0502a0:3045_4: ajja panekaṃ manussaṃ disvāva yāguādīni vicāretvā dāpesī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3045_8: ahaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ kantāraṃ āgacchanto tassa upāsakassūpanissayaṃ disvā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:3045_10: pātova paṭṭhāya goṇaṃ pariyesanto araññe vicari.
atk-s0502a0:3045_11: ‘Jighacchadukkhena dhamme desiyamānepi paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkhissatī’ti cintetvā evaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:3045_12: jighacchārogasadiso rogo nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3048_0: Etaṃ ñatvā yathābhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3049_0: Tattha jighacchāparamā rogāti yasmā añño rogo sakiṃ tikicchito vinassati vā tadaṅgavasena vā pahīyati,
atk-s0502a0:3049_1: jighacchā pana niccakālaṃ tikicchitabbāyevāti sesarogānaṃ ayaṃ paramā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:3049_4: khandhapariharaṇasamaṃ dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti etamatthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā paṇḍito nibbānaṃ sacchi karoti.
atk-s0502a0:3049_5: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhanti tañhi sabbasukhānaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ sukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3053_0: Ārogyaparamā lābhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3054_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a0:3054_1: Ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati,
atk-s0502a0:3054_2: niddāya abhibhūyamānopi ujukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:3054_8: atibahubhojanaṃ evaṃ dukkhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3059_3: Mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttari ovadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3064_8: rājā atthaṃ sallakkhetvā yaṃ piṇḍaṃ chaḍḍessati,
atk-s0502a0:3064_9: tasmiṃ piṇḍe sitthagaṇanāya rañño bhattapacanakāle tattake taṇḍule hareyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3064_11: bhante”ti sāyampi pātopi rañño bhuñjantassa osānapiṇḍakāle taṃ gāthaṃ udāharitvā tena chaḍḍitapiṇḍe sitthagaṇanāya taṇḍule hāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:3064_12: Rājāpi tassa gāthaṃ sutvā sahassaṃ sahassaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:3064_13: So aparena samayena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhahitvā sukhappatto tanusarīro ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:3065_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:3065_3: Pubbe me bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ yuddhameva hoti,
atk-s0502a0:3065_4: idāni vajīrakumāriṃ nāma dhītaraṃ bhāgineyyassa datvā so gāmo tassāyeva nhānacuṇṇamūlaṃ katvā dinno,
atk-s0502a0:3065_7: Kulasantakaṃ rājamaṇiratanaṃ no gehe purimadivase naṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:3065_10: Tumhākaṃ sāvakehi saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ icchantena ñātidhītāpi no gehe katā,
atk-s0502a0:3065_16: nibbānasadisañca sukhaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3069_5: Santuṭṭhiparamaṃ dhananti gihino vā pabbajitassa vā yaṃ attanā laddhaṃ attano santakaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:3069_6: teneva tussanabhāvo santuṭṭhī nāma sesadhanehi paramaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:3069_7: Vissāsaparamā ñātīti mātā vā hotu pitā vā,
atk-s0502a0:3069_10: Yena aññātakena pana saddhiṃ vissāso atthi,
atk-s0502a0:3073_0: Pavivekarasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliyaṃ viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3074_2: ahaṃ ito catūhi māsehi parinibbāyissāmī”ti vutte satthu santike satta bhikkhusatāni santāsaṃ āpajjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:3074_5: Bhikkhū vaggā vaggā hutvā “kiṃ nu kho karissāmā”ti mantentā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:3074_6: Atheko tissatthero nāma bhikkhū “satthā kira catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0502a0:3074_8: satthari dharamāneyeva mayā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova vihāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3074_9: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike gamanaṃ vā kenaci saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo vā natthi.
atk-s0502a0:3074_15: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “kasmā tissa evaṃ akāsī”ti pucchitvā tena attano adhippāye ārocite “sādhu,
atk-s0502a0:3074_19: Gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karontāpi neva maṃ pūjenti,
atk-s0502a0:3074_20: dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjamānāyeva pana maṃ pūjentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3078_2: Pitvāti dukkhapariññādīni karonto ārammaṇato sacchikiriyāvasena pivitvā.
atk-s0502a0:3078_3: Upasamassa cāti kilesūpasamanibbānassa ca rasaṃ pitvā.
atk-s0502a0:3078_4: Niddaro hotīti tena ubhayarasapānena khīṇāsavo bhikkhu abbhantare rāgadarathādīnaṃ abhāvena niddaro ceva nippāpo ca hoti.
atk-s0502a0:3078_5: Rasaṃ pivanti navavidhalokuttaradhammavasena uppannaṃ pītirasaṃ pivantopi niddaro nippāpo ca hoti.
atk-s0502a0:3079_0: Desanāvasāne tissatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:3082_0: Sāhu dassananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvagāmake viharanto sakkaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3083_0: Tathāgatassa hi āyusaṅkhāre vissaṭṭhe lohitapakkhandikābādhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā sakko devarājā “mayā
atk-s0502a0:3083_1: satthu santikaṃ gantvā gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tigāvutappamāṇaṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0502a0:3083_3: Atha naṃ satthā āha “ko eso”ti? “Ahaṃ, bhante, sakko”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3083_7: devānaṃ manussagandho yojanasatato paṭṭhāya gale baddhakuṇapaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0502a0:3083_10: caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhito tumhākaṃ sīlagandhaṃ ghāyitvā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:3083_11: ahameva upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti so satthu sarīravaḷañjanabhājanaṃ aññassa hatthenāpi phusituṃ adatvā sīseyeva
atk-s0502a0:3083_14: Evaṃ satthāraṃ paṭijaggitvā satthu phāsukakāleyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3084_0: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho satthari sakkassa sineho,
atk-s0502a0:3084_1: evarūpaṃ nāma dibbasampattiṃ pahāya mukhasaṅkocanamattampi akatvā gandhabhājanaṃ nīharanto viya satthu
atk-s0502a0:3084_3: Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0502a0:3084_6: yaṃ sakko devarājā mayi sinehaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:3084_7: Ayaṃ sakko hi devarājā maṃ nissāya jarasakkabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sotāpanno hutvā taruṇasakkassa bhāvaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:3084_8: ahaṃ hissa maraṇabhayatajjitassa pañcasikhagandhabbadevaputtaṃ purato katvā āgatakāle indasālaguhāyaṃ devaparisāya majjhe nisinnassa –
atk-s0502a0:3085_0: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0502a0:3086_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:3087_0: Vatvā tassa kaṅkhaṃ vinodento dhammaṃ desesiṃ.
atk-s0502a0:3087_2: sakkopi yathānisinnova sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā taruṇasakko jāto.
atk-s0502a0:3087_8: Bālehi saddhiṃ pana sabbametaṃ dukkhanti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:3098_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ,bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃ va candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:3099_2: tehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne nisīdanādibhāvopi tesaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ kātuṃ labhanabhāvopi sādhuyeva.
atk-s0502a0:3099_4: Dīghamaddhānanti so bālasahāyena “ehi sandhicchedādīni karomā”ti vuccamāno tena saddhiṃ ekacchando hutvā
atk-s0502a0:3099_5: tāni karonto hatthacchedādīni patvā dīghamaddhānaṃ socati.
atk-s0502a0:3099_6: Sabbadāti yathā asihatthena vā amittena āsīvisādīhi vā saddhiṃ ekato vāso nāma niccaṃ dukkho,
atk-s0502a0:3099_8: Dhīro ca sukhasaṃvāsoti ettha sukho saṃvāso etenāti sukhasaṃvāso,
atk-s0502a0:3099_9: paṇḍitena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne saṃvāso sukhoti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0502a0:3099_10: Ñātīnaṃva samāgamoti yathāpi ñātīnaṃ samāgamo sukho,
atk-s0502a0:3100_0: Tasmā hīti yasmā bālehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso dukkho,
atk-s0502a0:3100_8: tathārūpaṃ sappurisaṃ sobhanapañhaṃ yathā nimmalaṃ nakkhattapathasaṅkhātaṃ ākāsaṃ candimā bhajati,
atk-s0502a0:3107_0: Ayogeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tayo pabbajite ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3108_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ kule mātāpitūnaṃ ekaputtako ahosi piyo manāpo.
atk-s0502a0:3108_1: So ekadivasaṃ gehe nimantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumodanaṃ karontānaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:3108_5: Athassa pitā bahi nikkhamanto “imaṃ rakkheyyāsī”ti mātaraṃ paṭicchāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:3108_7: Athassa ekadivasaṃ pitari bahi gate mātā “puttaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti ekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ nissāya ekaṃ pādehi uppīḷetvā chamāya nisinnā suttaṃ kantati.
atk-s0502a0:3108_10: sarīravalañjaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā tāya pāde samiñjite nikkhamitvā vegena vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “pabbājetha maṃ,
atk-s0502a0:3109_3: So “kahaṃ nu kho me putto”ti olokento taṃ adisvā “vihāraṃ gato bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā puttaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā kanditvā roditvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:3109_4: kiṃ maṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā “mama putte pabbajite ahaṃ idāni gehe kiṃ karissāmī”ti sayampi bhikkhū yācitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:3109_5: Athassa mātāpi “kiṃ nu kho me putto ca pati ca cirāyanti,
atk-s0502a0:3109_6: kacci vihāraṃ gantvā pabbajitā”ti te olokentī vihāraṃ gantvā ubhopi pabbajite disvā “imesaṃ pabbajitakāle
atk-s0502a0:3109_7: mama gehena ko attho”ti sayampi bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a0:3109_8: Te pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:3109_9: vihārepi bhikkhuniupassayepi ekatova nisīditvā sallapantā divasaṃ vītināmenti.
atk-s0502a0:3110_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū nesaṃ kiriyaṃ satthuṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:3110_1: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tumhe evaṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā evaṃ karotha?
atk-s0502a0:3110_7: Tasmā sattesu ca saṅkhāresu ca kañci piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:3118_0: “Tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha, piyāpāyo hi pāpako;
atk-s0502a0:3119_0: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjanti, yesaṃ natthi piyāppiya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3120_1: Vesiyāgocarādibhedassa hi chabbidhassa agocarassa sevanaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro nāma,
atk-s0502a0:3120_3: Yogasminti tabbiparīte ca yonisomanasikāre ayuñjantoti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3120_4: Atthaṃ hitvāti pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya adhisīlādisikkhattayaṃ attho nāma,
atk-s0502a0:3120_7: Pihetattānuyoginanti tāya paṭipattiyā sāsanato cuto gihibhāvaṃ patvā pacchā ye attānuyogaṃ anuyuttā sīlādīni
atk-s0502a0:3121_0: Mā piyehīti piyehi sattehi vā saṅkhārehi vā kudācanaṃ ekakkhaṇepi na samāgaccheyya,
atk-s0502a0:3121_3: Piyā nañhi viyogavasena adassanaṃ appiyānañca upasaṅkamanavasena dassanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:3121_5: tasmā kañci sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā piyaṃ nāma na kareyya.
atk-s0502a0:3121_8: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjantīti yesaṃ piyaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:3121_12: Tesu pana dvīsu pahīnesu sesaganthā pahīnā honti.
atk-s0502a0:3121_13: Tasmā piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā na kattabbanti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3122_1: Tena pana tayo janā “mayaṃ vinā bhavituṃ na sakkomā”ti vibbhamitvā gehameva agamiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:3125_0: Piyato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3126_0: So hi attano putte kālakate puttasokābhibhūto āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati,
atk-s0502a0:3126_2: Satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ekaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ gahetvā tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3126_3: So satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ kātukāmo bhavissatī”ti satthāraṃ pavesetvā gehamajjhe
atk-s0502a0:3126_4: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthari nisinne āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:3126_5: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a0:3126_8: idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma na ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne,
atk-s0502a0:3126_17: bhijjanadhammaṃ bhinna’nti sokaṃ akatvā maraṇassatimeva bhāvayiṃsū”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:3126_20: ācikkhatha me”ti yācito tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a0:3127_0: “Uragova tacaṃ jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tanuṃ;
atk-s0502a0:3128_0: Evaṃ sarīre nibbhoge, pete kālakate sati.
atk-s0502a0:3130_0: Tasmā etaṃ na socāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a0:3131_0: Imaṃ pañcakanipāte uragajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “evaṃ pubbe paṇḍitā piyaputte kālakate yathā etarahi tvaṃ kammante vissajjetvā nirāhāro rodanto vicarasi,
atk-s0502a0:3131_1: tathā avicaritvā maraṇassatibhāvanābalena sokaṃ akatvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:3131_4: Uppajjamāno hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā piyameva nissāya uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3134_0: Piyato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3135_0: Tattha piyatoti vaṭṭamūlako hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ piyameva sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā nissāya uppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:3135_1: tato pana vippamuttassa ubhayampetaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3136_0: Desanāvasāne kuṭumbiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:3139_0: Pemato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3140_0: Sā kira puttassa dhītaraṃ sudattaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā gehe bhikkhusaṅghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:3140_2: Sā tassā sarīranikkhepaṃ kāretvā sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī dukkhinī dummanā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:3140_3: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, visākhe,
atk-s0502a0:3140_4: dukkhinī dummanā assumukhā rodamānā nisinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:3140_11: “Sace panāyaṃ ettako jano tava nattāya sadiso bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a0:3140_14: “Kati pana janā sāvatthiyaṃ devasikaṃ kālaṃ karontī”ti? “Bahū,
atk-s0502a0:3140_20: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi mā soci,
atk-s0502a0:3140_21: soko vā bhayaṃ vā pematova jāyatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3143_0: Pemato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3144_0: Tattha pematoti puttadhītādīsu kataṃ pemameva nissāya soko jāyatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3148_0: Ratiyā jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ nissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto licchavī ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3149_0: Te kira ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase aññamaññaṃ asadisehi alaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānagamanatthāya nagarā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3149_1: Satthā piṇḍāya pavisanto te disvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0502a0:3149_6: te ime olokentū”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:3149_7: Tepi uyyānaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ itthiṃ ādāya gantvā taṃ nissāya issābhibhūtā aññamaññaṃ paharitvā lohitaṃ nadiṃ viya pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3149_10: Bhikkhūpi licchavayo tathā nīyamāne disvā satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:3149_11: licchavirājāno pātova alaṅkatapaṭiyattā devā viya nagarā nikkhamitvā idāni ekaṃ itthiṃ nissāya imaṃ byasanaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a0:3149_13: soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ ratiṃ nissāya uppajjatiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:3152_0: Ratiyā vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a0:3153_0: Tattha ratiyāti pañcakāmaguṇaratito, taṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:3157_0: Kāmatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anitthigandhakumāraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:3158_0: So kira brahmalokā cutasatto sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya itthisamīpaṃ upagantuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0502a0:3158_4: āvāhaṃ te karissāmā”ti vutte “na me itthiyā attho”ti paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ yāciyamāno pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre
atk-s0502a0:3158_5: pakkosāpetvā rattasuvaṇṇanikkhasahassaṃ dāpetvā ativiya pāsādikaṃ ghanakoṭṭimaṃ itthirūpaṃ kāretvā puna
atk-s0502a0:3158_7: tayi āvāhaṃ akaronte kulavaṃso na patiṭṭhahissati,
atk-s0502a0:3158_8: kumārikaṃ te ānessāmā”ti vutte “tena hi sace me evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessatha,
atk-s0502a0:3158_9: karissāmi vo vacana”nti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0502a0:3158_10: Athassa mātāpitaro abhiññāte brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā “amhākaṃ putto mahāpuñño,
atk-s0502a0:3158_11: avassaṃ iminā saddhiṃ katapuññā kumārikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:3158_12: gacchatha imaṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ gahetvā evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ āharathā”ti pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3158_13: Te “sādhū”ti cārikaṃ carantā maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ gatā.
atk-s0502a0:3158_14: Tasmiñca nagare ekā soḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā kumārikā ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:3158_16: Tepi kho brāhmaṇā “sace idha evarūpā kumārikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:3158_17: imaṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ asukassa kulassa dhītā viya abhirūpā’ti vakkhantī”ti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ titthamagge ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3159_0: Athassa kumārikāya dhātī taṃ kumārikaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi nhāyitukāmā hutvā titthaṃ āgatā taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā “dhītā me”ti saññāya “dubbinītāsi,
atk-s0502a0:3159_2: tvaṃ mayā puretaraṃ idhāgatāsī”ti hatthena paharitvā thaddhabhāvañceva nibbikāratañca ñatvā “ahaṃ me,
atk-s0502a0:3159_5: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā “evarūpā te, amma,
atk-s0502a0:3159_7: Ayaṃ mama dhītu santike kiṃ agghatīti?
atk-s0502a0:3159_8: Tena hi te dhītaraṃ amhākaṃ dassehīti.
atk-s0502a0:3159_9: Sā tehi saddhiṃ gehaṃ gantvā sāmikānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:3159_10: Te brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ katapaṭisammodanā dhītaraṃ otāretvā heṭṭhāpāsāde suvaṇṇarūpakassa santike ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:3159_13: Brāhmaṇā taṃ tesaṃ datvā kumārikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā gantvā anitthigandhakumārassa mātāpitūnaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3159_15: naṃ sīghaṃ ānethā”ti mahantena sakkārena pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3160_0: Kumāropi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “kañcanarūpatopi kira abhirūpatarā dārikā atthī”ti savanavaseneva sinehaṃ uppādetvā “sīghaṃ ānentū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:3160_1: Sāpi kho yānaṃ āropetvā ānīyamānā atisukhumālatāya yānugghātena samuppāditavātarogā antarāmaggeyeva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3160_3: tassa atisinehena pucchantassa sahasāva anārocetvā katipāhaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā tamatthaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:3160_4: So “tathārūpāya nāma itthiyā saddhiṃ samāgamaṃ nālattha”nti uppannadomanasso pabbatena viya sokadukkhena ajjhotthaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:3160_5: Satthā tassūpanissayaṃ disvā piṇḍāya caranto taṃ gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:3160_6: Athassa mātāpitaro satthāraṃ antogehaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ parivisiṃsu.
