atk-s0502a0:4108_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ aciravatīnadītīre hatthidamakaṃ “ekaṃ hatthiṃ damessāmī”ti attanā icchitaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4108_1: sikkhāpetuṃ asakkontaṃ disvā samīpe ṭhite bhikkhū āmantetvā āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4108_2: sace ayaṃ hatthācariyo imaṃ hatthiṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma vijjheyya,
atk-s0502a0:4108_4: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā tathā katvā taṃ hatthiṃ sudantaṃ damesi.
atk-s0502a0:4108_5: Te bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4108_6: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā evaṃ vutta”nti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4108_10: Na hi etehi yānehi agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthā nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a0:4108_11: attanā pana sudantena sakkā agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4108_13: kiṃ te etesaṃ damanenā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4110_0: “Na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:4112_2: na hi etehi yānehi koci puggalo supinantenapi agatapubbattā “agata”nti saṅkhātaṃ nibbānadisaṃ tathā gaccheyya,
atk-s0502a0:4112_3: yathā pubbabhāge indriyadamena aparabhāge ariyamaggabhāvanāya sudantena danto nibbisevano sappañño puggalo taṃ agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:4116_0: Dhanapāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññatarassa parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇassa putte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4117_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko brāhmaṇo aṭṭhasatasahassavibhavo vayappattānaṃ catunnaṃ puttānaṃ āvāhaṃ katvā cattāri satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4117_3: tassā kucchiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ vasena kulasantakaṃ bhijjissati,
atk-s0502a0:4117_4: handa naṃ mayaṃ saṅgaṇhissāmā”ti te taṃ paṇītehi ghāsacchādanādīhi upaṭṭhahantā hatthapādasambāhanādīni
atk-s0502a0:4117_5: karontā upaṭṭhahitvā ekadivasamassa divā niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāde sambāhantā pāṭiyekkaṃ gharāvāse
atk-s0502a0:4117_6: ādīnavaṃ vatvā “mayaṃ tumhe iminā nīhārena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahissāma,
atk-s0502a0:4117_8: Brāhmaṇo puna ekekassa satasahassaṃ datvā attano nivatthapārupanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:4117_10: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nhatvā āgacchantaṃ dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suṇhā evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4117_11: “kiṃ tayā jeṭṭhaputtassa sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā atirekaṃ dinnaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:4117_12: nanu sabbesaṃ dve dve satasahassāni dinnāni,
atk-s0502a0:4117_13: kiṃ sesaputtānaṃ gharassa maggaṃ na jānāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4117_14: Sopi “nassa vasalī”ti kujjhitvā aññassa gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4117_15: Tatopi katipāhaccayena imināva upāyena palāpito aññassāti evaṃ ekagharampi pavesanaṃ alabhamāno paṇḍaraṅgapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4117_16: pabbajitvā bhikkhāya caranto kālānamaccayena jarājiṇṇo dubbhojanadukkhaseyyāhi milātasarīro bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a0:4117_17: caranto āgamma pīṭhikāya nipanno niddaṃ okkamitvā uṭṭhāya nisinno attānaṃ oloketvā puttesu attano patiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4117_19: “samaṇo kira gotamo abbhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0502a0:4117_20: sakkā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ labhitu”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4117_21: So nivāsanapārupanaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā bhikkhabhājanaṃ gahetvā daṇḍamādāya bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4118_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇamahāsālo lūkho lūkhapāvuraṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a0:4118_2: Satthā ekamantaṃ nisinnena tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā etadavoca –
atk-s0502a0:4118_7: te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha gharā nikkhāmentīti.
atk-s0502a0:4118_9: imā gāthāyo pariyāpuṇitvā sabhāyaṃ mahājanakāye sannipatite puttesu ca sannisinnesu bhāsassu –
atk-s0502a0:4120_0: Te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha, sāva vārenti sūkaraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4121_0: “Asantā kira maṃ jammā, tāta tātāti bhāsare;
atk-s0502a0:4125_0: “Daṇḍova kira me seyyo, yañce puttā anassavā;
atk-s0502a0:4126_0: Caṇḍampi goṇaṃ vāreti, atho caṇḍampi kukkuraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4129_0: So bhagavato santike tā gāthāyo uggaṇhitvā tathārūpe brāhmaṇānaṃ samāgamadivase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu
atk-s0502a0:4129_1: puttesu taṃ sabhaṃ ogāhitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe mahārahesu āsanesu nisinnesu “ayaṃ me kālo”ti sabhāya
atk-s0502a0:4129_6: Tena ca samayena manussānaṃ vattaṃ hoti “yo mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khādanto mātāpitaro na poseti,
atk-s0502a0:4129_8: Tasmā te brāhmaṇaputtā pitu pādesu patitvā “jīvitaṃ no, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4129_14: ajja paṭṭhāya pitaraṃ na sammā paṭijaggissatha,
atk-s0502a0:4129_16: Te bhītā pitaraṃ pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ ukkhipitvā gehaṃ netvā sarīraṃ telena abbhañjitvā ubbaṭṭetvā
atk-s0502a0:4129_17: gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhāpetvā brāhmaṇiyo pakkosāpetvā “ajja paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ sammā paṭijaggatha,
atk-s0502a0:4130_0: Brāhmaṇo subhojanañca sukhaseyyañca āgamma katipāhaccayena sañjātabalo pīṇindriyo attabhāvaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a0:4130_1: “ayaṃ me sampatti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya laddhā”ti paṇṇākāratthāya ekaṃ dussayugaṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4130_2: gantvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisinno taṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavato pādamūle ṭhapetvā “mayaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4130_5: paṭiggaṇhātu me bhavaṃ gotamo ācariyo ācariyadhana”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4130_6: Bhagavā tassa anukampāya taṃ paṭiggahetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:4130_12: mayaṃ pana ruccanaṭṭhānameva gamissāmā”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_0: Satthā punadivase piṇḍāya caranto jeṭṭhaputtassa gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_1: So satthāraṃ disvā pattamādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā paṇītabhojanamadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_2: Satthā punadivase itarassa itarassāti paṭipāṭiyā sabbesaṃ gharāni agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_4: Ekadivasaṃ jeṭṭhaputto maṅgale paccupaṭṭhite pitaraṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4131_8: “Tena hi taṃ svātanāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nimantethā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4131_10: Satthā punadivase saparivāro tassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_11: So haritupalitte sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite gehe buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā appodakamadhupāyasena ceva paṇītena khādanīyena ca parivisi.
atk-s0502a0:4131_12: Antarābhattasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇassa cattāro puttā satthu santike nisīditvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:4131_14: mayaṃ amhākaṃ pitaraṃ paṭijaggāma na pamajjāma,
atk-s0502a0:4132_1: mātāpituposanaṃ nāma porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ āciṇṇamevā”ti vatvā “tassa nāgassa vippavāsena,
atk-s0502a0:4132_2: virūḷhā sallakī ca kuṭajā cā”ti imaṃ ekādasanipāte mātuposakanāgarājajātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4138_0: Tattha dhanapālo nāmāti tadā kāsikaraññā hatthācariyaṃ pesetvā ramaṇīye nāgavane gāhāpitassa hatthino etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4138_3: pakatiyāpi hatthino tasmiṃ kāle aṅkuse vā kuntatomare vā na gaṇenti,
atk-s0502a0:4138_8: Baddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjatīti so baddho hatthisālaṃ pana netvā vicitrasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā katagandhaparibhaṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:4138_9: upari baddhavicitravitānāya bhūmiyā ṭhapito raññā rājārahena nānaggarasena bhojanena upaṭṭhāpitopi kiñci
atk-s0502a0:4138_11: tamatthaṃ sandhāya “baddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4138_12: Sumarati nāgavanassāti so ramaṇīyaṃ me vasanaṭṭhānanti nāgavanaṃ sarati.
atk-s0502a0:4138_13: “Mātā pana me araññe puttaviyogena dukkhappattā ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:4138_15: kiṃ me iminā bhojanenā”ti dhammikaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānadhammameva sari.
atk-s0502a0:4138_16: Taṃ pana yasmā tasmiṃ nāgavaneyeva ṭhito sakkā pūretuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4138_19: Satthari imaṃ attano pubbacariyaṃ ānetvā kathente kathenteyeva sabbepi te assudhārā pavattetvā muduhadayā ohitasotā bhaviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4138_20: Atha nesaṃ bhagavā sappāyaṃ viditvā saccāni pakāsetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:4139_0: Desanāvasāne saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a0:4142_0: Middhī yadā hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4143_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a0:4143_1: So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvāva satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati,
atk-s0502a0:4143_2: niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi ujukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4143_8: atibahubhojanaṃ evaṃ dukkhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4149_3: Gharasūkaro hi daharakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0502a0:4149_6: yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca,
atk-s0502a0:4149_7: nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya ca aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto niddāyanasīlo samparivattasāyī,
atk-s0502a0:4149_8: tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasikātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:4151_0: Tanukassa bhavanti vedanā, saṇikaṃ jīrati āyu pālaya”nti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4152_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā uttaramāṇavaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā “imaṃ gāthaṃ rañño bhojanavelāya pavedeyyāsi,
atk-s0502a0:4152_1: iminā upāyena bhojanaṃ parihāpeyyāsī”ti upāyaṃ ācikkhi,
atk-s0502a0:4152_3: Rājā aparena samayena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhito susallahukasarīro sukhappatto satthari uppannavissāso sattāhaṃ asadisadānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0502a0:4155_0: Idaṃ pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sānuṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4156_0: So kira ekissā upāsikāya ekaputtako ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4156_2: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ahosi vattasampanno,
atk-s0502a0:4156_4: Māsassa aṭṭhame divase pātova uṭṭhāya udakamāḷake udakaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ sammajjitvā āsanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4156_5: paññāpetvā dīpaṃ jāletvā madhurassarena dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_6: Bhikkhū tassa thāmaṃ ñatvā “sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti ajjhesanti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_8: kāyo vā bādhatī”ti kiñci paccāhāraṃ akatvā dhammāsanaṃ abhirūhitvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sarabhaññaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4156_9: vatvā otaranto “mayhaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ imasmiṃ sarabhaññe pattiṃ dammī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a0:4156_10: Tassa manussā mātāpitaro pattiyā dinnabhāvaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_11: Anantarattabhāve panassa mātā yakkhinī hutvā nibbattā,
atk-s0502a0:4156_12: sā devatāhi saddhiṃ āgantvā dhammaṃ sutvā “sāmaṇerena dinnapattiṃ anumodāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4156_14: “Sīlasampanno ca nāma bhikkhu sadevakassa lokassa piyo hotī”ti tasmiṃ sāmaṇere devatā salajjā sagāravā
atk-s0502a0:4156_15: mahābrahmānaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññanti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_16: Sāmaṇere gāravena tañca yakkhiniṃ garukaṃ katvā passanti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_17: Tā dhammassavanayakkhasamāgamādīsu “sānumātā sānumātā”ti yakkhiniyā aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ denti.
atk-s0502a0:4156_18: Mahesakkhāpi yakkhā taṃ disvā maggā okkamanti,
atk-s0502a0:4157_0: Atha kho sāmaṇero vuḍḍhimanvāya paripakkindriyo anabhiratiyā pīḷito anabhiratiṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto paruḷhakesanakho
atk-s0502a0:4157_1: kiliṭṭhanivāsanapārupano kassaci anārocetvā pattacīvaramādāya ekakova mātugharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4157_2: Upāsikā puttaṃ disvā vanditvā āha – “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4157_3: tvaṃ pubbe ācariyupajjhāyehi vā daharasāmaṇerehi vā saddhiṃ idhāgacchasi,
atk-s0502a0:4157_6: Sā upāsikā nānappakārena gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ ovadamānāpi saññāpetuṃ asakkontī “appeva
atk-s0502a0:4157_7: nāma attano dhammatāyapi sallakkheyyā”ti anuyyojetvā “tiṭṭha, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4157_9: yāguṃ pivitvā katabhattakiccassa te manāpāni vatthāni nīharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4157_12: Atha “bhattaṃ sampādessāmī”ti avidūre nisinnā taṇḍule dhovati.
atk-s0502a0:4157_13: Tasmiṃ samaye sā yakkhinī “kahaṃ nu kho sāmaṇero,
atk-s0502a0:4157_15: no”ti āvajjamānā tassa vibbhamitukāmatāya nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sāmaṇero me mahesakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ antare lajjaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0502a0:4157_16: gacchāmissa vibbhamane antarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti āgantvā tassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā kheḷena paggharantena bhūmiyaṃ nipati.
atk-s0502a0:4157_17: Upāsikā puttassa taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā vegena gantvā puttaṃ āliṅgetvā ūrūsu nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4157_19: Upāsikā pana paridevamānā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4161_0: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, iti me arahataṃ sutaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:4162_0: Sā dāni ajja passāmi, yakkhā kīḷanti sānunā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4167_0: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, sāhu te arahataṃ suta”nti. –
atk-s0502a0:4170_0: Mākāsi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0502a0:4171_0: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissasi karosi vā;
atk-s0502a0:4172_0: Na te dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4173_0: Evaṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ katvā sakuṇassa viya uppatitvā palāyatopi te mokkho natthīti vatvā sā yakkhinī sāmaṇeraṃ muñci.
atk-s0502a0:4173_1: So akkhīni ummīletvā mātaraṃ kese vikiriya assasantiṃ passasantiṃ rodamānaṃ sakalagāmavāsino ca sannipatite
atk-s0502a0:4173_2: disvā attano yakkhena gahitabhāvaṃ ajānanto “ahaṃ pubbe pīṭhe nisinno,
atk-s0502a0:4173_3: mātā me avidūre nisīditvā taṇḍule dhovi,
atk-s0502a0:4173_5: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti nipannakova mātaraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:4174_0: “Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0502a0:4175_0: Jīvantaṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4176_0: Athassa mātā vatthukāmakilesakāme pahāya pabbajitassa puna vibbhamanatthaṃ āgamane ādīnavaṃ dassentī āha –
atk-s0502a0:4177_0: “Mataṃ vā putta rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0502a0:4178_0: Yo ca kāme cajitvāna, punarāgacchate idha;
atk-s0502a0:4179_0: Taṃ vāpi putta rodanti, puna jīvaṃ mato hi so”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4180_0: Evañca pana vatvā gharāvāsaṃ kukkuḷasadisañceva narakasadisañca katvā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassentī puna āha –
atk-s0502a0:4183_2: mayā pana ‘ayaṃ no puttako ḍayhamāno’ti gehā bhaṇḍaṃ viya nīharitvā buddhasāsane pabbājito,
atk-s0502a0:4183_4: Abhidhāvatha parittāyatha noti imamatthaṃ kassa ujjhāpayāma kaṃ nijjhāpayāmā”ti dīpetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4186_0: So mātari kathentiyā kathentiyā sallakkhetvā “natthi mayhaṃ gihibhāvena attho”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4186_3: tātā”ti pucchitvā paripuṇṇavassabhāvaṃ ñatvā ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0502a0:4186_5: Athassa acirūpasampannassa satthā cittaniggahe ussāhaṃ janento “cittaṃ nāmetaṃ nānārammaṇesu dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4186_6: cārikaṃ carantaṃ aniggaṇhantassa sotthibhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:4186_7: tasmā aṅkusena mattahatthino viya cittassa niggaṇhane yogo karaṇīyo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4192_1: idaṃ cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ca ārammaṇesu rāgādīnaṃ yena kāraṇena icchati,
atk-s0502a0:4192_3: tassa vasena yattha kāmaṃ yathāruci carantassa sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4192_4: tatheva vicaraṇato yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ cari,
atk-s0502a0:4192_5: taṃ ajja ahaṃ pabhinnaṃ mattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena niggahessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4193_0: Desanāvasāne sānunā saddhiṃ dhammassavanāya upasaṅkamantānaṃ bahūnaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4193_1: Sopāyasmā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā mahādhammakathiko hutvā vīsavassasataṃ ṭhatvā sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhetvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a0:4196_0: Appamādaratāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño pāveyyakaṃ nāma hatthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4197_0: So kira hatthī taruṇakāle mahābalo hutvā aparena samayena jarāvātavegabbhāhato hutvā ekaṃ mahantaṃ saraṃ oruyha kalale laggitvā uttarituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:4197_1: Mahājano taṃ disvā “evarūpopi nāma hatthī imaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ patto”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4197_2: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā hatthācariyaṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, ācariya,
atk-s0502a0:4197_4: So gantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgāmasīsaṃ dassetvā saṅgāmabheriṃ ākoṭāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4197_6: Bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4197_11: Tasmā yoniso padahitvā tumhepi tato attānaṃ uddharathā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4201_0: Tattha appamādaratāti satiyā avippavāse abhiratā hotha.
atk-s0502a0:4201_1: Sacittanti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu attano cittaṃ yathā vītikkamaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a0:4201_3: Duggāti yathā so paṅke sanno kuñjaro hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmaṃ katvā paṅkaduggato attānaṃ uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a0:4205_0: Sace labhethāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pālileyyakaṃ nissāya rakkhitavanasaṇḍe viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4205_1: Vatthu yamakavagge “pare ca na vijānantī”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya āgatameva.
atk-s0502a0:4206_0: Tathāgatassa tattha hatthināgena upaṭṭhiyamānassa vasanabhāvo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4206_1: Sāvatthinagarato “anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā mahāupāsikā”ti evamādīni mahākulāni ānandattherassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “satthāraṃ no, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4206_3: Disāvāsinopi pañcasatā bhikkhū vuṭṭhavassā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “cirassutā no,
atk-s0502a0:4206_8: labheyyāma bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ savanāyā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4206_9: Thero te bhikkhū ādāya tattha gantvā “temāsaṃ ekavihārino tathāgatassa santikaṃ ettakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a0:4206_10: upasaṅkamanaṃ ayutta”nti cintetvā te bhikkhū bahi ṭhapetvā ekakova satthāraṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a0:4206_16: So tattheva daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4206_19: satthu nisīdanapāsāṇaphalake attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapessatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:4206_21: Vattasampannā hi garūnaṃ āsane vā sayane vā attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0502a0:4207_1: Satthā “ekakova āgatosī”ti pucchitvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kahaṃ pana te”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a0:4207_2: “tumhākaṃ cittaṃ ajānanto bahi ṭhapetvā āgatomhī”ti vutte “pakkosāhi ne”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4207_4: Satthā tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tehi bhikkhūhi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4207_6: tumhehi temāsaṃ ekakehi tiṭṭhantehi nisīdantehi ca dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4207_10: Evarūpañhi sahāyaṃ labhantena ekakova vasituṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4207_11: alabhantassa ekacārikabhāvova seyyo”ti vatvā nāgavagge imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4221_0: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā,
atk-s0502a0:4223_2: Parissayānīti tādisaṃ mettāvihāriṃ sahāyaṃ labhanto sīhabyagghādayo pākaṭaparissaye ca rāgabhayadosabhayamohabhayādayo
atk-s0502a0:4223_3: paṭicchannaparissaye cāti sabbeva parissaye abhibhavitvā tena saddhiṃ attamano upaṭṭhitasatī hutvā careyya,
atk-s0502a0:4224_0: Rājāva raṭṭhanti raṭṭhaṃ hitvā gato mahājanakarājā viya.
atk-s0502a0:4224_2: yathā vijitabhūmipadeso rājā “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma mahantaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4224_3: kiṃ me rajjena kāritenā”ti vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pahāya ekakova mahāraññaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova carati,
atk-s0502a0:4224_5: Mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti yathā ca “ahaṃ kho ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthinīhi hatthikaḷabhehi hatthicchāpehi,
atk-s0502a0:4224_9: ogāhā ca me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṃ upanighaṃsantiyo gacchanti,
atk-s0502a0:4224_10: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekakova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitvā gamanato mātaṅgoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0502a0:4224_11: imasmiṃ araññe ayaṃ hatthināgo yūthaṃ pahāya sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova sukhaṃ carati,
atk-s0502a0:4225_0: Ekassāti pabbajitassa hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ekībhāvābhiratassa ekakasseva caritaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0502a0:4225_1: Natthi bāle sahāyatāti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaṅgaguṇāni vipassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4225_2: cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā amatamahānibbānanti ayañhi sahāyatā nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4225_3: Sā bāle nissāya adhigantuṃ na sakkāti natthi bāle sahāyatā.
atk-s0502a0:4225_4: Ekoti iminā kāraṇena sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova careyya,
atk-s0502a0:4225_6: Yathā so appossukko nirālayo imasmiṃ araññe mātaṅganāgo icchiticchitaṭṭhāne sukhaṃ carati,
atk-s0502a0:4225_8: appamattakānipi na ca pāpāni kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4225_9: Tasmā tumhehi patirūpaṃ sahāyaṃ alabhantehi ekacārīheva bhavitabbanti imamatthaṃ dassento satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a0:4226_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:4229_0: Atthamhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā himavantapadese araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4230_0: Tasmiṃ kira kāle rājāno manusse pīḷetvā rajjaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0502a0:4230_1: Atha bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje daṇḍakaraṇapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññena evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:4230_2: “sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretuṃ ahanaṃ aghātayaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4230_5: māro pāpimā taṃ bhagavato parivitakkaṃ ñatvā “samaṇo gotamo ‘sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu’nti cintesi,
atk-s0502a0:4230_9: gacchāmi ussāhamassa janessāmī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “kāretu, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4230_14: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ pana me tvaṃ, pāpima, passasi,
atk-s0502a0:4230_15: yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti vatvā “bhagavatā kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4230_17: Ākaṅkhamāno hi bhagavā himavantaṃ pabbatarājaṃ ‘suvaṇṇa’nti adhimucceyya,
atk-s0502a0:4230_20: tumhe dhammena rajjaṃ kāressathā”ti tena vutte –
atk-s0502a0:4237_0: Imāhi gāthāhi saṃvejetvā “añño eva kho, pāpima,
atk-s0502a0:4237_4: ahañhi evaṃ ovadāmī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4250_0: Sukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4251_0: Tattha atthamhīti pabbajitassāpi hi cīvarakaraṇādike vā adhikaraṇavūpasamādike vā gihinopi kasikammādike
atk-s0502a0:4251_1: vā balavapakkhasannissitehi abhibhavanādike vā kicce uppanne ye taṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ vā vūpasametuṃ
atk-s0502a0:4251_4: Tuṭṭhī sukhāti yasmā pana gihinopi sakena asantuṭṭhā sandhicchedādīni ārabhanti,
atk-s0502a0:4251_7: Tasmā yā itarītarena parittena vā vipulena vā attano santakena santuṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a0:4251_9: Puññanti maraṇakāle pana yathājjhāsayena pattharitvā katapuññakammameva sukhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4251_10: Sabbassāti sakalassapi pana vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānasaṅkhātaṃ arahattameva imasmiṃ loke sukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4252_3: Mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ anupaṭṭhahanabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano santakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā nidahanti,
atk-s0502a0:4252_14: Ubhayenapi tesaṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijagganabhāvo kathito,
atk-s0502a0:4253_0: Sīlanti maṇikuṇḍalarattavatthādayo hi alaṅkārā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vaye ṭhitānaṃyeva sobhanti.
atk-s0502a0:4253_3: “ummattako esa maññe”ti garahuppādanena pana dosameva janeti.
atk-s0502a0:4253_4: Pañcasīladasasīlādibhedaṃ pana sīlaṃ daharassāpi mahallakassāpi sabbavayesu sobhatiyeva,
atk-s0502a0:4253_8: Saddhā patiṭṭhitāti lokiyalokuttarato duvidhāpi saddhā niccalā hutvā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a0:4253_9: Sukho paññāya paṭilābhoti lokiyalokuttarapaññāya paṭilābho sukho.
atk-s0502a0:4253_10: Pāpānaṃ akaraṇanti setughātavasena pana pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ loke sukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4260_0: Manujassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kapilamacchaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4261_0: Atīte kira kassapabhagavato parinibbutakāle dve kulabhātaro nikkhamitvā sāvakānaṃ santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4261_6: Evaṃ tesu pabbajitesu ubho bhātaro ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā viharantā ekadivasaṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4261_7: imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurānī”ti pucchitvā “ganthadhuraṃ vipassanādhurañcāti dve dhurānī”ti sutvā jeṭṭho
atk-s0502a0:4261_8: “vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vasitvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4261_9: gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4261_11: vuḍḍhakāle vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti ganthadhuraṃ paṭṭhapetvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:4261_14: So bāhusaccamadena matto lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto atipaṇḍitamānitāya parehi vuttaṃ kappiyampi “akappiya”nti vadeti,
atk-s0502a0:4261_20: evaṃ avacā”ti vatvā dhammañca vinayañca dassetvā ovadiyamānopi “tumhe kiṃ jānātha,
atk-s0502a0:4261_22: Athassa bhātu sāgatattherassāpi bhikkhū tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4261_26: tasmā paṭipattiṃ pahāya kappiyādīni paṭibāhanto mā evaṃ avacā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0502a0:4261_28: Evaṃ santepi thero dvattikkhattuṃ ovaditvā ovādaṃ agaṇhantaṃ “nāyaṃ mama vacanaṃ karotī”ti ñatvā “tena, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4261_30: Tato paṭṭhāya naṃ aññe pesalā bhikkhū chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4262_0: So durācāro hutvā durācāraparivuto viharanto ekadivasaṃ uposathagge “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti bījaniṃ ādāya dhammāsane nisīditvā “vattati, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4262_1: ettha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti pucchitvā “ko attho imassa paṭivacanena dinnenā”ti tuṇhībhūte bhikkhū disvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4262_3: pātimokkhena sutena vā asutena vā ko attho”ti vatvā āsanā vuṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:4262_4: Evaṃ so kassapassa bhagavato pariyattisāsanaṃ osakkāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4262_7: Sāpissa mātā ca bhaginī ca tasseva diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitvā pesale bhikkhū akkositvā paribhāsitvā tattheva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4263_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle pañcasatā purisā gāmaghātakādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā janapadamanussehi anubaddhā
atk-s0502a0:4263_1: palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci paṭisaraṇaṃ apassantā aññataraṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:4263_12: Atha ne janapadamanussā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā ito cito ca pariyesamānā te core disvā sabbe te jīvitā voropesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4264_0: Te anulomapaṭilomavasena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagaradvāre pañcasatakulike kevaṭṭagāme nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4264_3: Evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivaseyeva paṭisandhigahaṇañca mātukucchito nikkhamanañca ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4264_4: Kevaṭṭajeṭṭhako “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ gāme aññepi dārakā ajja jātā”ti pariyesāpetvā tesaṃ jātabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4264_5: ñatvā “ete mama puttassa sahāyakā bhavissantī”ti sabbesaṃ posāvanikaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4264_6: Te sabbepi sahapaṃsukīḷakā sahāyakā hutvā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4264_7: Tesaṃ kevaṭṭajeṭṭhakaputtova yasato ca tejato ca aggapuriso ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4265_0: Kapilopi ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena tasmiṃ kāle aciravatiyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo duggandhamukho maccho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:4265_1: Athekadivasaṃ te sahāyakā “macche bandhissāmā”ti jālādīni gahetvā nadiyā khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4265_2: Atha nesaṃ antojālaṃ so maccho pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:4265_4: “puttā no paṭhamaṃ macche bandhantā suvaṇṇamacchaṃ bandhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4265_6: Tepi kho sahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4265_9: Rājā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ disvā “satthā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4265_10: Macchena mukhe vivaṭamatteyeva sakalajetavanaṃ ativiya duggandhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4266_1: kassapabhagavato pāvacane kapilo nāma bhikkhu ahosi bahussuto mahāparivāro lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto attano vacanaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako,
atk-s0502a0:4266_3: so tena kammena avīcimhi nibbattitvā vipākāvasesena idāni maccho hutvā jāto.
atk-s0502a0:4266_4: Yaṃ pana so dīgharattaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vācesi,
atk-s0502a0:4266_30: bhante”ti vatvā vippaṭisārābhibhūto nāvaṃ sīsena paharitvā tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:4267_0: Atha bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipatitāya parisāya cittācāraṃ oloketvā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ “dhammacariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4267_1: etadāhu vasuttama”nti suttanipāte kapilasuttaṃ kathetvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4270_0: So plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
atk-s0502a0:4272_0: “Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
atk-s0502a0:4275_0: “Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:4278_0: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0502a0:4280_0: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappuna”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4281_0: Tattha pamattacārinoti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādena pamattacārissa puggalassa neva jhānaṃ na vipassanā na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0502a0:4281_1: Yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvālatā vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a0:4281_2: evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya punappunaṃ uppajjanato taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4281_3: So plavatī hurā huranti so taṇhāvasiko puggalo bhave bhave uplavati dhāvati.
atk-s0502a0:4281_6: yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvati,
atk-s0502a0:4281_11: evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ dhāvanto “ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya apavattaṃ patto”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0502a0:4282_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ esā lāmakabhāvena jammī visāhāratāya visapupphatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya
atk-s0502a0:4282_1: rūpādīsu visattatāya āsattatāya visattikāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā chadvārikataṇhā abhibhavati.
atk-s0502a0:4282_2: Yathā nāma vassāne punappunaṃ vassantena devena abhivaṭṭhaṃ bīraṇatiṇaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a0:4282_3: evaṃ tassa puggalassa anto vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4283_0: Duraccayanti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ dukkaratāya duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ sahati abhibhavati,
atk-s0502a0:4283_2: Yathā nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0502a0:4284_0: Taṃ vo vadāmīti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4284_2: mā ahaṃ kapilo viya vināsaṃ pāpuṇathāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4284_3: Mūlanti imissā chadvārikataṇhāya arahattamaggañāṇena mūlaṃ khaṇatha.
atk-s0502a0:4284_6: yathā usīrena atthiko puriso mahantena kudālena bīraṇaṃ khaṇati,
atk-s0502a0:4284_9: māro bhañji punappunanti mā tumhe nadīsote jātaṃ naḷaṃ mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto viya kilesamāro maraṇamāro
atk-s0502a0:4285_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamānā satthu santike
atk-s0502a0:4285_1: pabbajitvā na cirasseva dukkhassantaṃ katvā satthārā saddhiṃ āneñjavihārasamāpattidhammaparibhogena ekaparibhogā ahesunti.
atk-s0502a0:4288_0: Yathāpi mūleti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto gūthasūkarapotikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4289_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye satthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto ekaṃ sūkarapotikaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4289_1: Tassa sitaṃ karontassa mukhavivaraniggataṃ dantobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ānandatthero “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4289_7: Esā kakusandhassa bhagavato sāsane ekāya āsanasālāya sāmantā kukkuṭī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4289_8: Sā ekassa yogāvacarassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ sajjhāyantassa dhammaghosaṃ sutvā tato cutā rājakule nibbattitvā ubbarī nāma rājadhītā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4289_9: Sā aparabhāge sarīravalañjaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā puḷavakarāsiṃ disvā tattha puḷavakasaññaṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:4289_10: Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:4289_11: Tato cavitvā puna gativasena ālulamānā idāni sūkarayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:4289_12: idaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā mayā sitaṃ pātukatanti.
atk-s0502a0:4289_13: Taṃ sutvā ānandattherappamukhā bhikkhū mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4289_14: Satthā tesaṃ saṃvegaṃ uppādetvā bhavataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ pakāsento antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitakova imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4300_0: Tañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ, mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha.
atk-s0502a0:4316_0: Tattha mūleti yassa rukkhassa catūsu disāsu catudhā heṭṭhā ca ujukameva gate pañcavidhamūle chedanaphālanapācanavijjhanādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4316_1: kenaci upaddavena anupaddave thirapattatāya daḷhe so rukkho uparicchinnopi sākhānaṃ vasena punadeva rūhati,
atk-s0502a0:4316_2: evameva chadvārikāya taṇhāya anusaye arahattamaggañāṇena anuhate asamucchinne tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4317_0: Yassāti yassa puggalassa “iti ajjhattikassūpādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni bāhirassūpādāya aṭṭhārasa
atk-s0502a0:4317_1: taṇhāvicaritānī”ti imesaṃ taṇhāvicaritānaṃ vasena chattiṃsatiyā sotehi samannāgatā manāpesu rūpādīsu
atk-s0502a0:4317_2: āsavati pavattatīti manāpasavanā taṇhā bhusā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4317_3: taṃ puggalaṃ vipannañāṇatāya duddiṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanato mahantabhāvena mahā hutvā jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4317_4: vā anissāya rāganissitā saṅkappā vahantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4318_0: Savanti sabbadhi sotāti ime taṇhāsotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato,
atk-s0502a0:4318_2: dhammataṇhāti sabbabhavesu vā savanato sabbadhi savanti nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4318_3: Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena ca latā viyāti latā.
atk-s0502a0:4318_4: Uppajja tiṭṭhatīti chahi dvārehi uppajjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a0:4318_5: Tañca disvāti taṃ pana taṇhālataṃ “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti jātaṭṭhānavasena disvā.
atk-s0502a0:4318_6: Paññāyāti satthena vane jātaṃ lataṃ viya maggapaññāya mūle chindathāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4319_3: Somanassānīti taṇhāvasikassa jantuno evarūpāni somanassāni bhavanti.
atk-s0502a0:4319_4: Te sātasitāti te taṇhāvasikā puggalā sātanissitā sukhanissitā ca hutvā sukhesino sukhapariyesino bhavanti.
atk-s0502a0:4319_6: te jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni upagacchantiyevāti jātijarūpagā nāma honti.
atk-s0502a0:4319_7: Pajāti ime sattā tāsakaraṇena tasiṇāti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya taṇhāya purakkhatā parivāritā hutvā.
atk-s0502a0:4320_0: Bandhitoti luddena araññe baddho saso viya parisappanti bhāyanti.
atk-s0502a0:4320_1: Saṃyojanasaṅgasattakāti dasavidhena saṃyojanasaṅgena ceva sattavidhena rāgasaṅgādinā ca sattā baddhā tasmiṃ vā laggā hutvā.
atk-s0502a0:4320_2: Cirāyāti ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ punappunaṃ jātiādikaṃ dukkhaṃ upagacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4320_3: Tasmāti yasmā tasiṇāya purakkhatā paliveṭhitā sattā,
atk-s0502a0:4320_4: tasmā attano virāgaṃ rāgādivigamaṃ nibbānaṃ patthento ākaṅkamāno bhikkhu arahattamaggenetaṃ tasiṇaṃ vinodaye panuditvā nīharitvā chaḍḍeyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4322_0: Sāpi kho sūkarapotikā tato cavitvā suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ rājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:4322_3: tato cutā kāvīrapaṭṭane nāvikassa gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:4322_5: tato cutā tasseva dakkhiṇadisāya bhokkantagāme sumanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa dhītā nāmena sumanā eva hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:4322_6: Athassā pitā tasmiṃ gāme chaḍḍite dīghavāpiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāmunigāme nāma vasi.
atk-s0502a0:4322_7: Tattha naṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇirañño amacco lakuṇḍakaatimbaro nāma kenacideva karaṇīyena gato disvā mahantaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā ādāya mahāpuṇṇagāmaṃ gato.
atk-s0502a0:4322_8: Atha naṃ koṭipabbatamahāvihāravāsī mahāanuruddhatthero nāma tattha piṇḍāya caritvā tassā gehadvāre ṭhito disvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kathesi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4322_11: Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā atītabhave ugghāṭetvā jātissarañāṇaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:4322_12: Taṅkhaṇaññeva uppannasaṃvegā sāmikaṃ yācitvā mahantena issariyena pañcabalakattherīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a0:4322_14: Pacchā damiḷamaddane kate ñātīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhokkantagāmameva gantvā tattha vasantī kallamahāvihāre āsīvisopamasuttantaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4323_0: Sā parinibbānadivase bhikkhubhikkhunīhi pucchitā bhikkhunisaṅghassa sabbaṃ imaṃ pavattiṃ nirantaraṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a0:4323_1: sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe maṇḍalārāmavāsinā dhammapadabhāṇakamahātissattherena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-s0502a0:4323_2: “ahaṃ pubbe manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā kukkuṭī hutvā tattha senassa santikā sīsacchedaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a0:4323_4: paribbājikāsu pabbajitvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā seṭṭhikule nibbattā nacirasseva
atk-s0502a0:4323_5: cavitvā sūkarayoniṃ gantvā tato cutā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4323_10: tato cutā bhokkantagāma”nti evaṃ samavisame terasa attabhāve patvā “idāni ukkaṇṭhitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a0:4323_11: sabbepi appamādena sampādethā”ti vatvā catasso parisā saṃvejetvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a0:4326_0: Yo nibbanathoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vibbhantakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4327_0: Eko kira mahākassapattherassa saddhivihāriko hutvā cattāri jhānāni uppādetvāpi attano mātulassa suvaṇṇakārassa
atk-s0502a0:4327_1: gehe visabhāgārammaṇaṃ disvā tattha paṭibaddhacitto vibbhami.
atk-s0502a0:4327_2: Atha naṃ manussā alasabhāvena kammaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ gehā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4327_3: So pāpamittasaṃsaggena corakammena jīvikaṃ kappento vicari.
atk-s0502a0:4327_4: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā catukke catukke kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4327_5: Thero piṇḍāya carituṃ pavisanto taṃ dakkhiṇena dvārena nīhariyamānaṃ disvā bandhanaṃ sithilaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a0:4327_7: So tena ovādena satuppādaṃ labhitvā puna catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0502a0:4327_8: Atha naṃ “āghātanaṃ netvā ghātessāmā”ti sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4327_10: Athassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge ṭhitā manussā asisattitomarādīni āvudhāni ukkhipitvāpi taṃ asantasantameva disvā “passatha, bho,
atk-s0502a0:4327_12: anekasatānañhi āvudhahatthānaṃ purisānaṃ majjhe neva chambhati na vedhati,
atk-s0502a0:4327_13: aho acchariya”nti acchariyabbhutajātā mahānādaṃ naditvā rañño taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4327_14: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “vissajjetha na”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4327_16: Satthā obhāsaṃ pharitvā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4333_1: yo puggalo gihibhāve ālayasaṅkhātaṃ vanathaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajitatāya nibbanatho dibbavihārasaṅkhāte tapovane
atk-s0502a0:4333_2: adhimutto gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātā taṇhāvanā mutto hutvā puna gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvanameva dhāvati,
atk-s0502a0:4334_0: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā so rājapurisānaṃ antare sūlagge nisinnova udayabbayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4334_1: āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā samāpattisukhaṃ anubhavanto vehāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāseneva
atk-s0502a0:4334_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sarājikāya parisāya majjheyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a0:4337_0: Na taṃ daḷhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bandhanāgāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4338_0: Ekasmiṃ kira kāle bahū sandhicchedakapanthaghātakamanussaghātake core ānetvā kosalarañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4338_2: Tiṃsamattāpi kho jānapadā bhikkhū satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgantvā disvā vanditvā punadivase sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:4338_3: carantā bandhanāgāraṃ gantvā te core disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā sāyanhasamaye tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā,  “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4338_4: ajja amhehi piṇḍāya carantehi bandhanāgāre bahū corā andubandhanādīhi baddhā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a0:4338_5: te tāni bandhanāni chinditvā palāyituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:4338_7: tehi bandhanehi thirataraṃ aññaṃ bandhanaṃ nāmā”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a0:4338_11: etaṃ etehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena thirataraṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4338_12: evaṃ mahantampi panetaṃ ducchindaniyaṃ bandhanaṃ porāṇakapaṇḍitā chinditvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a0:4339_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ duggatagahapatikule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:4339_3: Athassa mātā anicchamānasseva ekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ gehe katvā aparabhāge kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4339_9: mayi vijātāya dārakaṃ disvā pabbajissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4339_13: Atha naṃ sā “puttassa tāva thanapānato apagamanakālaṃ āgamehī”ti vatvā puna gabbhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:4339_17: So tassā anācikkhitvāva rattibhāge uṭṭhāya palāyi.
atk-s0502a0:4339_18: Atha naṃ nagaraguttikā aggahesuṃ. So “ahaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4339_20: vissajjetha ma”nti attānaṃ vissajjāpetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññāsamāpattiyo labhitvā jhānakīḷāya kīḷanto vihāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4339_21: So tattha vasantoyeva “evarūpampi nāma me ducchindaniyaṃ puttadārabandhanaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinna”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a0:4340_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā tena udānitaṃ udānaṃ pakāsento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4351_0: Tattha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ ayasā nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4351_2: yañca pabbajatiṇehi vā aññehi vā vākādīhi rajjuṃ katvā kataṃ rajjubandhanaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4351_3: taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvena thiranti na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4351_9: tesaṃ so rāgo ca yā puttadāresu apekkhā taṇhā,
atk-s0502a0:4351_10: etaṃ kilesamayaṃ bandhanañca paṇḍitapurisā daḷhanti vadanti.
atk-s0502a0:4351_11: Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4351_14: bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā thalapathajalapathādīsu kammāni kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4351_15: Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummociyaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4351_16: Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya paribbajanti,
atk-s0502a0:4355_0: Ye rāgarattāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto khemaṃ nāma rañño bimbisārassa aggamahesiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_0: Sā kira padumuttarapādamūle patthitapatthanā ativiya abhirūpā pāsādikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_1: “Satthā kira rūpassa dosaṃ kathetī”ti sutvā pana satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_2: Rājā tassā rūpamadamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā veḷuvanavaṇṇanāpaṭisaṃyuttāni gītāni kāretvā naṭādīnaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_3: Tesaṃ tāni gāyantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tassā veḷuvanaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya asutapubbaṃ viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_5: tumhākaṃ veḷuvanuyyānamevā”ti vutte uyyānaṃ gantukāmā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_6: Satthā tassā āgamanaṃ ñatvā parisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentova tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya attano passe ṭhatvā bījamānaṃ abhirūpaṃ itthiṃ nimmini. Khemā,
atk-s0502a0:4356_7: devīpi pavisamānāva taṃ itthiṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:4356_12: satthāraṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti maññe”ti cintetvā tathāgatassa kathāsaddampi anisāmetvā tameva itthiṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_13: Satthā tassā tasmiṃ rūpe uppannabahumānataṃ ñatvā taṃ rūpaṃ paṭhamavayādivasena dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0502a0:4356_15: Khemā taṃ disvā “evarūpampi nāmetaṃ rūpaṃ muhutteneva khayavayaṃ sampattaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4356_16: natthi vata imasmiṃ rūpe sāro”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:4356_19: passa dānissa asārabhāva”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4359_2: ime sattā rāgarattā dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā attano taṇhāsotaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a0:4359_3: tattheva laggantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4365_0: Tattha makkaṭakova jālanti yathā nāma makkaṭako suttajālaṃ katvā majjhe ṭhāne nābhimaṇḍale nipanno pariyante
atk-s0502a0:4365_1: patitaṃ paṭaṅgaṃ vā makkhikaṃ vā vegena gantvā vijjhitvā tassa rasaṃ pivitvā puna gantvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:4365_3: evameva ye sattā rāgarattā dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā sayaṃkataṃ taṇhāsotaṃ anupatanti,
atk-s0502a0:4365_6: Etampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrāti paṇḍitā etaṃ bandhanaṃ chetvā anapekkhino nirālayā hutvā arahattamaggena sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya vajanti,
atk-s0502a0:4366_4: khemāya pabbajituṃ vā parinibbāyituṃ vā vaṭṭatī”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4369_0: Muñca pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4370_0: Pañcasatā kira naṭā saṃvacchare vā chamāse vā patte rājagahaṃ gantvā rañño sattāhaṃ samajjaṃ katvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0502a0:4370_3: Athekā laṅghikadhītā vaṃsaṃ abhiruyha tassa upari parivattitvā tassa pariyante ākāse caṅkamamānā naccati ceva gāyati ca.
atk-s0502a0:4370_4: Tasmiṃ samaye uggaseno nāma seṭṭhiputto sahāyakena saddhiṃ mañcātimañce ṭhito taṃ oloketvā tassā hatthapādavikkhepādīsu
atk-s0502a0:4370_6: alabhantassa me idheva maraṇa”nti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:4370_8: kiṃ te rujjatī”ti pucchitopi “taṃ me naṭadhītaraṃ labhantassa jīvitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a0:4370_11: aññaṃ te amhākaṃ kulassa ca bhogānañca anurūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessāmā”ti vuttepi tatheva vatvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:4370_12: Athassa pitā bahuṃ yācitvāpi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa sahāyaṃ pakkosāpetvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a0:4370_13: “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā attano dhītaraṃ mayhaṃ puttassa detū”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4370_15: sace pana so imaṃ alabhitvā jīvituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:4370_19: So “ahaṃ tehi saddhiṃ vicarissāmī”ti vatvā yācantānampi tesaṃ kathaṃ anādiyitvā nikkhamitvā nāṭakassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4370_20: So tassa dhītaraṃ datvā tena saddhiṃyeva gāmanigamarājadhānīsu sippaṃ dassento vicari.
atk-s0502a0:4371_0: Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya nacirasseva puttaṃ labhitvā kīḷāpayamānā “sakaṭagopakassa putta,
atk-s0502a0:4371_3: Sopi nesaṃ sakaṭaparivattakaṃ katvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne goṇānaṃ tiṇaṃ āharati,
atk-s0502a0:4371_5: Tadeva kira sandhāya sā itthī puttaṃ kīḷāpayamānā tathā vadati.
atk-s0502a0:4371_6: So attānaṃ ārabbha tassā gāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:4371_10: Sā “kiṃ pana mayhaṃ tayā palāyitena vā āgatena vā”ti punappunaṃ tadeva gītaṃ gāyati.
atk-s0502a0:4371_11: Sā kira attano rūpasampattiñceva dhanalābhañca nissāya taṃ kismiñci na maññati.
atk-s0502a0:4371_12: So “kiṃ nu kho nissāya imissā ayaṃ māno”ti cintento “sippaṃ nissāyā”ti ñatvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a0:4371_13: sippaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti sasuraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa jānanakasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā gāmanigamādīsu sippaṃ dassento
atk-s0502a0:4371_14: anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā “ito sattame divase uggaseno seṭṭhiputto nagaravāsīnaṃ sippaṃ dassessatī”ti
atk-s0502a0:4372_0: Nagaravāsino mañcātimañcādayo bandhāpetvā sattame divase sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4372_1: Sopi saṭṭhihatthaṃ vaṃsaṃ abhiruyha tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4372_2: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento taṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a0:4372_3: bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “sve seṭṭhiputto sippaṃ dassessāmīti vaṃsamatthake ṭhassati,
atk-s0502a0:4372_6: taṃ sutvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:4372_8: Satthā punadivase kālaṃ sallakkhetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:4372_9: Uggasenopi satthari antonagaraṃ apaviṭṭheyeva unnādanatthāya mahājanassa aṅgulisaññaṃ datvā vaṃsamatthake
atk-s0502a0:4372_10: patiṭṭhāya ākāseyeva satta vāre parivattitvā oruyha vaṃsamatthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4372_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā nagaraṃ pavisanto yathā taṃ parisā na oloketi,
atk-s0502a0:4372_13: Uggaseno parisaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ parisā oloketī”ti domanassappatto “idaṃ mayā saṃvacchare kattabbaṃ sippaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4372_14: satthari nagaraṃ pavisante parisā maṃ anoloketvā satthārameva oloketi,
atk-s0502a0:4372_15: moghaṃ vata me sippadassanaṃ jāta”nti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:4373_0: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a0:4373_3: Thero gantvā vaṃsassa heṭṭhā ṭhito seṭṭhiputtaṃ āmantetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4376_0: So therassa kathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “satthā maññe mama sippaṃ passitukāmo”ti vaṃsamatthake ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4379_0: Evañca pana vatvā vaṃsamatthakato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāseva cuddasakkhattuṃ parivattitvā oruyha vaṃsamatthakeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4379_3: paṇḍitena nāma atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu ālayaṃ pahāya jātiādīhi muccituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4385_0: Tattha muñca pureti atītesu khandhesu ālayaṃ nikantiṃ ajjhosānaṃ patthanaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ taṇhaṃ muñca.
atk-s0502a0:4385_3: Bhavassa pāragūti evaṃ sante tividhassāpi bhavassa abhiññāpariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyavasena pāragū
atk-s0502a0:4385_4: pāraṅgato hutvā khandhadhātuāyatanādibhede sabbasaṅkhate vimuttamānaso viharanto puna jātijarāmaraṇāni
atk-s0502a0:4386_1: Seṭṭhiputtopi vaṃsamatthake ṭhitakova saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā vaṃsato oruyha satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4386_2: āgantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:4386_3: Atha naṃ satthā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “ehi bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4386_4: So tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4386_7: saṭṭhihatthassa te vaṃsassa matthakato otarantassa bhayaṃ nāma nāhosī”ti pucchitvā “natthi me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4386_13: mama puttena uggasenena sadisā chinnasaṃyojanā bhikkhū bhāyanti,
atk-s0502a0:4386_14: na tasantī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇavagge imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4389_1: Punekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4389_2: evaṃ arahattūpanissayasampannassa bhikkhuno naṭadhītaraṃ nissāya naṭehi saddhiṃ vicaraṇakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4389_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4389_8: ubhayampetaṃ iminā eva kata”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a0:4390_0: Atīte kira kassapadasabalassa suvaṇṇacetiye kariyamāne bārāṇasivāsino kulaputtā bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4390_1: yānakesu āropetvā “hatthakammaṃ karissāmā”ti cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge ekaṃ theraṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:4390_3: Athekā kuladhītā theraṃ oloketvā sāmikaṃ āha – “sāmi, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:4390_5: yānake ca no bahuṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4390_8: So taṃ pattaṃ āharitvā khādanīyabhojanīyassa pūretvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā ubhopi patthanaṃ kariṃsu, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4390_11: tasmā olokento tesaṃ patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4390_12: Taṃ disvā sā itthī sāmikaṃ āha – “amhākaṃ, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:4390_18: Te tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sā itthī naṭagehe nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:4390_20: bhavissatī”ti tassā paṭivacanassa dinnattā naṭehi saddhiṃ vicari.
atk-s0502a0:4390_23: mayhampi sā eva gatī”ti pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a0:4393_0: Vitakkamathitassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_0: Eko kira daharabhikkhu salākagge attano pattasalākaṃ gahetvā salākayāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_1: Tattha udakaṃ alabhitvā udakatthāya ekaṃ gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_2: Tattha taṃ ekā kumārikā disvāva uppannasinehā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4394_3: puna pānīyena atthe sati idheva āgaccheyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4394_4: So tato paṭṭhāya yadā pānīyaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a0:4394_7: Evaṃ gacchante kāle yāgumpi datvā punekadivasaṃ tattheva nisīdāpetvā bhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_9: imasmiṃ gehe na kiñci natthi nāma,
atk-s0502a0:4394_10: kevalaṃ mayaṃ vicaraṇakamanussameva na labhāmā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_11: So kathipāheneva tassā kathaṃ sutvā ukkaṇṭhi.
atk-s0502a0:4394_12: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “kasmā tvaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4394_15: Tepi naṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4394_17: ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā tvaṃ mādisassa āraddhavīriyassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a0:4394_19: bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā “kiṃ kāraṇā ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4394_22: Sā hi pubbe sakalajambudīpe aggadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake ekasmiṃ sinehaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0502a0:4394_23: taṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti vatvā tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito –
atk-s0502a0:4395_0: Atīte cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitakāle takkasilāyaṃ disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ uggahetvā tena
atk-s0502a0:4395_1: tuṭṭhena dinnaṃ dhītaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gacchantassa ekasmiṃ aṭavimukhe ekūnapaññāsāya kaṇḍehi ekūnapaññāsacore
atk-s0502a0:4395_2: māretvā kaṇḍesu khīṇesu corajeṭṭhakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:4395_3: asiṃ āharā”ti vutte tāya taṅkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhacore sinehaṃ katvā corassa hatthe asitharuṃ ṭhapetvā corena
atk-s0502a0:4395_4: dhanuggahapaṇḍitassa māritabhāvaṃ āvikatvā corena ca taṃ ādāya gacchantena “mampi esā aññaṃ disvā attano
atk-s0502a0:4395_6: kiṃ me imāyā”ti ekaṃ nadiṃ disvā orimatīre taṃ ṭhapetvā tassā bhaṇḍakaṃ ādāya “tvaṃ idheva hohi,
atk-s0502a0:4395_7: yāvāhaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ uttāremī”ti tattheva taṃ pahāya gamanabhāvañca āvikatvā –
atk-s0502a0:4397_0: Paccāgaccha lahuṃ khippaṃ, mampi tārehi dānito.
atk-s0502a0:4403_0: Nayīdha naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā, tāḷaṃ vā susamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:4404_0: Anamhikāle susoṇi, kiṃ nu jagghasi sobhane.
atk-s0502a0:4406_0: Jīno macchañca pesiñca, kapaṇo viya jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a0:4408_0: Jīnā patiñca jārañca, maññe tvaññeva jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a0:4410_0: Sā nūnāhaṃ ito gantvā, bhattu hessaṃ vasānugā.
atk-s0502a0:4411_0: “Yo hare mattikaṃ thālaṃ, kaṃsathālampi so hare;
atk-s0502a0:4413_0: Imaṃ pañcakanipāte cūḷadhanuggahajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “tadā cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito tvaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:4413_2: siṅgālarūpena āgantvā tassā niggahakārako sakko devarājā ahamevā”ti vatvā “evaṃ sā itthī taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake
atk-s0502a0:4413_3: ekasmiṃ sinehena sakalajambudīpe aggapaṇḍitaṃ jīvitā voropesi,
atk-s0502a0:4413_4: taṃ itthiṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ tava taṇhaṃ chinditvā viharāhi bhikkhū”ti taṃ ovaditvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4424_2: Subhānupassinoti iṭṭhārammaṇe subhanimittagāhādivasena vissaṭṭhamānasatāya subhanti anupassantassa.
atk-s0502a0:4424_3: Taṇhāti evarūpassa jhānādīsu ekampi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a0:4424_4: atha kho chadvārikā taṇhāyeva bhiyyo vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0502a0:4424_5: Esa khoti eso puggalo taṇhābandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ suthiraṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:4424_6: Vitakkūpasameti micchāvitakkādīnaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhāte dasasu asubhesu paṭhamajjhāne.
atk-s0502a0:4424_7: Sadā satoti yo ettha abhirato hutvā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato taṃ asubhajhānaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0502a0:4424_8: Byanti kāhitīti esa bhikkhu tīsu bhavesu uppajjanakaṃ taṇhaṃ vigatantaṃ karissati.
atk-s0502a0:4424_9: Mārabandhananti eso tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ mārabandhanampi chindissatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4425_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4428_0: Niṭṭhaṅgatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4429_0: Ekadivasañhi vikāle sambahulā therā jetavanavihāraṃ pavisitvā rāhulattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4429_1: So aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto tathāgatassa gandhakuṭiyā pamukhe nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:4429_2: Tadā so āyasmā arahattaṃ patto avassikova hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4429_3: Māro vasavattibhavane ṭhitoyeva taṃ āyasmantaṃ gandhakuṭipamukhe nipannaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:4429_7: So mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā āgamma soṇḍāya therassa matthakaṃ parikkhipitvā mahantena saddena koñcanādaṃ ravi.
atk-s0502a0:4429_8: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa mārabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “māra,
atk-s0502a0:4429_9: tādisānaṃ satasahassenāpi mama puttassa bhayaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0502a0:4429_10: Putto hi me asantāsī vītataṇho mahāvīriyo mahāpañño”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4438_0: Tattha niṭṭhaṅgatoti imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ arahattaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a0:4438_3: Acchindi bhavasallānīti sabbānipi bhavagāmīni sallāni acchindi.
atk-s0502a0:4439_1: Niruttipadakovidoti niruttiyañca sesapadesu cāti catūsupi paṭisambhidāsu chekoti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4439_3: jaññā pubbāparāni cāti akkharānaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātaṃ akkharapiṇḍañca jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:4439_7: ādimhi paññāyamāne majjhapariyosānesu apaññāyamānesupi “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4439_10: ante paññāyamāne ādimajjhesu apaññāyamānesu “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4439_15: Sa ve antimasārīroti esa koṭiyaṃ ṭhitasarīro,
atk-s0502a0:4439_16: mahantānaṃ atthadhammaniruttipaṭibhānānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnañca pariggāhikāya paññāya samannāgatattā mahāpañño,
atk-s0502a0:4439_19: mahāpurisoti vadāmī”ti vacanato vimuttacittatāya ca mahāpurisoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4440_1: Māropi pāpimā “jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0502a0:4443_0: Sabbābhibhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4444_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā pattasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a0:4444_1: dhammacakkapavattanatthaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:4444_2: Sopi satthāraṃ disvā “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4444_8: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4444_9: Athassa satthā “mayhaṃ upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4450_0: Tattha sabbābhibhūti sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ abhibhavanato sabbābhibhū.
atk-s0502a0:4450_2: Sabbesu dhammesūti sabbesupi tebhūmakadhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anūpalitto.
atk-s0502a0:4450_4: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhayante uppādite taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte arahatte asekhāya vimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0502a0:4450_5: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme sayameva jānitvā.
atk-s0502a0:4450_6: Kamuddiseyyanti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti kaṃ nāma uddiseyyanti.
atk-s0502a0:4451_0: Desanāvasāne upako ājīvako tathāgatassa vacanaṃ nevābhinandi,
atk-s0502a0:4451_2: Sīsaṃ pana cāletvā jivhaṃ nillāḷetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ luddakanivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0502a0:4454_0: Sabbadānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4455_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye tāvatiṃsadevaloke devatā sannipatitvā cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kataraṃ dānaṃ nu kho dānesu,
atk-s0502a0:4455_4: Te pañhe ekā devatāpi vinicchituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:4455_6: sopi aparanti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ pucchantā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4455_7: Ettakenāpi kālena pañhānaṃ atthaṃ adisvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:4455_8: mahādevatāsannipāto”ti vutte “cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpetvā vinicchituṃ asakkontā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4455_11: taṇhakkhayova kasmā seṭṭho”ti ime pañhe vinicchituṃ asakkontā āgatamhāti. Tātā,
atk-s0502a0:4455_13: amhākaṃ pana rājā janasahassena cintite atthe cintetvā taṅkhaṇeneva jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:4455_14: so amhehi paññāya ca puññena ca visiṭṭho, etha,
atk-s0502a0:4455_15: tassa santikaṃ gacchāmāti tameva devagaṇaṃ ādāya sakkassa devarañño santikaṃ gantvā tenāpi “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:4455_17: imesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ aññopi jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a0:4455_19: Satthā panetarahi kahaṃ viharatī”ti pucchitvā “jetavane”ti sutvā “etha,
atk-s0502a0:4455_20: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti devagaṇena saddhiṃ rattibhāge sakalaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:4455_23: añño imesaṃ atthaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:4456_1: mayā hi pāramiyo pūretvā mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā tumhādisānaṃ kaṅkhacchedanatthameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4456_2: tayā pucchitapañhesu hi sabbadānānaṃ dhammadānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4456_5: taṇhakkhayo pana arahattaṃ sampāpakattā seṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4462_0: Tattha sabbadānaṃ dhammadānanti sacepi hi cakkavāḷagabbhe yāva brahmalokā nirantaraṃ katvā sannisinnānaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4462_2: tasmiṃ samāgame catuppadikāya gāthāya katānumodanāva seṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a0:4462_3: Tañhi dānaṃ tassā gāthāya soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati.
atk-s0502a0:4462_4: Evaṃ dhammassa desanāpi vācanampi savanampi mahantaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4462_5: Yena ca puggalena bahūnaṃ taṃ dhammassavanaṃ kāritaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4462_7: Tathārūpāya eva parisāya paṇītapiṇḍapātassa patte pūretvā dinnadānatopi sappitelādīnaṃ patte pūretvā
atk-s0502a0:4462_8: dinnabhesajjadānatopi mahāvihārasadisānaṃ vihārānañca lohapāsādasadisānañca pāsādānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni
atk-s0502a0:4462_9: kāretvā dinnasenāsanadānatopi anāthapiṇḍikādīhi vihāre ārabbha katapariccāgatopi antamaso catuppadikāya
atk-s0502a0:4462_10: gāthāya anumodanāvasenāpi pavattitaṃ dhammadānameva varaṃ seṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4462_12: Evarūpāni hi puññāni karontā dhammaṃ sutvāva karonti,
atk-s0502a0:4462_14: Sace hi ime sattā dhammaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4462_15: uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāgumpi kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattampi na dadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4462_17: Apica ṭhapetvā buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca sakalakappaṃ deve vassante udakabindūni gaṇetuṃ samatthāya
atk-s0502a0:4462_18: paññāya samannāgatā sāriputtādayopi attano dhammatāya sotāpattiphalādīni adhigantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4463_0: Sabbe pana gandharasādayopi rasā ukkaṃsato devatānaṃ sudhābhojanarasopi saṃsāravaṭṭe pātetvā dukkhānubhavanasseva paccayo.
atk-s0502a0:4463_1: Yo panesa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhāto ca navalokuttaradhammasaṅkhāto ca dhammaraso,
atk-s0502a0:4463_7: Yā panesā dhammaṃ kathentassa vā suṇantassa vā vācentassa vā anto uppajjamānā pīti udaggabhāvaṃ janeti,
atk-s0502a0:4463_10: sāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭassa antaṃ katvā arahattapariyosānā hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4463_13: “sabbaratiṃ dhammarati jinātī”ti taṇhakkhayo pana taṇhāya khayante uppannaṃ arahattaṃ sakalassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa abhibhavanato sabbaseṭṭhameva.
atk-s0502a0:4464_0: Evaṃ satthari imissā gāthāya atthaṃ kathenteyeva caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4464_1: Sakkopi satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4464_2: evaṃjeṭṭhake nāma dhammadāne kimatthaṃ amhākaṃ pattiṃ na dāpetha,
atk-s0502a0:4464_3: ito paṭṭhāya no bhikkhusaṅghassa kathetvā pattiṃ dāpetha,
atk-s0502a0:4464_5: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā,
atk-s0502a0:4464_7: ajjādiṃ katvā mahādhammassavanaṃ vā pākatikadhammassavanaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ vā antamaso anumodanampi
atk-s0502a0:4467_0: Hananti bhogāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aputtakaseṭṭhiṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4468_0: Tassa kira kālakiriyaṃ sutvā rājā pasenadi kosalo “aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ kassa pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitvā “rañño”ti
atk-s0502a0:4468_1: sutvā sattahi divasehi tassa gehato dhanaṃ rājakulaṃ abhiharāpetvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “handa
atk-s0502a0:4468_5: tamahaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājantepuraṃ abhiharitvā āgacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4469_0: So kira suvaṇṇapātiyā nānaggarasabhojane upanīte “evarūpaṃ nāma manussā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0502a0:4469_1: kiṃ tumhe mayā saddhiṃ imasmiṃ gehe keḷiṃ karothā”ti bhojane upaṭṭhite leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā palāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:4469_3: Vatthayānachattesupi manāpesu upaṭṭhāpitesu te manusse leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharanto palāpetvā sāṇāni dhāreti,
atk-s0502a0:4469_4: jajjararathakena yāti paṇṇachattakena dhāriyamānenāti evaṃ raññā ārocite satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4470_2: “Detha samaṇassa piṇḍa”nti vatvā so uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4470_3: Tasmiṃ kira assaddhe bāle evaṃ vatvā pakkante tassa bhariyā saddhā pasannā “cirassaṃ vata me imassa mukhato ‘dehī’ti vacanaṃ sutaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4470_4: ajja mama manorathaṃ pūrentī piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti paccekabuddhassa pattaṃ gahetvā paṇītabhojanassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4470_6: kiñci te laddha”nti pattaṃ gahetvā paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ disvā vippaṭisārī hutvā evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:4470_7: “varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4470_8: Te hi imaṃ bhuñjitvā mayhaṃ kammaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0502a0:4470_11: So bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0502a0:4470_12: So kirassa aṅguliṃ gahetvā vicaranto “idaṃ mayhaṃ pitusantakaṃ yānakaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4470_14: Atha naṃ so seṭṭhi “idāni tāvesa evaṃ vadeti,
atk-s0502a0:4470_15: imassa pana vuḍḍhippattakāle imasmiṃ gehe bhoge ko rakkhissatī”ti taṃ araññaṃ netvā ekasmiṃ gacchamūle
atk-s0502a0:4470_16: gīvāya gahetvā mūlakandaṃ viya gīvaṃ phāletvā māretvā tattheva chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0502a0:4471_2: tassa kammassa vipākena sattakkhattuṃ sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajji,
atk-s0502a0:4471_3: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imissāyeva sāvatthiyā sattakkhattuṃ seṭṭhittaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:4471_4: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:4471_5: datvā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi ‘varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyu’nti,
atk-s0502a0:4471_6: tassa kammassa vipākena nāssuḷārāya bhattabhogāya cittaṃ namati,
atk-s0502a0:4471_9: nāssuḷārānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ bhogāya cittaṃ namati.
atk-s0502a0:4471_10: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:4471_11: bhātu ca pana ekaputtaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesi,
atk-s0502a0:4471_12: tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccittha,
atk-s0502a0:4471_13: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idaṃ sattamaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājakosaṃ paveseti.
atk-s0502a0:4472_2: ettake nāma bhoge vijjamāne neva attanā paribhuñji,
atk-s0502a0:4472_3: na tumhādise buddhe dhuravihāre viharante puññakammaṃ akāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4472_5: dummedhapuggalā nāma bhoge labhitvā nibbānaṃ na gavesanti,
atk-s0502a0:4472_6: bhoge nissāya uppannataṇhā panete dīgharattaṃ hanatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4476_0: Tattha no ca pāragavesinoti ye pana nibbānapāragavesino puggalā,
atk-s0502a0:4476_2: Aññeva attananti bhoge nissāya uppannāya taṇhāya duppañño puggalo pare viya attānameva hanatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4480_0: Tiṇadosānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ viharanto aṅkuraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4480_3: So kira anuruddhattherassa antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa attano ābhataṃ kaṭacchumattakaṃ bhikkhaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4480_4: Tadassa puññaṃ aṅkurena dasavassasahassāni dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā dinnadānato mahapphalataraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4480_8: evaṃ taṃ sukhette suvuttabījaṃ viya mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4480_10: tena te dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ jāta”nti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento –
atk-s0502a0:4486_0: Vatvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4489_0: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4492_0: Tasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4495_0: Tasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4498_0: Tasmā hi vigaticchesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4499_0: Tattha tiṇadosānīti sāmākādīni tiṇāni uṭṭhahantāni pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni khettāni dūsenti,
atk-s0502a0:4499_2: Evaṃ sattānampi anto rāgo uppajjanto satte dūseti,
atk-s0502a0:4499_3: tena tesu dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4501_0: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti. –
atk-s0502a0:4503_0: Desanāvasāne aṅkuro ca indako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4509_0: Cakkhunā saṃvaroti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4510_0: Tesu kira ekeko cakkhudvārādīsu pañcasu dvāresu ekekameva rakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:4510_2: ahaṃ durakkhaṃ rakkhāmī”ti vivaditvā “satthāraṃ pucchitvā imamatthaṃ jānissāmā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4510_3: mayaṃ cakkhudvārādīni rakkhantā attano attano rakkhanadvārameva durakkhanti maññāma,
atk-s0502a0:4510_4: ko nu kho amhesu durakkhaṃ rakkhatī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4510_8: api ca kho pana tumhe na idāneva pañcasu ṭhānesu asaṃvutā,
atk-s0502a0:4510_10: asaṃvutattāyeva ca paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde avattitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇitthā”ti vatvā “kadā,
atk-s0502a0:4510_11: bhante”ti tehi yācito atīte takkasilajātakassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā rakkhasīnaṃ vasena rājakule jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4510_12: patte pattābhisekena mahāsattena setacchattassa heṭṭhā rājāsane nisinnena attano sirisampattiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a0:4515_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ dassetvā “tadāpi tumheva pañca janā takkasilāyaṃ rajjagahaṇatthāya nikkhantaṃ mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4515_1: āvudhahatthā parivāretvā maggaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge rakkhasīhi cakkhudvārādivasena upanītesu rūpārammaṇādīsu
atk-s0502a0:4515_2: asaṃvutā paṇḍitassa ovāde avattitvā olīyantā rakkhasīhi khāditā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇittha.
atk-s0502a0:4515_3: Tesu pana ārammaṇesu susaṃvuto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhantiṃ devavaṇṇiṃ yakkhiniṃ anādiyitvā sotthinā
atk-s0502a0:4515_4: takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ patto rājā ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā,
atk-s0502a0:4515_7: Etāni hi saṃvaranto eva sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4518_0: Ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
atk-s0502a0:4521_0: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;
atk-s0502a0:4523_0: Tattha cakkhunāti yadā hi bhikkhuno cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
atk-s0502a0:4523_1: tadā iṭṭhārammaṇe arajjantassa aniṭṭhārammaṇe adussantassa asamapekkhanena mohaṃ anuppādentassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a0:4523_2: dvāre saṃvaro thakanaṃ pidahanaṃ gutti katā nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4523_3: Tassa so evarūpo cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu.
atk-s0502a0:4523_5: Cakkhudvārādīsuyeva pana saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā nuppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:4523_7: Tadā hi asaṃvaro uppajjanto assaddhā akkhanti kosajjaṃ muṭṭhasaccaṃ aññāṇanti akusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ pañcavidho labbhati.
atk-s0502a0:4523_8: Saṃvaro uppajjanto saddhā khanti vīriyaṃ sati ñāṇanti kusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ pañcavidho labbhati.
atk-s0502a0:4524_0: Kāyena saṃvaroti ettha pana pasādakāyopi copanakāyopi labbhati.
atk-s0502a0:4524_4: Tehi pana saddhiṃ akusalavīthiyaṃ uppajjantehi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4524_7: Tāya saddhiṃ uppajjantehi musāvādādīhi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4524_9: Manasā saṃvaroti etthāpi javanamanato aññena manena saddhiṃ abhijjhādayo natthi.
atk-s0502a0:4524_10: Manodvāre pana javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānehi abhijjhādīhi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4524_12: Sādhu sabbatthāti tesu cakkhudvārādīsu sabbesupi saṃvaro sādhu.
atk-s0502a0:4524_13: Ettāvatā hi aṭṭha saṃvaradvārāni aṭṭha ca asaṃvaradvārāni kathitāni.
atk-s0502a0:4524_14: Tesu aṭṭhasu asaṃvaradvāresu ṭhito bhikkhu sakalavaṭṭamūlakadukkhato na muccati,
atk-s0502a0:4524_15: saṃvaradvāresu pana ṭhito sabbasmāpi vaṭṭamūlakadukkhā muccati.
atk-s0502a0:4525_0: Desanāvasāne te pañca bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4528_0: Hatthasaṃyatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ haṃsaghātakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4529_0: Sāvatthivāsino kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā laddhūpasampadā yebhuyyena ekato vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:4529_1: Te ekadivasaṃ aciravatiṃ gantvā nhatvā ātape tappamānā sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathentā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4529_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dve haṃsā ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:4529_3: Atheko daharabhikkhu sakkharaṃ gahetvā “ekassa haṃsapotakassa akkhiṃ paharissāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a0:4529_8: “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti dutiyaṃ sakkharaṃ gahetvā haṃsassa pacchābhāge khipi,
atk-s0502a0:4529_10: Atha naṃ itaraṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā parapasse akkhimhi paharitvā orimakkhinā nikkhāmesi.
atk-s0502a0:4529_11: Haṃso viravanto parivattitvā tesaṃ pādamūleyeva pati.
atk-s0502a0:4529_13: buddhasāsane pabbajitvā ananucchavikaṃ vo kataṃ pāṇātipātaṃ karontehī”ti vatvā te ādāya gantvā tathāgatassa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4530_0: Satthā “saccaṃ kira tayā bhikkhu pāṇātipāto kato”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4530_1: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kasmā evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā evamakāsi,
atk-s0502a0:4530_2: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe agāramajjhe vasamānā appamattakesupi ṭhānesu kukkuccaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4530_3: tvaṃ pana evarūpe buddhasāsane pabbajitvā kukkuccamattampi na akāsī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a0:4531_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapattanagare dhanañcaye rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0502a0:4531_1: gahetvā anupubbena viññutaṃ patto takkasilāyaṃ sippāni uggahetvā pitarā uparajje patiṭṭhāpito aparabhāge
atk-s0502a0:4531_2: pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dasa rājadhamme akopento kurudhamme vattittha.
atk-s0502a0:4531_6: evamassa mātā aggamahesī kaniṭṭhabhātā uparājā purohito brāhmaṇo rajjugāhako amacco sārathi seṭṭhi doṇamāpako
atk-s0502a0:4531_7: mahāmatto dovāriko nagarasobhinī vaṇṇadāsīti evametesu ekādasasu janesu kurudhammaṃ rakkhantesu kaliṅgaraṭṭhe
atk-s0502a0:4531_8: dantapuranagare kaliṅge rajjaṃ kārente tasmiṃ raṭṭhe devo na vassi.
atk-s0502a0:4531_9: Mahāsattassa pana añjanasannibho nāma maṅgalahatthī mahāpuñño hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4531_10: Raṭṭhavāsino “tasmiṃ ānīte devo vassissatī”ti saññāya rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4531_11: Rājā tassa hatthissa ānayanatthāya brāhmaṇe pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4534_1: Hatthimhi pana ānītepi deve avassante “so rājā kurudhammaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0502a0:4534_2: tenassa raṭṭhe devo vassatī”ti saññāya “yaṃ so kurudhammaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0502a0:4534_3: taṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā”ti puna kāliṅgo brāhmaṇe ca amacce ca pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:4534_4: Tesu gantvā yācantesu rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi te attano attano sīlesu kiñci kukkuccamattaṃ katvā “aparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4534_5: no sīla”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi “na ettāvatā sīlabhedo hotī”ti tehi punappunaṃ yācitā attano attano sīlāni
atk-s0502a0:4534_7: Kāliṅgo suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā ābhataṃ kurudhammaṃ disvāva samādāya sādhukaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a0:4536_0: Rajjugāho ca kaccāno, doṇamāpako ca kolito.
atk-s0502a0:4541_0: Jātakaṃ samodhānetvā “bhikkhu evaṃ pubbepi paṇḍitā appamattakepi kukkucce uppanne attano sīlabhede āsaṅkaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4541_1: tvaṃ pana mādisassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā pāṇātipātaṃ karonto atibhāriyaṃ kammamakāsi,
atk-s0502a0:4541_2: bhikkhunā nāma hatthehi pādehi vācāya ca saṃyatena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4547_0: Tattha hatthasaṃyatoti hatthakīḷāpanādīnaṃ vā hatthena paresaṃ paharaṇādīnaṃ vā abhāvena hatthasaṃyato.
atk-s0502a0:4547_2: Vācāya pana musāvādādīnaṃ akaraṇato vācāya saṃyato.
atk-s0502a0:4547_7: Eko santusitoti ekavihārī hutvā suṭṭhu tusito vipassanācārato paṭṭhāya attano adhigamena tuṭṭhamānaso.
atk-s0502a0:4547_8: Puthujjanakalyāṇakañhi ādiṃ katvā sabbepi sekhā attano adhigamena santussantīti santusitā,
atk-s0502a0:4551_0: Yo mukhasaṃyatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4551_1: Vatthu “atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”ti sutte āgatameva.
atk-s0502a0:4552_0: Kokālike pana padumaniraye uppanne dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho kokāliko bhikkhu attano mukhaṃ nissāya vināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:4552_1: dve aggasāvake akkosantasseva hissa pathavī vivaraṃ adāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4552_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a0:4552_6: pubbepi kokāliko bhikkhu attano mukhameva nissāya naṭṭho”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ sotukāmehi bhikkhūhi yācito tassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a0:4553_0: Atīte himavantapadese ekasmiṃ sare kacchapo vasati.
atk-s0502a0:4553_1: Dve haṃsapotakā gocarāya carantā tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ katvā daḷhavissāsikā hutvā ekadivasaṃ kacchapaṃ pucchiṃsu – “samma,
atk-s0502a0:4553_10: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā ekaṃ daṇḍakaṃ kacchapena ḍaṃsāpetvā sayaṃ tassa ubho koṭiyo ḍaṃsitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4553_11: Taṃ tathā haṃsehi nīyamānaṃ gāmadārakā disvā “dve haṃsā kacchapaṃ daṇḍena harantī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4553_13: tumhākaṃ ettha kiṃ hoti duṭṭhaceṭakā”ti vattukāmo haṃsānaṃ sīghavegatāya bārāṇasinagare rājanivesanassa
atk-s0502a0:4553_14: uparibhāgaṃ sampattakāle daṭṭhaṭṭhānato daṇḍakaṃ vissajjetvā ākāsaṅgaṇe patitvā dvedhā bhijji.
atk-s0502a0:4559_2: bhikkhunā nāma mukhasaṃyatena samacārinā anuddhatena nibbutacittena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4562_0: Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpeti, madhuraṃ tassa bhāsita”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4563_5: Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpetīti bhāsitatthañceva desanādhammañca katheti.
atk-s0502a0:4563_6: Madhuranti evarūpassa bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ madhuraṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4563_7: Yo pana atthameva sampādeti, na pāḷiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4563_11: tassa bhāsitaṃ madhuraṃ nāma na hotīti.
atk-s0502a0:4567_0: Dhammārāmoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammārāmattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4568_0: Satthārā kira “ito me catumāsaccayena parinibbānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ārocite anekasahassā bhikkhū satthāraṃ parivāretvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4568_1: Tattha puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4568_3: Sabbepi “kiṃ nu kho karissāmā”ti vaggabandhanena vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:4568_4: Eko pana dhammārāmo nāma bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ na upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0502a0:4568_6: āvuso”ti vuccamāno paṭivacanampi adatvā “satthā kira catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0502a0:4568_8: satthari dharamāneyeva vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ekakova viharanto satthārā desitaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjeti cinteti anussarati.
atk-s0502a0:4568_12: kiṃ nu kho karissāmā’ti amhehi saddhiṃ sammantanamattampi na karotī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4568_13: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4568_18: tumhesu dharantesuyeva vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjāmi cintemi anussarāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:4569_2: aññenāpi mayi sinehavantena bhikkhunā nāma dhammārāmasadiseneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4569_3: Na hi mayhaṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjaṃ karontā mama pūjaṃ karonti nāma,
atk-s0502a0:4569_4: dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjantāyeva pana maṃ pūjenti nāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4572_0: Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4573_0: Tattha nivāsanaṭṭhena samathavipassanādhammo ārāmo assāti dhammārāmo.
atk-s0502a0:4573_2: Tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanatāya dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4573_5: Saddhammāti evarūpo bhikkhu sattatiṃsabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca na parihāyatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4574_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4577_0: Salābhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ vipakkhasevakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4578_0: Tassa kireko devadattapakkhiko bhikkhu sahāyo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4578_1: So taṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “kuhiṃ gatosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4578_7: So tassa vacanena katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4578_11: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evamakāsī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4578_12: ahaṃ tattha ekaṃ daharaṃ nissāya katipāhaṃ vasiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4578_13: na ca pana devadattassa laddhiṃ rocemī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4578_14: Atha naṃ bhagavā “kiñcāpi tvaṃ laddhiṃ na rocesi,
atk-s0502a0:4578_15: diṭṭhadiṭṭhakānaṃyeva pana laddhiṃ rocento viya vicarasi.
atk-s0502a0:4578_19: pubbe panesa kesaṃ laddhiṃ rocento viya vicari,
atk-s0502a0:4578_20: ācikkhatha no”ti bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a0:4583_4: Paralābhaṃ patthentassa hi jhānavipassanāmaggaphalesu ekadhammopi nuppajjati,
atk-s0502a0:4583_5: sakalābhasantuṭṭhasseva pana jhānādīni uppajjantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4589_0: Taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, suddhājīviṃ atandita”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4590_1: Sapadānacārañhi parivajjetvā anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento salābhaṃ atimaññati hīḷeti jigucchati nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4590_3: Aññesaṃ pihayanti aññesaṃ lābhaṃ patthento na careyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4590_4: Samādhiṃ nādhigacchatīti aññesañhi lābhaṃ pihayanto tesaṃ cīvarādikaraṇe ussukkaṃ āpanno bhikkhu appanāsamādhiṃ vā upacārasamādhiṃ vā nādhigacchati.
atk-s0502a0:4590_5: Salābhaṃ nātimaññatīti appalābhopi samāno uccanīcakule paṭipāṭiyā sapadānaṃ caranto bhikkhu salābhaṃ nātimaññati nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4590_6: Taṃ veti taṃ evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ sārajīvitatāya suddhājīviṃ jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya jīvitakappanena akusītatāya atanditaṃ devā pasaṃsanti thomentīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4594_0: Sabbasoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcaggadāyakaṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4595_0: So kira sasse khette ṭhitakāleyeva khettaggaṃ nāma deti,
atk-s0502a0:4595_4: pātiyaṃ vaḍḍhitakāle pātaggaṃ nāma detīti imāni pañca aggadānāni deti,
atk-s0502a0:4595_7: Satthā tassa ca brāhmaṇiyā cassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa bhojanavelāyaṃ gantvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4595_10: Brāhmaṇī pana taṃ parivisamānā satthāraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:4595_11: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ datvā bhuñjati,
atk-s0502a0:4595_12: idāni ca samaṇo gotamo āgantvā dvāre ṭhito.
atk-s0502a0:4595_13: Sace brāhmaṇo etaṃ disvā attano bhattaṃ haritvā dassati,
atk-s0502a0:4595_15: Sā “evaṃ ayaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ na passissatī”ti satthu piṭṭhiṃ datvā tassa pacchato taṃ paṭicchādentī
atk-s0502a0:4595_16: onamitvā puṇṇacandaṃ pāṇinā paṭicchādentī viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4595_17: Tathā ṭhitā eva ca pana “gato nu kho no”ti satthāraṃ aḍḍhakkhikena olokesi.
atk-s0502a0:4595_22: Lokagarunā buddhena “na gamissāmī”ti sīse cālite sā sandhāretuṃ asakkontī mahāhasitaṃ hasi.
atk-s0502a0:4595_23: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā gehābhimukhaṃ obhāsaṃ muñci.
atk-s0502a0:4595_24: Brāhmaṇopi piṭṭhiṃ datvā nisinnoyeva brāhmaṇiyā hasitasaddaṃ sutvā chabbaṇṇānañca rasmīnaṃ obhāsaṃ oloketvā satthāraṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a0:4595_25: Buddhā hi nāma gāme vā araññe vā hetusampannānaṃ attānaṃ adassetvā na pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a0:4595_28: rājaputtaṃ āgantvā dvāre ṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ anācikkhantiyā bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā aḍḍhabhuttaṃ bhojanapātiṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a0:4595_30: ahaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ datvāva bhuñjāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4595_31: ito ca me majjhe bhinditvā ekova bhattakoṭṭhāso bhutto,
atk-s0502a0:4595_34: Satthā “na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena attho”ti avatvā,
atk-s0502a0:4600_0: Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvāva pasannacitto hutvā “aho acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4600_1: dīpasāmiko nāma rājaputto ‘na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena attho’ti avatvā evaṃ vakkhatī”ti dvāre ṭhitakova satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:4600_5: Satthā “kathaṃrūpā nu kho imassa dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti upadhārento “ime dvepi janā kassapabuddhakāle ‘nāmarūpa’nti vadantānaṃ kathaṃ suṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:4600_6: nāmarūpaṃ avissajjitvāva nesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti,
atk-s0502a0:4600_8: nāme ca rūpe ca arajjanto asajjanto asocanto bhikkhu nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
