atk-s0502a0:4603_0: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4604_1: rūpakkhandhassa cāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena pavatte nāmarūpe.
atk-s0502a0:4604_2: Mamāyitanti yassa ahanti vā mamanti vā gāho natthi.
atk-s0502a0:4604_3: Asatā ca na socatīti tasmiñca nāmarūpe khayavayaṃ patte “mama rūpaṃ khīṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0502a0:4604_4: mama viññāṇaṃ khīṇa”nti na socati na vihaññati,
atk-s0502a0:4604_6: Sa veti so evarūpo vijjamānepi nāmarūpe mamāyitarahitopi asatāpi tena asocanto bhikkhūti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4608_0: Mettāvihārīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4609_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmante mahākaccāne avantijanapade kuraragharaṃ nissāya pavattapabbate viharante soṇo
atk-s0502a0:4609_1: nāma koṭikaṇṇo upāsako therassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā therassa santike pabbajitukāmo therena “dukkaraṃ kho, soṇa,
atk-s0502a0:4609_2: yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ ekaseyyaṃ brahmacariya”nti vatvā dve vāre paṭikkhittopi pabbajjāya ativiya ussāhajāto
atk-s0502a0:4609_3: tatiyavāre theraṃ yācitvā pabbajitvā appabhikkhukattā dakkhiṇāpathe tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a0:4609_4: satthāraṃ sammukhā daṭṭhukāmo hutvā upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā tena dinnaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā anupubbena jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4609_5: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃyeva anuññātasenāsano bahudeva rattiṃ
atk-s0502a0:4609_6: ajjhokāse vīthināmetvā rattibhāge gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā attano pattasenāsane taṃ rattibhāgaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0502a0:4609_7: paccūsasamaye satthārā ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni sabbāneva sarabhaññena abhaṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4609_11: Satthārā dinnasādhukāraṃ sutvā bhūmaṭṭhakadevā nāgā supaṇṇāti evaṃ yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4610_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jetavanato vīsayojanasatamatthake kuraragharanagare therassa mātu mahāupāsikāya gehe adhivatthā
atk-s0502a0:4610_7: Tvaṃ ito pubbe mayhaṃ sādhukāraṃ adatvā ajja kasmā desīti?
atk-s0502a0:4610_12: Putto te ajja satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0502a0:4610_13: satthā tava puttassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasanno sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4610_15: Sammāsambuddhassa hi sādhukāraṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhūmaṭṭhakadeve ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva jātanti. Kiṃ pana, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4610_19: Evaṃ devatāya kathentiyāva upāsikāya pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari.
atk-s0502a0:4611_1: “sace me putto satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhi,
atk-s0502a0:4611_3: Puttassa āgatakāle dhammassavanaṃ kāretvā dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4611_4: Soṇattheropi kho satthārā sādhukāre dinne “ayaṃ me upajjhāyena dinnasāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ kālo”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4611_5: paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadaṃ ādiṃ katvā pañca vare yācitvā katipāhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4611_6: satthu santikeyeva vasitvā “upajjhāyaṃ passissāmī”ti satthāraṃ āpucchitvā jetavanā nikkhamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0502a0:4612_0: Thero punadivase taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya caranto mātu upāsikāya gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4612_1: Sāpi puttaṃ disvā tuṭṭhamānasā vanditvā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:4612_3: satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu dhammakathaṃ kathesī”ti. “Upāsike,
atk-s0502a0:4612_5: imasmiṃ gehe adhivatthā devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṃ datvā mayā ‘ko eso’ti vutte ‘aha’nti vatvā evañca evañca kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4612_10: yato tayā satthu sammukhā dhammo kathito,
atk-s0502a0:4612_12: Asukadivase nāma dhammassavanaṃ kāretvā tava dhammaṃ suṇissāmi, tātā”’ti.
atk-s0502a0:4612_14: Upāsikā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ katvā “puttassa me dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti ekameva dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a0:4612_15: geharakkhikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ parijanaṃ ādāya antonagare dhammassavanatthāya kārite maṇḍape alaṅkatadhammāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4612_16: abhiruyha dhammaṃ desentassa puttassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4613_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle navasatā corā tassā upāsikāya gehe otāraṃ olokentā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a0:4613_1: Tassā pana gehaṃ sattahi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ sattadvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4613_2: tattha tesu tesu ṭhānesu caṇḍasunakhe bandhitvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4613_3: Antogehe chadanassa udakapātaṭṭhāne pana parikhaṃ khaṇitvā tipunā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4613_4: Taṃ divā ātapena vilīnaṃ pakkuthitaṃ viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a0:4613_6: Tassānantarā mahantāni ayasaṅghāṭakāni nirantaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ odahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4613_7: Iti imañcārakkhaṃ upāsikāya ca antogehe ṭhitabhāvaṃ paṭicca te corā okāsaṃ alabhantā taṃ divasaṃ tassā
atk-s0502a0:4613_8: gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā tipuparikhāya ca ayasaṅghāṭakānañca heṭṭhābhāgeneva gehaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a0:4613_9: corajeṭṭhakaṃ tassā santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “sace sā amhākaṃ idha paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā nivattitvā gehābhimukhī
atk-s0502a0:4614_0: Corāpi antogehe dīpaṃ jāletvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4614_1: Sā dāsī core disvā upāsikāya santikaṃ gantvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a0:4614_2: bahū corā gehaṃ pavisitvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ vivariṃsū”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:4614_7: Corāpi kahāpaṇagabbhaṃ tucchaṃ katvā rajatagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4614_10: mā me antarāyaṃ karī”ti puna taṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4614_11: Corā rajatagabbhampi tucchaṃ katvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4614_12: Sā punapi gantvā upāsikāya tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:4614_14: “bhoti je tvaṃ anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a0:4614_17: mā me antarāyaṃ karī’ti mayā vuttāpi mama kathaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ āgacchasiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:4615_0: Corajeṭṭhako tassā kathaṃ sutvā “evarūpāya itthiyā santakaṃ harantānaṃ asani patitvā matthakaṃ bhindeyyā”ti
atk-s0502a0:4615_1: corānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “sīghaṃ upāsikāya santakaṃ paṭipākatikaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4620_1: Theropi dhammaṃ kathetvā vibhātāya rattiyā āsanā otari.
atk-s0502a0:4620_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe corajeṭṭhako upāsikāya pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a0:4620_5: “Ahañhi tumhesu āghātaṃ katvā tumhe māretukāmo aṭṭhāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4620_11: puttassa vo santike amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ dāpethā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4620_13: ime corā mama guṇesu tumhākañca dhammakathāya pasannā pabbajjaṃ yācanti,
atk-s0502a0:4620_15: Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā tehi nivatthavatthānaṃ dasāni chindāpetvā tambamattikāya rajāpetvā te pabbājetvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4620_16: Upasampannakāle ca nesaṃ ekekassa visuṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānamadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4620_17: Te navasatā bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ navasatakammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā ekaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha tassa tassa rukkhassa chāyāya nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4621_0: Satthā vīsayojanasatamatthake jetavanamahāvihāre nisinnova te bhikkhū oloketvā tesaṃ cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4621_1: vavatthāpetvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisīditvā kathento viya imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4626_0: “Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati;
atk-s0502a0:4629_0: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0502a0:4638_0: Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike.
atk-s0502a0:4641_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0502a0:4652_0: Tattha mettāvihārīti mettākammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karontopi mettāvasena tikacatukkajjhāne nibbattetvā ṭhitopi mettāvihārīyeva nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4652_1: Pasannoti yo pana buddhasāsane pasanno hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4652_4: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu santaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ upasantatāya saṅkhārūpasamaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4653_0: Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvanti bhikkhu imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nāvaṃ micchāvitakkodakaṃ chaḍḍento siñca.
atk-s0502a0:4653_1: Sittā te lahumessatīti yathā hi mahāsamudde udakasseva bharitā nāvā chiddāni pidahitvā udakassa sittatāya
atk-s0502a0:4653_2: sittā sallahukā hutvā mahāsamudde anosīditvā sīghaṃ supaṭṭanaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a0:4653_3: evaṃ tavāpi ayaṃ micchāvitakkodakabharitā attabhāvanāvā cakkhudvārādichiddāni saṃvarena pidahitvā uppannassa
atk-s0502a0:4653_4: micchāvitakkodakassa sittatāya sittā sallahukā saṃsāravaṭṭe anosīditvā sīghaṃ nibbānaṃ gamissati.
atk-s0502a0:4653_6: Etāni hi chinditvā arahattappatto tato aparabhāge anupādisesanibbānameva ehisi,
atk-s0502a0:4654_0: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhāapāyasampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde baddharajjuṃ puriso satthena viya heṭṭhāmaggattayena chindeyya.
atk-s0502a0:4654_1: Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya pajaheyya,
atk-s0502a0:4654_3: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya.
atk-s0502a0:4654_4: Pañcasaṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo bhikkhu oghatiṇṇoti vuccati,
atk-s0502a0:4655_0: Jhāya bhikkhūti bhikkhu tvaṃ dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena jhāya ceva,
atk-s0502a0:4655_2: Ramessūti pañcavidhe ca kāmaguṇe te cittaṃ mā ramessu.
atk-s0502a0:4655_3: Mā lohaguḷanti sativossaggalakkhaṇena hi pamādena pamattā niraye tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ gilanti,
atk-s0502a0:4655_4: tena taṃ vadāmi “mā pamatto hutvā lohaguḷaṃ gili,
atk-s0502a0:4656_0: Natthi jhānanti jhānuppādikāya vāyāmapaññāya apaññassa jhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a0:4656_1: Paññā natthīti ajhāyantassa “samāhito bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī”ti vuttalakkhaṇā paññā natthi.
atk-s0502a0:4656_2: Yamhi jhānañca paññā cāti yamhi puggale idaṃ ubhayampi atthi,
atk-s0502a0:4657_0: Suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassāti kismiñcideva vivittokāse kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nisinnassa.
atk-s0502a0:4657_2: Sammāti hetunā kāraṇena dhammaṃ vipassantassa vipassanāsaṅkhātā amānusī rati aṭṭhasamāpattisaṅkhātā dibbāpi rati hoti uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4658_0: Yato yato sammasatīti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammaṃ karonto yena yenākārena,
atk-s0502a0:4658_1: purebhattādīsu vā kālesu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ attanā abhirucite kāle,
atk-s0502a0:4658_2: abhirucite vā kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto sammasati.
atk-s0502a0:4658_3: Udayabbayanti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā lakkhaṇehi udayaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4658_5: Pītipāmojjanti evaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ sammasanto dhammapītiṃ dhammapāmojjañca labhati.
atk-s0502a0:4658_6: Amatanti taṃ sappaccaye nāmarūpe pākaṭe hutvā upaṭṭhahante uppannaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ amatanibbānasampāpakattā vijānataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ amatamevāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4659_3: Idāni “taṃ ādī”ti vuttaṃ pubbaṭṭhānaṃ dassento indriyaguttītiādimāha.
atk-s0502a0:4659_7: Tena ājīvapārisuddhi ceva paccayasannissitañca sīlaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4660_0: Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇeti vissaṭṭhakammante apatirūpasahāye vajjetvā sādhujīvitāya suddhājīve jaṅghabalaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4660_1: nissāya jīvikakappanāya akusīte atandite kalyāṇamitte bhajassu,
atk-s0502a0:4660_3: Paṭisanthāravutyassāti āmisapaṭisanthārena ca dhammapaṭisanthārena ca sampannavuttitāya paṭisanthāravutti assa,
atk-s0502a0:4660_9: Tato pāmojjabahuloti tato paṭisanthāravuttito ca ācārakosallato ca uppannena dhammapāmojjena pāmojjabahulo
atk-s0502a0:4660_10: hutvā taṃ sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ karissatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4661_0: Evaṃ satthārā desitāsu imāsu gāthāsu ekamekissāya gāthāya pariyosāne ekamekaṃ bhikkhusataṃ nisinnanisinnaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0502a0:4661_1: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā sabbepi te bhikkhū ākāseneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4661_2: kantāraṃ atikkamitvā tathāgatassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ vaṇṇentā thomentā pāde vandiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:4664_0: Vassikā viya pupphānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4665_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karontā pātova pupphitāni vassikapupphāni
atk-s0502a0:4665_1: sāyaṃ vaṇṭato muccantāni disvā “pupphānaṃ vaṇṭehi muccanato mayaṃ paṭhamataraṃ rāgādīhi muccissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a0:4665_5: bhikkhunā nāma vaṇṭato muccanapupphena viya dukkhato muccituṃ vāyamitabbamevā”ti vatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova ālokaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4669_3: yathā vassikā hiyyo pupphitapupphāni punadivase purāṇabhūtāni muñcati,
atk-s0502a0:4670_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:4673_0: Santakāyoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto santakāyattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4674_3: Sīhā kira ekadivasaṃ gocaraṃ gahetvā rajatasuvaṇṇamaṇipavāḷaguhānaṃ aññataraṃ pavisitvā manosilātale
atk-s0502a0:4674_4: haritālacuṇṇesu sattāhaṃ nipajjitvā sattame divase uṭṭhāya nipannaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā sace naṅguṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a0:4674_5: vā kaṇṇānaṃ vā hatthapādānaṃ vā calitattā manosilāharitālacuṇṇānaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ passanti,
atk-s0502a0:4674_6: “na te idaṃ jātiyā vā gottassa vā patirūpa”nti puna sattāhaṃ nirāhārā nipajjanti,
atk-s0502a0:4674_7: cuṇṇānaṃ pana vippakiṇṇabhāve asati “idaṃ te jātigottānaṃ anucchavika”nti āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā
atk-s0502a0:4674_8: disā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a0:4674_10: Tassa kāyasamācāraṃ disvā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “na no, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4674_12: Imassa hi nisinnaṭṭhāne hatthacalanaṃ vā pādacalanaṃ vā kāyavijambhitā vā natthī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4674_15: bhikkhunā nāma santakāyattherena viya kāyādīhi upasanteneva bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4678_4: catūhi maggehi lokāmisassa vantatāya vantalokāmiso bhikkhu abbhantare rāgādīnaṃ upasantatāya upasantoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4679_0: Desanāvasāne so thero arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4682_0: Attanā codayattānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto naṅgalakulattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4683_0: Eko kira duggatamanusso paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvati,
atk-s0502a0:4683_1: taṃ eko bhikkhu pilotikakhaṇḍanivatthaṃ naṅgalaṃ ukkhipitvā gacchantaṃ disvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4683_2: “kiṃ pana te evaṃ jīvanato pabbajituṃ na vara”nti. Ko maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4683_9: Atha naṃ so thero jetavanaṃ netvā sahatthena,
atk-s0502a0:4683_10: nhāpetvā māḷake ṭhapetvā pabbājetvā nivatthapilotikakhaṇḍena saddhiṃ naṅgalaṃ māḷakasīmāyameva rukkhasākhāyaṃ ṭhapāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4683_12: So buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ nissāya jīvanto ukkaṇṭhitvā ukkaṇṭhitaṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto “na dāni
atk-s0502a0:4683_13: saddhādeyyāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā gamissāmī”ti taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā attanāva attānaṃ ovadi – “ahirika, nillajja,
atk-s0502a0:4683_14: idaṃ nivāsetvā vibbhamitvā bhatiṃ katvā jīvitukāmo jāto”ti.

atk-s0502a0:4684_7: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū “esa abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4684_10: mama putto attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ patto”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4687_0: So attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
atk-s0502a0:4689_0: “Attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā;
atk-s0502a0:4692_0: Tattha codayattānanti attanāva attānaṃ codaya sāraya.
atk-s0502a0:4692_4: upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā hutvā sabbiriyāpathesu sukhaṃ viharissasīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4693_1: Ko hi nātho paroti yasmā parassa attabhāve patiṭṭhāya kusalaṃ vā katvā saggaparāyaṇena maggaṃ vā bhāvetvā sacchikataphalena bhavituṃ na sakkā,

atk-s0502a0:4693_3: Tasmāti yasmā attāva attano gati patiṭṭhā saraṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4693_4: tasmā yathā bhadraṃ assājānīyaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ patthayanto vāṇijo tassa visamaṭṭhānacāraṃ pacchinditvā
atk-s0502a0:4693_5: divasassa tikkhattuṃ nahāpento bhojento saṃyameti paṭijaggati,
atk-s0502a0:4693_6: evaṃ tvampi anuppannassa akusalassa uppādaṃ nivārento satisammosena uppannaṃ akusalaṃ pajahanto attānaṃ saṃyama gopaya,

atk-s0502a0:4697_0: Pāmojjabahuloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto vakkalittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4698_0: So kirāyasmā sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā satthu
atk-s0502a0:4698_1: sarīrasampattiṃ oloketvā sarīrasampattidassanena atitto “evāhaṃ niccakālaṃ tathāgataṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a0:4698_2: satthu santike pabbajitvā yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4698_3: tattha ṭhito sajjhāyakammaṭṭhānamanasikārādīni pahāya satthāraṃ olokentova vicarati.
atk-s0502a0:4698_4: Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento kiñci avatvā “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā “kiṃ te, vakkali,
atk-s0502a0:4698_5: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0502a0:4698_10: So evaṃ ovaditopi satthu dassanaṃ pahāya neva aññattha gantuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0502a0:4698_11: Atha naṃ satthā “nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gantvā vassūpanāyikadivase “apehi, vakkali, apehi,
atk-s0502a0:4698_13: So “na maṃ satthā ālapatī”ti temāsaṃ satthu sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena,
atk-s0502a0:4699_0: Satthā tassa kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ dassetuṃ obhāsaṃ muñci.
atk-s0502a0:4699_1: Athassa satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya tāvamahantopi soko pahīyi.
atk-s0502a0:4699_2: Satthā sukkhataḷākaṃ oghena pūrento viya therassa balavapītipāmojjaṃ uppādetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4703_1: pakatiyāpi pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu buddhasāsane pasādaṃ roceti,
atk-s0502a0:4703_2: so evaṃ pasanno buddhasāsane santaṃ padaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigaccheyyāti.
atk-s0502a0:4703_3: Imañca pana gāthaṃ vatvā satthā vakkalittherassa hatthaṃ pasāretvā –
atk-s0502a0:4705_0: Ahaṃ taṃ uddharissāmi, paṅke sannaṃva kuñjaraṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4710_2: ehīti ca avhānampi laddha”nti balavapītiṃ uppādetvā “kuto nu kho gantabba”nti gamanamaggaṃ apassanto
atk-s0502a0:4710_3: dasabalassa sammukhe ākāse uppatitvā paṭhamapāde pabbate ṭhiteyeva satthārā vuttagāthā āvajjento ākāseyeva
atk-s0502a0:4710_4: pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā tathāgataṃ vandamānova otaritvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4710_5: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0502a0:4713_0: Yo haveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto sumanasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4714_0: Padumuttarabuddhakālasmiñhi eko kulaputto satthārā catuparisamajjhe ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a0:4714_1: ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ sampattiṃ patthayamāno satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a0:4714_3: ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:4714_4: Satthā kappasatasahassaṃ olokento tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ viditvā “ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0502a0:4714_5: gotamabuddhasāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo anuruddho nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4714_6: So taṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sve pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ maññamāno parinibbute satthari bhikkhū dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4714_7: pucchitvā sattayojanikaṃ kañcanathūpaṃ parikkhipitvā anekāni dīparukkhasahassāni kāretvā dīpapūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a0:4714_8: tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu kappasatasahassāni saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ kappe bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4714_9: daliddakule nibbatto sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya tassa tiṇahārako hutvā jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a0:4714_11: Sumanaseṭṭhīpi tasmiṃ nagare niccakālaṃ mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a0:4715_0: Athekadivasaṃ upariṭṭho nāma paccekabuddho gandhamādane nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya “kassa nu kho ajja
atk-s0502a0:4715_1: anuggahaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā “ajja mayā annabhārassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:4715_2: idāni ca so aṭavito tiṇaṃ ādāya gehaṃ āgamissatī”ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya iddhiyā gantvā annabhārassa sammukhe paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4715_4: bhikkhaṃ labhitthā”ti pucchitvā “labhissāma mahāpuññā”ti vutte “tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4715_5: thokaṃ āgamethā”ti tiṇakājaṃ chaḍḍetvā vegena gehaṃ gantvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a0:4715_8: sāmī”ti vutte vegena paccāgantvā paccekabuddhassa pattaṃ ādāya “mayhaṃ dātukāmatāya sati deyyadhammo na hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4715_10: Ajja pana me paṭiggāhako ca diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a0:4715_12: lābhā vata me”ti gehaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ patte pakkhipāpetvā paccāharitvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā –
atk-s0502a0:4716_0: “Iminā pana dānena, mā me dāliddiyaṃ ahu;
atk-s0502a0:4717_0: Natthīti vacanaṃ nāma, mā ahosi bhavābhave. –
atk-s0502a0:4718_1: natthīti padameva na suṇeyya”nti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:4718_2: Paccekabuddho “evaṃ hotu mahāpuññā”ti vatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4719_0: Sumanaseṭṭhinopi chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4719_2: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “kiṃ maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadamānaṃ na passasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4719_3: Nāhaṃ tava dānaṃ ārabbha sādhukāraṃ demi,
atk-s0502a0:4719_4: annabhārena pana upariṭṭhassa dinnapiṇḍapāte pasīditvā mayā esa sādhukāro pavattitoti.
atk-s0502a0:4719_6: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadanto devataṃ sādhukāraṃ dāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4719_7: annabhāro maṃ nissāya jīvanto ekapiṇḍapāteneva sādhukāraṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:4719_8: tassa dāne anucchavikaṃ katvā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “ajja tayā kassaci kiñci dinna”nti pucchi. “Āma, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4719_9: upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa me ajja bhāgabhattaṃ dinna”nti. “Handa, bho,
atk-s0502a0:4719_10: kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehī”ti? “Na demi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4719_15: sahassaṃ gahetvā pattiṃ me dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4719_16: So “ayyena saddhiṃ mantetvā jānissāmī”ti vegena paccekabuddhaṃ sampāpuṇitvā,
atk-s0502a0:4719_18: sahassaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ piṇḍapāte pattiṃ yācati,
atk-s0502a0:4720_1: kulasatike gāme ekasmiṃ ghare dīpaṃ jāleyya,
atk-s0502a0:4720_2: sesā attano telena vaṭṭiṃ temetvā jālāpetvā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4720_8: attano piṇḍapāte paresaṃ pattiṃ dentassa yattakānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:4720_11: seṭṭhissa pana pattiyā dinnāya dve piṇḍapātā honti eko tava,
atk-s0502a0:4721_1: bhante”ti taṃ abhivādetvā seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “gaṇha, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4721_7: ahampi tava guṇe pūjemi, gaṇha, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4721_8: ito paṭṭhāya ca pana mā sahatthā kammamakāsi,
atk-s0502a0:4721_12: Nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa pana dinnapiṇḍapāto tadaheva vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a0:4721_13: Tasmā rājāpi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā annabhāraṃ pakkosāpetvā pattiṃ gahetvā mahantaṃ bhogaṃ datvā tassa seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_0: So sumanaseṭṭhissa sahāyako hutvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0502a0:4722_1: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare amitodanassa sakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:4722_4: satthu cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_5: Ekadivasaṃ kira chasu khattiyesu pūve lakkhaṃ katvā guḷehi kīḷantesu anuruddho parājito pūvānaṃ atthāya mātu santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_6: Sā mahantaṃ suvaṇṇathālaṃ pūretvā pūve pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_7: Pūve khāditvā puna kīḷanto parājito tatheva pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_8: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ pūvesu āhaṭesu catutthe vāre mātā “idāni pūvā natthī”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_9: Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “natthī”ti padassa asutapubbatāya “natthipūvā nāma idāni bhavissantī”ti saññaṃ katvā “gaccha natthipūve āharā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:4722_11: dethā”ti vutte “mama puttena natthīti padaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4722_12: kathaṃ nu kho natthibhāvaṃ jānāpeyya”nti suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovitvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā paṭikujjitvā “handa, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4722_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe nagarapariggāhikā devatā “amhākaṃ sāminā annabhārakāle upariṭṭhassa paccekabuddhassa bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4722_15: datvā ‘natthīti padameva na suṇeyya’nti patthanā nāma ṭhapitā.
atk-s0502a0:4722_17: muddhāpi no sattadhā phaleyyā”ti cintetvā dibbapūvehi pātiṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4722_18: So puriso pātiṃ āharitvā tassa santike ṭhapetvā vivari.
atk-s0502a0:4722_20: Pūvo pana mukhe ṭhapitamattova sattarasaharaṇisahassāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4723_1: “na maṃ maññe ito pubbe mātā piyāyati.
atk-s0502a0:4723_2: Na hi me aññadā tāya natthipūvā nāma pakkapubbā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4723_6: mama akkhīhipi hadayamaṃsatopi tvaṃ piyataroti. Sacāhaṃ, amma,
atk-s0502a0:4723_8: kasmā mama pubbe evarūpe natthipūve nāma na adāsīti.
atk-s0502a0:4723_19: Sā tato paṭṭhāya tena “pūve khāditukāmomhī”ti vuttakāle suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovitvā aññāya pātiyā paṭikujjitvā pahiṇati,
atk-s0502a0:4723_21: Evaṃ so agāramajjhe vasanto natthīti padassa atthaṃ ajānitvā dibbapūveyeva paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a0:4724_0: Satthu pana parivāratthaṃ kulapaṭipāṭiyā sākiyakumāresu pabbajantesu mahānāmena sakkena, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:4724_8: So hi bhattassa uṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi na jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:4724_11: Ekadivasañhi anuruddho bhaddiyo kimiloti tayo janā “bhattaṃ nāma kahaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4724_13: So kirekadivasaṃ vīhī koṭṭhamhi pakkhipante addasa,
atk-s0502a0:4724_15: Atha naṃ bhaddiyo “tvaṃ na jānāsī”ti vatvā “bhattaṃ nāma ukkhaliyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4724_16: So kirekadivasaṃ ukkhalito bhattaṃ vaḍḍhente disvā “etthevetaṃ uppajjatī”ti saññamakāsi,
atk-s0502a0:4724_18: Anuruddho te ubhopi “tumhe na jānāthā”ti vatvā “bhattaṃ nāma ratanubbedhamakuḷāya mahāsuvaṇṇapātiyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4724_24: Evaṃ bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi ajānanto mahāpuñño kulaputto kammante kiṃ jānissati.
atk-s0502a0:4725_3: paṭhamaṃ khettaṃ kasāpetabba”ntiādinā nayena bhātarā vuttānaṃ kammantānaṃ apariyantabhāvaṃ sutvā “na
atk-s0502a0:4725_4: me gharāvāsena attho”ti mātaraṃ āpucchitvā bhaddiyapamukhehi pañcahi sākiyakumārehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a0:4725_6: Pabbajitvā ca pana sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno anupubbena tisso vijjā sacchikatvā dibbena cakkhunā ekāsane
atk-s0502a0:4725_7: nisinnova hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakāni viya sahassalokadhātuyo olokanasamattho hutvā –
atk-s0502a0:4728_0: Udānaṃ udānetvā “kiṃ nu kho me katvā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti olokento “padumuttarapādamūle patthanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4728_1: ṭhapesi”nti ñatvā puna “saṃsāre saṃsaranto asukasmiṃ nāma kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya jīvanto
atk-s0502a0:4731_2: “yo so tadā mayā upariṭṭhassa dinnapiṇḍapātato kahāpaṇe datvā pattiṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0502a0:4731_3: mama sahāyako sumanaseṭṭhi kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi nibbatto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4731_4: Atha naṃ “viñjhāṭaviyaṃ pabbatapāde muṇḍanigamo nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a0:4731_5: tattha mahāmuṇḍassa nāma upāsakassa mahāsumano cūḷasumanoti dve puttā,
atk-s0502a0:4731_6: tesu so cūḷasumano hutvā nibbatto”ti addasa.
atk-s0502a0:4731_8: “atthi nu kho tattha mayi gate upakāro,
atk-s0502a0:4731_10: So upadhārento idaṃ addasa “so tattha mayi gate sattavassikova nikkhamitvā pabbajissati,
atk-s0502a0:4731_12: Disvā ca pana upakaṭṭhe antovasse ākāsena gantvā gāmadvāre otari.
atk-s0502a0:4731_13: Mahāmuṇḍo pana upāsako therassa pubbepi vissāsiko eva.
atk-s0502a0:4731_14: So theraṃ piṇḍapātakāle cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ disvā puttaṃ mahāsumanaṃ āha – “tāta, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:4731_16: yāvassa añño koci pattaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a0:4731_20: Upāsako theraṃ antonivesane sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:4732_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ paṭijagganto viya temāsaṃ paṭijaggitvā mahāpavāraṇāya ticīvarañceva guḷatelataṇḍulādīni
atk-s0502a0:4732_3: na me iminā attho”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4732_10: “Mayhaṃ santike kappiyakārako sāmaṇeropi natthī”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4732_11: mama putto mahāsumano sāmaṇero bhavissatī”ti. “Na me, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a0:4732_16: Thero tena saddhiṃ aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ tattheva vasitvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti tassa ñātake āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a0:4733_1: tassa tattha pubbarattāpararattaṃ caṅkamantassa udaravāto samuṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:4733_2: Atha naṃ kilantarūpaṃ disvā sāmaṇero pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4733_10: “Anotattato pānīye laddhe phāsukaṃ hoti, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4733_14: Tena hi anotatte pannago nāma nāgarājā maṃ jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:4733_15: tassa ācikkhitvā bhesajjatthāya ekaṃ pānīyavārakaṃ āharāti.
atk-s0502a0:4733_16: So sādhūti upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pañcayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4733_17: Taṃ divasaṃ pana nāgarājā nāganāṭakaparivuto udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo hoti.
atk-s0502a0:4733_19: “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo attano pādapaṃsuṃ mama matthake okiranto vicarati,
atk-s0502a0:4733_21: na dānissa pānīyaṃ dassāmī”ti paṇṇāsayojanikaṃ anotattadahaṃ mahāpātiyā ukkhaliṃ pidahanto viya phaṇena pidahitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a0:4733_22: Sāmaṇero nāgarājassa ākāraṃ oloketvāva “kuddho aya”nti ñatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4739_0: Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇero “ayaṃ nāgarājā attano icchāya na dassati,
atk-s0502a0:4739_1: ahaṃ balakkāraṃ katvā ānubhāvaṃ jānāpetvā imaṃ abhibhavitvāva pānīyaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a0:4739_5: mā maṃ vārehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4741_0: Yadi te thāmabalaṃ atthi, nāgarāja nivārayā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4744_0: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4745_2: “tena hi suṭṭhu jānassū”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā “buddhasāsanassa ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā mayā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4745_3: harituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatānaṃ tāva santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4745_6: “Etasmiṃ anotattadahapiṭṭhe pannaganāgarājena saddhiṃ mama saṅgāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:4745_8: So eteneva nīhārena cattāro lokapāle sakkasuyāmasantusitaparanimmitavasavattī ca upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:4745_9: Tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā yāva brahmalokaṃ gantvā tattha tattha brahmehi āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitehi “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4745_11: Evaṃ so asaññe ca arūpibrahmāno ca ṭhapetvā sabbattha muhutteneva āhiṇḍitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:4745_12: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabbāpi devatā anotattadahapiṭṭhe nāḷiyaṃ pakkhittāni piṭṭhacuṇṇāni viya ākāsaṃ nirantaraṃ pūretvā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4745_13: Sannipatite devasaṅghe sāmaṇero ākāse ṭhatvā nāgarājaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:4750_0: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4751_0: So tikkhattuṃ nāgarājassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā ākāse ṭhitakova dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā ākāsato
atk-s0502a0:4751_1: oruyha nāgarājassa phaṇe akkamitvā adhomukhaṃ nippīḷesi,
atk-s0502a0:4751_2: tāvadeva balavatā purisena akkantaallacammaṃ viya nāgarājassa phaṇe akkantamatte ogalitvā dabbimattā phaṇapuṭakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4751_3: Nāgarājassa phaṇehi muttamuttaṭṭhānato tālakkhandhapamāṇā udakavaṭṭiyo uggañchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4751_8: So “ayaṃ maṃ devasaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā pānīyaṃ gahetvā lajjāpesi,
atk-s0502a0:4751_9: etaṃ gahetvā mukhe hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ vāssa maddāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4751_10: pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāyaṃ khipāmī”ti vegena anubandhi.
atk-s0502a0:4751_12: Sāmaṇero gantvā upajjhāyassa hatthe pānīyaṃ ṭhapetvā “pivatha,
atk-s0502a0:4751_16: sāmaṇero mayā adinnameva pānīyaṃ gahetvā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:4751_19: iminā me dinnaṃ pānīyaṃ āhaṭa”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4751_20: Thero “khīṇāsavasāmaṇerassa musākathanaṃ nāma natthī”ti ñatvā pānīyaṃ pivi.
atk-s0502a0:4751_25: pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti. Mahārāja,
atk-s0502a0:4751_27: tumhe sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetuṃ na sakkhissatha,
atk-s0502a0:4751_31: Atha naṃ therassa vacanena khamāpetvā tena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā “ito paṭṭhāya anotattaudakena atthe sati tumhākaṃ āgamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:4752_1: Satthā therassa āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā migāramātupāsāde therassa āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4752_2: Bhikkhūpi theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4752_3: Athekacce sāmaṇeraṃ sīsepi kaṇṇesupi bāhāyampi gahetvā sañcāletvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4752_7: “bhāriyaṃ vatimesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ āsīvisaṃ gīvāya gaṇhantā viya sāmaṇeraṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a0:4752_9: ajja mayā sumanasāmaṇerassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4752_11: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0502a0:4752_27: puthujjanā pana attano asamatthatāyeva na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4752_31: kuṭaṃ ādāya kira udakaṃ āharā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4752_33: anotattato kira maṃ udakaṃ āhārāpethā”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0502a0:4752_35: So visākhāya kāritesu ghanasuvaṇṇakoṭṭimesu senāsanakuṭesu ekaṃ saṭṭhikuṭaudakagaṇhanakaṃ mahāghaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4752_36: hatthena gahetvā “iminā me ukkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe ṭhapitena attho natthī”ti olambakaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0502a0:4753_0: Nāgarājā sāmaṇeraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā kuṭaṃ aṃsakūṭena ādāya, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4753_1: tumhe mādise dāse vijjamāne kasmā sayaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a0:4753_2: udakenatthe sati kasmā sāsanamattampi na pahiṇathā”ti kuṭena udakaṃ ādāya sayaṃ ukkhipitvā “purato hotha, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4753_5: ahameva sammāsambuddhena āṇatto”ti nāgarājānaṃ nivattāpetvā kuṭaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ hatthena gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi.
atk-s0502a0:4753_6: Atha naṃ satthā āgacchantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0502a0:4753_11: Sopi pānīyaghaṭaṃ ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4753_16: ajja paṭṭhāya bhikkhu hohī”ti vatvā dāyajjaupasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4753_17: Dveyeva kira sāmaṇerā sattavassikā upasampadaṃ labhiṃsu –
atk-s0502a0:4754_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ upasampanne dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4754_2: evarūpo hi nāma daharasāmaṇerassa ānubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4754_3: na no ito pubbe evarūpo ānubhāvo diṭṭhapubbo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4754_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4754_8: mama sāsane daharopi sammā paṭipanno evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4757_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4758_1: Pabhāsetīti so bhikkhu attano arahattamaggañāṇena abbhādīhi mutto candimā viya lokaṃ khandhādibhedaṃ lokaṃ obhāseti,
atk-s0502a0:4765_0: Chinda sotanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasādabahulaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4766_0: So kira brāhmaṇo bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto attano gehe soḷasamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4766_1: paṭṭhapetvā bhikkhūnaṃ āgatavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā “āgacchantu bhonto arahanto,
atk-s0502a0:4766_2: nisīdantu bhonto arahanto”ti yaṃkiñci vadanto arahantavādapaṭisaṃyuttameva vadati.
atk-s0502a0:4766_5: Evaṃ te sabbepi kukkuccāyantā tassa gehaṃ nāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4766_7: nāgacchantī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:4766_9: bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā tehi tasmiṃ atthe ārocite “sādiyatha pana tumhe,
atk-s0502a0:4766_17: api ca kho pana brāhmaṇassa arahantesu adhimattaṃ pemaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4766_18: tasmā tumhehipi taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā arahattameva pattuṃ yutta”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4770_0: Tattha parakkammāti taṇhāsotaṃ nāma na appamattakena vāyāmena chindituṃ sakkā,
atk-s0502a0:4770_1: tasmā ñāṇasampayuttena mahantena parakkamena parakkamitvā taṃ sotaṃ chinda.
atk-s0502a0:4770_5: Akataññūti evaṃ sante tvaṃ suvaṇṇādīsu kenaci akatassa nibbānassa jānanato akataññū nāma hosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4774_0: Yadā dvayesūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4775_0: Ekadivasañhi tiṃsamattā disāvāsikā bhikkhū āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4775_1: Sāriputtatthero tesaṃ arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitakova imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4778_0: Athassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4779_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle dvidhā ṭhitesu samathavipassanādhammesu abhiññāpāragādivasena ayaṃ khīṇāsavo pāragū hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4779_1: athassa vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojanasamatthā sabbe kāmayogādayo saṃyogā evaṃ jānantassa atthaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4780_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a0:4783_0: Yassa pāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4784_0: So kirekasmiṃ divase aññataro puriso viya hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4784_5: tañhi vītarāgehi pattabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4786_0: “Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0502a0:4788_3: Na vijjatīti yassa sabbampetaṃ “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahaṇābhāvena natthi,
atk-s0502a0:4788_4: taṃ kilesadarathānaṃ vigamena vītaddaraṃ sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4792_0: Jhāyinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4793_4: mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4793_7: uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattameva panevaṃ vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4797_0: Tattha jhāyinti duvidhena jhānena jhāyantaṃ kāmarajena virajaṃ vane ekakamāsīnaṃ catūhi maggehi soḷasannaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4797_1: kiccānaṃ katattā katakiccaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavaṃ uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4798_0: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4801_0: Divā tapatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā migāramātupāsāde viharanto ānandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4802_0: Pasenadi kosalo kira mahāpavāraṇāya sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito gandhamālādīni ādāya vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4802_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kāḷudāyitthero jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parisapariyante nisinno hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4802_6: Ānandatthero atthamentassa ca sūriyassa uggacchantassa ca candassa obhāsaṃ olokento rañño sarīrobhāsaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4802_7: therassa sarīrobhāsaṃ tathāgatassa ca sarīrobhāsaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a0:4802_10: ajja mama ime obhāse olokentassa tumhākameva obhāso ruccati.
atk-s0502a0:4802_11: Tumhākañhi sarīraṃ sabbobhāse atikkamitvā virocatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4802_17: buddhā pana rattimpi divāpi pañcavidhena tejena virocantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4805_0: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a0:4807_2: Candimāti candopi abbhādīhi vimutto rattimeva virocati, no divā.
atk-s0502a0:4807_3: Sannaddhoti suvaṇṇamaṇivicittehi sabbābharaṇehi paṭimaṇḍito caturaṅginiyā senāya parikkhittova rājā virocati,
atk-s0502a0:4807_5: Jhāyīti khīṇāsavo pana gaṇaṃ vinodetvā jhāyantova virocati.
atk-s0502a0:4807_10: dhammatejena adhammatejaṃ pariyādiyitvā iminā pañcavidhena tejasā niccakālameva virocatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4811_0: Bāhitapāpoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇapabbajitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4812_0: Eko kira brāhmaṇo bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitvā “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake ‘pabbajitā’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a0:4812_2: mampi kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4812_4: kilesamalānaṃ pana pabbājitattā pabbajito nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4816_3: tasmā yo attano rāgādimalaṃ pabbājayanto vinodento carati,
atk-s0502a0:4816_4: sopi tena pabbājanena pabbajitoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4820_0: Na brāhmaṇassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4821_0: Ekasmiṃ kira ṭhāne sambahulā manussā “aho amhākaṃ, ayyo,
atk-s0502a0:4821_2: aññesu akkosantesu vā paharantesu vā kopamattampi natthī”ti therassa guṇe kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4821_3: Atheko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo “ko esa na kujjhatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4821_11: jānissāmissa kattabba”nti theraṃ bhikkhāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvā pacchābhāgena gantvā piṭṭhimajjhe mahantaṃ pāṇippahāramadāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4821_16: bhante”ti vatvā “kiṃ eta”nti ca vutte “ahaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya tumhe pahari”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4821_18: mama geheyeva nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti therassa pattaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:4822_0: Manussā kujjhitvā “iminā amhākaṃ niraparādho ayyo pahaṭo,
atk-s0502a0:4822_2: ettheva naṃ māressāmā”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādihatthā brāhmaṇassa gehadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4822_3: Thero uṭṭhāya gacchanto brāhmaṇassa hatthe pattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4822_4: Manussā taṃ therena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4822_5: tumhākaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4822_12: gacchatha tumhe”ti manusse uyyojetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattāpetvā thero vihārameva gato.
atk-s0502a0:4822_13: Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “kiṃ nāmetaṃ sāriputtatthero yena brāhmaṇena pahaṭo,
atk-s0502a0:4822_14: tasseva gehe nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgato.
atk-s0502a0:4822_15: Therassa pahaṭakālato paṭṭhāya idāni so kassa lajjissati,
atk-s0502a0:4822_19: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4822_23: kodho nāmesa anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:4825_0: Dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa muñcati.
atk-s0502a0:4827_0: “Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi;
atk-s0502a0:4828_0: Yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkha”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4829_0: Tattha pahareyyāti “khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇohamasmī”ti jānanto khīṇāsavassa vā aññatarassa vā jātibrāhmaṇassa na pahareyya.
atk-s0502a0:4829_1: Nāssa muñcethāti sopi pahaṭo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo assa paharitvā ṭhitassa veraṃ na muñcetha,
atk-s0502a0:4829_4: Tato dhīti yo pana taṃ paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto tassa upari veraṃ muñcati,
atk-s0502a0:4830_0: Etadakiñci seyyoti yaṃ khīṇāsavassa akkosantaṃ vā apaccakkosanaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4830_2: etaṃ tassa khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇassa na kiñci seyyo,
atk-s0502a0:4830_5: Yadā nisedho manaso piyehīti kodhanassa hi kodhuppādova manaso piyo nāma.
atk-s0502a0:4830_6: Kodho hi panesa mātāpitūsupi buddhādīsupi aparajjhati.
atk-s0502a0:4830_7: Tasmā yo assa tehi manaso nisedho kodhavasena uppajjamānassa cittassa niggaho,
atk-s0502a0:4830_10: So tassa yato yato vatthuto anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchanto nivattati.
atk-s0502a0:4830_11: Tato tatoti tato tato vatthuto sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nivattatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4834_0: Yassa kāyena vācāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4835_0: Bhagavatā hi anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paññatte aṭṭha garudhamme maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso surabhipupphadāmaṃ
atk-s0502a0:4835_1: viya sirasā sampaṭicchitvā saparivārā mahāpajāpati gotamī upasampadaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a0:4835_2: añño tassā upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthi.
atk-s0502a0:4835_3: Evaṃ laddhūpasampadaṃ theriṃ ārabbha aparena samayena kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā ācariyupajjhāyā na paññāyanti,
atk-s0502a0:4835_5: Evañca pana vatvā bhikkhuniyo kukkuccāyantiyo tāya saddhiṃ neva uposathaṃ na pavāraṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a0:4835_7: Satthā tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mayā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā dinnā,
atk-s0502a0:4835_10: Kāyaduccaritādivirahitesu khīṇāsavesu kukkuccaṃ nāma na kātabba”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4838_0: Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4839_0: Tattha dukkaṭanti sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4839_1: Tīhi ṭhānehīti etehi kāyādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādipavesanivāraṇatthāya dvāraṃ pihitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4843_0: Yamhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4844_0: So kirāyasmā assajittherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya “yassaṃ disāyaṃ thero vasatī”ti suṇāti,
atk-s0502a0:4844_1: tato añjaliṃ paggayha tatova sīsaṃ katvā nipajjati.
atk-s0502a0:4844_3: ajjāpi disā namassamāno vicaratī”ti tamatthaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4844_7: mama disā namassanabhāvaṃ vā anamassanabhāvaṃ vā tumheva jānāthā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a0:4844_10: assajittherassa pana santikā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattatāya attano ācariyaṃ namassati.
atk-s0502a0:4844_11: Yañhi ācariyaṃ nissāya bhikkhu dhammaṃ vijānāti,
atk-s0502a0:4844_12: tena so brāhmaṇena aggi viya sakkaccaṃ namassitabboyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4848_0: Tattha aggihuttaṃvāti yathā brāhmaṇo aggihuttaṃ sammā paricaraṇena ceva añjalikammādīhi ca sakkaccaṃ namassati,
atk-s0502a0:4848_1: evaṃ yamhā ācariyā tathāgatapaveditaṃ dhammaṃ vijāneyya,
atk-s0502a0:4852_0: Na jaṭāhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ jaṭilabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4853_0: So kira “ahaṃ mātito ca pitito ca sujāto brāhmaṇakule nibbatto.
atk-s0502a0:4853_1: Sace samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati,
atk-s0502a0:4853_2: mampi nu kho tathā vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4853_6: paṭividdhasaccameva panāhaṃ brāhmaṇoti vadāmī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4855_0: “Na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a0:4856_0: Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4857_0: Tattha saccanti yasmiṃ puggale cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ saccañāṇañceva navavidho ca lokuttaradhammo atthi, so suci,
atk-s0502a0:4861_0: Kiṃ teti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ vaggulivataṃ kuhakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4862_0: So kira vesālinagaradvāre ekaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ āruyha dvīhi pādehi rukkhasākhaṃ gaṇhitvā adhosiro olambanto “kapilānaṃ me sataṃ detha,
atk-s0502a0:4862_4: ito patitvā maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a0:4862_5: Tathāgatassa bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa nagaraṃ pavisanakāle bhikkhū taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā nikkhamanakālepi naṃ tatheva olambantaṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4862_6: Nāgarāpi “ayaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya evaṃ olambanto patitvā maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ kareyyā”ti cintetvā nagaravināsabhītā “yaṃ so yācati,
atk-s0502a0:4862_9: Bhikkhū vihārūpacāre taṃ gāviṃ viya viravitvā gacchantaṃ disvā sañjānitvā “laddhaṃ te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:4862_11: laddhaṃ me”ti sutvā antovihāraṃ gantvā tathāgatassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4862_17: tadā pana paṇḍite vañcetuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītamāhari.
atk-s0502a0:4863_0: Atīte ekaṃ kāsikagāmaṃ nissāya eko kuhakatāpaso vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a0:4863_2: Divā uppannakhādanīyabhojanīyato attano puttānaṃ viya tassapi ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a0:4863_4: Athekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ godhamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sādhukaṃ pacitvā tato koṭṭhāsaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyadivase tassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4863_5: Tāpaso maṃsaṃ khāditvāva rasataṇhāya baddho “kiṃ maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhamaṃsa”nti sutvā bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a0:4863_6: caritvā sappidadhikaṭukabhaṇḍādīni gahetvā paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:4863_7: Paṇṇasālāya pana avidūre ekasmiṃ vammike godharājā viharati.
atk-s0502a0:4863_8: So kālena kālaṃ tāpasaṃ vandituṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0502a0:4863_9: Taṃdivasaṃ panesa “taṃ vadhissāmī”ti daṇḍaṃ paṭicchādetvā tassa vammikassa avidūre ṭhāne niddāyanto viya nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4863_10: Godharājā vammikato nikkhamitvā tassa santikaṃ āgacchantova ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā “na me ajja ācariyassa ākāro ruccatī”ti tatova nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:4863_11: Tāpaso tassa nivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa māraṇatthāya daṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0502a0:4863_13: Godharājāpi dhammikaṃ pavisitvā tato sīsaṃ nīharitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokento tāpasaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:4865_0: So maṃ daṇḍena pāhāsi, yathā asamaṇo tathā.
atk-s0502a0:4866_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a0:4868_0: Atha naṃ tāpaso attano santakena palobhetuṃ evamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4870_0: Telaṃ loṇañca me atthi, pahūtaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4871_0: Taṃ sutvā godharājā “yathā yathā tvaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a0:4871_1: tathā tathā me palāyitukāmatāva hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4873_0: Telaṃ loṇañca kittesi, ahitaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4874_0: Evañca pana vatvā “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayi samaṇasaññaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4874_1: idāni pana te maṃ paharitukāmatāya daṇḍo khitto,
atk-s0502a0:4874_7: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā “tadā esa kuhako tāpaso ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:4874_8: godharājā pana ahamevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā tadā godhapaṇḍitena tassa niggahitakāraṇaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4876_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a0:4878_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhīti ambho duppañña tava baddhāhipi imāhi jaṭāhi sakhurāya nivatthāyapi imāya ajinacammasāṭikāya ca kimatthoti.
atk-s0502a0:4878_2: kevalaṃ hatthilaṇḍaṃ assalaṇḍaṃ viya maṭṭhaṃ bāhiraṃ parimajjasīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4882_0: Paṃsukūladharanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanto kisāgotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4883_0: Tadā kira sakko paṭhamayāmāvasāne devaparisāya saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamante sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4883_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kisāgotamī “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti ākāsenāgantvā sakkaṃ disvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:4883_2: So taṃ vanditvā nivattantiṃ disvā satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:4883_6: mama dhītā paṃsukūlikattherīnaṃ aggā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4886_0: Ekaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4887_0: Tattha kisanti paṃsukūlikā hi attano anurūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrentā appamaṃsalohitā ceva honti dhamanisanthatagattā ca,
atk-s0502a0:4887_2: Ekaṃ vanasminti vivittaṭṭhāne ekakaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4891_0: Na cāhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4892_0: So kira “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati ahañcamhi brāhmaṇayoniyaṃ nibbatto,
atk-s0502a0:4892_1: mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4892_5: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4895_0: Bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano;
atk-s0502a0:4897_1: Mattisambhavanti brāhmaṇiyā mātu santake udarasmiṃ sambhūtaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4897_3: bho”ti vatvā vicaranto bhovādi nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a0:4897_5: Ahaṃ pana rāgādīhi akiñcanaṃ catūhi upādānehi anādānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4898_0: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4901_0: Sabbasaṃyojananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ nāma seṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4901_1: Vatthu “muñca pure muñca pacchato”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a0:4902_2: abhūtena maññe aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhikkhūhi vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4902_4: mama puttasadisā chinnasaṃyojanā na bhāyantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4906_2: Tamahanti taṃ ahaṃ rāgādīnaṃ saṅgānaṃ atītattā saṅgātigaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4906_3: catunnampi yogānaṃ abhāvena visaṃyuttaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4910_0: Chetvā naddhinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve brāhmaṇe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4911_0: Tesu kirekassa cūḷarohito nāma goṇo ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:4911_3: mama goṇo balavā”ti vivaditvā “kiṃ no vivādena,
atk-s0502a0:4911_4: pājetvā jānissāmā”ti aciravatītīre sakaṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā goṇe yojayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4911_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhūpi nhāyituṃ tattha gatā honti.
atk-s0502a0:4911_9: Bhikkhū disvā vihāraṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ satthu ārocayiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a0:4911_13: bhikkhunā pana ajjhattikaṃ kodhanaddhiñceva taṇhāvarattañca chindituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4915_3: idaṃ sabbampi chinditvā ṭhitaṃ avijjāpalighassa ukkhittattā ukkhittapalighaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4915_4: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddhaṃ taṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4916_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a0:4919_0: Akkosanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto akkosakabhāradvājaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4920_0: Tassa hi bhātu bhāradvājassa dhanañjānī nāma brāhmaṇī sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:4920_1: Sā khīpitvāpi kāsitvāpi pakkhalitvāpi “namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a0:4920_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaparivesanāya pavattamānāya pakkhalitvā tatheva mahāsaddena udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a0:4920_3: Brāhmaṇo kujjhitvā “evamevāyaṃ vasalī yattha vā tattha vā pakkhalitvā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti vatvā “idāni te, vasali,
atk-s0502a0:4920_4: gantvā tassa satthuno vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4920_8: api ca gantvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchassū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4920_9: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā avanditvāva ekamantaṃ ṭhito pañhaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4921_0: “Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a0:4923_0: Athassa pañhaṃ byākaronto satthā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4924_0: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a0:4926_0: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a0:4927_0: So satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4927_1: Athassa kaniṭṭho akkosakabhāradvājo “bhātā kira me pabbajito”ti sutvā kuddho āgantvā satthāraṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosi.
atk-s0502a0:4927_2: Sopi satthārā atithīnaṃ khādanīyādidānaopammena saññatto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4927_3: Aparepissa sundarikabhāradvājo biliṅgakabhāradvājoti dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro satthāraṃ akkosantāva satthārā vinītā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4928_2: catūsu nāma bhātikesu akkosantesu satthā kiñci avatvā tesaṃyeva patiṭṭhā jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4928_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4928_7: ahaṃ mama khantibalena samannāgatattā duṭṭhesu adussanto mahājanassa patiṭṭhā homiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4932_0: Tattha aduṭṭhoti etaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosañca pāṇiādīhi pothanañca andubandhanādīhi bandhanañca yo akuddhamānaso hutvā adhivāseti,
atk-s0502a0:4932_2: punappunaṃ uppattiyā anīkabhūtena teneva khantibalena samannāgatattā balānīkaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4936_0: Akkodhananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4937_0: Tadā kira thero pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caranto nālakagāme mātu gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4937_1: Atha naṃ sā nisīdāpetvā parivisamānā akkosi – “ambho,
atk-s0502a0:4937_2: ucchiṭṭhakhādaka ucchiṭṭhakañjiyaṃ alabhitvā paragharesu uḷuṅkapiṭṭhena ghaṭṭitakañjiyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitosi,
atk-s0502a0:4937_5: Bhikkhūnampi bhattaṃ dadamānā “tumhehi mama putto attano cūḷupaṭṭhāko kato,
atk-s0502a0:4937_22: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4937_27: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:4937_29: khīṇāsavā nāma akkodhanāva hontī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4941_4: koṭiyaṃ ṭhitena attabhāvena antimasarīraṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4945_0: Vāri pokkharapattevāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇatheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4946_0: Aparena samayena mahājano dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti,
atk-s0502a0:4946_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a0:4946_13: Yathā hi padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu na limpati na saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0502a0:4946_15: Yathā ca āragge sāsapo na upalimpati na saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0502a0:4946_17: evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na limpati na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4949_0: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4950_0: Tattha yo na limpatīti evamevaṃ yo abbhantare duvidhepi kāme na upalimpati,
atk-s0502a0:4954_0: Yo dukkhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4955_0: Tassa kireko dāso apaññatte sikkhāpade palāyitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4955_1: Brāhmaṇo taṃ olokento adisvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā cīvaraṃ daḷhaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0502a0:4959_1: Pannabhāranti ohitakhandhabhāraṃ catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4962_0: Gambhīrapaññanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto khemaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4963_0: Ekadivasañhi paṭhamayāmasamanantare sakko devarājā parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā satthu santike sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4963_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe khemā bhikkhunī “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti āgantvā sakkaṃ disvā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:4963_3: āgacchamānā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivattī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:4963_5: mama dhītā khemā nāma mahāpaññā maggāmaggakovidā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4967_0: Tattha gabbhīrapaññanti gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya paññāya samannāgataṃ dhammojapaññāya samannāgataṃ medhāviṃ “ayaṃ duggatiyā maggo,
atk-s0502a0:4967_3: ayaṃ amaggo”ti evaṃ magge ca amagge ca chekatāya maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ uttamatthaṃ anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4971_0: Asaṃsaṭṭhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pabbhāravāsītissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4972_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ olokento ekaṃ leṇapabbhāraṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a0:4972_2: So “ahaṃ idha vasanto pabbajitakiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:4972_5: Ayaṃ pana idha ekarattimeva vasitvā pakkamissatī”ti cintetvā putte ādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:4972_6: Thero punadivase pātova gocaragāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:4972_7: Atha naṃ ekā upāsikā disvāva puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā attānaṃ nissāya temāsaṃ vasanatthāya yāci.
atk-s0502a0:4972_8: Sopi “sakkā mayā imaṃ nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ kātu”nti adhivāsetvā tameva leṇaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4972_9: Devatā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “addhā kenaci nimantito bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:4972_10: sve vā parasuve vā gamissatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:4973_0: Evaṃ aḍḍhamāsamatte atikkante “ayaṃ idheva maññe antovassaṃ vasissati,
atk-s0502a0:4973_1: sīlavatā pana saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne puttakehi saddhiṃ vasituṃ dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4973_3: atthi nu kho imassa sīle khalita”nti dibbena cakkhunā olokentī upasampadamāḷakato paṭṭhāya tassa sīle khalitaṃ adisvā “parisuddhamassa sīlaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4973_4: kiñcidevassa katvā ayasaṃ uppādessāmī”ti tassa upaṭṭhākakule upāsikāya jeṭṭhaputtassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0502a0:4973_11: tumhākaṃ pana kulūpakaṃ theraṃ laṭṭhimadhukaṃ yācitvā tena telaṃ pacitvā imassa natthukammaṃ detha,
atk-s0502a0:4973_18: Tena hissa pādadhovanaudakaṃ ādāya sīse āsiñcathāti.
atk-s0502a0:4973_19: Upāsikā “sakkā idaṃ kātu”nti velāya āgataṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā antarabhatte nisinnassa pāde dhovitvā udakaṃ gahetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4973_20: idaṃ udakaṃ dārakassa sīse āsiñcāmā”ti āpucchitvā “tena hi āsiñcathā”ti vutte tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4973_21: Sā devatā tāvadeva taṃ muñcitvā gantvā leṇadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4974_0: Theropi bhattakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāyāsanā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānatāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantova pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4974_1: Atha naṃ leṇadvāraṃ pattakāle sā devatā “mahāvejja mā idha pavisā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4974_4: Thero “atthi nu kho mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhāna”nti upasampadamāḷakato paṭṭhāya olokento attano sīle
atk-s0502a0:4974_5: tilakaṃ vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā “ahaṃ mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhānaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a0:4974_12: ajjeva tayā amanussagahitassa upaṭṭhākaputtassa pādadhovanaudakaṃ sīse āsittaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4974_21: devatāpi mama catupārisuddhisīle tilakaṃ vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā dārakassa sīse āsittapādadhovanamattaṃ addasā”ti tassa sīlaṃ ārabbha balavapīti uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:4974_22: So taṃ vikkhambhetvā pāduddhārampi akatvā tattheva arahattaṃ patvā “mādisaṃ parisuddhaṃ samaṇaṃ dūsetvā mā idha vanasaṇḍe vasi,
atk-s0502a0:4974_23: tvameva nikkhamāhī”ti devataṃ ovadanto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a0:4975_0: “Visuddho vata me vāso, nimmalaṃ maṃ tapassinaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:4976_0: Mā tvaṃ visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhama pavanā tuva”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4977_0: So tattheva temāsaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4977_1: pabbajitakiccaṃ te matthakaṃ pāpita”nti puṭṭho tasmiṃ leṇe vassūpagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4977_2: tvaṃ devatāya evaṃ vuccamāno na kujjhī”ti vutte “na kujjhi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4977_5: devatāya idaṃ nāma vuccamānopi na kujjhinti vadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:4977_9: etassa gihīhi vā pabbajitehi vā saṃsaggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a0:4977_10: asaṃsaṭṭho esa appiccho santuṭṭho”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4981_1: Ubhayanti gihīhi ca anāgārehi cāti ubhayehipi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4981_2: Anokasārinti anālayacāriṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:4985_0: Nidhāya daṇḍanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4986_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vāyamanto arahattaṃ patvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmī”ti tato nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:4986_1: Atha naṃ ekasmiṃ gāme ekā itthī sāmikena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ katvā tasmiṃ bahi nikkhante “kulagharaṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a0:4986_2: maggaṃ paṭipannā antarāmagge disvā “imaṃ theraṃ nissāya gamissāmī”ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0502a0:4986_4: Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā “kulagāmaṃ gatā bhavissatī”ti anubandhanto taṃ disvā “na sakkā imāya ekikāya imaṃ aṭaviṃ paṭipajjituṃ,
atk-s0502a0:4986_5: kaṃ nu kho nissāya gacchatī”ti olokento theraṃ disvā “ayaṃ imaṃ gaṇhitvā nikkhanto bhavissatī”ti cintetvā theraṃ santajjesi.
atk-s0502a0:4986_6: Atha naṃ sā itthī “neva maṃ esa bhadanto passati,
atk-s0502a0:4986_9: So “kiṃ pana tvaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ mama ācikkhissasi,
atk-s0502a0:4986_10: tuyhameva anucchavikaṃ imassa karissāmī”ti uppannakodho itthiyā āghātena theraṃ pothetvā taṃ ādāya nivatti.
atk-s0502a0:4986_12: Athassa vihāraṃ gatakāle bhikkhū sarīraṃ sambāhantā gaṇḍe disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4986_15: tasmiṃ purise evaṃ paharante tvaṃ kiṃ avaca,
atk-s0502a0:4986_16: kiṃ vā te kodho uppanno”ti. “Na me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4986_17: kodho uppajjī”ti vutte satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:4986_18: esa bhikkhu ‘kodho te uppajjatī’ti vuccamāno ‘na me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:4986_19: kodho uppajjatī’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4986_23: te paharantesupi kodhaṃ na karontiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:4989_0: Yo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:4990_3: Yo na hantīti yo evaṃ sabbasattesu vigatapaṭighatāya nikkhittadaṇḍo neva kañci sayaṃ hanati,
atk-s0502a0:4994_0: Aviruddhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cattāro sāmaṇere ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:4995_0: Ekā kira brāhmaṇī catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddesabhattaṃ sajjetvā brāhmaṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:4995_2: So vihāraṃ gantvā “cattāro me brāhmaṇe uddisitvā dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4995_3: Tassa saṃkicco paṇḍito sopāko revatoti sattavassikā cattāro khīṇāsavasāmaṇerā pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4995_4: Brāhmaṇī mahārahāni āsanāni paññāpetvā ṭhitā sāmaṇere disvāva kupitā uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyamānā
atk-s0502a0:4995_5: “tvaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā attano nattumattepi appahonte cattāro kumārake gahetvā āgatosī”ti vatvā tesaṃ tesu
atk-s0502a0:4995_6: āsanesu nisīdituṃ adatvā nīcapīṭhakāni attharitvā “etesu nisīdathā”ti vatvā “gaccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:4995_10: Thero āgantvā sāmaṇere disvā “imehi brāhmaṇehi bhattaṃ laddha”nti pucchitvā “na laddha”nti vutte catunnameva
atk-s0502a0:4995_11: bhattassa paṭiyattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “āhara me patta”nti pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4995_12: Brāhmaṇīpi “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti pucchitvā “etesaṃ nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a0:4995_13: āhara me patta”nti attano pattaṃ gahetvā gato,
atk-s0502a0:4995_16: Brāhmaṇo gantvā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ disvā tatheva vatvā ānesi.
atk-s0502a0:4995_17: Sopi sāmaṇere disvā tatheva vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_0: Sāmaṇerāpi pātova paṭṭhāya kiñci alabhamānā jighacchāya pīḷitā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4996_1: Atha nesaṃ guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_2: So āvajjento tesaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya nisinnānaṃ kilantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jarājiṇṇo
atk-s0502a0:4996_3: mahallakabrāhmaṇo hutvā tasmiṃ brāhmaṇavādake brāhmaṇānaṃ aggāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_4: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “idāni me brāhmaṇī attamanā bhavissatī”ti ehi gehaṃ gamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_5: Brāhmaṇī taṃ disvāva tuṭṭhacittā dvīsu āsanesu attharaṇaṃ ekasmiṃyeva attharitvā, “ayya,
atk-s0502a0:4996_7: Sakko gehaṃ pavisitvā cattāro sāmaṇere pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tesaṃ āsanapariyante bhūmiyaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_8: Atha naṃ disvā brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:4996_14: So khandhepi hatthepi kacchāyapi gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiyamāno uṭṭhātumpi na icchati.
atk-s0502a0:4996_17: ahaṃ ekasmiṃ hatthe gaṇhissāmī”ti ubhopi dvīsu hatthesu gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ pothentā gehadvārato bahi akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4996_19: Te nivattitvā taṃ nisinnameva disvā bhītaravaṃ ravantā vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4996_20: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko attano sakkabhāvaṃ jānāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:4996_22: Pañcapi janā āhāraṃ gahetvā eko kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ vinivijjhitvā,
atk-s0502a0:4996_26: sakkopi ekena ṭhānena nikkhamīti evaṃ pañcadhā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:4996_27: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana taṃ gehaṃ pañcachiddagehaṃ kira nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:4997_3: amhākaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī kodhābhibhūtā paññattāsanesu no nisīditumpi adatvā “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:4997_4: Amhākaṃ upajjhāyo āgantvā amhe disvā “imesaṃ nisinnabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pattaṃ āharāpetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a0:4997_5: “Aññaṃ mahallakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ānesī”ti vutte brāhmaṇo mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ānesi,
atk-s0502a0:4997_6: sopi amhe disvā tatheva vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:4997_8: gaccha brāhmaṇavādakato ekaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:4997_9: So tattha gantvā brāhmaṇavesena āgataṃ sakkaṃ ānesi,
atk-s0502a0:4997_11: Evaṃ karontānaṃ pana tesaṃ tumhe na kujjhitthāti?
atk-s0502a0:4997_14: ime ‘na kujjhimhā’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarontī”ti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a0:4997_16: khīṇāsavā nāma viruddhesupi na virujjhantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5001_0: Tattha aviruddhanti āghātavasena viruddhesupi lokiyamahājanesu āghātābhāvena aviruddhaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5001_1: Hatthagate daṇḍe vā satthe vā avijjamānepi paresaṃ pahāradānato aviratattā attadaṇḍesu janesu nibbutaṃ nikkhittadaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5001_2: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ ahaṃ mamanti gahitattā sādānesu tassa gahaṇassa abhāvena anādānaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5005_0: Yassa rāgo cāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāpanthakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5006_0: So hāyasmā cūḷapanthakaṃ catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ paguṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontaṃ “tvaṃ sāsane abhabbo,
atk-s0502a0:5006_3: ito nikkhamā”ti vihārā nikkaḍḍhitvā dvāraṃ thakesi.
atk-s0502a0:5006_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a0:5006_12: mama puttena atthapurekkhāratāya ceva dhammapurekkhāratāya ca kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5008_0: “Yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito;
atk-s0502a0:5010_1: ayañca paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho āraggā sāsapo viya pātito,
atk-s0502a0:5014_0: Akakkasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto pilindavacchattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5015_1: vasalī”tiādīni vadanto gihīpi pabbajitepi vasalivādeneva samudācarati.
atk-s0502a0:5015_2: Athekadivasaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5015_4: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ pilindavaccha bhikkhū vasalivādena samudācarasī”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5015_5: bhante”ti vutte tassāyasmato pubbenivāsaṃ manasikaritvā “mā kho tumhe,
atk-s0502a0:5015_12: bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni sabbāni tāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni,
atk-s0502a0:5015_14: khīṇāsavassa nāma kakkasaṃ pharusaṃ paresaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavacanameva natthi.
atk-s0502a0:5015_15: Āciṇṇavasena hi mama putto evaṃ kathetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5018_0: Yāya nābhisaje kañci, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5019_3: Nābhisajeti yāya girāya aññaṃ kujjhāpanavasena na laggāpeyya,
atk-s0502a0:5023_0: Yodha dīghanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññatarattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5024_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo sarīragandhagahaṇabhayena uttarasāṭakaṃ apanetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā gehadvārābhimukho nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:5024_1: Atheko khīṇāsavo bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gacchanto taṃ sāṭakaṃ disvā ito cito ca oloketvā kañci apassanto
atk-s0502a0:5024_3: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo disvā akkosanto upasaṅkamitvā “muṇḍaka, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a0:5024_7: gaṇha na”nti tassa datvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:5024_8: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karontā “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5024_9: sāṭako dīgho rasso thūlo saṇho”ti. Āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5024_10: dīgho vā hotu rasso vā thūlo vā saṇho vā,
atk-s0502a0:5024_13: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ – “esa, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5024_18: khīṇāsavā nāma paresaṃ santakaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5026_0: “Yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:5027_0: Loke adinnaṃ nādiyati, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5028_1: sāṭakābharaṇādīsu dīghaṃ vā rassaṃ vā maṇimuttādīsu aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā mahagghaappagghavasena subhaṃ vā
atk-s0502a0:5028_2: asubhaṃ vā yo puggalo imasmiṃ loke parapariggahitaṃ nādiyati,
atk-s0502a0:5032_0: Āsā yassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5033_0: Thero kira pañcabhikkhusataparivāro janapade ekaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0502a0:5033_1: Manussā theraṃ disvā bahuṃ vassāvāsikaṃ paṭissuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5033_2: Thero pavāretvā sabbasmiṃ vassāvāsike asampatteyeva satthu santikaṃ gacchanto bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0502a0:5033_3: “daharānañceva sāmaṇerānañca manussehi vassāvāsike āhaṭe gahetvā peseyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:5033_5: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5033_6: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ajjāpi maññe sāriputtattherassa taṇhā atthiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:5033_7: Tathā hi manussehi vassāvāsike dinne attano saddhivihārikānaṃ ‘vassāvāsikaṃ peseyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:5033_8: ṭhapetvā vā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāthā’ti bhikkhūnaṃ vatvā āgato”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5033_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a0:5033_14: manussānaṃ pana puññato daharasāmaṇerānañca dhammikalābhato parihāni mā ahosīti tenevaṃ kathita”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5035_0: “Āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca;
atk-s0502a0:5037_2: Visaṃyuttanti sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5041_0: Yassālayāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5041_2: Idha pana satthā moggallānattherassa nittaṇhabhāvaṃ vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5045_1: Aññāya akathaṃkathīti aṭṭha vatthūni yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā aṭṭhavatthukāya vicikicchāya nibbicikiccho.
atk-s0502a0:5045_2: Amatogadhamanuppattanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ogāhetvā anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5049_0: Yodha puññañcāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto revatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5049_1: Vatthu “gāme vā yadi vāraññe”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a0:5050_0: Puna ekadivasaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho sāmaṇerassa lābho,
atk-s0502a0:5050_2: yena ekakena pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcakūṭāgārasatāni katānī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5050_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a0:5050_7: mayhaṃ puttassa neva puññaṃ atthi, na pāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5053_0: Asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5054_0: Tattha ubhoti dvepi puññāni ca pāpāni ca chaḍḍetvāti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5054_3: Vaṭṭamūlakasokābhāvena asokaṃ abbhantare rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvena virajaṃ nirupakkilesatāya suddhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5058_0: Candaṃ vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto candābhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5059_1: atīte eko bārāṇasivāsī vāṇijo “paccantaṃ gantvā candanaṃ āharissāmī”ti bahūni vatthābharaṇādīni gahetvā
atk-s0502a0:5059_2: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi paccantaṃ gantvā gāmadvāre nivāsaṃ gahetvā aṭaviyaṃ gopāladārake pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:5059_3: “imasmiṃ gāme pabbatapādakammiko koci manusso atthī”ti? “Āma, atthī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5059_10: So tehi dinnasaññāya sukhayānake nisīditvā tassa gehadvāraṃ gantvā yānā oruyha gehaṃ pavisitvā “asukanāme”ti taṃ itthiṃ pakkosi.
atk-s0502a0:5059_11: Sā “eko no ñātako bhavissatī”ti vegenāgantvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5059_12: So tattha nisīditvā nāmaṃ vatvā “mama sahāyo kaha”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:5059_15: mama dhītā asukā nāma kaha”nti sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ kittentova pucchitvā “imāni nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni dadeyyāsi,
atk-s0502a0:5059_16: sahāyassāpi me aṭavito āgatakāle idaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5059_17: Sā tassa uḷāraṃ sakkāraṃ katvā sāmikassa āgatakāle “sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5059_18: iminā āgatakālato paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ vatvā idañcidañca dinna”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5060_0: Atha naṃ sāyaṃ sayane nisinno pucchi – “samma,
atk-s0502a0:5060_1: pabbatapāde carantena te kiṃ bahuṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti?
atk-s0502a0:5060_3: rattasākhā pana me bahū rukkhā diṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5060_5: Tena hi te amhākaṃ dassehīti tena saddhiṃ gantvā rattacandanarukkhe chinditvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā āgacchanto taṃ āha – “samma,
atk-s0502a0:5060_8: aññena ca me paṇṇākārena attho natthi,
atk-s0502a0:5060_10: So “sādhū”ti vatvā kālena kālaṃ tassa santikaṃ āgacchanto rattacandanameva āharati,
atk-s0502a0:5061_0: Tato aparena samayena parinibbute kassapadasabale patiṭṭhite kañcanathūpe so puriso bahuṃ candanaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5061_1: Athassa so sahāyako vāṇijo bahuṃ candanaṃ pisāpetvā pātiṃ pūretvā “ehi, samma,
atk-s0502a0:5061_3: tāva cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āgamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya tattha gantvā candanapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5061_4: Sopissa paccantavāsī sahāyako cetiyakucchiyaṃ candanena candamaṇḍalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5062_0: So tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha khepetvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:5062_6: Taṃ yāne nisīdāpetvā “yo imassa sarīraṃ hatthena parāmasati,
atk-s0502a0:5062_7: so evarūpaṃ nāma issariyasampattiṃ labhatī”ti vatvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5062_8: Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā dadamānā eva tassa sarīraṃ hatthena phusituṃ labhanti.
atk-s0502a0:5062_9: Te evaṃ anuvicarantā sāvatthiṃ anuppattā nagarassa ca vihārassa ca antarā nivāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5062_10: Sāvatthiyampi pañcakoṭimattā ariyasāvakā purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālavatthabhesajjādihatthā dhammassavanāya gacchanti.
atk-s0502a0:5062_14: amhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ānubhāvasadiso ānubhāvo natthi.
atk-s0502a0:5062_15: Etassa hi sarīraṃ phusantā idaṃ nāma labhanti,
atk-s0502a0:5062_17: Tumhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ko ānubhāvo nāma,
atk-s0502a0:5062_19: Te aññamaññaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā “vihāraṃ gantvā candābhassa vā amhākaṃ vā satthu ānubhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti taṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5063_0: Satthā tasmiṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamanteyeva candābhāya antaradhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5063_1: So satthu santike aṅgārapacchiyaṃ kāko viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5063_6: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ gantvā antaradhāyamānaṃ ābhaṃ disvā candābho cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:5063_9: “kiṃ nu kho ābhāya antaradhānamantaṃ jānāthā”ti? Āma, jānāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:5063_13: “etasmiṃ mante gahite ahaṃ sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5063_20: Brāhmaṇāpi antarantarā āgantvā “gahito te manto”ti pucchanti.
atk-s0502a0:5063_22: So katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā brāhmaṇehi āgantvā pucchitakāle “yātha tumhe,
atk-s0502a0:5067_4: Nandībhavaparikkhīṇanti tīsu bhavesu parikkhīṇataṇhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5071_0: Yo imanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kuṇḍakoliyaṃ nissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto sīvalittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5072_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye suppavāsā nāma koliyadhītā sattavassāni gabbhaṃ dhāretvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā dukkhāhi
atk-s0502a0:5072_1: tibbāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
atk-s0502a0:5072_2: yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0502a0:5072_4: yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0502a0:5072_6: yathidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi taṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsentī sāmikaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a0:5072_7: santikaṃ pesetvā tena tassā vacanena satthu vandanāya ārocitāya “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā,
atk-s0502a0:5072_8: arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti satthārā vuttakkhaṇeyeva sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyitvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5072_10: Puttopissā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇaṃ ādāya saṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvesi.
atk-s0502a0:5072_11: So aparabhāge nikkhamitvā pabbajito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5073_1: evarūpo nāma arahattassa upanissayasampanno bhikkhu ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātukucchismiṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosi,
atk-s0502a0:5073_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “āma,
atk-s0502a0:5073_8: mama putto ettakā dukkhā muccitvā idāni nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5078_1: yo bhikkhu imaṃ rāgapalipathañceva kilesaduggañca saṃsāravaṭṭañca catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ appaṭivijjhanakamohañca atīto,
atk-s0502a0:5078_2: cattāro oghe tiṇṇo hutvā pāraṃ anuppatto,
atk-s0502a0:5082_0: Yodha kāmeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundarasamuddattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5083_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto sundarasamuddakumāro nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhave mahākule nibbatto.
atk-s0502a0:5083_1: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālādihatthaṃ mahājanaṃ dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a0:5083_2: “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanatthāyā”ti vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a0:5083_4: Satthā tassa āsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5083_5: So “na sakkā agāraṃ ajjhāvasantena saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti satthu dhammakathaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a0:5083_6: pabbajjāya jātussāho parisāya pakkantāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā “mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ tathāgatā
atk-s0502a0:5083_7: na pabbājentī”ti sutvā gehaṃ gantvā raṭṭhapālakulaputtādayo viya mahantena vāyāmena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
atk-s0502a0:5083_8: satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “kiṃ me idha vāsenā”ti tato nikkhamitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:5084_0: Athekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ tassa mātāpitaro ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase mahantena sirisobhaggena tassa sahāyakakumārake
atk-s0502a0:5084_1: kīḷamāne disvā “amhākaṃ puttassa idaṃ dullabhaṃ jāta”nti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5084_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā gaṇikā taṃ kulaṃ gantvā tassa mātaraṃ rodamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0502a0:5084_13: Tena hi me paribbayaṃ dethāti paribbayaṃ gahetvā mahantena parivārena rājagahaṃ gantvā tassa piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:5084_14: caraṇavīthiṃ sallakkhetvā tatthekaṃ nivāsagehaṃ gahetvā pātova paṇītaṃ āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a0:5084_16: idheva nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:5085_1: idheva piṇḍāya carituṃ phāsuka”nti vatvā katipāhaṃ ālinde nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā dārake pūvehi saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a0:5085_2: “etha tumhe therassa āgatakāle mayi vārentiyāpi idhāgantvā rajaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5085_3: Te punadivase therassa bhojanavelāya tāya vāriyamānāpi rajaṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5085_5: dārakā vāriyamānāpi mama vacanaṃ asuṇitvā idha rajaṃ uṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0502a0:5085_6: antogehe nisīdathā”ti anto nisīdāpetvā katipāhaṃ bhojesi.
atk-s0502a0:5085_7: Puna dārake saṅgaṇhitvā “tumhe mayā vāriyamānāpi therassa bhojanakāle mahāsaddaṃ kareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5085_11: dārakā mayā vāriyamānāpi vacanaṃ na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a0:5085_12: uparipāsādeyeva nisīdathā”ti vatvā therena adhivāsite theraṃ purato katvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhantī dvārāni pidahamānāva pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a0:5085_13: Thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacāriko samānopi rasataṇhāya baddho tassā vacanena sattabhūmikaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a0:5086_1: puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accāvadati vijambhati vinamati gilasati vilajjati nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-s0502a0:5086_14: naccena gītena vāditena roditena vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati,
atk-s0502a0:5086_29: sirasaṃ bandhatī”ti evaṃ āgataṃ itthikuttaṃ itthilīlaṃ dassetvā tassa purato ṭhitā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5088_0: Tuvampi daharo mama, ahampi daharā tava;
atk-s0502a0:5090_0: Therassa “aho vata me bhāriyaṃ anupadhāretvā katakamma”nti mahāsaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0502a0:5090_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake jetavane nisinnova taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
