atk-s0502a0:5090_5: rājagahanagare sattabhūmikapāsādatale sundarasamuddassa ca bhikkhuno gaṇikāya ca saṅgāmo vattatīti.
atk-s0502a0:5090_10: gaṇikāya parājayo”ti therassa jayaṃ pakāsetvā tattha nisinnakova obhāsaṃ pharitvā “bhikkhu ubhopi kāme nirapekkho pajahā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5094_1: yo puggalo idha loke ubhopi kāme hitvā anāgāro hutvā paribbajati,
atk-s0502a0:5094_2: taṃ parikkhīṇakāmañceva parikkhīṇabhavañca ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5095_0: Desanāvasāne so thero arahattaṃ patvā iddhibalena vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0502a0:5095_1: satthu sarīraṃ thomentoyeva āgantvā satthāraṃ vandi.
atk-s0502a0:5095_3: jivhāviññeyyaṃ rasaṃ nissāya manaṃ naṭṭho sundarasamuddatthero,
atk-s0502a0:5095_7: pubbepāhaṃ etassa rasataṇhāya baddhamanassa avassayo jātoyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a0:5100_0: Ekakanipāte imaṃ vātamigajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “tadā sundarasamuddo vātamigo ahosi,
atk-s0502a0:5100_1: imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā tassa vissajjāpetā rañño mahāmacco ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānesīti.
atk-s0502a0:5103_0: Yodha taṇhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jaṭilattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_1: atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ dve bhātaro kuṭumbikā mahantaṃ ucchukhettaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5104_2: Athekadivasaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā ucchukhettaṃ gantvā “ekaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dassāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5104_3: ekaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dve ucchuyaṭṭhiyo rasassa anikkhamanatthāya chinnaṭṭhāne bandhitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_4: Tadā kira ucchūnaṃ yantena pīḷanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:5104_5: agge vā mūle vā chinditvā ukkhittakāle dhammakaraṇato udakaṃ viya sayameva raso nikkhamati.
atk-s0502a0:5104_6: Tassa pana khettato ucchuyaṭṭhiyo gahetvā āgamanakāle gandhamādane paccekabuddho samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a0:5104_7: “kassa nu kho ajja anuggahaṃ karissāmī”ti upadhārento taṃ attano ñāṇajāle paviṭṭhaṃ disvā saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a0:5104_8: samatthabhāvañca ñatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya iddhiyā āgantvā tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_9: So taṃ disvāva pasannacitto uttarasāṭakaṃ uccatare bhūmipadese attharitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5104_10: idha nisīdathā”ti paccekabuddhaṃ nisīdāpetvā “pattaṃ upanāmethā”ti ucchuyaṭṭhiyā bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ mocetvā pattassa upari akāsi,
atk-s0502a0:5104_12: Paccekabuddhena tasmiṃ rase pīte “sādhukaṃ vata me ayyena raso pīto.
atk-s0502a0:5104_17: pattaṃ me upanāmethā”ti dutiyampi ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ mocetvā rasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_18: “Bhātā me ucchukhettato aññaṃ ucchuṃ āharitvā khādissatī”ti ettakampi kirassa vañcanacittaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_19: Paccekabuddho pana paṭhamaṃ ucchurasassa pītattā taṃ ucchurasaṃ aññehipi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitukāmo hutvā gahetvāva nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_20: So tassa ākāraṃ ñatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5104_22: imassa nissandena devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavitvā pariyosāne tumhehi pattadhammameva pāpuṇeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:5104_23: Paccekabuddhopissa “evaṃ hotū”ti vatvā “icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyha”nti dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ katvā yathā so passati,
atk-s0502a0:5104_24: evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ gantvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhasatānaṃ taṃ rasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5105_0: So taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā bhātu santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ gatosī”ti vutte “ucchukhettaṃ oloketuṃ gatomhī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5105_2: nanu nāma ekaṃ vā dve vā ucchuyaṭṭhiyo ādāya āgantabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti bhātarā vutto – “āma, bhātika,
atk-s0502a0:5105_4: ekaṃ pana paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ datvā ‘mūlaṃ vā pattiṃ vā dassāmī’ti tumhākampi me ucchuyaṭṭhito raso dinno,
atk-s0502a0:5105_5: kiṃ nu kho tassa mūlaṃ gaṇhissatha,
atk-s0502a0:5105_8: “Mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ pivitvā tumhākaṃ ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ ādāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ gantvā pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ adāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5105_9: So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tena me paccekabuddhena diṭṭhadhammasseva adhigamo bhaveyyā”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5105_11: jeṭṭhena pana ekapadeneva arahattaṃ patthitanti idaṃ tesaṃ pubbakammaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5106_0: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5106_1: Tesaṃ devaloke ṭhitakāleyeva vipassī sammāsambuddho loke uppajji.
atk-s0502a0:5106_2: Tepi devalokato cavitvā bandhumatiyā ekasmiṃ kulagehe jeṭṭho jeṭṭhova,
atk-s0502a0:5106_6: Tesu vayappattakāle kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā viharantesu “buddharatanaṃ loke uppannaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5106_15: dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti dhammaghosakassa bandhumatīnagare ghosanaṃ sutvā mahājanaṃ purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a0:5106_16: pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanāya gacchantaṃ disvā senakuṭumbiko “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5106_17: dhammassavanāyā”ti vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃyeva gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:5107_0: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5107_1: So satthu dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya ussāhajāto satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a0:5107_2: Atha naṃ satthā “atthi pana te apaloketabbā ñātakā”ti pucchi. Atthi, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a0:5107_4: So kaniṭṭhassa santikaṃ gantvā “yaṃ imasmiṃ kule sāpateyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5107_10: pitari mate pitaraṃ viya tumhe alatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5107_15: na sakkā taṃ agāramajjhe ṭhitena pūretuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5107_18: Evaṃ so kaniṭṭhaṃ nivattāpetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5107_19: Kaniṭṭhopi “bhātu pabbajitasakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhātaraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5107_21: ahaṃ pana pañcahi kāmaguṇehi baddho nikkhamitvā pabbajituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0502a0:5107_22: mayhaṃ gehe ṭhitasseva anucchavikaṃ mahantaṃ puññakammaṃ ācikkhathā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5107_25: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nānādārūni āharāpetvā thambhādīnaṃ atthāya tacchāpetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5107_27: ekaṃ maṇikhacitanti sabbāni sattaratanakhacitāni kāretvā tehi gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā sattaratanakhacitāheva chadaniṭṭhakāhi chādāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5107_28: Gandhakuṭiyā karaṇakāleyeva pana taṃ attanā samānanāmako aparājitoyeva nāma bhāgineyyo upasaṅkamitvā “ahampi karissāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5107_29: mayhampi pattiṃ detha mātulā”ti āha. Na demi, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5107_31: So bahumpi yācitvā pattiṃ alabhamāno “gandhakuṭiyā purato kuñjarasālaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sattaratanamayaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a0:5107_32: So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde meṇḍakaseṭṭhi hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:5108_0: Gandhakuṭiyaṃ pana sattaratanamayāni tīṇi mahāvātapānāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5108_1: Tesaṃ abhimukhe heṭṭhā sudhāparikammakatā tisso pokkharaṇiyo kāretvā catujjātikagandhodakassa pūretvā aparājito, gahapati,
atk-s0502a0:5108_2: pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni ropāpesi tathāgatassa anto nisinnakāle vātavegena samuṭṭhitāhi reṇuvaṭṭīhi sarīrassa okiraṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5108_6: Iti sā naccanto viya moro sobhamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5108_7: Sattasu pana ratanesu koṭṭetabbayuttakaṃ koṭṭetvā itaraṃ sakalameva gahetvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a0:5109_6: iminā kira vo kuṭumbikena gandhakuṭi kāritā,
atk-s0502a0:5109_8: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiabhimukhaṃ gantvā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā parikkhittaratanarāsiṃ olokento dvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5109_11: Satthā tattheva ṭhatvā tatiyavāre tassa bhātikattheraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a0:5109_12: So olokitākāreneva ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āha – “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5109_15: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5109_16: yathā manussā rukkhamūle pavisitvā anapekkhā pakkamanti,
atk-s0502a0:5109_17: yathā vā nadiṃ taritvā uḷumpaṃ anapekkhā pariccajanti,
atk-s0502a0:5109_18: evaṃ anapekkhā hutvā tumhe vasathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5109_22: tesu ratanāni ādāya pakkamantesu na sakkā amhehi vāretuṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5109_23: pariveṇamhi ettake ratane vokiṇṇe attano upaṭṭhāke harantepi na vāretīti kuṭumbiko mayi āghātaṃ katvā apāyūpago bhaveyyā”ti iminā kāraṇena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5110_0: Kuṭumbiko samantā rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā manusse āha – “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:5110_1: ucchaṅgena vā pacchipasibbakehi vā ādāya gacchante vāreyyātha,
atk-s0502a0:5110_2: hatthena gahetvā gacchante pana mā vārayitthā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5110_3: Antonagarepi ārocāpesi “mayā gandhakuṭipariveṇe satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni,
atk-s0502a0:5110_4: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā gacchantā duggatamanussā ubho hatthe pūretvā gaṇhantu,
atk-s0502a0:5110_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “saddhā tāva dhammaṃ sotukāmā gamissantiyeva,
atk-s0502a0:5110_7: assaddhāpi pana dhanalobhena gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhato muccissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5110_10: Sakiṃ okiṇṇaratanesu khīṇesu yāvatatiyaṃ jaṇṇumattena odhinā okirāpesiyeva.
atk-s0502a0:5110_11: Satthu pana pādamūle tipusamattaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:5110_13: “satthu sarīrato suvaṇṇavaṇṇāya pabhāya saddhiṃ maṇipabhaṃ olokentānaṃ titti nāma na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5111_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko micchādiṭṭhikabrāhmaṇo “satthu kira pādamūle mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ nikkhittaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5111_1: harissāmi na”nti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ āgatassa mahājanassa antarena pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:5111_2: Kuṭumbiko tassa pavisanākāreneva “maṇiṃ gaṇhitukāmo”ti sallakkhetvā “aho vata na gaṇheyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a0:5111_3: Sopi satthāraṃ vandanto viya pādamūle hatthaṃ upanāmetvā maṇiṃ gahetvā ovaṭṭikāya katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:5111_6: mayā tikkhattuṃ gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni,
atk-s0502a0:5111_7: tāni me gaṇhantesu āghāto nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0502a0:5111_9: Ajja pana ‘aho vatāyaṃ brāhmaṇo maṇiṃ na gaṇheyyā’ti cintetvā tasmiṃ maṇiṃ ādāya gate cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5111_11: attano santakaṃ parehi anāharaṇīyaṃ kātuṃ sakkosī”ti nayaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5111_12: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “ajja ādiṃ katvā mama santakaṃ dasikasuttamattampi maṃ
atk-s0502a0:5111_13: abhibhavitvā anekasatāpi rājāno vā corā vā gaṇhituṃ samatthā nāma mā hontu,
atk-s0502a0:5111_17: So gandhakuṭimahaṃ karonto aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antovihāreyeva nava māse mahādānaṃ datvā dānapariyosāne sabbesaṃ ticīvaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5112_0: So evaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni karitvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0502a0:5112_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe ekasmiṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aḍḍhamāsādhike nava māse mātukucchiyaṃ vasi.
atk-s0502a0:5112_3: sabbesaṃ kāyarūḷhāni ābharaṇānipi pajjalitāni viya obhāsaṃ muñciṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:5112_9: jānāsi nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti? “Jānāmi, devā”ti. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5112_17: idamassa khīramūlaṃ hotū”ti devasikaṃ sahassaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:5112_18: Athassa nāmagahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa ekapajjotabhūtattā jotikotveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5113_0: Athassa vayappattakāle gehakaraṇatthāya bhūmitale sodhiyamāne sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a0:5113_1: Sakko “kiṃ nu kho ida”nti upadhārayamāno “jotikassa gehaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhantī”ti ñatvā “nāyaṃ etehi katagehe vasissati,
atk-s0502a0:5113_2: mayāpettha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakīvesena tattha gantvā “kiṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5113_4: nāyaṃ tumhehi katagehe vasissatī”ti vatvā soḷasakarīsamattaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:5113_5: so tāvadeva kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5113_6: Puna “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ bhinditvā sattaratanamayo sattabhūmikapāsādo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:5113_8: Puna “imaṃ parikkhipitvā sattaratanamayā satta pākārā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:5113_10: Atha “nesaṃ pariyante kapparukkhā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:5113_12: “Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu catasso nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a0:5113_22: Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā catasso suvaṇṇamayā ucchuyaṭṭhiyo nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5114_0: Sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu satta yakkhā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5114_1: Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake yamakoḷī nāma yakkho attano parivārena yakkhasahassena saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a0:5114_2: dutiye uppalo nāma attano parivārayakkhānaṃ dvīhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5114_3: tatiye vajiro nāma tīhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5114_4: catutthe vajirabāhu nāma catūhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5114_5: pañcame kasakando nāma pañcahi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5114_6: chaṭṭhe kaṭattho nāma chahi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5114_7: sattame disāmukho nāma sattahi sahassehi saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:5114_8: Evaṃ pāsādassa anto ca bahi ca gāḷharakkhā ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5114_10: satta pākārā sattadvārakoṭṭhakā catasso nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā bimbisāro rājā seṭṭhicchattaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_0: Tena pana saddhiṃ katapuññakammā itthī uttarakurūsu nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:5115_1: Atha naṃ devatā tato ānetvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5115_2: Sā āgacchamānā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ tayo ca jotipāsāṇe gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_3: Tesaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tāyeva taṇḍulanāḷiyā bhattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_4: Sace kira te sakaṭasatampi taṇḍulānaṃ pūretukāmā honti,
atk-s0502a0:5115_6: Bhattapacanakāle taṇḍule ukkhaliyaṃ pakkhipitvā tesaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari ṭhapeti,
atk-s0502a0:5115_7: pāsāṇā tāvadeva pajjalitvā bhatte pakkamatte nibbāyanti.
atk-s0502a0:5115_12: aggissa vā dīpassa vā obhāsaṃ neva jāniṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5115_13: “Jotikassa kira evarūpā sampattī”ti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_15: Jotikaseṭṭhi āgatāgatānaṃ uttarakurutaṇḍulānaṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā dāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_18: “Gāvutikanidhikumbhiyā mukhaṃ vivarāpetvā yāpanamattaṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_19: Sakalajambudīpavāsikesu dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchantesu nidhikumbhiyā aṅgulimattampi ūnaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0502a0:5115_20: Gandhakuṭipariveṇe vālukaṃ katvā okiṇṇaratanānaṃ kirassa eso nissando.
atk-s0502a0:5116_0: Evaṃ mahājane vatthābharaṇāni ceva dhanañca yadicchakaṃ ādāya gacchante bimbisāro tassa pāsādaṃ daṭṭhukāmopi mahājane āgacchante okāsaṃ nālattha.
atk-s0502a0:5116_1: Aparabhāge yadicchakaṃ ādāya gatattā manussesu mandībhūtesu rājā jotikassa pitaraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a0:5116_8: Paṭhamadvārakoṭṭhake sammajjitvā kacavarachaḍḍikā dāsī rañño hatthaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a0:5116_9: rājā “seṭṭhijāyā”ti saññāya lajjamāno tassā bāhāya hatthaṃ na ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:5116_10: Evaṃ sesadvārakoṭṭhakesupi dāsiyo “seṭṭhibhariyāyo”ti maññamāno tāsaṃ bāhāya hatthaṃ na ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a0:5116_11: Jotiko āgantvā rājānaṃ paccuggantvā vanditvā pacchato hutvā “purato yātha,
atk-s0502a0:5116_13: Rañño maṇipathavī sataporisapapāto viya hutvā upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:5116_14: So “iminā mama gahaṇatthāya opāto khaṇito”ti maññamāno pādaṃ nikkhipituṃ na visahi.
atk-s0502a0:5116_17: Rājā tena akkantakāle bhūmiṃ akkamitvā heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ olokento vicari.
atk-s0502a0:5116_18: Tadā ajātasattukumāropi pitu aṅguliṃ gahetvā vicaranto cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:5116_20: gahapatike nāma sattaratanamaye pāsāde vasante esa rājā hutvā dārumaye gehe vasati,
atk-s0502a0:5116_21: ahaṃ dāni rājā hutvā imassa imasmiṃ pāsāde vasituṃ na dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5117_5: So soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhatvā ratanamaye seṭṭhissa nisīdanamaṇḍape paññatte tasseva nisīdanapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a0:5117_6: Athassa hatthadhovanūdakaṃ datvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā kilinnapāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5117_9: kilinnapāyāso eso”ti aññissā suvaṇṇapātiyā bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purimapātiyaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5117_10: Tato uṭṭhitautunā kira taṃ bhuñjituṃ sukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:5117_11: Rājā madhurabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto pamāṇaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5117_12: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a0:5117_14: ito uttariṃ jirāpetuṃ na sakkā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5117_16: garukaṃ katvā kathesi attano bhatta”nti? Deva,
atk-s0502a0:5117_18: tumhākaṃ sabbassāpi hi balakāyassa idameva bhattaṃ idaṃ supeyyaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5117_19: Api ca kho ahaṃ ayasassa bhāyāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:5117_23: seṭṭhinā kiñci kataṃ bhavissatī”ti vacanassa bhāyāmi, devāti.
atk-s0502a0:5117_26: Rañño bhattakiccāvasāne sabbo rājaparivāro tadeva bhattaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a0:5118_6: Kiñcāpi hi pātova rājā saparivāro āgato,
atk-s0502a0:5118_8: Tato seṭṭhi “rājā me bhariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo”ti tassā santikaṃ gantvā “rājā āgato,
atk-s0502a0:5118_9: kiṃ tava rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5118_11: rājā nāmā”ti vatvā “rājā nāma amhākaṃ issaro”ti vutte anattamanataṃ pavedentī “dukkaṭāni vata no puññakammāni,
atk-s0502a0:5118_13: Assaddhāya nāma puññakammāni katvā mayaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇitvā aññassa issariyaṭṭhāne nibbattamhā.
atk-s0502a0:5118_14: Addhā amhehi asaddahitvā dānaṃ dinnaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:5118_18: Tassā tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ bījentiyā rañño veṭhanassa gandhavāto akkhīni pahari,
atk-s0502a0:5118_23: ‘rājā me sāmikassa sampattiṃ gaṇheyyā’ti bhayena rodati maññe,
atk-s0502a0:5118_24: assāsehi naṃ ‘na me tava sampattiyā attho”’ti. Na esā, deva, rodatīti.
atk-s0502a0:5118_27: Ayañhi dīpobhāsaṃ vā aggiobhāsaṃ vā adisvā maṇiālokeneva bhuñjati ca nisīdati ca nipajjati ca,
atk-s0502a0:5118_28: devo pana dīpālokena nisinno bhavissatīti? Āma, seṭṭhīti. Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0502a0:5118_29: ajja paṭṭhāya maṇiālokena nisīdathāti mahantaṃ tipusamattaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5118_30: Rājā gehaṃ oloketvā “mahatī vata jotikassa sampattī”ti vatvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5119_2: taṃ pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikakāle rakkhaṇatthāya ekaṃ dāsiṃ datvā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5119_3: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā bahi olokayamānaṃ ākāsena gacchanto eko vijjādharo disvā uppannasineho
atk-s0502a0:5119_5: Sā tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya na cirasseva gabbhaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a0:5119_7: kiṃ ida”nti vatvā “hotu mā kassaci ācikkhī”ti tāya vuttā bhayena tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5119_8: Sāpi dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā navabhājanaṃ āharāpetvā tattha taṃ dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā taṃ bhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5119_9: pidahitvā upari pupphadāmāni ṭhapetvā “imaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā gaṅgāya vissajjehi,
atk-s0502a0:5119_10: ‘kiṃ ida’nti ca puṭṭhā ‘ayyāya me balikamma’nti vadeyyāsī”ti dāsiṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5120_0: Heṭṭhāgaṅgāyampi dve itthiyo nhāyamānā taṃ bhājanaṃ udakenāhariyamānaṃ disvā ekā “mayhetaṃ bhājana”nti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5120_2: taṃ mayha”nti vatvā bhājane sampatte taṃ ādāya thale ṭhapetvā vivaritvā dārakaṃ disvā ekā “mama bhājananti vuttatāya dārako mameva hotī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5120_4: taṃ mameva hotūti vuttatāya mama dārako”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5120_5: Tā vivadamānā vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā amaccesu vinicchituṃ asakkontesu rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5120_6: Rājā tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ dārakaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0502a0:5120_10: Tasmā sā dārakaṃ “imaṃ therassa santike pabbājessāmī”ti posesi.
atk-s0502a0:5120_11: Tassa jātadivase gabbhamalassa dhovitvā anapanītatāya kesā jaṭitā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:5120_13: Tassa padasā vicaraṇakāle thero taṃ gehaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a0:5120_15: Thero dārakaṃ disvā “kiṃ upāsike dārako laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5120_16: imāhaṃ dārakaṃ tumhākaṃ santike pabbājessāmīti posesiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5120_18: Thero “sādhū”ti ādāya taṃ gacchanto “atthi nu kho imassa gihisampattiṃ anubhavituṃ puññakamma”nti olokento
atk-s0502a0:5120_21: ñāṇampissa paripākaṃ na gacchatī”ti cintetvā taṃ ādāya takkasilāyaṃ ekassa upaṭṭhākassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5121_0: So theraṃ vanditvā ṭhito taṃ dārakaṃ disvā “dārako vo, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5121_7: Tassa pana gehe dvādasa vassāni bhaṇḍakaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a0:5121_8: So gāmantaraṃ gacchanto sabbampi taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āpaṇaṃ haritvā dārakaṃ āpaṇe nisīdāpetvā tassa tassa bhaṇḍakassa
atk-s0502a0:5121_9: mūlaṃ ācikkhitvā “idañca idañca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ gahetvā dadeyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a0:5121_10: Taṃdivasaṃ nagarapariggāhikā devatā antamaso maricajīrakamattenāpi atthike tasseva āpaṇābhimukhe kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5121_11: So dvādasa vassāni ussannaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ ekadivaseneva vikkiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5121_12: Kuṭumbiko āgantvā āpaṇe kiñci adisvā “sabbaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5121_19: yattha katthaci jīvituṃ samattho”ti attano gehe vayappattaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa datvā “gehamassa karothā”ti purise āṇāpetvā niṭṭhite gehe “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a0:5122_0: Athassa gehapavisanakāle ekena pādena ummāre akkantamatte gehassa pacchimabhāge bhūmiṃ bhinditvā asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a0:5122_1: Rājā “jaṭilakumārassa kira gehe bhūmiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhito”ti sutvāva tassa seṭṭhicchattaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a0:5122_4: So tesaṃ vayappattakāle pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādetvā “sace amhehi samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a0:5122_7: Atthi nu kho jambudīpe amhehi samānabhogaṃ kula”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya suvaṇṇamayaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5122_8: patodalaṭṭhiṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ pādukañca kārāpetvā purisānaṃ hatthe datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a0:5122_9: imāni ādāya kiñcideva olokayamānā viya jambudīpatale vicaritvā amhehi samānabhogassa seṭṭhikulassa atthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5122_10: vā natthibhāvaṃ vā ñatvā āgacchathā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5123_2: kiṃ karontā vicarathā”ti pucchitvā “ekaṃ olokentā vicarāmā”ti vutte “imesaṃ imāni gahetvā kiñcideva oloketuṃ vicaraṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:5123_5: Te tattha aṭṭhakarīsamatte ṭhāne hatthiassausabhappamāṇe piṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiṃ āhacca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhite
atk-s0502a0:5123_6: heṭṭhā vuttappakāre suvaṇṇameṇḍake disvā tesaṃ antarantarā vicaritvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5123_11: Te tatova gantvā attano seṭṭhinā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:5123_12: diṭṭhaṃ vo amhākaṃ samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikula”nti vutte, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5123_14: bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhino evarūpo nāma vibhavo”ti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5123_15: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi attamano hutvā “ekaṃ tāva seṭṭhikulaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5123_16: aparampi nu kho atthī”ti satasahassagghanikaṃ kambalaṃ datvā “gacchatha, tātā, aññampi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_0: Te rājagahaṃ gantvā jotikaseṭṭhissa gehato avidūre dārurāsiṃ katvā aggiṃ datvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5124_1: “Kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhakāle ca “ekaṃ no mahagghakambalaṃ vikkiṇantānaṃ kayiko natthi,
atk-s0502a0:5124_4: Atha ne jotikaseṭṭhi disvā “ime kiṃ karontī”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ agghanako kambalo”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_5: “Satasahassagghanako”ti vutte satasahassaṃ dāpetvā “dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ sammajjitvā kacavarachaḍḍikāya dāsiyā dethā”ti tesaṃyeva hatthe pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_6: Sā kambalaṃ gahetvā rodamānā sāmikassa santikaṃ āgantvā “kiṃ maṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5124_9: kathāhaṃ imaṃ nivāsessāmi vā pārupissāmi vā”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5124_11: etaṃ pana paliveṭhetvā tava sayanapādamūle ṭhapetvā nipajjanakāle gandhodakena dhotānaṃ pādānaṃ puñchanatthāya te pahiṇiṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5124_13: Sā “etaṃ pana kātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_14: Te ca purisā taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā attano seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:5124_17: rājagahanagare jotikaseṭṭhissa evarūpā nāma sampattī”ti sabbaṃ gehasampattiṃ ārocetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5124_18: Seṭṭhi tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso “idāni pabbajituṃ labhissāmī”ti rañño santikaṃ gantvā “pabbajitukāmomhi,
atk-s0502a0:5124_22: So gehaṃ gantvā putte pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇadaṇḍaṃ vajirakuddālaṃ jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe ṭhapetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5124_24: So kuddālaṃ ādāya gantvā suvaṇṇapabbataṃ pahari,
atk-s0502a0:5124_26: Tassa hatthato kuddālaṃ gahetvā majjhimaputtassa hatthe datvā pahiṇi,
atk-s0502a0:5124_27: tassapi suvaṇṇapabbataṃ paharantassa piṭṭhipāsāṇe pahaṭakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_28: Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhaputtassa hatthe datvā pahiṇi,
atk-s0502a0:5124_29: tassa taṃ gahetvā paharantassa koṭṭetvā rāsikatāya mattikāya pahaṭakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5124_31: alaṃ ettakenā”ti vatvā itare dve jeṭṭhabhātike pakkosāpetvā “ayaṃ suvaṇṇapabbato na tumhākaṃ nibbatto,
atk-s0502a0:5124_33: iminā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā paribhuñjathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5124_35: kasmā ca jaṭilo jātakāle udake pātitoti?
atk-s0502a0:5125_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhassa hi cetiye kariyamāne eko khīṇāsavo cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā oloketvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a0:5125_1: kasmā cetiyassa uttarena mukhaṃ na uṭṭhahatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a0:5125_5: So evaṃ vatvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā, “ammā, tātā,
atk-s0502a0:5125_6: tumhākaṃ cetiyassa ekasmiṃ mukhe suvaṇṇaṃ nappahoti,
atk-s0502a0:5125_7: suvaṇṇaṃ jānāthā”ti mahājanaṃ samādapento suvaṇṇakārakulaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5125_8: Suvaṇṇakāropi taṅkhaṇeyeva bhariyāya saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karonto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a0:5125_9: Atha naṃ thero “cetiye tumhehi gahitamukhassa suvaṇṇaṃ nappahoti,
atk-s0502a0:5125_11: So bhariyāya kopena “tava satthāraṃ udake khipitvā gacchā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5125_13: mama kuddhena te ahameva akkositabbā vā paharitabbā vā,
atk-s0502a0:5125_16: bhante”ti vatvā therassa pādamūle nipajji. Tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5125_20: Suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe katvā antodhātunidhāne pakkhipitvā allavattho allakeso hutvā khamāpehi, tātāti.
atk-s0502a0:5126_1: bhante”ti vatvā suvaṇṇapupphāni karonto tīsu puttesu jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a0:5126_3: tasmā imāni pupphāni katvā dhātunidhāne pakkhipitvā khamāpessāmi,
atk-s0502a0:5126_4: tvampi kho me sahāyo hohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5126_8: sopi tatheva vatvā kātuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a0:5126_10: so “pitu uppannakiccaṃ nāma puttassa bhāro”ti vatvā pitusahāyo hutvā pupphāni akāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5126_11: Suvaṇṇakāro vidatthippamāṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe niṭṭhāpetvā dhātunidhāne pakkhipitvā allavattho allakeso satthāraṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0502a0:5126_12: Iti so sattakkhattuṃ jātakāle udake pātanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a0:5126_15: Ye panassa dve jeṭṭhabhātikā puttā suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ karaṇakāle sahāyā bhavituṃ na icchiṃsu,
atk-s0502a0:5126_16: tesaṃ tena kāraṇena suvaṇṇapabbato na nibbatti,
atk-s0502a0:5126_17: jaṭilassa ceva kaniṭṭhaputtassa ca ekato katabhāvena nibbatti.
atk-s0502a0:5126_18: Iti so putte anusāsitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5126_19: Satthā aparena samayena pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caranto tassa puttānaṃ gehadvāraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0502a0:5126_20: te buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa aḍḍhamāsaṃ bhikkhādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5127_2: asītihatthe suvaṇṇapabbate ca puttesu ca taṇhā atthī”ti. “Na me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5127_3: etesu taṇhā vā māno vā atthī”ti.
atk-s0502a0:5127_4: Te “ayaṃ jaṭilatthero abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5127_7: mama puttassa tesu taṇhā vā māno vā atthī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5131_1: yo idha loke chadvārikaṃ taṇhaṃ vā mānaṃ vā jahitvā gharāvāsena anatthiko anāgāro hutvā paribbajati,
atk-s0502a0:5131_2: taṇhāya ceva bhavassa ca parikkhīṇattā taṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:5135_0: Yodha taṇhanti puna imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jotikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5136_0: Ajātasattukumāro hi devadattena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā pitaraṃ ghātetvā rajje patiṭṭhito “jotikaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a0:5136_1: mahāpāsādaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti yuddhasajjo nikkhamitvā maṇipākāre saparivārassa attano chāyaṃ disvā “gahapatiko
atk-s0502a0:5136_2: yuddhasajjo hutvā balaṃ ādāya nikkhanto”ti sallakkhetvā upagantuṃ na visahi.
atk-s0502a0:5136_3: Seṭṭhipi taṃ divasaṃ uposathiko hutvā pātova bhuttapātarāso vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a0:5136_4: Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhito pana yamakoḷi nāma yakkho taṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti saparivāraṃ viddhaṃsetvā disāvidisāsu anubandhi.
atk-s0502a0:5137_2: kiṃ tvaṃ tava purise “mayā saddhiṃ yujjhathā”ti āṇāpetvā idhāgamma dhammaṃ suṇanto viya nisinnoti.
atk-s0502a0:5137_3: Kiṃ pana devo mama gehaṃ gaṇhituṃ gatoti? Āma,
atk-s0502a0:5137_5: Mama anicchāya mama gehaṃ gaṇhituṃ rājasahassampi na sakkoti, devāti.
atk-s0502a0:5137_6: So “kiṃ pana tvaṃ rājā bhavissasī”ti kujjhi.
atk-s0502a0:5137_8: mama santakaṃ pana dasikasuttampi mama anicchāya rājūhi vā corehi vā gahetuṃ na sakkāti.
atk-s0502a0:5137_9: Kiṃ panāhaṃ tava ruciyā gaṇhissāmīti? Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0502a0:5137_10: imā me dasasu aṅgulīsu vīsati muddikā,
atk-s0502a0:5137_14: So pana rājā bhūmiyaṃ ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā ullaṅghanto aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiruhati,
atk-s0502a0:5137_16: Evaṃmahābalo samānopi ito cito ca parivattento ekaṃ muddikampi kaḍḍhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a0:5137_21: mama santakaṃ mama anicchāya na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti vatvā rañño kiriyāya uppannasaṃvego “pabbajituṃ me anujāna,
atk-s0502a0:5137_23: So “imasmiṃ pabbajite sukhaṃ pāsādaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā ekavacaneneva “tvaṃ pabbajāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5137_24: So satthu santike pabbajitvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ patvā jotikatthero nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5137_25: Tassa arahattaṃ pattakkhaṇeyeva sabbāpi sā sampatti antaradhāyi,
atk-s0502a0:5137_26: tampissa satulakāyiṃ nāma bhariyaṃ devatā uttarakurumeva nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5138_2: tasmiṃ pana te pāsāde vā itthiyā vā taṇhā atthī”ti pucchitvā “natthāvuso”ti vutte satthu ārocesuṃ – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5138_6: mama puttassa tasmiṃ taṇhā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5142_0: Imissā gāthāyattho heṭṭhā jaṭilattheravatthumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0502a0:5146_0: Hitvāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ naṭaputtakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5147_0: So kira ekaṃ naṭakīḷaṃ kīḷayamāno vicaranto satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5147_1: Tasmiṃ buddhappamukhena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pavisante bhikkhū ekaṃ naṭaputtaṃ kīḷantaṃ disvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5147_3: atthi nu kho te ettha sineho”ti pucchitvā “natthī”ti vutte “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a0:5147_7: mama putto sabbayoge atikkanto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5151_0: Tattha mānusakaṃ yoganti mānusakaṃ āyuñceva pañca kāmaguṇe ca.
atk-s0502a0:5151_2: Upaccagāti yo mānusakaṃ yogaṃ hitvā dibbaṃ yogaṃ atikkanto,
atk-s0502a0:5151_3: taṃ sabbehi catūhipi yogehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5155_0: Hitvā ratiñcāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ naṭaputtakaṃyeva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5155_4: mama putto ratiñca aratiñca pahāya ṭhito”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5159_4: Vīranti taṃ evarūpaṃ sabbaṃ khandhalokaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ vīriyavantaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5163_0: Cutiṃ yo vedīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vaṅgīsattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5164_0: Rājagahe kireko brāhmaṇo vaṅgīso nāma matamanussānaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā “idaṃ niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ,
atk-s0502a0:5164_5: Brāhmaṇā “sakkā imaṃ nissāya lokaṃ khāditu”nti cintetvā taṃ dve rattavatthāni paridahāpetvā ādāya janapadaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5164_6: carantā manusse vadanti “eso vaṅgīso nāma brāhmaṇo matamanussānaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:5164_8: Manussā yathābalaṃ dasapi kahāpaṇe vīsatipi satampi datvā ñātakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0502a0:5164_9: Te anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa avidūre nivāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5164_10: Te bhuttapātarāsā mahājanaṃ gandhamālādihatthaṃ dhammassavanāya gacchantaṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti
atk-s0502a0:5164_11: pucchitvā “vihāraṃ dhammassavanāyā”ti vutte “tattha gantvā kiṃ karissatha,
atk-s0502a0:5164_16: amhākaṃ satthārā sadiso nāma natthī”ti vatvā itarehipi “vaṅgīsasadiso natthī”ti vutte kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “etha,
atk-s0502a0:5164_17: dāni vo vaṅgīsassa vā amhākaṃ vā satthu jānanabhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti te ādāya vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a0:5164_18: Satthā tesaṃ āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā niraye tiracchānayoniyaṃ manussaloke devaloketi catūsu ṭhānesu nibbattānaṃ cattāri sīsāni,
atk-s0502a0:5164_19: khīṇāsavasīsañcāti pañca sīsāni āharāpetvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā āgatakāle vaṅgīsaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a0:5164_20: “tvaṃ kira sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā matakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a0:5164_24: Athassa satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā itarānipi tīṇi sīsāni pucchitvā tena avirajjhitvā vuttavuttakkhaṇe
atk-s0502a0:5164_25: tatheva tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā pañcamaṃ sīsaṃ dassetvā “idaṃ kassa sīsa”nti pucchi,
atk-s0502a0:5164_26: so tampi ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0502a0:5165_3: Atha naṃ vaṅgīso yāci “detha me imaṃ manta”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5165_5: So “imasmiṃ mante gahite sakalajambudīpe ahaṃ jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā te brāhmaṇe “tumhe tattheva katipāhaṃ vasatha,
atk-s0502a0:5165_6: ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti uyyojetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vaṅgīsatthero nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a0:5165_7: Athassa satthā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā “mantassa parikammaṃ sajjhāyāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5165_8: So taṃ sajjhāyanto antarantarā brāhmaṇehi “gahito te manto”ti pucchiyamāno “āgametha tāva,
atk-s0502a0:5165_9: gaṇhāmī”ti vatvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā puna brāhmaṇehi puṭṭho “abhabbo dānāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5165_17: mama putto cutipaṭisandhikusalo jāto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a0:5168_0: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a0:5172_0: Tattha yo vedīti yo sattānaṃ sabbākārena cutiñca paṭisandhiñca pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti,
atk-s0502a0:5172_3: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhatāya buddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5172_4: Yassāti yassete devādayo gatiṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0502a0:5172_6: kilesehi ārakattā arahantaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5176_0: Yassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto dhammadinnaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5177_0: Ekadivasañhi tassā gihikāle sāmiko visākho upāsako satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a0:5177_2: So tato pubbe āgacchanto dhammadinnaṃ vātapānena olokentiṃ disvā sitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a0:5177_3: Taṃ divasaṃ pana vātapānena ṭhitaṃ anolokentova agamāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5177_10: Atha naṃ visākho sukhanisinnavelāya taṃ pakkositvā “dhammadinne imasmiṃ gehe sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ paṭicchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a0:5177_12: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā “tumhe pana,
atk-s0502a0:5177_14: Ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya na kiñci vicāremīti.
atk-s0502a0:5177_18: bhadde”ti sampaṭicchitvā mahantena sakkārena taṃ bhikkhunīupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a0:5178_0: Sā pavivekakāmatāya bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ janapadaṃ gantvā tattha viharantī na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0502a0:5178_1: arahattaṃ patvā “idāni maṃ nissāya ñātijanā puññāni karissantī”ti punadeva rājagahaṃ paccāgañchi.
atk-s0502a0:5178_2: Upāsako tassā āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena āgatā”ti bhikkhunīupassayaṃ gantvā theriṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “ukkaṇṭhitā nu khosi,
atk-s0502a0:5178_4: pañhamekaṃ naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā sotāpattimagge pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0502a0:5178_6: Upāsako teneva upāyena sesamaggesupi pañhaṃ pucchitvā atikkamma pañhassa puṭṭhakāle tāya “accayāsi, āvuso,
atk-s0502a0:5178_7: visākhā”ti vatvā “ākaṅkhamāno satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā imaṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vutte theriṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a0:5178_8: uṭṭhāyāsanā satthu santikaṃ gantvā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0502a0:5178_10: ahampetaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento evameva vissajjeyya”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5180_0: “Yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:5182_3: Natthi kiñcananti yassetesu ṭhānesu taṇhāgāhasaṅkhātaṃ kiñcanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a0:5182_4: tamahaṃ rāgakiñcanādīhi akiñcanaṃ kassaci gahaṇassa abhāvena anādānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5186_0: Usabhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5186_1: Vatthu “na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajantī”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vuttameva.
atk-s0502a0:5187_3: duṭṭhahatthiṃ chattaṃ dhāretvā ṭhitaṃ disvā bhāyī”ti?
atk-s0502a0:5187_11: Khīṇāsavausabhānañhi antare jeṭṭhakausabhā mama puttasadisā bhikkhū na bhāyantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5190_0: Anejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a0:5191_1: acchambhitaṭṭhena usabhasadisatāya usabhaṃ uttamaṭṭhena pavaraṃ vīriyasampattiyā vīraṃ mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5191_2: esitattā mahesiṃ tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vijitattā vijitāvinaṃ nhātakilesatāya nhātakaṃ catusaccabuddhatāya buddhaṃ
atk-s0502a0:5191_3: taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a0:5195_0: Pubbenivāsanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devahitabrāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a0:5196_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā vātarogena ābādhiko hutvā upavāṇattheraṃ uṇhodakatthāya devahitabrāhmaṇassa santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a0:5196_1: So gantvā satthu ābādhikabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā uṇhodakaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a0:5196_2: taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “lābhā vata me,
atk-s0502a0:5196_3: yaṃ mama santikaṃ sammāsambuddho uṇhodakassatthāya sāvakaṃ pahiṇī”ti uṇhodakassa kājaṃ purisena gāhāpetvā phāṇitassa ca puṭaṃ upavāṇattherassa pādāsi.
atk-s0502a0:5196_4: Thero taṃ gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā uṇhodakena phāṇitaṃ āloḷetvā bhagavato pādāsi,
atk-s0502a0:5196_7: “kassa nu kho deyyadhammo dinno mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0502a0:5196_8: satthāraṃ pucchissāmī”ti so satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5199_0: Athassa satthā “evarūpassa brāhmaṇassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a0:5204_2: chabbīsatidevalokabhedaṃ saggañca catubbidhaṃ apāyañca dibbacakkhunā passati,
atk-s0502a0:5204_4: abhiññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānitvā pariññeyyaṃ parijānitvā pahātabbaṃ pahāya sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatvā vosiko niṭṭhānaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a0:5204_7: tamahaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ vosānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vutthabhāvena sabbavositavosānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti.
atk-s0502a0:5205_1: Brāhmaṇopi pasannamānaso saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ pavedesīti.
atk-s0502a0:5210_25: brāhmaṇavagge cattālīsāti pañcādhikāni tīṇi vatthusatāni pakāsetvā nātisaṅkhepanātivitthāravasena uparacitā
atk-s0502a0:5212_0: Gāthā dhammapade tena, bhāsitā yā mahesinā.
atk-s0502a0:5221_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, kusalā sabbapāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0502a0:5222_0: Sabbe ijjhantu saṅkappā, labhantu madhuraṃ phalanti.
atk-s0502a0:5223_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0502a0:5223_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katāyaṃ dhammapadaṭṭhakathā –
